name: New Body and Mind
tags: Beauty & Wellness, Detox & Weight Loss, Swimming Pool, Sauna, Steam Room, Floating Tank, Sound Healing, Bath Therapy, Health Food, Sports Massage, Herbal Steam Room, Thai Massage, Foot Massage, Coconut Oil Massage, Deep Tissue Massage, Neck And Shoulder Massage, Head Massage, Speciality Massages
description:
Thailand’s Premier Detox, Weight Loss & Wellness Retreat
Discover the transformative power of
New Body and Mind
, Thailand’s only exclusive retreat for detox, weight loss, and holistic wellness. Our carefully designed programs combine proven methods with a supportive, nurturing environment, helping you achieve long-lasting results for both body and mind.
Set against the tranquil backdrop of sand, sea, and sun, our retreat offers more than just relaxation—it’s an opportunity for true renewal. Our programs integrate advanced detox therapies, personalized weight loss plans, and rejuvenating treatments such as
massage, sauna, steam room, hydrotherapy, halotherapy, and float tank sessions
, all designed to cleanse, heal, and restore balance.
We go beyond physical transformation by focusing on overall well-being. Our
nutrition and mind management workshops
provide the tools to maintain a healthier lifestyle long after your retreat, ensuring sustainable change. Whether you're looking to reset your health, lose weight, or simply reconnect with yourself, New Body and Mind offers a
holistic approach to wellness
that nurtures both body and spirit.
With expert guidance, a peaceful setting, and a focus on personal growth, we provide an
extraordinary retreat experience
that will leave you feeling revitalized, empowered, and inspired to embrace a healthier, happier life."

tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Bars & Entertainment, Meat Lovers, Thai Food, International Food, Aussie Food, Cocktails, Wifi Access In Restaurant
description:
Authentic Aussie Dining in Koh Samui
Craving juicy steaks, hearty burgers, fresh seafood, or indulgent desserts? Bondi Aussie Bar & Grill brings you generous portions of the best Aussie food, expertly prepared with premium ingredients.
A True Aussie Experience:
Enjoy perfectly grilled steaks, succulent burgers, and crispy seafood, all cooked over open flames for that authentic BBQ flavor.
Premium Ingredients:
We use Australian meats and the freshest local produce to create mouth-watering dishes.
Gourmet Pub Grub:
Classic pub food gets a gourmet twist with delicious steaks, burgers, salads, sides, and decadent desserts.
Vibrant Atmosphere:
Whether you're enjoying dinner with friends or a family gathering, Bondi offers a welcoming, friendly vibe.
Join us for a true Aussie dining experience, packed with flavor and warmth."

Samui Media Group: Digital & Print Solutions
At Samui Media Group, we bring your vision to life with high-quality digital and print solutions. Our expert team excels in four key areas:
Web Design & Development:
Crafting stunning, functional websites for all needs—simple sites or complex e-commerce platforms.

Transforming ideas into captivating visuals, from logos to custom graphics.

Print Work:
High-quality print services for business cards, brochures, large format prints, and more.
We’re committed to excellence, ensuring every project exceeds expectations. Let’s create something amazing together."

name: The Outback Cafe
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Pet Friendly, Thai Food, International Food, Breakfast, Wifi Access In Restaurant
description:
Cozy Café in Lipa Noi
Nestled in the heart of Lipa Noi, The Outback offers a welcoming environment for enjoying freshly brewed coffee, hearty breakfasts, and delicious light lunches. Whether you're gathering with friends or enjoying a solo meal, the cozy and relaxed atmosphere makes it a perfect spot for every occasion.
Freshly Brewed Coffee & Hearty Breakfasts
Kick-start your day with our locally roasted coffee, available in various styles—from rich cappuccinos to refreshing iced lattes. Pair it with a hearty breakfast, including favorites like avocado toast, eggs benedict, pancakes, and smoothie bowls, all made with fresh, quality ingredients.
Tasty Lunch Options
For lunch, indulge in gourmet sandwiches, fresh salads, and nourishing bowls, all crafted to satisfy your cravings and provide a wholesome, delicious meal.
Relaxing & Welcoming Atmosphere
The Outback is the perfect place to unwind, whether you're enjoying a quiet morning coffee or a leisurely lunch. Come visit and experience a warm, inviting vibe that will make you feel right at home."

name: Samui Marketing
tags: Professional Services, Marketing, Seo Services, Digital Marketing, Logo Design
description:
The primary concept that ties everything that we do together is our consultative approach.
We are marketing consultants first, and our goal is to correctly diagnose the challenges you’re experiencing, and fit you with the appropriate solution that will help you to get the results you’re looking for.
As marketing consultants, we coach our clients on helping them to reach their dreams.
We help with business start ups, entrepreneur challenges, ideas, questions, and so much more. Our clients rely on us for marketing everything from starting their businesses to selling them, and all things in between.
As your dedicated marketing resource, the most common request that we receive is for us to become a partner.
Small businesses and medium-sized businesses need a partner to help them to accomplish their goals with marketing and business growth.
With the right expertise, you are much more likely to reach your goals. We expertly guide people along their journey."

tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Keto Friendly, Meat Lovers, Paleo Friendly, Thai Food, Airconditioned Area, Barbecue, American Food, International Food, Sunday Roast
description:
Located in the heart of Bangrak, Oliver's Steakhouse Bar & Grill offers a variety of mouthwatering dishes in a relaxed and welcoming atmosphere. Whether you're craving perfectly cooked steaks, juicy burgers, or fresh seafood, our menu is designed to satisfy every taste. We pride ourselves on using the finest ingredients, ensuring each dish is crafted with care and cooked to perfection.
Our Offerings
Steaks & Grilled Meats
: Enjoy expertly cooked steaks and a selection of grilled meats, all cooked to your preference.
Burgers & Pub Favorites
: Savor our gourmet burgers, hearty pub classics, and other comfort foods.
Casual Dining Experience
: Unwind in a friendly atmosphere while enjoying flavorful, expertly prepared dishes.
Whether you're enjoying a casual meal or celebrating with friends and family, Oliver's Steakhouse Bar & Grill offers the perfect spot for a memorable dining experience in Bangrak, Koh Samui."

name: New Leaf Detox Resort
tags: Beauty & Wellness, Detox & Weight Loss, Swimming Pool
description:
New
Leaf is one of Thailand’s finest Detox, Weight Loss and award-winning Wellness resorts on the beautiful Maenam Beach at Koh Samui.
We are the only
Thailand Resort
100% focused on weight loss and total body wellness: No fads, No fake diets, and No false claims.
No public restaurants or cafes are on-site to distract or derail you from your mission. No confusing procedures. Just one dedicated weight loss, fitness, health, and wellness program.
New Leaf Wellness has a track record of providing impeccable services since 2006 and is internationally recognized as one of the Worlds best Health, Weight Loss, and Wellness Resorts."

name: Nahm Restaurant & Bar
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Beachfront, International Food
description:
Nahm Restaurant & Bar – A Relaxed Dining Experience by the Sea
Located in Bangrak, Nahm Restaurant & Bar offers a serene and stylish dining experience with breathtaking ocean views, perfect for enjoying delicious food while taking in one of the most spectacular sunsets on Koh Samui.
Our Offerings:
Casual Dining by the Sea:
A relaxed yet elegant atmosphere with both indoor and outdoor seating, all offering stunning views of the coastline.
Fresh & Local Flavors:
A diverse menu that blends Thai-inspired dishes with international cuisine, crafted with fresh, locally sourced ingredients.
Sunset Views:
Experience one of the best sunset views on Koh Samui, making it the ideal spot for a memorable dining experience, whether it’s lunch or dinner.
Crafted Cocktails & Beverages:
Enjoy refreshing drinks from our extensive cocktail and wine list, designed to complement your meal perfectly.
Whether you're enjoying a laid-back lunch or a romantic dinner by the sea, Nahm Restaurant & Bar in Bangrak offers the perfect setting for an unforgettable dining experience."

name: Day & Night
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Rooftop Venues, Meat Lovers, Michelin Star, Thai Food, Airconditioned Area, Italian Food, International Food
description:
Timeless Dining Experience
Step into the charm of Day & Night in Chaweng, where vintage elegance meets modern comfort. Located in a beautifully restored building with a serene garden, this restaurant offers a delightful fusion of Thai and European cuisine, catering to all tastes in a relaxed yet refined atmosphere.
Culinary Excellence
Under the guidance of V. Veerapol Khamkasem, a chef with over 10 years of experience, Day & Night offers a creative twist on comfort food. Chef Veerapol, who transitioned from a computer graphics professional to the culinary world, combines traditional techniques with fresh, high-quality ingredients to create exceptional dishes.
Perfect for Every Occasion
Whether you're enjoying a casual meal or celebrating a special event, Day & Night offers an inviting setting for breakfast, lunch, or dinner. This exceptional dining experience will transport you from the everyday into a world of culinary delight."

name: Boujis Boutique Resort
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Bar, Wifi Access In Room, Private Room, Air Conditioning, Private Bathroom, Parking, Rooms With Seaview, Rooms With Balcony, Family Rooms, Sun Loungers Or Beach Chairs, Sun Umbrellas
description:
Boujis Boutique Resort in Chaweng Noi offers a tranquil escape with luxury villas, private pools, and breathtaking ocean views. This adults-only resort is perfect for couples or those seeking a peaceful retreat in Koh Samui. Our resort blends modern amenities with serene, natural surroundings. Enjoy the spacious, stylish villas with private outdoor spaces, including gardens and pools. Relax by the infinity pool, enjoy a massage, or stroll through our lush landscaped grounds.
With a prime location just a short walk from Chaweng Noi beach, you’re close to the island’s vibrant nightlife and attractions. Experience the best of both worlds with an exclusive, peaceful atmosphere and easy access to Samui’s entertainment spots. Boujis Boutique Resort is the perfect getaway for those seeking luxury, comfort, and an unforgettable stay in Koh Samui."

description:
Enjoy an unforgettable evening in Koh Samui, where refreshing drinks, great company, and vibrant live music come together. Whether you're sipping cocktails at the bar or enjoying the lively ambiance, every moment is designed for relaxation and fun.
Perfect for celebrations or simply unwinding, this place offers a welcoming atmosphere and friendly service that makes every visit special. With a blend of local and international flavors, it's the ideal spot for a night out, ensuring you leave with great memories and a desire to return."

The BAR Bowls Samui

At

Whether you're looking for a post-workout boost or simply want to enjoy a light and refreshing meal,

name: Kimpton Kitalay
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Pool Villas, Beachfront, Breakfast, Pet Friendly, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Room With Private Pool, Wifi Access In Room, Gym, Private Room, Air Conditioning, Private Bathroom, Parking, Rooms With Seaview, Laundry Service, Rooms With Balcony, Family Rooms, Sun Loungers Or Beach Chairs, Sun Umbrellas, Wellness, Kid's Club, 5* Accommodation
description:
Seaside Escape
Kimpton Kitalay Samui offers a charming escape along Koh Samui’s stunning coastline, blending romance, serenity, and local culture. Immerse yourself in the peaceful ambiance with a beachfront infinity pool and rejuvenating spa experiences.
Luxury and Heritage
Inspired by the island’s fishing village heritage, the resort combines relaxation and adventure, perfect for romantic getaways or fun family vacations. Enjoy dive trips, Instagram-worthy cocktails, and a thoughtfully curated social calendar.
Memorable Experiences
From quiet moments by the beach to exciting family-friendly activities, Kimpton Kitalay Samui ensures unforgettable experiences. Relax with a refreshing drink or indulge in luxurious spa treatments while soaking in the island’s beauty."

name: Shio Japanese Dining
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Airconditioned Area, Japanese Food, Cocktails
description:
Contemporary Japanese Restaurant & Sushi Bar
A Taste of the Tides
Discover vibrant Japanese cuisine at SHIO, a dynamic new restaurant and sushi bar in Koh Samui. Located at LANAI Bar & Lounge, SHIO is helmed by Chef Run, the culinary innovator behind Bangkok’s In the Mood for Love. Known for his creative sushi rolls, such as Wave Rider and High Tide, Chef Run brings a unique twist to traditional Japanese flavors.
SHIO serves premium seafood flown in from Japan, including Chu-toro, Hamachi, and signature rolls like Samui Song and Sassy Salmon. Main courses include Gindara Saikyo Yaki (grilled black cod) and Chirashi Don (assorted sashimi over sushi rice).
Enjoy the rustic-chic ambiance and ocean views as you indulge in authentic, fresh sushi and creative dishes. Open seasonally from January to May 2025, Thursday to Tuesday, 6:00–10:00 PM."

name: Boho Thai Lifestyle Café
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Thai Food, Airconditioned Area, Outdoor Dining, Family Friendly, International Food, Breakfast, Wifi Access In Restaurant
description:
All-Day Thai Lifestyle Café
Boho Thai Lifestyle Café blends retro charm with a modern twist, serving Thai classics and Western comfort food from morning to night. The menu features fresh salads, noodles, curries, fried favorites, and all-day breakfast. Refresh with creative sodas, iced teas, and cocktails made with local herbs, or treat yourself to house-baked pastries and indulgent desserts.
Set among lush resort greenery, guests can dine indoors or outside—with pets welcome on the terrace. Start your day with a tropical breakfast, gather for a relaxed brunch, or unwind at sunset with themed dinners under the stars.
Beyond dining, guests can explore local Thai art and lifestyle crafts, or join hands-on classes like flower arranging and Thai cooking. Boho Café offers more than a meal—it’s an easygoing experience that celebrates Thai flavor, creativity, and island life all in one vibrant space."

name: HOM baking company
tags: Food & Beverage, Bakeries & Coffee Shops, Pet Friendly, Airconditioned Area, Outdoor Dining
description:
Feel-Good Bakery & Café — Serving Freshly Baked Fun
HOM Baking Company is a cozy café and bakery where creativity meets comfort. From barista-crafted coffees and Thai milk tea to croissants, cakes, and other baked treats, everything is made fresh and with care.
Our menu changes throughout the day, offering a rotating selection of sweet and savory goods to suit every craving. Guests can also order custom hampers or personalized birthday cakes for any age or occasion.
For those who love to get hands-on, HOM hosts fun baking activities like cookie decorating and cupcake workshops—perfect for all ages. Whether you’re popping in for a quick treat or spending time with family and friends, HOM brings a little extra joy to your day.

name: Shades Ocean Lounge & Bar

name: Lanai Bar & Lounge
tags: Bars & Nightlife, Bars & Pubs, Cocktail Bars, Hotel Bars
description:
Koh Samui's Stylish Hangout
Located near the entrance of Kimpton Kitalay Samui, LANAI Bar & Lounge is the ideal spot to unwind after a day of island exploration. Its design blends geometric patterns, Thai-inspired elements, and vibrant furniture, creating a unique atmosphere to enjoy curated drinks and creative cocktails.
LANAI serves a wide range of Thai-grown spirits and international favorites, offering expertly crafted cocktails perfect for sunset or a late-night sip. Enjoy the laid-back vibe while indulging in sweet treats or savory snacks from the kitchen, including sandwiches, salads, and hearty shareable plates.
True to Kimpton Kitalay Samui's welcoming spirit, LANAI also provides a cool bowl of water to keep your furry companions refreshed while you relax and enjoy the evening."

name: Kitavaree Spa & Wellness
tags: Beauty & Wellness, Massage, Spa & Beauty, Body Scrub, Body Wrap, Facial, Thai Massage, Foot Massage, Coconut Oil Massage, Deep Tissue Massage, Aromatic Swedish Massage, Speciality Massages
description:
Stay Well
Tucked within the peaceful surroundings of Kitalay, Kitavaree is a serene escape designed to inspire calm and clarity. This wellness haven blends local fishing heritage with contemporary comforts, offering a thoughtful retreat rooted in tradition and mindfulness.
Guests are invited to reconnect with themselves through experiences that honor authenticity, sustainability, and tranquility. Kitavaree is more than a spa—it's a journey into balance and inner peace, set in a space where the past and present meet in quiet harmony."

name: Benzo Sushi Bar & Grill
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Thai Food, Japanese Food, Cocktails
description:
Benzo Sushi Bar & Grill, located in the heart of Chaweng, offers an upscale Japanese dining experience with a modern twist. Led by Chef Ben, who brings over 15 years of experience in top Japanese kitchens across Europe and Asia, this stylish restaurant blends business and leisure dining in a relaxed, sophisticated atmosphere.
The menu features a curated selection of sushi, grilled dishes, and Japanese favorites, all made with the finest ingredients. Whether you’re enjoying a casual meal, hosting a business dinner, or celebrating a special occasion, Benzo provides exceptional service and an inviting ambiance. Chef Ben’s expertise ensures that each dish is a memorable blend of traditional Japanese flavors and contemporary flair.
For fresh sushi, grilled seafood, and creative Japanese dishes, Benzo Sushi Bar & Grill in Chaweng is the perfect spot for an elevated dining experience in Koh Samui."

name: Treehouse Silent Beach resort
tags: Accommodation, Bungalows, Beachfront, Breakfast, Restaurant, Wifi Access In Room, Air Conditioning, Rooms With Balcony, Fan Room, 3* Accommodation
description:
Welcome to all Treehouse friends...
​We have a new Backpacker Option, lovely but basic Bamboo Huts with shared Bathroom...starts at 300,-THB
Fan & Air-con Bungalow's
We have 13 Air-con and 9 Fan Bungalow's nestled in our beautiful tropical garden. There are 7 seafront room's available. All bungalow's have private bathroom with hot shower and a nice veranda.
WIFI is available throughout the area. Our restaurant offers wide selection of Thai and international food as well as fancy drinks!
For reservation drop us a message, but please be aware that minimum stay in peak season (Christmas/New year) is 3 nights. We always try to keep some room's for walk in guest's!"

name: Resto Treehouse Silent Beach
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Beachfront, Thai Food, Outdoor Dining, Fusion Food, Family Friendly, International Food, Wifi Access In Restaurant
description:
Delicious Thai & International Cuisine
We offer a diverse menu featuring delicious and healthy food, served in a cozy, inviting atmosphere just steps from the beach. Our selection includes authentic Thai dishes, freshly prepared Red Snapper Fish, and a variety of international favorites such as hummus wraps, homemade falafel, quesadillas, chili con carne, Indian dal, and schnitzel – there's something to satisfy every craving.
All our dishes are made fresh daily, with a focus on high-quality ingredients and reasonable prices, maintaining our dedication to exceptional food for over 20 years.
Relax and unwind with one of our 10 different mojitos, or choose from an extensive cocktail menu and special shakes. Enjoy our Mojito Happy Hour every day from 4 pm to 7 pm, with drinks priced at just 99 Baht! Whether you're watching the sunset or lounging on the beach, Treehouse offers the perfect setting for a memorable experience.
Join us for great food, refreshing drinks, and breathtaking views."

name: Passa
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Live Music, Meat Lovers, Seafood, Thai Food, Airconditioned Area, Fusion Food, French Food, Italian Food, International Food, Cocktails, Wifi Access In Restaurant
description:
At Passa Restaurant, we believe in the art of using food to create happiness. Located in the heart of Koh Samui, our culinary team is driven by a passion for fine dining and the discovery of premium, locally-sourced ingredients. We collaborate with local producers to bring you the freshest and highest-quality produce, ensuring each dish is a celebration of flavor.
Supported by a creative and dynamic team, every meal at Passa is meticulously crafted to awaken all your senses. A harmonious blend of spices and condiments infuses international flavors into our dishes, offering an unforgettable dining experience. Let your senses guide you on a culinary journey of discovery and delight."

Enjoy transformative healing in a serene, peaceful environment designed to support your journey to optimal health and vitality."

name: The Fish Restaurant
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Thai Food, Outdoor Dining, Mexican Food, International Food
description:
The Fish Restaurant: A Culinary Journey in Maenam, Koh Samui
Nestled in the charming area of
Maenam
, Koh Samui,
The Fish Restaurant
offers a diverse and exciting dining experience with a menu that blends Thai, seafood, European, and Mexican cuisines. Known for using fresh, high-quality ingredients, this restaurant caters to every palate in a relaxed, welcoming atmosphere.
Authentic Thai Cuisine
Savor the bold, aromatic flavors of traditional Thai dishes like Pad Thai, Green Curry, Tom Yum, and Som Tum, all prepared with the finest local ingredients.
Fresh Seafood Delights
Seafood is a specialty at The Fish Restaurant, with an extensive menu featuring freshly caught fish, prawns, and grilled lobster. Indulge in seafood platters, grilled fish, or seafood curries while enjoying the coastal ambiance.
European Comforts
For a European twist, enjoy hearty pasta dishes, steaks, and risottos—each crafted with care and attention to detail.
Mexican Flavors
Craving spice? Delight in tacos, burritos, fajitas, and quesadillas, all bursting with fresh, traditional flavors.
Located in scenic Maenam, The Fish Restaurant is the perfect spot for a relaxed meal with friends or family."

name: Samui Modern Construction
tags: Property Services, Construction, Home Improvement
description:
With over 40 years of construction expertise and 15 years of dedicated service to the community, we’re your go-to destination for crafting bespoke villas that endure the test of time.
Specializing in tailoring exquisite villas to your unique vision and lifestyle, our skilled artisans are committed to bringing your dream home to life. Whether you envision a tranquil oasis nestled amidst lush tropical foliage or a contemporary masterpiece with panoramic ocean views, we’re here to turn your aspirations into reality.
Backed by comprehensive warranties and a commitment to ongoing staff development, we ensure not just exceptional craftsmanship, but also enduring peace of mind for our clients. Trust us to exceed your expectations and elevate your living experience."

name: Beyond Samui Resort
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Bar, Wifi Access In Room, Gym, Air Conditioning, Rooms With Seaview, Rooms With Balcony, Family Rooms, Sun Loungers Or Beach Chairs, Sun Umbrellas, Wellness
description:
A beautifully designed Thai-style beach resort located at the northern end of Chaweng Beach, Koh Samui, offers a serene escape just minutes away from the island’s vibrant entertainment center. The resort is divided into Hillside and Beachside zones, offering stunning beachfront views and easy access to the calm waters of the bay.
Relax and unwind with a complimentary welcome drink upon check-in, followed by a soothing massage or a refreshing swim at the pool. Indulge in authentic Thai cuisine at the restaurant, where dishes are prepared with the freshest local ingredients for a truly memorable dining experience."

name: Kanda Spa
tags: Beauty & Wellness, Massage, Spa & Beauty, Sauna, Body Scrub, Facial, Thai Massage, Foot Massage, Coconut Oil Massage, Head Massage
description:
Kanda Spa in Chaweng offers a rejuvenating wellness experience that combines the enchanting magic of Asia with ultimate relaxation. Whether you're arriving in Koh Samui or simply seeking a peaceful escape during your holiday, Kanda Spa provides a tranquil environment for you to de-stress and awaken your senses.
Open to both in-house guests and outside customers, advance reservations are highly recommended to ensure availability. The spa features six specialized rooms with a total capacity for 13 people, each designed to cater to your unique wellness needs:
Thai Massage Room
: Accommodates up to 3 guests, ideal for traditional Thai massage.
Dalah
: Accommodates 2 guests for authentic Thai massage experiences.
Rose

Lotus

name: Beyond @ Beach Restaurant

description:
Savor delicious meals at our Beyond @ Beach Restaurant, perfectly located by the beachside and swimming pool, where you can enjoy breathtaking views of the sea.
Relax under palm trees and umbrellas while sipping on creative cocktails at our beach bar.
Our recently revamped menu features a variety of starters, fresh salads, tasty sandwiches, mouthwatering mains, decadent desserts, and more, ensuring a delightful dining experience for every taste.
Whether you're here for a casual lunch or a special evening, our inviting atmosphere and stunning views make every meal unforgettable."

name: THINK & Retro Cafe
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Beach Bars, Beachfront, Live Music, Thai Food, Outdoor Dining, International Food, Breakfast, Wifi Access In Restaurant
description:
A Chill Beachside Spot in Lipa Noi
Set right on the quiet shores of Lipa Noi, THINK – Retro Cafe Samui is a laid-back escape with vintage charm, sea views, and easy beach vibes. Whether you're stopping in for a bite or spending the afternoon lounging by the water, this is the kind of place that makes you want to stay a little longer.
Here’s what you’ll find at THINK:
Beachside dining just steps from the sand, tasty food and cold drinks, from small snacks to full meals, served fresh and paired with smoothies, cocktails, or a cold beer, a relaxed retro vibe with quirky, throwback style, open sea views perfect for watching the tide roll in, and a great space for unwinding, come solo with a book, hang out with friends, or just kick back and enjoy the scene.
Whether you’re here for lunch, a sunset drink, or a full day of beachfront chilling, THINK – Retro Cafe is a spot worth remembering on your Koh Samui trip."

name: I -Talay Resort
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Bungalows, Beachfront, Breakfast, Restaurant
description:
Talay Taling Ngam Samui offers relaxed holiday cottage accommodation on Taling Ngam Beach and 15 minutes by car from Na Muang Waterfall I. Free WiFi is available in public areas, and private parking can be reserved in advance.
Each unit includes a seating area and a private bathroom. Towels are provided.
Guests can enjoy local food and drinks at the on-site restaurant and bar within a relax atmosphere on the beach. Packed lunches are also available.
There’s a private beach area for guests, and bikes and cars can be rented directly from the property. Activities like darts, snorkeling, diving, and cycling are popular in the surrounding area."

name: Casa De Mar Resort
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Bar, Wifi Access In Room, Private Room, Air Conditioning, Private Bathroom, Parking, Rooms With Balcony, Family Rooms, Sun Loungers Or Beach Chairs, Sun Umbrellas

name: Banana Fan Sea Resort
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Bar, Wifi Access In Room, Air Conditioning, Rooms With Balcony, Family Rooms, Sun Loungers Or Beach Chairs, Sun Umbrellas
description:
A Tropical Haven on Chaweng Beach
Located on the southern end of Chaweng Beach in Samui, Banana Fan Sea Resort is a serene tropical retreat offering white sand beaches and crystal-clear waters. Just a short distance from the vibrant nightlife, shopping, and dining of Chaweng, it provides the perfect balance of relaxation and convenience.
The resort features a collection of private bungalows, each designed to offer the utmost comfort and privacy. Enjoy breathtaking views of distant islands from your poolside or private terrace. Each bungalow is equipped with modern amenities, including air conditioning, a TV with international channels, a mini-bar, a telephone, and a spacious bathroom with a bath. Set within lush gardens, Banana Fan Sea Resort offers a relaxing atmosphere where guests can unwind while enjoying the stunning surroundings.
Whether you're here to relax by the pool, take in the beautiful beach views, or explore the nearby attractions, Banana Fan Sea Resort ensures an unforgettable stay in paradise."

name: Baitong Restaurant
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Beachfront, Live Music, Thai Food, International Food, Cocktails, Wifi Access In Restaurant
description:
Baitong Restaurant, located on the beachfront in Chaweng, offers a truly unforgettable dining experience. Whether you're celebrating a special occasion or enjoying an intimate dinner, our venue provides the perfect atmosphere with stunning ocean views, elegant decorations, and impeccable service. Set against the backdrop of the ocean, Baitong Restaurant combines the beauty of nature with luxurious dining.
Our menu features a delightful mix of local Thai dishes and international cuisine, all crafted to elevate your dining experience. Each dish is prepared with the finest ingredients to create flavors that satisfy every palate. Whether you're in the mood for traditional Thai flavors or international favorites, Baitong Restaurant offers a diverse selection to suit every taste.
As part of the Banana Fan Sea Resort, we offer a unique blend of luxury, ambiance, and exceptional service. Our team is dedicated to creating memorable moments for every guest, ensuring your dining experience is nothing short of perfect. Whether it’s a romantic evening or a celebration with loved ones, Baitong Restaurant is the ideal spot to make lasting memories."

name: Yada Beach Bar & Restaurant
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Beachfront, Thai Food, Outdoor Dining
description:
Yada Beach Bar & Restaurant
in Koh Samui is a laid-back, tropical dining spot situated along the island's stunning coastline. Known for its relaxed atmosphere, the venue combines a cozy beachfront setting with great food and drinks, making it a popular destination for both locals and tourists. Whether you're in the mood for a refreshing cocktail while watching the sunset or a delicious meal by the sea, Yada Beach Bar offers a blend of traditional Thai and international cuisine, with an emphasis on fresh, high-quality ingredients.
The restaurant's casual, stylish design complements its beachfront location, with seating options that allow guests to enjoy the ocean breeze and picturesque views of the Gulf of Thailand. The bar offers a wide selection of cocktails, beers, and wines, perfect for unwinding after a day of exploring the island."

name: Samui Steam Clean
tags: Property Services, Cleaning Services
description:
Samui Steam clean
is a professional cleaning service based in Koh Samui, specializing in eco-friendly and high-quality steam cleaning solutions for homes, offices, and commercial spaces. The company is known for its attention to detail and commitment to using environmentally safe products and techniques, ensuring a deep clean that is both effective and gentle on the environment.
Samui Steam clean offers a range of services, including deep carpet cleaning, upholstery cleaning, tile and grout cleaning, and general home cleaning. Using advanced steam-cleaning technology, they can effectively remove dirt, stains, and allergens without the need for harsh chemicals, making it a great choice for those seeking a more sustainable and healthy cleaning option.
Whether you're looking to freshen up your home, clean your office space, or restore the appearance of your furniture, Samui Steam clean provides professional and reliable services that leave your space looking fresh, clean, and inviting. Their team of experienced cleaners ensures top-notch results with minimal disruption, providing a hassle-free experience for their clients. Ideal for both residential and commercial clients, Samui Steam clean is dedicated to maintaining the highest standards of cleanliness and customer satisfaction."

name: Savor Catering
tags: Food & Beverage, Catering, Seafood, French Food, Russian Food, Tapas, International Food, Delivery, Fine Dining
description:
Savor Catering specializes in creating customized food experiences that cater to a variety of tastes and dietary preferences, whether you're craving traditional Thai flavors, international dishes, or something more contemporary.
With a focus on fresh, locally sourced ingredients and professional presentation, Savor Catering prides itself on delivering a memorable dining experience for its clients. Their team of skilled chefs is passionate about crafting gourmet meals, with options ranging from elegant plated dinners to casual buffet-style spreads. The service also includes options for themed menus, vegetarian and vegan dishes, and other dietary restrictions, ensuring every guest is catered for.
Savor Catering Samui takes care of all the details, from food preparation and service to setup and cleanup, allowing clients to relax and enjoy their event. Whether you're hosting an intimate gathering at a private villa, a corporate event, or a large-scale wedding, Savor Catering provides personalized service to make every occasion special."

name: The Cork
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, International Food, Wine Bar
description:
A stylish and vibrant wine bar and restaurant located on the beautiful island of Koh Samui, offering a refined yet relaxed setting for wine lovers and food enthusiasts. The Cork Samui is a go-to destination for those seeking to enjoy quality wines paired with exceptional cuisine.
In addition to its outstanding wine selection, The Cork Samui serves a menu of expertly crafted dishes, blending European and Thai influences. The restaurant is known for its elegant yet unpretentious approach to dining, with everything from fresh seafood and locally inspired flavors to more classic international dishes. Whether you’re enjoying a casual meal with friends or a romantic dinner.
With both indoor and outdoor seating options, make it an ideal spot for a relaxed evening out. The knowledgeable and friendly staff ensure that every guest has an exceptional experience, making it one of the most popular venues on the island for wine and dining."

name: The Thai Tapas
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Thai Food
description:
The Thai Tapas
in Koh Samui offers a unique twist on traditional Thai cuisine by serving a variety of small, shareable dishes inspired by the flavors of Thailand. The restaurant provides an intimate, stylish setting where guests can sample a range of dishes, from spicy salads to savory stir-fries and flavorful curries, all served in tapas-sized portions.
With a focus on fresh ingredients and authentic flavors,
The Thai Tapas
allows diners to enjoy a diverse culinary experience, perfect for those who want to explore a variety of Thai dishes in one meal. The vibrant atmosphere, coupled with excellent service, makes it a great spot for both casual meals and special gatherings. Whether you're dining with friends or on a romantic night out,
The Thai Tapas
offers a delightful way to experience Thai cuisine in a fun and interactive format."

name: The Road Less Travelled
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Bakeries & Coffee Shops, Airconditioned Area, Fusion Food, Vegetarian, International Food, Breakfast
description:
The Road Less Travelled Bistro
in Koh Samui offers a cozy and welcoming dining experience with a focus on fresh, locally sourced ingredients and a menu inspired by international and fusion flavors. Located in a charming setting, the bistro provides a relaxed atmosphere, ideal for those looking to enjoy delicious meals in a laid-back environment.
The menu at
The Road Less Travelled Bistro
features a variety of dishes, from hearty breakfasts and light lunches to creative dinner options. You’ll find a mix of comfort foods, healthy options, and signature dishes with a twist, perfect for satisfying different tastes. Whether you're in the mood for a flavorful salad, a hearty burger, or a carefully crafted vegetarian dish, the bistro's menu has something for everyone."

The club focuses on physical activity, creativity, and social interaction with fitness classes, sports, and creative workshops that help children develop essential skills in a safe, nurturing environment.
Adults can enjoy fitness programs, making it a vibrant, family-friendly destination where everyone can pursue health and wellness goals.

name: Samui Elephant Haven
tags: Things To Do, Must See, On The Land, Elephants
description:
Samui Elephant Haven is a dedicated sanctuary on Koh Samui, Thailand, focused on the rescue, rehabilitation, and care of elephants. Unlike traditional elephant attractions, this ethical sanctuary offers a safe, natural environment where elephants can live freely. Visitors can interact with the elephants in a respectful manner, learn about their behavior and needs, and contribute to important conservation efforts.
At Samui Elephant Haven, we prioritize humane treatment, promoting awareness of elephant welfare and ethical tourism. Our mission is to educate the public about the importance of conservation and to provide a peaceful refuge for rescued elephants. Experience the beauty of these majestic creatures in a way that supports their well-being and helps protect them for future generations. Visit Samui Elephant Haven for a meaningful, eco-friendly encounter with elephants in Koh Samui."

name: Mom To Be
tags: Children's Needs, Children & Parenting, Children Playgrounds
description:
Mom To Be Koh Samui
provides comprehensive support for expecting families, offering expert
doula services
,
childbirth education
, and personalized
prenatal care
.
Our services also include
yoga classes for adults
and
kids’ activities
, creating a balanced and holistic experience for the whole family. Whether you’re preparing for birth, seeking emotional support, or looking to stay active and healthy during pregnancy, our experienced team is here to guide you every step of the way.
Join us in Koh Samui for family bonding, and expert care."

name: Party Time Samui
tags: Children's Needs, Child Activities, Party Needs
description:
Party Time Samui is your ultimate destination for fun and entertainment on Koh Samui! Whether you're planning a birthday party, corporate event, or a special celebration, we provide everything you need to create unforgettable memories. Enjoy exciting inflatables, delicious snacks from our treat stalls, and a variety of game tables that keep guests of all ages entertained.
From kids to adults, our family-friendly events are packed with activities designed for everyone to have a blast. Whether you're looking to host a lively event or a relaxed gathering, Party Time Samui guarantees fun, laughter, and a vibrant atmosphere. Let us handle the entertainment and bring the party to your next celebration. Make your event truly special with Party Time Samui—where the fun never ends!"

Welcome to
The Pug House Samui
, a cozy and pet-friendly café and boutique in the heart of Koh Samui, dedicated to pug lovers and all animal enthusiasts! At our charming venue, you can indulge in delicious vegan food and drinks while spending quality time with adorable pugs in a relaxed and inviting atmosphere.
Whether you're here to enjoy a peaceful moment with your furry friends, meet fellow dog lovers, or shop for unique pug-themed merchandise,
The Pug House Samui
offers an unforgettable experience. Our café is the perfect destination for those who love animals and seek a community of like-minded pet lovers."

name: The Boudoir
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Catering, French Food
description:
A Culinary Journey of Passion, Sincerity, and Generosity
At Boudoir, each dish we serve tells a compelling story—a story of passion, a love for beautiful ingredients, and the joy of sharing unforgettable moments. It is where classic French cuisine meets fresh, local produce, creating a dining experience that appeals not only to the senses but also to the heart.
Authentic French Cuisine:
At Boudoir, we bring the timeless traditions of French cooking to life, using only the finest ingredients. Our dishes are meticulously crafted, fusing the richness of French culinary techniques with the freshest seasonal produce. Whether you're enjoying a beloved bistro favorite or exploring a creative new interpretation of a classic, our menu is designed to delight and inspire.
Some days the menu will be only the suggestions of the day with a choice of 3 to 4 dishes as a starter, same for main course and about 3 dessert prices at 550 thb for main, 850 thb for starter and main and 1050 thb for starter, main and dessert. Wine prices start from 1000 thb for a bottle."

name: Red Moon
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Thai Food, French Food
description:
Red Moon Koh Samui: A Unique Fusion of French and Thai Cuisine
Red Moon Koh Samui is a vibrant French-Thai restaurant located in the heart of Fisherman’s Village. This charming dining spot offers a delightful blend of French culinary artistry and authentic Thai flavors, using the freshest local ingredients to create dishes that are both exquisite and unforgettable.
A Perfect Blend of French and Thai Flavors
At Red Moon, we pride ourselves on creating a menu that combines the best of both French and Thai cuisines. Our chefs expertly craft each dish, from timeless French classics to innovative Thai-inspired creations, ensuring that every bite is a celebration of flavor. Using locally sourced ingredients, we bring together the boldness of Thai spices with the sophistication of French culinary techniques for a dining experience that is truly unique.
Cozy Atmosphere with Stunning Views
Whether you're enjoying a romantic dinner for two or a casual meal with friends, Red Moon offers a cozy and welcoming atmosphere that enhances your dining experience. Located in Fisherman’s Village, the restaurant offers stunning views, making it the perfect place to relax and enjoy your meal. The combination of intimate indoor seating and outdoor options provides a flexible setting to suit any occasion.
Exquisite Dishes and Fine Wine Pairings
Our menu is a carefully curated selection of expertly prepared dishes, designed to offer something for everyone. From classic French recipes like duck confit and beef bourguignon to Thai-inspired creations like spicy green curry and fragrant pad thai, Red Moon has a dish to satisfy all tastes. To complement your meal, we offer a fine selection of wines, handpicked to pair perfectly with our diverse menu.
Unforgettable Dining Experience in Koh Samui
Red Moon is more than just a restaurant—it's a place where culinary art meets breathtaking views and exceptional service. Whether you're visiting Koh Samui for the first time or are a regular guest, a meal at Red Moon promises to be an unforgettable experience.
Visit us at Fisherman’s Village for a dining experience that combines the finest of French and Thai flavors in a warm, inviting atmosphere. Your journey through the tastes of Koh Samui starts here."

name: Organic Farm & Coffee Shop
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Bakeries & Coffee Shops, Thai Food, Outdoor Dining, Viewpoint, International Food, Breakfast, Coffee Shop
description:
Visit our Organic Farm & Coffee Shop, where the owner greets you with open arms and a warm smile! Nestled on a charming hilltop, our cozy cafe offers a truly inviting atmosphere, perfect for relaxing and enjoying fresh, locally sourced food and drinks. Every dish is made with the finest organic ingredients from our farm, ensuring a farm-to-table experience that's both delicious and wholesome.
Sip on freshly brewed coffee or indulge in one of our specialty drinks while soaking in the breathtaking views and the friendly ambiance. Our dedicated team provides attentive service, making every visit feel like a personal experience. Whether you're here to enjoy a meal, a drink, or simply unwind, we promise an unforgettable time in our peaceful hilltop retreat. Come join us for good food, great company, and an amazing atmosphere!"

name: The Culture
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Spa Retreat, Restaurant
description:
The Culture Samui: A Vibrant Resort on Bangrak Beach
Nestled along the stunning Bangrak Beach, The Culture Samui offers guests an immersive experience in Thailand’s rich traditions and culture. With direct beachfront access, this vibrant resort provides the ideal setting for tranquility, privacy, and personal discovery.
Luxurious Rooms and Villas
The resort features 51 beautifully designed rooms and villas that blend modern luxury with cultural influences. Each room comes equipped with free Wi-Fi and top-tier amenities, providing a relaxing space to unwind. Whether you choose a villa with a private pool or a room with ocean views, you'll find a perfect retreat.
A Space for Discovery and Relaxation
Guests can enjoy a variety of facilities, including a beachfront restaurant offering Thai and international dishes, and a beach bar with refreshing drinks and sunset views.
Exceptional Facilities
Relax by the infinity pool, work out in the gym, or unwind in the library—each space is designed for comfort and cultural exploration.
A Cultural Experience Like No Other
Whether you're seeking a peaceful retreat or adventure, The Culture Samui provides the perfect backdrop for a memorable stay."

name: Explorar - Adults Only Resort & Spa
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Pool Villas, Adults Only, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Room With Private Pool, Wifi Access In Room, Private Room, Air Conditioning, Private Bathroom, Parking, Rooms With Seaview, Canoeing, Laundry Service, Airport Shuttle, Rooms With Balcony, Sun Loungers Or Beach Chairs, Sun Umbrellas, 24 Hours Front Desk
description:
Adults Only Resort & Spa
Located on Mae Nam Beach, Explorar Koh Samui offers an exclusive adults-only retreat with world-class service. Enjoy a seamless check-in with a refreshing coconut and optional local rum. The resort features 125 modern rooms with private balconies and breathtaking sea views. For a more private experience, choose from 34 luxurious villas, including 13 beach pool villas with direct access to the turquoise waters.
Start your day with fresh juices and a hearty breakfast, then relax by the 50-meter infinity pool or indulge in complimentary water activities on the beach. Stay active with yoga, Muay Thai, or a workout in the 24-hour fitness center. Our award-winning spa offers ultimate relaxation.
Enjoy Mediterranean dining, wood-fired pizzas, fresh seafood, and cocktails crafted by expert mixologists. Committed to sustainability, we source local ingredients and support the community. Explore a perfect balance of relaxation, wellness, and luxury at Explorar Koh Samui."

name: Odyssey
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Beachfront, Thai Food, Outdoor Dining, International Food, Wifi Access In Restaurant
description:
Discover a world of flavors at Odyssey, the signature beachfront restaurant of Explorar Resort in Mae Nam, Koh Samui. Combining Mediterranean and Thai cuisines, Odyssey offers expertly crafted dishes in a relaxed, elegant setting with breathtaking ocean views.
Inspired by the rich culinary traditions of Greece, Italy, and France, our menu features highlights like charcoal-grilled seafood, tender lamb, creamy risotto, and hearty moussaka. For a local twist, indulge in fresh Thai seafood curries and spicy salads, creating a fusion of flavors that caters to every palate.
Breakfast Buffet (07:00–10:30)
: Start your day with a spread of international and local favorites. Price: 900 THB++ for outside guests.
Odyssey at Explorar Resort is more than a restaurant—it’s a culinary destination. From indulgent breakfasts to unforgettable dinners by the sea, every meal promises an exceptional dining experience in the heart of Koh Samui."

name: Vana Belle Luxury Resort
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Pool Villas, Beachfront, Breakfast, Butler / Private Chef, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Bar
description:
Nestled amidst tropical forests, lush gardens, crystal-clear waters, and pristine white sand beaches, Vana Belle, A Luxury Collection Resort, Koh Samui offers an unparalleled luxury experience on the serene Chaweng Noi Beach. Our stunning resort provides an idyllic retreat, with easy access to local attractions such as the Elephant Sanctuary, Wat Phra Yai, and Chaweng Beach, making it the perfect destination for both relaxation and adventure.
Unmatched Luxury and Comfort
Our resort is designed to provide the ultimate in comfort and luxury, featuring elegant suites and spacious villas, each with its own private pool. Guests will enjoy exclusive access to world-class amenities including the signature Luxury Collection Bed, plush pillows, remarkable marble bathrooms, and thoughtful extras that ensure an unforgettable stay."

name: Wanngram
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Thai Food, Airconditioned Area, Fusion Food, International Food, Wifi Access In Restaurant
description:
Wanngram presents a unique fusion of European and Modern Thai cuisine, combining quality, creativity, and consistency in every dish. With a passion for crafting exceptional dining experiences, our approach to food is imaginative, bold, and refined.
Using only the freshest ingredients, our menu features reimagined Thai favorites and classic European dishes with a twist—each one a thoughtful balance of flavor and artistry. Whether you're tasting a familiar dish or trying something entirely new, each bite delivers depth and originality.
At Wanngram, attentive service and a commitment to excellence ensure that every meal is a memorable one. Discover where culinary passion meets inventive cuisine in an experience that’s anything but ordinary."

name: Samui Water Park
tags: Things To Do, On The Water, Waterpark
description:
Nestled in the peaceful Maenam area in the north of Koh Samui, Samui Water Park is the island’s first professional water park, set amid a serene palm grove just 1,500 meters from the main road. This expansive water paradise is designed for guests of all ages, with special emphasis on thrilling fun for kids. From exhilarating water slides to splash zones, younger adventurers will find endless excitement.
With state-of-the-art rides and the latest water park trends, we ensure top-quality experiences for both thrill-seekers and those looking to relax. Whether you're racing down slides, exploring interactive play areas, or enjoying a peaceful day by the water, Samui Water Park has something for everyone. Bring the whole family and make unforgettable memories in this tropical paradise!"

name: Oonrak Koh Samui School
tags: Children's Needs, Schools, International School
description:
Oonrak Koh Samui School: A Leading Bilingual Learning Environment
Oonrak Koh Samui School offers an immersive bilingual education that blends academic excellence with holistic development. Our state-of-the-art facilities include spacious classrooms, dedicated ESL (English as a Second Language) classes, and newly designed science laboratories. The large library encourages reading and research, while the 30-station computer suite supports digital learning. For creative and physical development, we feature a dance studio, music room, meditation room, and art room.
Students can enjoy outdoor activities in our beautifully landscaped gardens, complete with a playground and colorful play equipment. The school also boasts a full-sized covered swimming pool, an outdoor running track, and a covered football pitch, providing ample opportunities for sports and inter-school events throughout the year. At Oonrak Koh Samui, we foster a well-rounded, engaging learning experience for every child."

tags: Professional Services, Wedding Planners, Wedding Venues
description:
Creating Unforgettable Moments
At
Zazen Boutique Resort & Spa
, our expert team of
Event & Wedding planners
is dedicated to ensuring your special occasion is nothing short of perfect. Whether you're hosting a
wedding
, corporate event, or social gathering, we offer the ideal setting with modern facilities, serene surroundings, and tropical elegance to make your event truly unforgettable.
Lovers & Friends
Your wedding day is a celebration of love, and at
Zazen
, we specialize in crafting bespoke weddings that reflect your unique style and vision. Whether you're planning an intimate ceremony or a grand celebration for up to 100 guests, our
personal wedding planners
will be with you every step of the way to ensure your day is flawless.
Choose from a range of wedding styles, including time-honored
Western ceremonies
, traditional
Spirit Thai Weddings
, or a
blend of both
, tailored to suit your preferences, budget, and guest count. Let us help you create memories that will last a lifetime."

name: Samui Karting
tags: Things To Do, On The Land, Karting
description:
Thrilling Location
Located in the heart of Koh Samui, the SK-Samui Karting Race Track offers an exhilarating motorsport experience in a vibrant tourist hotspot. The modern facility, surrounded by stunning natural beauty, provides the perfect setting for an action-packed day. With top-notch equipment and a safe, professionally designed track, it’s an unmissable attraction for adventure lovers.
High-Performance Karts
SK-Samui Karting features world-class Sodikart go-karts, including the Sodi RT10 and Sodi 2Drive models. These cutting-edge karts are designed for speed and comfort, equipped with EASY DRIVE® technology for a smooth ride. Whether you’re a first-timer or a seasoned pro, the karts provide a thrilling yet accessible driving experience for all skill levels.
Unforgettable Adventure
At SK-Samui Karting, every lap on the track is a chance to push your limits and create unforgettable memories. Whether racing against friends or enjoying a leisurely spin, the experience promises excitement, fun, and an adrenaline rush you won’t forget."

name: Le Relais
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Meat Lovers, Outdoor Dining, French Food, Family Friendly, Italian Food, International Food, Wifi Access In Restaurant
description:
Charming Location
Tucked away in vibrant Bophut, Koh Samui, this inviting spot blends rustic Mediterranean charm with modern style. Guests are welcomed into a relaxed yet elegant setting, where candlelit tables, ocean breezes, and lush surroundings create the perfect backdrop for unforgettable dining—whether it’s a cozy dinner for two or a lively night out with friends.
Delicious Variety
Serving up the heart of Mediterranean cuisine with a creative twist, the menu boasts wood-fired pizzas, fresh handmade pasta, grilled seafood, and premium meats. Diners can explore a wide selection of à la carte dishes, curated set menus, or personalized group packages, with vegetarian, vegan, and gluten-free options to suit every preference.
Memorable Experience
Dedicated to genuine hospitality, the team delivers not just a meal, but a warm and memorable experience. From first sip to last bite, every detail is crafted to ensure guests feel cared for, welcomed, and eager to return."

name: Santiburi Koh Samui Resort
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Pool Villas, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Bar, Room With Private Pool, Wifi Access In Room, Private Room, Air Conditioning, Private Bathroom, Parking, Rooms With Seaview, Rooms With Balcony, Sun Loungers Or Beach Chairs, Sun Umbrellas, 5* Accommodation
description:
Nestled on the tranquil north shore of Koh Samui,
Santiburi Resort
is a luxurious retreat set amidst 23 acres of lush tropical foliage, shady trees, and serene lotus ponds. Overlooking one of the island’s most beautiful beaches, the resort offers an idyllic escape with spacious suites and villas designed with sleek, contemporary Thai décor that exudes both style and warmth.
For families seeking a peaceful and refined vacation, our
exquisite family resort suites
are the perfect choice. Spacious, comfortable, and thoughtfully designed, they provide ample room for families to relax and enjoy their time together. The resort’s exclusive
Reserve
offers modern, private residences with a high level of seclusion, each positioned at least 10 meters apart for ultimate privacy and tranquility.
Santiburi Resort is the ideal destination for families looking to connect, unwind, and experience the beauty of Koh Samui in style."

name: Sala Thai Santiburi Restaurant
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Beachfront, Seafood, Thai Food, Fusion Food, Barbecue, Vegetarian, International Food, Cocktails, Wifi Access In Restaurant

name: Santiburi Country Club
tags: Sports & Fitness, Other, Golf
description:
Discover a slice of paradise on the northern coast of Koh Samui, home to a premier Championship golf course, proudly hosting the PGA Asian Tour. Set amidst the stunning beauty of the southern Gulf of Thailand and surrounded by the iconic palm trees that define the island, this 197-acre oasis offers the ultimate escape. Feel the cool ocean breeze as you take in breathtaking views of soaring peaks, creating the perfect barrier from the stresses of modern life.
The 18-hole championship course is designed for golfers of all levels, with a challenging layout that promises a thrilling experience. Enhance your skills at the state-of-the-art driving range, while immersing yourself in lush landscapes and panoramic vistas. This exceptional location combines world-class golf with the island’s natural beauty, offering an unforgettable adventure and the perfect blend of relaxation and excitement at Koh Samui’s top golf destination."

name: Santiburi Spa
tags: Beauty & Wellness, Massage, Spa & Beauty, Body Scrub, Body Wrap, Facial, Health Food, Foot Scrub
description:
We believe that true wellness stems from mental, emotional, physical, and spiritual peace—fundamental elements that create balance and harmony in life. Our holistic approach integrates these four pillars into every treatment and programme, guiding guests toward transformative well-being.
Our signature treatments and wellness programmes revolve around five key pillars:
Eat Well
: Enjoy locally sourced, organic meals with personalized dietary consultations.
Sleep Well
: Improve your sleep quality with calming therapies and meditative practices.
Move Well
: Boost physical health with tailored yoga, Pilates, and fitness routines.
Stay Well
: Achieve mental peace through mindfulness, stress management, and emotional wellness workshops.
Explore Well
: Immerse yourself in the beauty of Koh Samui with nature walks and cultural experiences.
Santiburi Spa is your sanctuary for holistic wellness and peace."

name: Mantra Samui Resort
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Pool Villas, Adults Only, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Bar
description:
Welcome to our exclusive hilltop lifestyle and wellness resort, offering breathtaking ocean-view rooms and a serene retreat near Koh Samui's best beaches and attractions. Whether you're planning a romantic getaway, a group retreat, or a wellness-focused vacation, our resort is the perfect place to unwind and rejuvenate.
Nestled near the charming
Fisherman’s Village
and tranquil
Maenam Beach
, our resort provides easy access to some of the island’s most popular destinations. Explore local markets, enjoy vibrant nightlife, or discover hidden beaches—all just a short drive away.
Enjoy a variety of wellness activities designed to rejuvenate your body and mind, including yoga, meditation, spa treatments, and more. Whether you're looking to de-stress or revitalize, we offer the perfect environment for a transformative experience."

name: The View Restaurant & Bar
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Bars & Entertainment, Adult Only, Thai Food, Wood Oven, Outdoor Dining, Viewpoint, Italian Food, International Food, Breakfast
description:
Indulge in the ultimate dining experience at our on-site restaurant and bar, where breathtaking ocean views meet a diverse menu of authentic
Thai and Western cuisines
. Whether you're starting your day with a hearty breakfast, enjoying a leisurely lunch, or dining under the stars for dinner, our restaurant offers something for every palate.
Our expert Thai chefs have curated a menu that celebrates the vibrant flavors of Thailand, featuring
traditional Thai dishes
made with fresh, locally sourced ingredients. From aromatic curries to flavorful stir-fries, each dish is prepared with authenticity and passion.
For those craving Western comfort food, we offer a selection of
Western classics
, including mouthwatering
homemade pizzas
baked in our wood-burning oven. Whether you're in the mood for a fresh pizza, a classic pasta, or a juicy burger, you'll find the perfect dish to satisfy your cravings."

name: Jai Spa
tags: Beauty & Wellness, Massage, Spa & Beauty, Body Scrub, Body Wrap, Facial, Pedicure, Wax
description:
At Jai Spa, we believe in the power of nature. That's why we use only
all-natural ingredients and products
that are both gentle and effective for your skin and body. Each treatment is carefully crafted to meet your individual needs, ensuring a personalized wellness experience that leaves you feeling refreshed and revitalized. Our menu of treatments includes a range of rejuvenating options, from traditional Thai therapies to luxurious spa treatments.
Whether you're seeking a
romantic retreat
with your partner or a relaxing day out with friends, Jai Spa offers
couples and friends packages
for the ultimate shared wellness experience. Treat yourself and your favorite person to a soothing massage, luxurious facials, and pampering wraps in our tranquil, intimate spa space."

name: Ok Fitness
tags: Sports & Fitness, Gym & Fitness
description:
Looking for a fitness center that offers everything you need to stay active and healthy on Koh Samui? Welcome to OK Fitness in Bang Por!
From cardio machines to strength training equipment, OK Fitness provides a full range of high-quality gear to suit your workout needs.
Whether you're a fitness enthusiast or just starting your health journey, OK Fitness offers a welcoming and supportive environment for all.
Conveniently open to fit your schedule, so you can work out at your own pace.
Easily accessible, OK Fitness is perfect for locals and tourists staying in the area.
Take the first step toward a healthier you. Drop by OK Fitness and see why it’s the go-to gym in Bang Por!"

name: Pepenero
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Meat Lovers, Seafood, Outdoor Dining, Italian Food, Vegetarian, Mediterranean Food, Wine Bar
description:
Pepenero Koh Samui is a place of passion – passion for great food, exceptional service, and unforgettable experiences. From our kitchen to the dining room, we are dedicated to discovering new ingredients, crafting innovative recipes, and offering outstanding wines. But ultimately, the magic happens when YOU step through our doors.
Your mood, your energy, and your enthusiasm are what turn a good evening into an extraordinary one. We believe that a truly memorable experience begins with you, and we’re here to make sure every moment is special.
Chef Alain is originally from Milan, but his family has roots spread throughout Italy. This mix makes him eclectic: Alain is at ease with recipes ranging from the North to the South of Italy. He loves Mediterranean cuisine, is a master of risottos and takes care of cooking the Fiorentina steak."

name: Nana Beach
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Beach Bars, Beachfront, Thai Food, Outdoor Dining, Family Friendly, International Food, Breakfast
description:
Nana Beach Samui: A Hidden Oasis on Maenam Beach
Nana Beach Samui is a hidden gem located on the secluded Maenam Beach, offering the perfect blend of location, atmosphere, and relaxation. This trendy, renovated beachfront spot features a laid-back vibe, where you can unwind with delicious food, refreshing drinks, and good company. The breathtaking sunsets only enhance the experience, making it truly unforgettable.
Relax and Unwind at Nana Beach Samui
Accessible by jet-ski thanks to its sandy beachfront, Nana Beach Samui offers an exclusive yet welcoming escape. Whether you arrive by land or sea, we’re excited to welcome you to our serene oasis. Perfect for a day of relaxation or a sunset gathering, Nana Beach Samui promises an unforgettable atmosphere in one of Koh Samui’s most beautiful locations."

name: Samui Buri Beach Resort
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Pool Villas, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Bar, Room With Private Pool, Wifi Access In Room
description:
A Traditional Thai Style Beach Resort,
nestled along a stunning 100-meter stretch of Maenam Beach,
Samui Buri Beach Resort
offers an exceptional escape built in traditional Thai architectural style. Set within lush tropical gardens, this serene beachfront retreat features 88 elegantly appointed guestrooms and pool villas, each designed to provide a refined and comfortable holiday experience.
The resort combines timeless Thai charm with modern amenities, ensuring guests enjoy a perfect balance of luxury and tranquility. Whether you seek a peaceful getaway or memorable family moments, Samui Buri Beach Resort promises quality experiences and relaxation in one of Koh Samui's most picturesque locations.
Experience the beauty and serenity of Maenam Beach at Samui Buri, your ideal destination for an unforgettable beach holiday."

name: Seetawaree Restaurant
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Beachfront, Thai Food, Family Friendly, International Food, Breakfast, Wifi Access In Restaurant
description:
Seetawaree Restaurant
at our resort offers a delightful dining experience with a blend of international flavors and authentic Thai delicacies. Located by the serene sea, it provides both indoor and outdoor seating options, allowing guests to enjoy the perfect ambiance for breakfast, lunch, or dinner. Our menu features a variety of expertly crafted dishes, from traditional Thai favorites like Pad Thai and Tom Yum, to a selection of international cuisines, all made with the freshest ingredients.
Whether you're looking to start your day with a wholesome breakfast, indulge in a leisurely lunch, or savor a romantic dinner by the water, Seetawaree Restaurant promises an unforgettable culinary experience. Perfect for families, couples, and friends, it's the ideal spot to relax, dine, and take in breathtaking views of the coastline. Join us at Seetawaree for a memorable meal by the sea."

name: Samuiburi Pool Side Bar
tags: Food & Beverage, Pool Bars, Beachfront, Family Friendly
description:
At
Samui Buri Poolside Bar
, guests can unwind and enjoy a refreshing selection of beverages in a tranquil, picturesque setting. Located by the outdoor swimming pool, the bar offers a variety of soft drinks, freshly squeezed juices, and expertly crafted cocktails, perfect for cooling off under the tropical sun.
Whether you’re looking to relax with a chilled drink or enjoy a cocktail while basking in the serene atmosphere of
Samui Buri Beach Resort
, the poolside bar provides a soothing escape.
Ideal for leisurely moments or refreshing breaks between beach activities, it’s the perfect place to relax and take in the beauty of Koh Samui’s lush surroundings. Let the soothing sounds of the pool and lush tropical gardens enhance your experience as you sip on your favorite drink in style."

name: The Deck Beach Club
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Beach Clubs, Bars & Entertainment, Beachfront, Dj Music, Outdoor Dining, International Food, Pool Day Pass
description:
The Deck Beach Club: Your New Favorite Spot in Koh Samui
Discover the all-new
The Deck Beach Club
, located just a short walk from Fisherman’s Village on the road to Bangrak in Koh Samui. Designed with a perfect blend of ethnic and modern style,
The Deck Beach Club
quickly stands out as one of the island's trendiest spots, offering a relaxing and stylish atmosphere ideal for those long, lazy sunny days by the sea.
At
The Deck Beach Club
, you can unwind in style while enjoying spectacular ocean views, signature cocktails, and fine western cuisine. The club's standout feature is its stunning 27-meter infinity pool, which offers a panoramic sea view, making it the perfect spot to soak in the beauty of Koh Samui's coastline.
Whether you're looking to lounge by the pool, sip on a crafted cocktail, or savor delicious dishes,
The Deck Beach Club
provides the perfect combination of leisure and luxury. Its contemporary, laid-back vibe invites both locals and visitors to relax, socialize, and make the most of their day in paradise.
High Season Minimum Spend (15/12 – 15/04 and 10/07 – 10/09)
:
To ensure an optimal experience for all our guests, we have a minimum spend requirement for each area during high season:
Lounge Area
: 1,500 THB
Sunbeds
: 2,000 THB
VIP Sunbeds
: 2,500 THB
Sofa
: 4,000 THB
These minimum spend amounts are designed to enhance your visit, offering you an exclusive and comfortable experience in one of Koh Samui's most sought-after beach destinations."

name: The Shack Steakhouse Grill
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Keto Friendly, Meat Lovers, Paleo Friendly, Seafood, Mexican Food, American Food
description:
Welcome to The Shack, Koh Samui’s original and only Rhythm n Blues-themed Steak House & Seafood Grill, located in the vibrant heart of Fisherman’s Village. With over 20 years of history, The Shack has become a beloved institution, attracting both expats and tourists. Known for its rich legacy and lively atmosphere, The Shack offers a dining experience where delicious steaks and fresh seafood are served alongside the soulful tunes of rhythm and blues music.
The Shack’s ambiance is vibrant and welcoming, designed for guests to enjoy exceptional meals in a relaxed, fun setting. As you dine, the soulful rhythm and blues music sets the tone for a laid-back yet lively atmosphere. The Shack is perfect for those who want to savor mouthwatering steaks and seafood while soaking in the island’s warm and inviting vibe.
At The Shack, we pride ourselves on serving some of the best steaks and seafood in Koh Samui. Our menu is a celebration of classic grill favorites, featuring tender cuts of beef, juicy steaks, and fresh seafood. We carefully source only the highest-quality ingredients, ensuring that each dish is bursting with flavor."

name: Shangrilah Bungalow
tags: Accommodation, Bungalows, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Bar, Wifi Access In Room
description:
Welcome to
SHANGRILAH Bungalow
, a charming beachfront escape located on the serene
Maenam Beach
in the northern part of
Koh Samui
, Thailand. Comfortable bungalows offer guests the ultimate tropical getaway, with rooms just steps away from the crystal-clear waters and soft, white sands of Maenam Beach.
Maenam Beach is renowned for its peaceful atmosphere and breathtaking natural beauty, making it the ideal spot for relaxation. With direct access to the beach, SHANGRILAH Bungalow provides an unforgettable oceanfront experience. Lounging by the pool, enjoying the gentle breeze, or taking a refreshing dip in the ocean, you're just a few steps from paradise.
Guests can easily explore Koh Samui and nearby islands from SHANGRILAH Bungalow. The
Maenam Pier
, where you can catch a
Catamaran speed boat
to destinations like
Koh Phangan
,
Koh Tao
, and
Angthong National Marine Park
, is just a 10-minute drive or a leisurely 30-minute walk along the beach."

name: Celes Hotel & Resort
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Pool Villas, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Spa Retreat, Muay Thai / Fitness, Restaurant, Room With Private Pool, Wifi Access In Room, Private Room, Air Conditioning, Private Bathroom
description:
Your Luxury Getaway on Koh Samui
Tucked along the tranquil north coast of Koh Samui, Celes Samui is a peaceful beachfront retreat where natural beauty and understated luxury come together. With soft sands and crystal-clear waters just steps away, it's the perfect escape for rest, romance, or rejuvenation.
Elegant & Versatile Stays
Our modern rooms and spacious suites are designed with comfort and style in mind—ideal for couples, families, or solo travelers. Whether you're unwinding in a private villa or enjoying sunset views from your balcony, each stay offers the perfect blend of elegance and relaxation.
Unmatched Comfort & Amenities
Enjoy world-class amenities including a serene spa, beachside dining, and a fully equipped fitness center. At Celes Samui, every detail is crafted to enhance your experience in this tropical paradise."

name: BDMS Wellness Clinic
tags: Health & Medical, Doctors & Clinics, Health Check, Iv Drips, Food Intolerance, Hormone Screening, Dexa Scan, Dna Test, Cancer Screening, Digital Mamogram, Mri Abdomen
description:
Holistic Wellness in Paradise
Located in Bophut, BDMS Wellness Clinic—one of Thailand’s premier health centers—joins forces with Celes Samui to present
BWC Retreat
, a comprehensive wellness experience combining medical expertise with tropical serenity.
Personalized Health Programs
BWC Retreat offers a range of hospital-grade treatments tailored to your personal goals, whether it's boosting energy, improving overall health, or simply de-stressing. Services include IV Vitamin Therapy, preventive wellness care, hormone and food intolerance testing, Dexa scans, DNA analysis, cancer screenings, digital mammograms, and MRI abdomen scans.
Safe, Expert-Led Care
Every treatment is medically supervised, ensuring you receive the highest level of safety and professional care. Set against the tranquil backdrop of Koh Samui, BWC Retreat is your ideal destination for a transformative, holistic health journey."

name: Samui Home Clinic
tags: Health & Medical, Doctors & Clinics, House Calls, Health Check, Iv Drips, Emergency Service, Bloodwork, Electrocardiogram (ecg)
description:
Convenient and Accessible Healthcare
Welcome to Samui Home Clinic, your friendly family clinic on Koh Samui, where your health is our priority. Our professional and reliable licensed doctor provides high-quality care for both locals and visitors.
Comprehensive Services
We offer walk-in care with no appointment needed, ensuring convenient access to medical services. The clinic is foreigner-friendly with an English and Thai-speaking doctor for clear communication. For added convenience, we provide patient drop-off and pick-up services.
Home Visits and Hotel Services
Need medical attention at home? We’ll come to you with our home doctor visits. We also offer hotel services upon request, making healthcare even more accessible during your stay on the island.
Your Health is Our Priority
At Samui Home Clinic, we’re committed to making healthcare simple, accessible, and personalized. Your well-being is in safe hands with us!"

name: Samui Home Pharmacy
tags: Health & Medical, Pharmacies
description:
Affordable and Accessible Healthcare
Welcome to Samui Home Pharmacy, where we make healthcare easy and convenient with affordable prices and expert services. Our pharmacy provides a wide range of high-quality products, including over-the-counter medications, prescription drugs, and health supplements, all accessible through online consultations with experienced doctors.
Specialized Services
We specialize in PEP (Post-Exposure Prophylaxis) and PrEP (Pre-Exposure Prophylaxis) services for HIV prevention. Our knowledgeable pharmacists, fluent in English, are here to offer personalized advice and assistance to meet your healthcare needs.
Reliable Delivery Services
Serving Koh Samui with reliable delivery services, we also offer nationwide shipping across Thailand, ensuring easy access to medications wherever you are. Trust Samui Home Pharmacy for convenient, high-quality care in every order."

name: The Butcher Koh Samui
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Meat Lovers, Barbecue, International Food
description:
Premium Dining on Lamai Beach Road
Located on the lively Lamai Beach Road in Koh Samui, The Butcher is a must-visit for meat lovers and food enthusiasts. With a focus on high-quality meats and bold flavors, it offers a relaxed yet sophisticated setting perfect for lunch, dinner, or special occasions.
Exceptional Cuts & Signature Dishes
Savor expertly grilled steaks, juicy lamb chops, gourmet burgers, and fresh seafood—all prepared with care and premium ingredients. The menu features a range of house-made sides and sauces to elevate your dining experience.
Perfect Pairings
Enjoy your meal with craft beers, fine wines, or signature cocktails from a carefully curated drinks list, each selected to enhance the flavors of our dishes.
Beachside Atmosphere & Friendly Service
Dine indoors or al fresco with views of the vibrant beach scene. The inviting ambiance and professional service make every visit memorable.
Visit The Butcher for a standout meal in the heart of Lamai."

name: Seventy Fahrenheit
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Thai Food, Outdoor Dining, Fusion Food, Mediterranean Food, Cocktails, Wifi Access In Restaurant
description:
Located in the heart of Lamai Beach Road,
Seventy Fahrenheit
is a prime destination for those looking to experience the vibrant atmosphere of Koh Samui. Its central location offers the perfect spot to people-watch as visitors hop from shop to shop and bar to bar. The restaurant boasts a diverse menu featuring both
Mediterranean cuisine
and exciting
Thai dishes
, making it an ideal choice for all tastes.
Whether you're craving fresh Mediterranean flavors or traditional Thai favorites, Seventy Fahrenheit offers a unique dining experience that combines great food with a lively, central location. Don't miss out on this must-visit restaurant on Lamai Beach Road!"
