name: SEEN Beach Club
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Beach Clubs, Adult Only, Beachfront, Dj Music, Outdoor Dining, Fusion Food, International Food, Pool Day Pass, Wifi Access In Restaurant, Use Of Swimming Pool
description:
Located in the heart of Chaweng Beach, SEEN Beach Club Samui offers the perfect blend of 1950s retro-chic Californian vibes, stunning sea views, golden sands, great music, incredible food, and tropical cocktails. This adults-only beach club provides a vibrant and relaxing environment, ideal for those seeking a stylish and memorable beach experience.
Enjoy outdoor dining with a variety of delicious dishes, accompanied by DJ music that sets the mood for the day or night. While access to the restaurant and bar is free, guests can purchase a day pass to enjoy the luxurious beds around the pool and on the beach. Day pass packages are available on the website for easy booking.
Whether you're lounging by the pool, enjoying delectable food, or sipping on refreshing cocktails, SEEN Beach Club Samui is your ultimate destination for beachside relaxation and fun."

name: No Stress Lamai
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Beach Bars, Beachfront, Thai Food, Outdoor Dining, International Food, Sunbeds
description:
No Stress Lamai Beach Restaurant – Relax in Style
Visit
No Stress Lamai
, the ultimate beachfront restaurant in Koh Samui, where relaxation meets great food. Whether you're enjoying a delicious meal or soaking up the sun, we offer
free sunbeds and towels
for our guests to make your day even more enjoyable.
What We Offer:
Free Sunbeds & Towels
for all guests
Beachfront Dining
with stunning views
Delicious Menu
featuring a variety of dishes
Spend your day by the crystal-clear waters of Lamai Beach, lounge on our comfortable sunbeds, and enjoy a relaxed, stress-free atmosphere. Whether you're here for a meal or just to unwind by the sea,
No Stress Lamai
is the perfect spot to escape and enjoy the best of Koh Samui.
Come and experience the ultimate beachside relaxation – we’ve got you covered!"

name: SUMMER By Coco Tam's
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Beachfront, Meat Lovers, Seafood, Thai Food, Outdoor Dining, Italian Food, Barbecue
description:
A brand-new world-fusion and superfood café located in the heart of Koh Samui. Our menu features a vibrant selection of healthy and delicious dishes, combining global flavors with the finest ingredients to nourish both your body and soul.
Indulge in quinoa salads, savor the flavors of Asian-fusion pasta, or enjoy a hearty all-day breakfast. For lunch or dinner, try our delicious burgers, desserts, and refreshing fresh fruit smoothies. We also offer expertly crafted coffee, specialist milk teas, and much more to complement your meal.
At SUMMER by Coco Tam’s, we’re passionate about serving dishes that are not only delicious but also packed with nutrients. Whether you're looking for a quick bite or a relaxing meal, our café is the perfect spot for those who appreciate healthy eating and vibrant flavors."

name: Pi Samui
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Beachfront, Live Music, Thai Food, Family Friendly, International Food, Wine Bar, Wifi Access In Restaurant
description:
Stunning Beachfront Location
Nestled along the tranquil shores of Choengmon Beach, this beachfront restaurant offers breathtaking panoramic views of the coastline. The innovative circular design, inspired by the mathematical constant π, blends beautifully with its natural surroundings, providing a unique and memorable dining experience.
Inviting Atmosphere
The cozy, family-friendly environment welcomes guests to relax and enjoy a meal in comfort. With soft lighting and rustic wooden tables, the circular dining space creates an intimate and warm ambiance, perfect for any occasion.
Diverse Menu Offerings
Indulge in a fusion of Thai, Mediterranean, and Italian flavors. Whether you're looking for casual dining or celebrating a special moment, the diverse menu offers something for every palate, with options that range from light bites to hearty meals.
Unforgettable Experiences
With live music and a focus on outstanding service, this restaurant is dedicated to creating unforgettable moments. Every visit promises exceptional food, a welcoming atmosphere, and beautiful views that make each meal truly special."

name: Sound Healing Sanctuary - Shantika
tags: Beauty & Wellness, Health Clubs, Sound Healing
description:
Sound Healing Sessions: A Journey to Inner Peace
Join us on a magical journey through the transformative power of sound. Our Sound Therapy Sessions are designed for anyone seeking healing or a deeper connection with themselves. Whether you're new to sound healing or experienced, these sessions provide a unique opportunity to explore the therapeutic effects of sound vibrations.
Healing Through Sound
Using a variety of instruments like singing bowls, gongs, and chimes, our experienced practitioners guide you through a deeply relaxing and meditative experience. Sound waves have been shown to help reduce stress, promote emotional balance, and restore energy, offering a holistic approach to wellness.
Reconnect with Yourself
These sessions offer more than just relaxation; they are a path to self-discovery and healing. Let the soothing sounds help you release tension, clear mental blockages, and achieve a peaceful state of mind."

The
White Whale Beachfront Pool Villa
in
Ban Bang Po
offers an unparalleled luxury experience on the stunning island of
Koh Samui
. With a perfect blend of seclusion and accessibility, this villa is a true beachfront paradise. Each villa features a private pool and direct access to the pristine
Bang Po Beach
, providing the ultimate relaxation right at your doorstep.
The
interiors
are designed with elegance, equipped with modern amenities such as air conditioning, minibars, and indulgent hot tubs, ensuring a stay that’s both comfortable and stylish. Whether you’re lounging by your private pool, soaking in the views, or enjoying the luxurious interior, every corner of the villa is meant to pamper you."

name: Health Oasis Resort
tags: Beauty & Wellness, Detox & Weight Loss, Swimming Pool
description:
At Health Oasis Resort, we have been dedicated to transforming lives since 1997, offering affordable detox, fasting, colon cleansing, and holistic weight loss programs. Located on a stunning tropical beachfront in Koh Samui, our resort provides the perfect setting to rejuvenate your body, mind, and spirit.
We are not just a resort; we are a community dedicated to supporting your wellness journey. Our team is genuinely committed to providing you with the highest level of care, guidance, and support throughout your detoxification process.
At Health Oasis, we are committed to serving a higher purpose – to promote health, healing, and well-being for all. We take pride in creating a positive impact on the lives of our guests, helping them to lead healthier, happier lives."

name: La Perle Resort Samui
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Bar, Wifi Access In Room, Private Room, Private Bathroom, Parking, Rooms With Seaview, Rooms With Balcony, Sun Loungers Or Beach Chairs, Sun Umbrellas, 4* Accommodation
description:
Inspired by Baudelaire's poem ""Invitation to the Voyage,"" La Perle is an idyllic escape where ""there's only order, beauty, luxury, calm, and voluptuousness."" Nestled on Ban Tai Beach, our resort offers the perfect retreat for even the most discerning travelers, blending charm and authenticity.
Featured Amenities:
Seaview:
Magnificent views from your room.
Swimming Pool:
Private and communal pools.
Stunning Sunsets:
Experience breathtaking sunsets daily.
Restaurant Seaside:
Enjoy Thai and international dishes with a sea view.
Beachside:
Steps from your room, enjoy the sand and surf.
Wi-Fi:
High-speed internet throughout the resort.
Indoor Bathroom:
Full bathroom amenities and shower.
Flat-Screen TV:
40-inch screen with cable channels in every bungalow.
La Perle Resort offers tranquility, stunning beaches, and a serene atmosphere, perfect for a peaceful getaway. Discover our 12 bungalows nestled in a tropical garden or by the beach."

name: Restaurant L’Ékrin
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Beachfront, Thai Food, Outdoor Dining, Fusion Food, French Food
description:
L'Ekrin at La Perle Resort
Nestled by the sea and overlooking the pool, L'Ekrin offers a refined dining experience with daily Thai dishes at moderate prices. Proudly using fresh, locally sourced ingredients, including organic produce and daily catches from local fishing, our menu celebrates the island's natural flavors.
Whether you’re a seafood lover or craving authentic Thai cuisine, you’ll find dishes crafted with the finest local products. To enhance your dining experience, we offer an extensive wine list, with food and wine pairings suggested by our expert staff.
Unwind with a drink by the pool or enjoy a cocktail at the bar, all while watching the breathtaking sunset over the horizon."

name: Nikki Beach - Beach Club
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Beach Clubs, Beachfront, Dj Music, Thai Food, Outdoor Dining, Fusion Food, Brunch, International Food, Sunbeds, Wifi Access In Restaurant, Use Of Swimming Pool
description:
Indulge in a world of luxury at Escape by Nikki Beach, where sun, sea, and style come together for an unparalleled beach club experience. Located on the pristine sands of Koh Samui, our beach club offers a unique blend of local Thai and Mediterranean flavors, accompanied by sunset views and a refreshing ocean breeze.
Relax in style as you sink your toes into the soft sand and sip on expertly crafted cocktails. Escape provides a chic and laid-back atmosphere where you can enjoy exclusive beachside lounging, gourmet dining, and world-class service. Whether you're here for a sun-soaked afternoon or a glamorous evening, the experience is nothing short of extraordinary.
Our menu combines vibrant local ingredients with Mediterranean culinary excellence. From fresh seafood to indulgent grilled meats and tapas-style dishes, every bite is a taste of the finest flavors. Pair your meal with our signature cocktails, created by top mixologists, for the perfect beachside refreshment.
As the sun dips below the horizon, Escape transitions into an elegant yet lively beach club. With music, cocktails, and a vibrant atmosphere, it’s the perfect venue to enjoy the evening with friends, loved ones, or even a special celebration. The stunning views and dynamic energy make every moment unforgettable.
Escape is the ultimate location for special occasions, whether it’s a birthday, anniversary, or corporate gathering. Offering a luxurious setting, top-notch service, and an unforgettable beachfront ambiance, it’s the perfect place to create lasting memories."

name: Escape By Nikki Beach
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Beachfront, Thai Food, Outdoor Dining, Fusion Food, International Food, Wifi Access In Restaurant
description:
A Unique Beach Dining Experience in Koh Samui
Escape the ordinary and indulge in an exceptional dining experience at Escape by Nikki Beach. Situated on the pristine sands of Koh Samui, our beach restaurant offers a fusion of local Thai and Mediterranean flavors, creating a unique menu that pairs perfectly with sunset views and the refreshing ocean breeze.
A Beachfront Dining Haven
Kick off your shoes and dig your toes into the warm sand as you enjoy our expertly crafted dishes. With a relaxed yet luxurious atmosphere, Escape is the perfect place to savor delicious food and soak in the beauty of the sea. Whether you’re enjoying a sunset aperitif or a dinner with loved ones, this beachfront haven sets the stage for a memorable experience.
Fusion of Local & Mediterranean Flavors
Our menu brings together the best of Thai ingredients and Mediterranean culinary traditions. From fresh seafood to grilled meats and tapas-style dishes, each bite is a celebration of bold, vibrant flavors, offering something for every palate.
Sunset to Late Evening Dining
As the sun sets over the Gulf of Thailand, Escape transforms into a romantic and lively venue for intimate dinners or group gatherings. With cocktails in hand and the soothing sound of the waves, your dining experience becomes unforgettable, whether shared with a partner, family, or friends.
Ideal for Special Occasions & Gatherings
Escape is perfect for any occasion, whether it’s a romantic evening, a family celebration, or a gathering with friends. Stunning views, exceptional food, and a vibrant atmosphere make it the ideal location for lasting memories."

name: After 8 Spa Nikki Beach
tags: Beauty & Wellness, Hairdressers, Massage, Spa & Beauty, Sauna, Body Scrub, Body Wrap, Facial, Hairdresser, Pedicure, Wax, Foot Scrub, Nail Color, Nail Gel, Nail Acrylic, Eyelash Extension, Hair Treatment, Hair Coloring, Nail Stylist, Thai Massage, Foot Massage, Coconut Oil Massage, Head Massage, Speciality Massages
description:
Experience ultimate relaxation at After 8 Spa, located just steps from the ocean at Nikki Beach, Lipa Noi. Let the soothing sound of crashing waves enhance your experience as skilled therapists guide you into a state of bliss with aromatherapy massages and rejuvenating treatments. Whether seeking stress relief or tranquility, our serene setting will transport you to heaven.
Indulge in a variety of treatments designed to renew your body, mind, and soul. Relax in the calming atmosphere, surrounded by Koh Samui's natural beauty, and treat yourself to personalized services. Signature treatments include aromatherapy massage, traditional Thai massage, couples' massage, and facial treatments.
Enjoy a peaceful oceanfront location with expert therapists, a tranquil atmosphere, and a wide range of services tailored to your needs."

name: Silent Divers
tags: Things To Do, Diving, Koh Tao, Padi Course
description:
Discover the thrill of
scuba diving in Koh Samui
with
Silent Divers
, a top-rated
PADI 5-Star Dive Center
committed to delivering unforgettable underwater experiences. Whether you're an
experienced diver
looking to explore vibrant dive sites or a
beginner
eager to take your first plunge into the world of scuba diving, we offer a wide range of
scuba diving courses
and
exciting dive trips
to suit all levels.
At
Silent Divers
, we specialize in providing safe, professional, and personalized diving experiences. Dive into the crystal-clear waters of
Koh Samui
and explore some of
Thailand’s best dive sites
, home to diverse marine life and vibrant coral reefs. As a
PADI 5-Star Dive Center
, we are known for our commitment to safety, excellent customer service, and high-quality diving instruction. Our team of expert instructors ensures every diver receives the attention and care they deserve, making your dive experience enjoyable and stress-free."

name: Discovery Dive Centre
tags: Things To Do, Diving, Padi Course
description:
Koh Samui’s Premier Dive Center Since 1999
Discovery Dive Centre is Koh Samui’s leading PADI 5-star Instructor Development Center with over 20 years of experience. Offering exceptional diving services, we cater to divers of all levels, from beginners to professionals.
Our Expertise:
With a team of experienced, full-time dive instructors, we provide personalized, safe, and enjoyable experiences for every diver. We are committed to delivering world-class training with a focus on environmental responsibility.
PADI Courses We Offer:
Discover Scuba Diving (Beginner)
Open Water Diver (Entry-level)
Advanced Open Water Diver
Rescue Diver
Divemaster & Instructor Development Course (IDC)
Top Dive Sites:
Koh Tao, Ang Thong Marine Park, Hin Wong Bay, and Chumphon Pinnacle.
Why choose us? Trusted reputation, experienced instructors, safety-focused, and eco-conscious. Join us to explore Koh Samui’s vibrant underwater world!"

description:
The Briza Beach Resort Samui, Caters to all of our guest’s individual tastes. It is beautifully situated on Chaweng, Samui’s most famous beach, and commanding panoramic views, The Briza Beach Resort offers a pure lifestyle experience.
The Briza Beach Resort Samui is located on the famous Chaweng Beach and just a 10-minute walk from the main day time attractions such as shopping, bars and restaurants and the vibrant nightlife for which Chaweng is world famous. All this within 15-minutes journey from Koh Samui’s boutique Airport.
Working as a team we wish to deliver our guests with the best of services and welcome to the Briza family!!!"

name: Kalimantan Restaurant
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Beachfront, Thai Food, Outdoor Dining, Family Friendly
description:
Kalimantan Restaurant at Briza Beach Resort
Located near the beach at
Briza Beach Resort
,
Kalimantan Restaurant
offers a delightful dining experience with a variety of international dishes. Whether you're looking for a hearty breakfast, a relaxed lunch, or a delicious dinner, our restaurant is the perfect place to enjoy great food in a beautiful setting.
Breakfast Buffet
Start your day with a full breakfast buffet, featuring a wide selection of dishes to suit every taste. From fresh fruits and pastries to hot options, our breakfast is the perfect way to fuel up for the day ahead.
Opening Hours for Breakfast:
6:30 a.m. – 10:30 a.m.
Lunch

Kalimantan Restaurant
. Whether you’re craving light bites or a more substantial meal, our lunch menu offers something for every preference.

Dinner
End your day with a delicious dinner at
Kalimantan Restaurant
. Savor our carefully crafted menu featuring both international and local flavors, all prepared with fresh, high-quality ingredients.

Relax and indulge in exceptional food while enjoying the tranquil beachside atmosphere at
Kalimantan Restaurant
."

description:
ARKbar Resort in Chaweng offers a wide range of accommodation options to suit every guest’s needs, whether you're looking for a peaceful retreat or a room right in the heart of the action.
With 187 rooms across the resort, you can choose from a variety of settings, including Premier Deluxe Rooms that overlook the Party Pool, placing you at the center of Ark Bar’s vibrant atmosphere. Whether you want to enjoy the energy and music or prefer a quieter space, we ensure your room preference is met for a perfect stay. Located on the beachfront, with a swimming pool and breakfast options, ARKbar Resort offers the perfect balance of comfort, convenience, and excitement for an unforgettable Koh Samui experience.
At Ark Bar Hotel, we offer the perfect balance of comfort, convenience, and excitement for a memorable stay in Koh Samui."

name: Spices Cafe
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Thai Food, Fusion Food
description:
Spices Cafe: A Fusion of East and West for a Unique Dining Experience
Spices Cafe offers a vibrant fusion of Thai and Western cuisine, delivering a unique dining experience with every dish. We pride ourselves on serving fresh, bold flavors made with the finest ingredients. Whether you're stopping by for lunch or enjoying dinner, the menu features creative à la carte options that blend traditional Thai dishes with Western favorites.
Indulge in authentic Thai classics like Tom Yam Goong (spicy shrimp soup) and Pad Thai (stir-fried noodles), or savor the richness of Western comfort foods like Beef Tenderloin, burgers, fresh salads, and pasta. Our daily specials ensure something new and exciting to try each day, keeping the menu fresh and full of surprises.
At Spices Cafe, we focus not only on great food but also on providing exceptional service. Inspired by Thailand's renowned hospitality, our team goes above and beyond to make every visit memorable. Whether you're here for a casual meal or a special occasion, you can expect friendly, attentive service that enhances your dining experience.
Come and enjoy a blend of East and West, where vibrant flavors meet in a relaxed atmosphere, making every meal a moment to savor."

name: Roestiland
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Swiss Food
description:
Welcome to
Swiss Restaurant Roestiland
, where a piece of Switzerland meets the tropical paradise of Koh Samui! Since 2013, Veronika and Franz have been delighting guests with authentic Swiss specialties served under the warm Thai sun. Located just a short walk from the picturesque Lamai Beach, we offer great food in a lush tropical garden setting.
Homemade Swiss Delights
Many of our beloved dishes are made by Franz with love and care, including wholemeal bread, our famous salad dressing (with fresh, drinking water-washed greens), and a selection of Swiss sausages like Mostbröckli. Our legendary Cordon Bleu is also a crowd favorite.
Traditional Swiss Flavors
Our menu brings the rich and traditional flavors of Switzerland to your plate. Enjoy cheese fondue and Raclette, both made with authentic Swiss cheese. For something hearty, try the delicious Zurich sliced meat, Rösti specialties, or homemade cheese spaetzle.
At Roestiland, we use the finest ingredients to ensure an unforgettable Swiss dining experience in Koh Samui. Whether you're after a satisfying meal or a memorable time in a tranquil garden, we offer the perfect setting for both."

name: Six Senses Samui Resort
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Pool Villas, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Room With Private Pool, Wifi Access In Room, Gym, Private Room, Air Conditioning, Private Bathroom, Rooms With Seaview, Laundry Service, Airport Shuttle, Rooms With Balcony, Family Rooms, Sun Loungers Or Beach Chairs, Sun Umbrellas, Concierge Services
description:
Located on the northern tip of Koh Samui, Six Senses Samui is a serene and luxurious retreat where nature and comfort come together seamlessly.
Six Senses Samui features 67 spacious villas, each designed to offer the ultimate in privacy and comfort. All villas provide breathtaking views, whether over the ocean or the lush tropical landscape. Of the 67 villas, 60 come with their own private pools, making it easy to enjoy the serene surroundings in complete relaxation.
The resort offers a variety of villa types to cater to different preferences and needs. Whether you seek a romantic getaway, a family retreat, or a special celebration, Six Senses Samui has the perfect villa to make your stay unforgettable. The luxurious and thoughtfully designed spaces provide the perfect base to enjoy the resort's exceptional range of experiences, from fine dining to spa treatments and outdoor adventures.
Six Senses Samui goes beyond offering just luxurious accommodations; it provides a range of exceptional island experiences designed to reconnect you with nature and offer true relaxation. Whether you're lounging by the infinity pool, indulging in world-class spa treatments, or exploring the stunning surroundings of Koh Samui, each moment at Six Senses is tailored to offer a memorable and rejuvenating experience."

name: Dining on the Rocks at Six Senses
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Rooftop Venues, Thai Food, Outdoor Dining, Viewpoint, International Food, Wifi Access In Restaurant, Fine Dining
description:
Stunning Dining Experience
Perched at the tip of a headland, Dining on the Rocks at Six Senses Samui offers an unparalleled experience with 270-degree views of the Gulf of Thailand. The venue features an elegant blend of teak and bamboo architecture, offering both open-air and covered seating that harmonizes with the natural surroundings.
Imaginative, Sustainable Cuisine
The menu focuses on organic, locally sourced ingredients, combined with both classic and modern culinary techniques. Chefs enhance the natural flavors of each dish, creating an imaginative fusion of Thai and global cuisines. This sustainable approach reflects Six Senses’ commitment to health, wellness, and environmental responsibility.
Intimate Atmosphere & Private Dining
Dining on the Rocks provides a tranquil, intimate setting for both casual dining and special occasions. Guests can enjoy private dinners under the stars at Tables 99 and 100, known for their seclusion and breathtaking views.
Award-Winning Setting
With its stunning location, exceptional cuisine, and serene ambiance, Dining on the Rocks offers a one-of-a-kind dining experience. Whether you’re indulging in a tasting menu or enjoying à la carte options, the natural beauty and exquisite food make every meal unforgettable."

name: Dining on the Hill - Six Senses
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Thai Food, Airconditioned Area, Outdoor Dining, Fusion Food, International Food, Wifi Access In Restaurant
description:
The resort’s main dining venue,
Dining on the Hill
, offers a vibrant and relaxed atmosphere for guests to enjoy both breakfast and dinner with stunning panoramic views of the Gulf of Thailand.
Breakfast:
Start your day with a bountiful breakfast offering a wide range of international and local specialties, with many dishes prepared à la carte to suit individual preferences. Signature options include freshly baked pastries, tropical fruit platters, local Thai breakfast dishes, and eggs cooked to order, among other dishes made with locally sourced ingredients.
Dinner:
In the evening,
Dining on the Hill
transforms into a fine dining venue offering a unique blend of traditional Thai cuisine, complemented by Western comfort food. The menu changes regularly to reflect the best seasonal ingredients and local produce, making every dining experience fresh and exciting. Thai classics like pad Thai, green curry, and grilled seafood are prepared with a contemporary twist, while Western dishes like pasta, steaks, and wood-fired pizzas are also available for those seeking comfort.
Specialty Features:
Panoramic views:
Guests dining at the restaurant can enjoy breathtaking views of the island’s lush tropical landscapes and the ocean.
Ambience:
A perfect combination of elegance and rustic charm, the restaurant is designed with an open-air concept that lets guests enjoy a beautiful breeze while dining."

name: Six Senses Samui Wellness and Spa
tags: Beauty & Wellness, Massage, Spa & Beauty, Sauna, Steam Room, Facial, Thai Massage, Foot Massage, Coconut Oil Massage, Head Massage, Hot Stone Massage, Speciality Massages
description:
Holistic Wellness Experience
Six Senses Samui offers a rejuvenating wellness journey set against the island’s natural beauty. The resort’s treatments blend locally-inspired techniques with natural ingredients, providing both relaxation and revitalization. Whether in a private villa or an open-air Sala, the serene surroundings of the rock-fringed bay enhance every experience.
Spa Facilities
The spa features six private treatment villas, each offering an intimate and tranquil environment for your treatments. A dedicated villa for visiting practitioners ensures a wide variety of therapies are available. The spa also includes two dry saunas and two steam rooms, perfect for post-treatment relaxation. Additionally, the resort offers a fitness center, yoga Sala, meditation Sala, and a walking meditation area to help guests connect with nature and deepen their relaxation.
Thai Healing Therapy
A signature treatment, the Thai Healing Therapy combines ancient techniques passed down for over 700 years. This therapeutic massage targets key areas like the neck, shoulders, back, and legs, using stretching, acupressure, and rhythmic massage to restore balance and relieve tension. Highly skilled therapists ensure the highest therapeutic benefit, making this treatment ideal for stress relief, muscle tension, and improved flexibility.
Unique Wellness Journey
What sets Six Senses Samui apart is its integration of expert therapies, stunning surroundings, and Thai healing traditions. Whether you seek a traditional Thai massage, a soothing facial, or a complete wellness retreat, the resort provides a holistic experience that nurtures both body and soul."

name: Six Senses - Drinks on the Hill
tags: Bars & Nightlife, Bars & Pubs, Open Air, Snack Menu, Cocktail Bars, Hotel Bars
description:
Enjoy a refreshing drink while taking in panoramic views of the Gulf of Thailand at Drinks on the Hill, located at Six Senses Samui. This relaxed bar offers an extensive menu of beverages, catering to all tastes. Choose from fresh tropical juices, mocktails, classic cocktails, local and imported beers, and a comprehensive wine list.
The cocktail menu highlights tropical flavors with creative combinations like mojitos and fruity punches. For wine lovers, enjoy a selection of both local and international wines, from crisp whites to full-bodied reds.
Perfect for unwinding after a day of exploration, Drinks on the Hill provides a tranquil atmosphere to enjoy a sunset drink or relax with friends. The attentive staff ensures a memorable experience in one of Koh Samui's most scenic locations."

name: Cape Fahn Hotel
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Pool Villas, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Room With Private Pool, Wifi Access In Room, Private Room, Air Conditioning, Private Bathroom, Rooms With Seaview, Airport Shuttle, Rooms With Balcony, Family Rooms, Sun Loungers Or Beach Chairs, Sun Umbrellas, Wellness, 5* Accommodation
description:
A luxurious 5-star retreat located on the exclusive Koh Fahn Island, just off the eastern coast of Koh Samui, Thailand. Nestled near the serene Choengmon Beach, this private paradise offers a unique opportunity to experience ultimate tranquility and sophistication.
At Cape Fahn, guests are treated to a collection of independent villas, each featuring a private pool for an intimate and personalized stay. Surrounded by lush tropical greenery, the villas provide breathtaking views of nature, offering a true sense of seclusion. Let the gentle breezes, the melodic symphony of birdsong, and the calming sound of waves on the deserted beach soothe your mind and spirit.
Whether you’re looking to unwind in complete privacy or enjoy the beauty of the island, Cape Fahn Private Islands Hotel delivers an unparalleled level of luxury and serenity. Enjoy the warm tropical sun, relax in your private villa, or take a leisurely stroll along the beach with the sound of the ocean as your soundtrack.
Despite its secluded location, the hotel is conveniently accessible, with Koh Samui Airport just a short journey away. Cape Fahn is the perfect blend of exclusive island living and easy access, offering a truly unique and unforgettable stay in Koh Samui."

name: Long Dtai Restaurant
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Bars & Entertainment, Michelin Star, Thai Food, Airconditioned Area, Outdoor Dining, Fusion Food, Wifi Access In Restaurant
description:
Exceptional Fine-Dining Experience
Situated in the luxurious Cape Fahn Hotel, Private Islands, Long Dtai offers a one-of-a-kind fine-dining experience with a focus on traditional southern Thai cuisine. The restaurant’s idyllic setting, combined with the expertise of Michelin-starred Chef David Thompson, makes it a premier destination for those seeking refined, authentic Thai flavors.
Culinary Journey Through Southern Thailand
Named ""Long Dtai,"" meaning ""heading south,"" the restaurant takes guests on a culinary exploration of southern Thai food, known for its vibrant herbs, spices, and bold flavors. Chef David Thompson brings his deep expertise and passion for Thai cuisine to every dish, using locally sourced ingredients to craft exquisite meals that are a feast for both the eyes and the palate.
Exquisite Southern Thai Specialties
Long Dtai’s menu features an array of southern Thai specialties, with each dish reflecting the rich culinary traditions of the region. The innovative presentation, paired with high-quality ingredients, ensures an unforgettable gastronomic experience, making it a must-visit for both locals and visitors alike.
Unmatched Dining Experience
Whether you're a seasoned lover of Thai cuisine or new to southern flavors, Long Dtai promises an exceptional and unique dining adventure. The restaurant’s dedication to excellence, combined with Chef Thompson’s culinary mastery, guarantees a memorable meal that exceeds expectations."

name: Hue All Day Dining
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Beachfront, Thai Food, Outdoor Dining, International Food, Wifi Access In Restaurant
description:
Hue Restaurant
Hue Restaurant offers an exceptional selection of international and Thai dishes for all-day dining, ideally located near the pools and recreational areas for your convenience. With its relaxing, casual setting, it’s the perfect place for guests of all ages to enjoy a variety of high-quality meals.
A Diverse Menu for Every Taste
Whether you're in the mood for classic Thai flavors or international favorites, Hue Restaurant’s diverse menu caters to every palate. From flavorful curries to global comfort foods, we ensure that every meal is prepared with freshness, flavor, and quality in mind.
Ethical Dining Commitment
In line with Cape & Kantary Hotels' commitment to ethical dining, Hue Restaurant proudly refrains from serving shark fin, bird's nest, or foie gras. We strongly support animal welfare by promoting sustainable and cruelty-free dining choices.
Come and indulge in a delightful dining experience at Hue Restaurant, where great food meets ethical values in a tranquil atmosphere."

name: The New French Kiss
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Beachfront, Seafood, Thai Food, French Food, Belgian Food, Cocktails
description:
Located on the stunning Thong Tanod Beach in the southernmost part of Koh Samui, The New French Kiss invites you to experience a unique blend of French, Belgian, and Thai cuisine in a breathtaking seaside setting. Whether you’re craving classic French sophistication, hearty Belgian comfort food, or the bold, vibrant flavors of Thailand, our menu offers something to satisfy every palate.
Authentic French Cuisine
: Indulge in French culinary classics, including savory pastries, rich sauces, and tender meats, all crafted with the finest ingredients for a true taste of France.
Belgian Delights
: Savor the heartiness of Belgian dishes such as traditional stews, prepared with love and authenticity.
Thai Specialties
: Immerse yourself in the bold, aromatic flavors of Thailand with a range of delicious Thai dishes, from spicy curries to fresh seafood and stir-fries, all made with the freshest local ingredients.
Beachfront Views & Relaxing Ambiance
: With sweeping views of the ocean, our restaurant offers the perfect blend of delicious food and tranquility, making it an ideal spot for both lunch and dinner.
Peaceful and Cozy Setting

name: Galanga
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Seafood, Thai Food, Airconditioned Area, Outdoor Dining, International Food, Wifi Access In Restaurant
description:
A Unique Dining and Art Experience
Located in a tranquil spot away from the bustle of Koh Samui, Galanga Restaurant & Art Gallery combines traditional Thai architecture with modern dining to create a truly memorable experience. With its open garden patio, terra-cotta courtyard, and ornate wooden Thai roof, the restaurant offers a peaceful, charming escape in a stunning setting.
Interactive Dining
The experience at Galanga goes beyond just food—it's an interactive journey. Guests can stroll through the garden to view fresh fish displays and watch chefs prepare dishes in the open kitchen, where techniques like noodle-pulling add a unique touch. For those who prefer dining under the stars, 11 alfresco tables offer a delightful open-air atmosphere.
Elegant Indoor Comfort
Inside, the air-conditioned dining room is equally enchanting, with towering circular pillars and a majestic tree that stretches into the atrium. The floor-to-ceiling wine cabinet adds to the ambiance, showcasing a fine selection of wines and Champagne, ideal for special occasions.
Art and Cuisine Combined
As an art gallery as well as a restaurant, Galanga features local artworks, blending culture with cuisine for a one-of-a-kind experience. The menu offers a diverse selection of authentic Thai dishes, including aromatic curries, fresh seafood, stir-fries, and noodles—each crafted with the finest ingredients and traditional methods."

name: Lucky Restaurant
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Beachfront, Thai Food, English Food, Sunset Restaurant
description:
Seaside Dining with Breathtaking Sunset Views
Nestled along Nathon’s scenic coastline, Lucky Restaurant offers a memorable dining experience with stunning views of Angthong Marine Park. Since 2009, this family-friendly spot has gained popularity for its perfect blend of authentic Thai cuisine, European classics, and a welcoming atmosphere, all while guests enjoy magnificent sunset views.
Diverse Menu for Every Taste
Lucky Restaurant serves a wide variety of dishes catering to all tastes. From flavorful Thai curries and fresh seafood to European favorites like fish and chips, pizza, and burgers, there’s something for everyone. Vegetarian options are also available, ensuring every guest is satisfied.
Refreshing Drinks & Free WiFi
Complement your meal with a refreshing drink, from fresh fruit shakes to cold beers, cappuccinos, and house wines. With free WiFi available, guests can stay connected while relaxing and enjoying the serene setting.
A Family-Friendly, Relaxed Atmosphere
The restaurant, owned by Steve and Nit, offers a warm, welcoming ambiance, making it the perfect place for family outings, romantic dinners, or casual meals with friends. The friendly service and breathtaking sunset views make every visit special."

name: Hansar Samui Resort & Spa
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Wifi Access In Room, Private Room, Air Conditioning, Private Bathroom, Rooms With Seaview, Airport Shuttle, Rooms With Balcony, Family Rooms, Sun Loungers Or Beach Chairs, Sun Umbrellas, Wellness
description:
A Haven of Happiness and Joy
Hansar Samui, named after the ancient Sanskrit word for ""happiness and joy,"" is dedicated to providing a luxurious resort and spa experience where every moment is filled with bliss. The resort's philosophy is all about embracing life in full color and ensuring a memorable stay that nurtures joy.
Luxurious Beachfront Accommodations
Set along a stunning beachfront, Hansar Samui offers spacious rooms with expansive private balconies and oversized daybeds, ideal for outdoor living and relaxation. Thoughtfully designed, each room blends teak floors, terrazzo bathrooms, and local textiles with modern touches. Custom furnishings and large flat-screen TVs enhance the comfort, making it a perfect balance of intimacy and openness, creating a true sense of place."

name: Luxsa
tags: Beauty & Wellness, Massage, Spa & Beauty, Steam Room, Body Scrub, Bath Therapy, Body Wrap, Facial, Foot Scrub, Thai Massage, Foot Massage, Coconut Oil Massage, Head Massage
description:
Rooted in ancient Thai healing traditions,
LUXSA
comes from the Sanskrit word meaning “Healing – health through water.” This philosophy, combined with the timeless Thai approach that balances the four elements of earth, water, air, and fire, forms the foundation of the LUXSA Spa experience.
At
LUXSA Spa
, we offer a serene sanctuary for the senses, designed to provide not only relaxation but also a transformative, memorable wellness experience. Whether you're looking to rejuvenate, detoxify, or simply unwind, our tailored treatments will help you achieve your health and wellness goals.
Take a moment to nourish your body and mind with our range of specialized spa services. Our dedicated spa receptionists are here to guide you in creating a personalized spa program during your stay. Programs can be customized to suit your unique preferences and range from
two to seven days
, allowing you to choose the perfect balance of treatments, therapies, and Spa cuisine."

name: H Bistro
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Beach Bars, Beachfront, Seafood, Thai Food, Airconditioned Area, Outdoor Dining, French Food, Family Friendly, International Food, Mediterranean Food, Breakfast, Wifi Access In Restaurant
description:
Step into H Bistro, where the vibrant flavors of the Mediterranean meet refined French culinary traditions. Featuring a menu crafted with premium ingredients like Maine lobster and oysters sourced from Canada, Japan, and France, each dish is designed to transport your taste buds straight to the heart of the Mediterranean.
H Bistro blends Mediterranean spices with French techniques, offering dishes that highlight the natural flavors of fresh, premium ingredients. From perfectly prepared seafood to expertly cooked meats, every plate is a journey of taste and texture.
Dine indoors in an intimate setting or enjoy the open air with beautiful Koh Samui views. Whether it's breakfast, a light bite, or a hearty evening meal, the menu caters to every palate throughout the day.
The experience is enhanced with a curated wine list, perfectly complementing the Mediterranean flavors. Locally sourced ingredients ensure every dish is fresh, flavorful, and of the highest quality.
H Bistro is the ideal destination for locals and visitors seeking a world-class culinary experience. Impeccable cuisine, stunning surroundings, and top-tier service combine to create a dining experience that’s as unforgettable as Koh Samui itself."

name: Sweet Sisters Cafe
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Fusion Food, Gluten Free Options, Vegan, Vegetarian, Breakfast
description:
Sweet Sisters Café: Delicious, Healthy, and Sustainable Dining
Located in the heart of Koh Samui, Sweet Sisters Café offers delicious and nutritious whole-food dishes made from the finest local, organic produce. Our menu features Southern Thai-inspired flavors with international influences, offering vegan, vegetarian, gluten-free, and dairy-free options to suit every dietary need.
What Makes Us Special?
Whole-Food Philosophy:
We use fresh, sustainable, and organic ingredients, free from MSG, sugar, and factory-farmed meats. Our chef, Noiy, ensures all meat is free-range, and seafood responsibly sourced.
Unique Thai Fusion:
Our dishes blend traditional Southern Thai flavors with global influences, from vegan curries to seafood salads.
Sustainably Sourced:
Many ingredients come directly from Noiy’s plantation, ensuring freshness and quality.
Inclusive Menu:
We cater to vegan, vegetarian, gluten-free, and dairy-free diets.
At Sweet Sisters Café, we offer healthy, flavorful meals that nourish both body and planet, with no compromises on taste or sustainability."

description:
Authentic Mexican Cuisine in the Heart of Fisherman’s Village, Koh Samui
Located in the vibrant Fisherman’s Village,
La Cantina
is your ultimate destination for authentic Mexican flavors. Offering a unique and unforgettable culinary experience, we bring the bold, rich tastes of Mexico to Koh Samui.
Our menu features a wide selection of traditional dishes made with fresh, high-quality ingredients and aromatic spices. From sizzling tacos and enchiladas to Tex-Mex twists, succulent steakhouse cuts, and flavorful rotisserie chicken, there's something to satisfy every palate.
Pair your meal with one of our signature margaritas, a refreshing mojito, or a chilled glass of sangria. Our fully stocked bar also offers a variety of cocktails, tequila, and beer, making it easy to find the perfect drink to complement your meal."

Whether you’re craving rich, flavorful curries, sizzling tandoori specialties, or aromatic biryanis, Tandoori Palace is the perfect destination for lovers of Indian cuisine.
Our menu features a wide variety of dishes, from vegetarian delights to tender meats, all cooked using time-honored recipes and traditional spices. Enjoy the bold and vibrant flavors of India in a comfortable and inviting atmosphere that captures the essence of Indian dining.

name: Antica Locanda
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Wood Oven, Italian Food
description:
Located in Bangrak, Antica Locanda offers a warm, family-friendly atmosphere where you can indulge in authentic Italian cuisine. Owned by Stefano Giacomelli, a passionate restaurateur with over 10 years of experience on Koh Samui, this charming eatery brings the essence of Italy to your plate.
Antica Locanda is renowned for its authentic Italian pizzas and handmade pastas, crafted using premium ingredients imported directly from Italy. From classic Margherita pizza to rich, flavorful pasta dishes, every bite promises to transport you to Italy.
The cozy and welcoming ambiance makes it the perfect spot for dining in or takeout. With generous portions, fast service, and friendly staff, Antica Locanda is the ideal family-friendly dining destination. Whether you're enjoying a meal with loved ones or grabbing a quick bite, Stefano and his Thai wife ensure an exceptional experience.
Visit us today for an unforgettable Italian meal in Bangrak!"

name: The Jolly Fisherman
tags: Bars & Nightlife, Bars & Pubs, Open Air, Live Music, Snack Menu
description:
The Jolly Fisherman
is Koh Samui’s go-to spot for good food, refreshing drinks, and an unbeatable atmosphere. Whether you're looking for a fun night out or a relaxed day with friends and family, this lively gastro pub promises an experience that combines the best of hearty dining, great drinks, and live entertainment.
From classic pub comfort food to exciting international dishes, we’ve got something for everyone. Enjoy everything from juicy burgers to flavorful seafood, all crafted with the finest ingredients. The perfect evening comes with great tunes! Enjoy live performances as the music flows through the air, enhancing the lively, laid-back vibe of our beer garden.
Whether you’re in the mood for a crisp draft beer, an artisanal craft brew, or a glass of premium wine, we offer a wide selection to complement your meal and elevate your experience."

name: Homm Chura
tags: Accommodation, Pool Villas, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool
description:
Homm Chura Samui Resort: Your Perfect Tropical Getaway
Experience the charm of Koh Samui at Homm Chura Samui, a luxury resort where Asian-inspired elegance meets vibrant island energy. Located just 5-7 minutes from Samui International Airport and only a 10-15 minute walk from the lively Chaweng Downtown, our resort offers easy access to the best of the island while providing a serene and sophisticated retreat.
With 65 beautifully designed rooms, including the spacious Grand Deluxe and the luxurious One Bedroom Beachview Suite, Homm Chura Samui invites you to unwind in style. Each room is a tranquil sanctuary, surrounded by lush palm trees and offering stunning views of our beachfront swimming pool and Koh Samui’s iconic white sand beach.
Nestled in the heart of Chaweng Beach, one of the island’s most sought-after areas, Homm Chura Samui places you just steps away from Koh Samui’s best dining, shopping, and entertainment. Whether you choose to relax at the resort or explore the vibrant local scene, everything you need is right at your doorstep.
Book your stay at Homm Chura Samui today and indulge in a luxurious escape where every moment is designed for relaxation, rejuvenation, and unforgettable experiences."

name: Prime Burger
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Meat Lovers, Fusion Food, Family Friendly, American Food, Vegan, Vegetarian
description:
In December 2023, Koh Samui welcomed a new culinary gem:
Prime Burger Samui
, an award-winning smash burger restaurant and the latest addition to a rapidly expanding chain with 15 locations across Thailand.
Nestled at the entrance to the renowned
Fisherman’s Village
, Prime Burger Samui offers a unique blend of local charm and gourmet dining, inviting both locals and tourists to indulge in expertly crafted burgers. Our smash burgers are made with freshly ground beef and daily baked buns, delivering a deliciously crispy caramelized crust that locks in rich, savory flavors. Inspired by Scandinavian, Thai, French, and Middle Eastern cuisines, our burgers are a global fusion of taste, alongside classic American favorites.
In addition to our signature burgers, our diverse menu includes fish and Halloumi burgers, salads, sides, a children's menu, and refreshing drinks, including craft beers and indulgent milkshakes. Plus, all our meat is halal, ensuring we cater to a wide range of preferences. Come experience the best of both worlds at Prime Burger Samui."

name: Wattanapat Hospital Pediatry
tags: Children's Needs, Pediatricians
description:
At Wattanapat Hospital Samui, we provide exceptional pediatric care to ensure that your child’s health is in the best hands. Our experienced pediatricians offer expert medical attention for children of all ages, from infants to teenagers.
We focus on regular health check-ups to monitor your child’s growth and development, ensuring they are on track with their milestones. In addition, we offer timely and safe vaccinations to protect against preventable diseases, helping safeguard your child’s health throughout their early years.
When your child is ill, our team is ready to provide quick and accurate diagnosis and treatment for common childhood illnesses, ensuring minimal discomfort.
For children with chronic conditions or complex medical needs, we offer specialized care to ensure they receive the support they require. In case of emergencies, our pediatric team is equipped to provide fast and reliable care when you need it most.
Wattanapat Hospital Samui stands out for its child-friendly environment, where your child will feel comfortable and at ease during their visit. Our compassionate pediatricians are dedicated to not just treating illnesses, but also to ensuring your child's well-being and comfort. With state-of-the-art facilities and advanced medical technology, we provide high-quality care tailored to your child’s needs. Trust us to deliver the best pediatric healthcare on Koh Samui."

name: Bangkok Hospital
tags: Health & Medical, Dental Services, Hospitals, Gynecology, Ultrasound, Laparoscopy, Ophthalmology, Traditional Chinese Medicine, Gastroenterologist, Health Check, Iv Drips, Food Intolerance, Hormone Screening, Cancer Screening, Digital Mamogram, Mri Abdomen, Dental Implants, Dental Bone Graft, Dental Full Xray, Internal Medicine, Surgery, Cardiac Department, Radiology, Emergency Service, Pulmonology, Urology, Bloodwork, Electrocardiogram (ecg), Dental Braces, Prosthodontics, Orthodontics, Endodontics, Wound Care And Stitch, Medical Certificates
description:
Bangkok Hospital Samui, located in Chaweng, is an internationally accredited medical facility that offers top-quality healthcare services to both locals and visitors. Established in 2004, the hospital boasts 50 beds and a dedicated team of 72 well-trained medical professionals. As part of the Bangkok Dusit Medical Services (BDMS) network, one of the largest healthcare providers in the Asia-Pacific region, Bangkok Hospital Samui is recognized globally for its excellence in patient care.
The hospital provides a comprehensive range of medical services, including gynecology, dental services, ultrasound, laparoscopy, and traditional Chinese medicine. Notably, it is the only hospital in Koh Samui offering Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI). With more than 60% of patients being foreigners, Bangkok Hospital Samui is well-equipped to meet international healthcare standards. The hospital also offers a unique emergency Hydrolance service (Boat Ambulance) to transport patients from nearby islands, ensuring timely medical care wherever needed."

Each doctor has experience and expertise in diagnosing and treating diseases in all internal medicine systems and has the potential to take good care of seriously ill patients with each disease.

tags: Health & Medical, Dental Services, Hospitals, Ultrasound, Physiotherapy & Rehab, Gastroenterologist, Cancer Screening, Radiology, Emergency Service, Bloodwork
description:
Welcome to Samui International Hospital, established in 1997 to meet the growing demand for quality healthcare on the island. Located centrally on North Chaweng Beach Road, we offer easy access to all areas of Koh Samui. Whether you’re an inpatient or outpatient, you’ll be treated by a dedicated team of highly qualified professionals committed to delivering the best possible care. Our experienced clinical staff ensures top-notch medical treatment, promoting faster recovery and optimal health outcomes.
Open 24 hours a day, we provide comprehensive medical services for both residents and tourists. Samui International Hospital is trusted for its excellence in healthcare, making it the preferred choice for those seeking quality treatment on the island. Your health and well-being are our top priority at all times."

name: Samui Home Clinic
tags: Health & Medical, Doctors & Clinics, House Calls, Health Check, Iv Drips, Emergency Service, Bloodwork
description:
Convenient and Accessible Healthcare
Welcome to Samui Home Clinic, your friendly family clinic, where your health is our priority. Our professional and reliable licensed doctor provides high-quality care for both locals and visitors.
Comprehensive Services
We offer walk-in care with no appointment needed, ensuring convenient access to medical services. The clinic is foreigner-friendly with an English and Thai-speaking doctor for clear communication. For added convenience, we provide patient drop-off and pick-up services.
Home Visits and Hotel Services
Need medical attention at home? We’ll come to you with our home doctor visits. We also offer hotel services upon request, making healthcare even more accessible during your stay on the island.
Your Health is Our Priority
At Samui Home Clinic, we’re committed to making healthcare simple, accessible, and personalized. Your well-being is in safe hands with us!"

name: Rapheephan Clinic
tags: Health & Medical, Doctors & Clinics, Gynecology, Ultrasound, Ophthalmology, Cardiac Department, Pulmonology, Urology, Maternal Fetal Medicine, Cosmetic Gynecology
description:
Rapheephan Clinic was established more than ten years, We always devoted to woman’s health, medical check up and all pregnant women before and after delivered.
From that we finally got comprehensive care for elderly people, men and women, We emphasizing the quality and our services.
Currently, we have multiple specialist doctors in the fields of Obstetrics&Gynecology, Pulmonology, Pediatrics, Radiology, Urology, Surgery, Maternal Fetal Medicine specialists and Gynecologic oncologist.
A urologist based in Bangkok offers surgical services for men, including consultations on kidney stones, BPH, sexual dysfunction, and more. Our focus is on delivering quality care at reasonable prices, with the advantage of being affiliated with a government hospital for various surgical procedures.
Our Rapheephan Clinic joins with Koh Samui Hospital in caring for all inpatients and we have sent our specialist doctors to help all patients at Koh Phangan Hospital. Let us take care of you with the best quality and affordable prices. Because we know."

name: Samui Physio Clinic
tags: Health & Medical, Doctors & Clinics, Physiotherapy & Rehab
description:
Samui Physio Clinic
Samui Physio Physical Therapy Clinic is a full-service physical therapy clinic that can provide care to the general public who are in pain, those with scoliosis, athletes, and even the elderly. Our team of experienced specialist physical therapists from Bangkok are ready to serve everyone, from preparing information before treatment, providing a thorough assessment, and taking care of the treatment results continuously. We believe in designing individualized treatments so that everyone can return to living with their loved ones with quality.
Samui Physio Clinic is considered a bone and muscle clinic that comes with a natural atmosphere, peaceful, clean and relaxing, along with modern treatment equipment that meets international standards without having to worry about additional costs. Because at this reasonable price, everyone can receive complete treatment to the fullest for the best results.
Samui Physio physical therapy clinic focuses on holistic treatment, whether it is manual therapy techniques such as myofascial release technique, mobilization, manipulation, and passive stretching, along with the use of physical tools to help maximize the effectiveness of the treatment, such as ultrasound therapy with electric stimulation to relax muscles by increasing blood circulation, high-power lasers to stimulate the repair of injured tissue, and cryotherapy to reduce swelling and inflammation.
In addition, Samui Physio Physical Therapy Clinic also emphasizes on advising everyone to understand the conditions/symptoms they are experiencing. Expert physical therapists will provide advice on both adjusting behaviors that are the cause of the problem and designing exercise postures that are appropriate and specific to each individual at each time.
We can take care of it
Neck pain, numbness in the arm
Back pain, numbness in the legs
Shoulder pain, frozen shoulder
ปวดข้อเข่า
Knee pain, osteoarthritis
Ankle, plantar fasciitis
ภาวะ Office Syndrome
Sports injuries

name: Samui Clinical Laboratory
tags: Health & Medical, Laboratories, Health Check, Hormone Screening, Cancer Screening, Bloodwork
description:
We offer a comprehensive range of accurate and reliable blood tests, designed to support your health and well-being. Whether you need routine bloodwork, health screenings, or specialized tests, our clinic uses the latest technology and is staffed by experienced professionals dedicated to delivering precise results.
Our services include full blood panels, cholesterol and lipid tests, liver and kidney function assessments, diabetes and blood sugar level checks, thyroid function tests, and vitamin and hormone evaluations. We also offer screenings for infectious diseases.
Located in central Koh Samui, we cater to both residents and visitors with convenient, efficient service. At
Samui Medical Technology Clinic
, we are committed to providing high-quality care and ensuring your peace of mind. Contact us today to schedule your appointment and take charge of your health!"

name: N Health
tags: Health & Medical, Laboratories, Bloodwork
description:
Comprehensive Bloodwork Services for Your Health
N Health offers a range of professional bloodwork services to monitor and optimize your health. With state-of-the-art facilities and expert staff, we provide accurate and timely blood tests tailored to your individual needs. Whether you're tracking your overall health, diagnosing specific conditions, or monitoring chronic illnesses, N Health ensures that you receive reliable results in a comfortable environment. Our bloodwork services cover everything from routine check-ups to specialized tests, helping you stay informed about your health. Trust N Health for your blood testing needs and take proactive steps towards a healthier future."

name: Sea Valley Hotel
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Beachfront, Breakfast, Pet Friendly, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Room With Private Pool
description:
Overlooking the sandy shores of Lipa Noi Beach, Sea Valley Resort offer private air-conditioned villas and most with a private pool . Apart from its sea-front outdoor pool, the hotel also provides pampering spa services.
Hiding behind landscaped gardens, villas feature a private terrace which enjoys beautiful sunset views. Fitted with wooden flooring and free Wi-Fi, Free Netflix in all the rooms, DVD player and a lounge area. Private bathrooms come with glass roofs and hot-water showers.
Staff at the tour desk can help arrange trekking and diving trips, where guests can explore the natural beauty of Koh Samui. Alternatively, traditional Thai massages can be enjoyed at the spa.
Overlooking the beach, Sea Valley’s restaurant offers an intimate dining experience at its outdoor seating area. After meals, relax with a cocktail and sports programs at the bar."

Escape to the tranquility of Srifa Resort, where charming two-bedroom houses provide the perfect retreat just a short stroll from the beautiful Lipa Noi Beach.
Why Stay at Srifa Resort?
Comfortable Accommodations: Spacious two-bedroom houses equipped with everything you need for a relaxing stay.
Prime Location: Enjoy the peaceful ambiance of Lipa Noi, just moments away from the beach.
Ideal for Families & Groups: Perfect for couples, families, or friends seeking a cozy and private getaway.
Relaxing Surroundings: Nestled in a serene environment, our resort offers a blend of comfort and nature.
Whether you're here to unwind by the beach or explore the beauty of Koh Samui, Srifa Resort is your home away from home."

name: Nanus Restaurant
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Beachfront, Italian Food, Sunset Restaurant
description:
Authentic Italian Dining by the Beach
Nanus Italian Restaurant in Lipa Noi offers an unforgettable culinary experience with authentic Italian flavors. Set against the stunning backdrop of the beach, enjoy a relaxing meal while taking in the serene beauty of the ocean.
Wood-Fired Pizzas & Homemade Pasta
Our menu is a tribute to Italy’s rich culinary heritage, featuring wood-fired pizzas, homemade pasta, and traditional Italian desserts. Every dish is prepared using the freshest, finest ingredients, ensuring that each bite transports you to Italy.
Beachfront Dining with Spectacular Views
Experience the charm of beachfront dining at Nanus Italian Restaurant. With the soothing sounds of the waves and breathtaking ocean views, every meal becomes a memorable occasion, whether it’s a romantic dinner or a family gathering.
Relaxing Atmosphere & Exceptional Service
Our relaxed and welcoming atmosphere, combined with attentive service, ensures a dining experience like no other. We prioritize guest satisfaction, creating a friendly and memorable environment for every visitor."

name: Satva Yoga Retreat
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Yoga Retreat, Restaurant, Wifi Access In Room
description:
Welcome to Satva Yoga Retreat – Your Tranquil Escape in Lipa Noi
Nestled in a secluded corner of Lipa Noi, Satva Yoga Retreat offers a peaceful haven for those seeking to deepen their yoga and meditation practice. Whether you're new to yoga or an experienced practitioner, our retreat is designed to help you reconnect with your inner self and find balance in a serene, supportive environment.
At Satva Yoga Retreat, you’ll experience guided exercises to strengthen your body, enhance flexibility, and improve posture. Our personalized wellness plans are tailored to support your journey towards better health and well-being, while stress-relieving techniques will help you unwind and feel centered.
Why choose Satva Yoga Retreat? Our secluded location provides the perfect backdrop for mindfulness, and small group sessions ensure you receive individual attention for a truly transformative experience. Join a community of like-minded souls and take the next step in your yoga journey."

name: Rajapruek Samui Resort
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Bungalows, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Wifi Access In Room
description:
A Serene Escape on Lipa Noi Beach
Nestled along the Gulf of Siam on Lipa Noi, also known as Sunset Beach, Rajapruek Samui Resort offers a peaceful haven where you can relax to the sound of waves and enjoy stunning sunsets. Our private beach, perfect for families, features shallow waters ideal for children to safely swim.
At Rajapruek Samui Resort, unwind with a range of activities like swimming, canoeing, and sailing. Treat yourself to a relaxing massage, such as oil or Thai massage, and experience the tranquil beauty of Koh Samui. Our friendly service and serene atmosphere ensure a truly restful and awe-inspiring stay."

name: Lipa Lodge Beach Restaurant
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Beachfront, Thai Food, Outdoor Dining, Italian Food, International Food, Breakfast
description:
Dining at Lipa Lodge: A Culinary Journey with Sea Views
Our all-day dining restaurant at Lipa Lodge offers an exceptional culinary experience in a stunning setting. With both indoor seating and a refreshing outdoor terrace, the restaurant boasts breathtaking sea views, making it an ideal spot for any meal, whether it's breakfast, lunch, or dinner.
Renowned for its award-winning cuisine crafted by Khun McDang, one of Thailand’s most celebrated chefs, our restaurant serves a menu that beautifully blends traditional Thai flavors with international dishes. Chef McDang’s innovative approach and culinary expertise have earned him acclaim in numerous guidebooks, making this a must-visit destination for food lovers. Whether you're savoring authentic Thai cuisine or global-inspired creations, each dish is designed to delight the senses."

11 private villas

description:

Koh Samui
, far from the bustling tourist crowds,
The Siam Residence
offers a serene escape in an idyllic setting. Located on the pristine

on the
West Coast of Koh Samui
, this exclusive private villa resort is a sanctuary of peace, beauty, and luxury.
Set amidst lush tropical gardens and offering an uninterrupted stretch of
immaculate white sandy beaches
, the Siam Residence is a true haven in the heart of the
Gulf of Siam
. Here, time seems to slow down as guests immerse themselves in the tranquil surroundings, with

, swaying palms, and the deep blue ocean as the backdrop."

name: The Siam Restaurant
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Beachfront, Seafood, Thai Food, German / Austrian Food, International Food, Breakfast Buffet
description:
Experience the perfect blend of relaxed beachside dining for lunch and elegant fine dining for dinner at
Siam Residence Restaurant
. Situated directly on the beach, our open-air restaurant offers breathtaking views of the island’s most spectacular sunset, making it the ideal spot to enjoy fresh, delicious cuisine.
For dinner, indulge in a variety of international dishes fused with the vibrant flavors of authentic Thai ingredients. From mild to spicy, our
traditional Thai dishes
cater to every palate, while our seafood menu is a standout feature. Freshly caught seafood such as squid, crab, prawns, and lobster is always available. If you prefer, our chef can guide you through the local market to handpick your
personal catch of the day
."

name: Sawai Home Resort
tags: Accommodation, Bungalows, Beachfront, Restaurant, Bar, Wifi Access In Room
description:
Sawai Home Resort, located on the beachfront in Nathon, offers a relaxing retreat with free Wi-Fi throughout the property. Just 400 meters from Laem Din Beach and 1.5 km from Lipa Noi Beach, the resort is an ideal destination for beach lovers.
Rooms feature modern amenities including air conditioning, a flat-screen TV, a fridge, and a private bathroom. Some rooms also have a seating area and a balcony or patio, perfect for enjoying the views.
Guests can indulge in authentic Thai cuisine while enjoying scenic views of the beach and sunset.
The resort is 17 km from the famous Grandfather's Grandmother's Rocks, 21 km from Fisherman Village, and 26 km from Big Buddha. Samui International Airport is 25 km away, with a paid airport shuttle service."

name: Stay Inn
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Beachfront
description:
Stay Inn Nathon: Budget-Friendly Comfort with a Sunset View
Stay Inn Nathon is a 3-storey, low-rise self-service hotel located in the heart of Nathon, Koh Samui. Offering modern, budget-friendly accommodation, the hotel features 18 studio rooms, each equipped with full facilities for a comfortable stay. Guests can enjoy stunning sunset views and the convenience of being just a short walk from Nathon Pier and the government district. Ideal for travelers seeking simplicity and affordability without compromising on quality, Stay Inn Nathon provides the perfect base to explore the island."

name: The Sunset Beach Resort
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Pool Villas, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Room With Private Pool
description:
Welcome to the Soft Opening of The Sunset Beach
We are thrilled to invite you to the soft opening of The Sunset Beach, our family-owned retreat where every guest is treated like family. While not all services are available during this phase, we are committed to providing an exceptional experience.
Though our full L’Ananas Restaurant is not yet operational, we offer a curated menu at the Pool Bar, alongside a selection of beverages. Our fitness center is open, and while the spa is not fully ready, the sauna, steam room, and cool cave are available for relaxation.
Our private beach offers a peaceful escape, perfect for enjoying sunsets and unwinding. As a family business, we take pride in delivering personalized service, and we apologize if any part of your stay doesn’t meet expectations. Your satisfaction is our priority.
We look forward to welcoming you to The Sunset Beach and providing an unforgettable, family-centered experience."

name: L’Ananas Restaurant
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Beachfront, Seafood, Thai Food, International Food, Breakfast
description:
Thai Food at L’Ananas, Koh Samui
Thai cuisine is known for its balance of five fundamental flavors in each dish or the overall meal – hot (spicy), sour, sweet, salty and bitter. The cuisine uses many local herbs and the dishes are light, tasty and healthy.
In our kitchen we use a great variety of local herbs and spices which gives a nice fresh tasty flavor to our dishes. Visit our herbal garden in the resort. Thai Fruits at L’Ananas Tropical seasonal fruits are always best when in season with their extraordinary nutritional values.
Choose from L’Ananas, our all-day dining restaurant with scenic views overlooking the resort and the sea, or the Lilavadee Pool Bar, nestled alongside our resort swimming pool for a refreshing drink, light snack or meal throughout the day and evening."

name: The Sunset Beach Spa
tags: Beauty & Wellness, Massage, Spa & Beauty, Swimming Pool, Sauna, Ice Bath/pool, Steam Room, Body Scrub, Facial
description:

rejuvenation

Hot & Wet Sauna

Complete your session with a refreshing dip in our

Why Choose The Sunset Beach Resort & Spa?

Sauna World

spa treatments

name: Sunset Beach Weddings
tags: Professional Services, Wedding Planners, Wedding Venues
description:
Your Dream Wedding in Thailand
Say ""I do"" at Sunset Beach, Thaling Ngam, one of Koh Samui's most picturesque wedding locations. Whether you’re envisioning an intimate beach ceremony or a grand celebration, we specialize in creating unforgettable weddings tailored to your style and vision.
With a breathtaking beachfront backdrop of crystal-clear waters and stunning sunsets, your wedding will be filled with natural beauty. We offer customized wedding packages, whether you dream of a traditional Thai ceremony, contemporary celebration, or rustic beach affair.
Our expert team handles all details, from floral arrangements and décor to catering and entertainment. Experienced coordinators ensure your day runs smoothly, so you can focus on enjoying the moment.
Let us help you create a magical experience at Thaling Ngam, with romantic honeymoon packages to follow. Contact us today to begin planning your dream wedding in paradise."
