tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Bar, Wifi Access In Room, Private Room, Air Conditioning, Private Bathroom, Parking, Rooms With Seaview, Rooms With Balcony, Sun Loungers Or Beach Chairs, Sun Umbrellas, 24 Hours Front Desk, 5* Accommodation
description:
Head south to discover a more serene pace of life, where windswept beaches stretch endlessly and the vast expanse of the open seas beckons.
Plunge into the vibrant marine life while snorkeling in Koh Samui or embark on an adventure to the breathtaking Angthong marine park.
Whether you're unwinding in your beachfront pool villa, enjoying a refreshing cocktail from the vintage VW truck. Immerse yourself in rejuvenating spa experiences, let the invigorating salt spray caress your skin, and find comfort in our well-appointed rooms.
58 rooms and pool villas, including beachfront
Fresh ocean flavours
Spa hideaway
Destination weddings"

name: Essence Restaurant
tags: Food & Beverage, Beachfront, Thai Food
description:
Discover Essence, a fresh addition to Koh Samui's dining scene, where beach views meet delicious, wholesome food. This beachfront restaurant serves hearty, nutritious dishes crafted from high-quality, honest produce.
Each plate is designed to be as flavorful as it is nourishing, making it the perfect spot for those looking for both taste and wellness.
The vibe at Essence is contemporary and casual, with a breezy atmosphere and stunning beach views that enhance the dining experience. Whether you're enjoying a relaxing meal with friends or a quiet dinner by the beach, Essence offers a satisfying and enjoyable culinary escape."

name: Tiki Hut
tags: Bars & Nightlife, Bars & Pubs, Beachfront, Sunset, Snack Menu
description:
Step into a world of tropical charm at The Tiki Hut in Taling Ngam, Koh Samui, where Polynesian-inspired décor meets an electric atmosphere. With its thatched roofs, tiki masks, and vibrant ambiance, The Tiki Hut offers a unique escape that blends relaxation with excitement.
Enjoy expertly crafted tropical cocktails prepared by skilled mixologists while soaking in the lively beats of live music. Whether you're unwinding in the afternoon sun or dancing into the night, The Tiki Hut promises a fun and immersive experience for all.
From sun-soaked relaxation to vibrant, lively nights, The Tiki Hut is your ultimate destination for a tropical experience on Koh Samui, perfect for both daytime lounging and lively evenings with friends."

name: Avani Rooftop Lounge
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Rooftop Venues, Beachfront
description:
Climb up and unwind at the Avani Rooftop Lounge, where you can enjoy delicious treats and refreshing drinks while taking in breathtaking ocean views. This rooftop venue is the perfect place to relax, whether you're starting your day with a refreshing iced coffee or smoothie in the morning breeze or treating yourself to a cocktail at sunset as the vibrant skies come alive.
Savor a variety of dishes from Essence, offering a perfect mix of Thai and international favorites, each crafted to highlight the fresh flavors of the island. The Avani Rooftop Lounge combines great food, stunning views, and a laid-back atmosphere for the ultimate relaxation experience."

name: Avani Dining on the beach
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Private Dining, Beachfront, Thai Food, Barbecue, International Food
description:
Indulge in a private dining experience on the beach, under the shimmering stars, where you can design your romantic night exactly as you envision it. Whether it's a quiet, intimate dinner or a special celebration, we take care of everything so you can focus on enjoying the moment.
To enhance the experience, consider adding a private fire show, creating lasting memories as the night unfolds. Choose from a wide array of menu options, each curated to satisfy your culinary desires, ensuring an unforgettable dining experience.
Relax, unwind, and let us craft a truly magical evening, perfect for you and your loved one to cherish."

name: Avani Spa
tags: Beauty & Wellness, Massage, Spa & Beauty
description:
Experience all-day bliss at Avani Spa, located in the serene Taling Ngam. This peaceful spa hotel in Koh Samui offers a full range of treatments designed to leave you glowing inside and out. Indulge in beachside massages, beautifying facials, and tailored treatments that offer ultimate relaxation and rejuvenation.
One of the signature experiences is the Avani Signature Touch, a soothing oil massage combined with stretching techniques, focusing on the upper back, shoulders, and neck. For a deeper state of relaxation, try the Meditation Massage, which blends ancient healing traditions with modern innovation. Begin this unique experience with mindfulness exercises, using the brainwave-tracking Muse headband to enhance your journey to bliss.
Avani Spa is the perfect destination for anyone seeking luxurious, rejuvenating treatments while embracing the tranquil pace of the island."

name: Avani Weddings
tags: Professional Services, Wedding Planners
description:
Plan a picture-perfect wedding in paradise, on the sand or atop the pool. Let our dedicated planners take care of all the details, leaving you free to live in the moment. Craft the perfect day from our romantic packages, for an unforgettable destination wedding in Koh Samui.
Relax and let us help you make every moment memorable. Choose the perfect wedding package and treat yourself with spa treatments, delicious food and stylish accommodation. We take care of all the details, so you can savour every second.
Plan your picture-perfect wedding in paradise with Avani Weddings in Taling Ngam, Koh Samui. Whether on the sandy beach or atop a stunning poolside terrace, our dedicated wedding planners ensure every detail is taken care of, allowing you to enjoy every moment.
Choose from our romantic wedding packages designed to create an unforgettable destination wedding experience. Relax and let us help you make every moment special, with options for spa treatments, delicious cuisine, and stylish accommodations.
From the ceremony to the reception, we handle all the details so you can focus on celebrating your love in a breathtaking tropical setting."

name: Avani Chaweng Samui Hotel
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Wifi Access In Room, Private Room, Air Conditioning, Private Bathroom, Rooms With Seaview, Rooms With Balcony, Sun Loungers Or Beach Chairs, Sun Umbrellas, 24 Hours Front Desk, Room Service, 5* Accommodation, Family Friendly
description:
Soak up tropical island vibes in the beating heart of Koh Samui’s biggest and best beach.  Adults-only resort,  guests under 18 years will not be permitted at Avani Chaweng. Kick back in your retro-chic room, head downstairs for all-day socialising by the pool.
We keep things cosy here at Avani Chaweng Samui Hotel & Beach Club, with three storeys of 80 rooms and suites wrapped around a central courtyard. Strike a pose on your balcony or by the pool. Grab a cocktail from the minibar. Or kick back for a chilled night in with all the connectivity and entertainment you could need from Chaweng beach Koh Samui hotels."

name: SEEN Beach Club
tags: Bars & Nightlife, Clubs & Discos, Beachfront, Open Air, Live Music, Dj Music, Snack Menu, Adults Only
description:
Great vibes and panoramic sea views await at SEEN Beach Club, a premier destination in Chaweng. By day, sip, dip, and unwind as you relax by the pool or on daybeds, taking in the stunning beachfront views. As the sun sets, the energy rises with live music, top DJs, and vibrant events, making it the ultimate spot to enjoy the nightlife scene.
Indulge in tempting bites from the snack menu and bold cocktails, or opt for exclusive bottle packages for a more personalized experience. Whether you’re dancing on the floor with friends or sharing a cozy, romantic moment, SEEN Beach Club has a spot for every vibe.
SEEN Beach Club follows an adults-only policy from 7:00 pm every Friday and Saturday, as well as during special events. Starting 1 January 2025, it will be a fully adults-only venue, with exceptions on Sundays from 11:00 am – 7:00 pm for families."

name: Centara Reserve
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Pool Villas, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Bar, Room With Private Pool, Wifi Access In Room, Gym, Private Room, Air Conditioning, Private Bathroom, Parking, Rooms With Seaview, Laundry Service, Airport Shuttle, Rooms With Balcony, Family Rooms, Sun Loungers Or Beach Chairs, Sun Umbrellas, Wellness, Concierge Services, Room Service
description:
Discover story-driven hospitality dedicated to creating personal moments and enduring memories in iconic destinations. From vibrant cities to tranquil escapes, every property evokes and inspires stories old and new; and each embraces a distinct personality inspired by the spirit of its destination.
A journey to personalised luxury. A relaxing, meaningful escape where stories are written. Centara Reserve is an invitation to discover a rare destination’s unique local culture, genuine hospitality and remarkable nature.
Every experience at Centara Reserve provides an immersive journey of discovery, from the locally-inspired arrival experience to the “Reserve Host” modern butler service; from the culinary arts to the world of pampering and wellness; and from authentic local activities to international spectacles.
Centara Reserve invites you to create a world of your own with experiences that are tailored and reserved just for you."

name: Salt Society Beach Bar & Kitchen
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Bars & Entertainment, Beachfront, Dj Music, Live Music, Seafood, Thai Food, Airconditioned Area, Outdoor Dining, Fusion Food, Barbecue, Vegan, Vegetarian, Brunch, International Food, Wifi Access In Restaurant
description:
Situated on the beachfront of Koh Samui, Salt Society Beach Bar & Kitchen offers an unforgettable dining experience that combines sophistication with relaxation. With a concept that fuses the treasures of the sea, represented by ""Salt,"" and the spirit of socializing, represented by ""Society,"" this venue creates a vibrant atmosphere where guests can enjoy exquisite food, refreshing drinks, and curated music.
Whether you're looking for fresh seafood, Thai-inspired dishes, or international fusion cuisine, Salt Society’s menu caters to a variety of tastes, including vegan and vegetarian options. With live music, DJ performances, and both air-conditioned and outdoor dining areas, it’s the perfect spot for a day-to-night experience. Guests can unwind by the beach, indulge in expertly crafted cocktails, and savor delicious meals in a welcoming and dynamic setting."

name: Samui Jetski Safari
tags: Things To Do, On The Water, Adrenaline Seekers, Jet Ski, Pig Island
description:
Welcome to an unforgettable adventure on the sea! Our fully guided jet ski tours offer a secure and safe experience, exploring the hidden gems of Koh Samui. Ride through stunning landscapes, visit unique and isolated locations, and enjoy activities like swimming, snorkeling, and relaxing on secluded beaches. One of the highlights of our tour is a visit to the famous Pig Island!
With brand-new jet skis, top-quality riding gear, and professional guides, we ensure you have a thrilling and worry-free experience. Whether you’re an experienced rider or a first-timer, we’ve got you covered for a day full of excitement and natural beauty. Join us for an adventure you’ll never forget!"

name: Samui Quad Motor
tags: Things To Do, Adrenaline Seekers, On The Land, Quad Tours
description:
Samui Quad Motor is Thailand's first ATV tour company, established in 2002. Our mission has always been to provide customers with the best off-road adventure experience on Koh Samui. We operate on scenic mountain tracks and jungle trails, offering the ultimate safari experience. Over the years, we've navigated challenges like floods, fallen trees, and wildlife, always prioritizing safety and customer enjoyment. Our expert guides are dedicated to ensuring your tour is both thrilling and safe.
Passionate about both adventure and preserving Koh Samui’s natural beauty, we strive to protect the island’s environment for future generations. If you leave our tour smiling, we consider it a success! Join us for an unforgettable ATV adventure on Koh Samui!"

name: Risto Luca
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Airconditioned Area, Italian Food, Gluten Free Options, Vegetarian, Wifi Access In Restaurant
description:
Discover authentic Italian cuisine at our cozy restaurant in Koh Samui, just steps from the stunning Chaweng Beach. Whether you're enjoying a romantic dinner, a family gathering, or a casual meal with friends, our welcoming atmosphere caters to all occasions. Savor the finest Italian dishes, including homemade pasta, fresh seafood, tender meats, and pizzas, all crafted with high-quality ingredients.
We take pride in offering a dedicated gluten-free cooking service for both pasta and pizza, ensuring an enjoyable dining experience for those with dietary restrictions. Join us to experience the true flavors of Italy in the heart of Koh Samui, where every meal is a celebration of taste, tradition, and hospitality. Perfect for anyone looking to indulge in a memorable meal near the beach!"

name: Island Organics
tags: Things To Do, Cooking Classes

name: Tree Bridge Zipline Samui
tags: Things To Do, Adrenaline Seekers, Zip Line
description:
Soar high above the stunning rainforest of
Koh Samui
and experience the thrill of flying through the treetops at
Tree Bridge Zipline
. Offering an unparalleled
adventure experience
, our zipline takes you to the top of a mountain, where you’ll glide down over lush green forests with
panoramic ocean views
. This exciting journey is designed to leave you with lasting memories of joy, exhilaration, and awe.
Inspired by the natural beauty of the
mountains
,
rainforests
, and
ocean
that surround us,
Tree Bridge Zipline
was created to give visitors the opportunity to connect with nature while embarking on an unforgettable adventure. As you zip through the air, you’ll not only get a unique perspective of Koh Samui’s pristine landscapes, but also experience the pure thrill of the ride."

description:
Discover the white sands of Chaweng Noi Beach.
Here, luxurious seclusion meets the natural beauty of this tropical haven, offering a tranquil escape from the everyday. Whether you're looking for a peaceful retreat or an exciting adventure, Sheraton Samui Resort provides the perfect backdrop for your dream getaway.
Relax and Rejuvenate in Paradise
Our resort features exceptional amenities designed for your relaxation and enjoyment. Lounge by the freshwater pool complete with a jacuzzi, or take a dip in the seawater pool overlooking the ocean. Each moment spent here is an opportunity to unwind and soak in the breathtaking views of the Gulf of Thailand."

name: Samui Boat Charter
tags: Things To Do, On The Water, Private Boat
description:
Samui Boat Charter – Luxury Private Yacht & Speedboat Charters
Explore the stunning Gulf of Thailand in style with
Samui Boat Charter
. We offer luxury speedboats, yachts, and sailboats for private and VIP charters to the most beautiful destinations. Whether you're heading to
Koh Tao
for snorkeling and scuba diving,
Angthong National Marine Park
for kayaking and scenic views, or
Koh Phangan
to relax on secluded beaches, our charters provide the ultimate freedom.
With
Samui Boat Charter
, there’s no rush. Start your day whenever you like and enjoy the freedom to explore at your own pace, without a strict itinerary. Our professional crew ensures first-class service, prioritizing safety and personalized experiences, whether you’re fishing, diving with whale sharks, or simply enjoying paradise.
Book your private charter with us today for an unforgettable experience."

name: Mr. Ocean Samui
tags: Things To Do, On The Water, Private Boat, Pig Island, Private Tours
description:
Mr. Ocean Samui Luxury Long-Tail – Now Open for Service!
Embark on an unforgettable
Eco-Luxury
journey aboard the finest long-tail boat in Koh Samui. Enjoy ultimate comfort with all the amenities you need, including a bathroom on board, for a truly relaxing experience.
Perfect for exploring Koh Samui’s beautiful coastline in style and comfort.
For more details on routes and promotions, please contact us."

name: Silavadee Pool Spa Resort
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Pool Villas, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Room With Private Pool
description:
A Luxury Escape with Breathtaking Views
Perched on the cliffside of Laem Nan Beach, Silavadee Pool Spa Resort offers a luxurious retreat with panoramic views of Koh Samui’s crystal-clear waters and lush landscape. This exclusive resort features 80 elegantly designed rooms, including infinity-edge pool villas and pool villa suites, ideal for those seeking a romantic getaway or peaceful escape.
Enjoy a tranquil atmosphere, personalized service, and stunning views from every room. Whether you're lounging by the infinity pools, enjoying world-class cuisine, or indulging in a couples' spa treatment, Silavadee offers a truly unforgettable experience.
With its secluded location yet close proximity to Koh Samui’s vibrant attractions, Silavadee is the perfect blend of privacy, luxury, and natural beauty, making it the ultimate romantic destination for your getaway."

name: The Height Restaurant
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Beachfront, Thai Food, Airconditioned Area, Outdoor Dining, Vegetarian, International Food
description:
Nestled on a clifftop with breathtaking views of Silavadee’s private beach and lush coastline,
The Height
is an exceptional fine dining restaurant offering authentic Thai and Southern Thai cuisine. At
The Height
, every dish is a tribute to the rich flavors of Thailand, particularly the unique and lesser-known southern Thai cuisine. The menu includes a range of options, from à la carte selections to multi-course and tasting menus, all showcasing seasonal ingredients and traditional recipes. Guests can explore authentic Southern Thai dishes that highlight local flavors and ancient culinary techniques passed down through generations.
The Height’s commitment to
sustainable gastronomy
is at the heart of every meal. By sourcing the highest-quality, fresh ingredients from local farmers and fishermen, the restaurant ensures that every dish is not only delicious but also environmentally responsible. The restaurant proudly partners with Silavadee’s own farm, further enhancing its sustainable approach by growing produce on-site to reduce food miles and minimize waste."

name: Silavadee Private Beach Dining
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Beachfront, Seafood, Thai Food, Outdoor Dining, International Food
description:
Treat yourself to an unforgettable dining experience, where luxury meets romance in an exclusive, intimate setting. Whether on the secluded beach or our stunning Sun Deck, enjoy a personalized multi-course meal paired with a curated selection of fine wines, all while our dedicated culinary team attends to your every need.
Exclusive & Intimate:
Enjoy complete privacy and a personalized setting, ideal for romantic dinners, proposals, or special celebrations.
Gourmet Dining:
Savor exceptional cuisine crafted by our skilled chefs, with the finest wine pairings to complement every dish.
Unmatched Service:
Experience flawless service from our dedicated team, ensuring your evening is seamless and unforgettable."

name: Silavadee Thai Cooking Class
tags: Things To Do, Cooking Classes
description:
Discover the secrets of traditional Thai cuisine with our hands-on
Thai Cooking Class
at Silavadee Pool Spa Resort Samui. Learn how to prepare authentic Thai dishes under the guidance of our talented chefs, and bring the flavors of Thailand back home to impress friends and family with your newfound skills.
Get your hands into the action! In this interactive class, you’ll be preparing and cooking traditional Thai recipes yourself, learning essential techniques, and discovering the unique ingredients that make Thai cuisine so special.
Using the freshest ingredients sourced locally, you’ll get a true taste of Thailand’s vibrant culinary culture. Discover how Thai herbs, spices, and fresh produce are combined to create irresistible flavors."

name: Sun Lounge
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Beachfront, Thai Food, Outdoor Dining, Fusion Food
description:
The Sun Lounge boasts some of the best views at the resort, offering uninterrupted vistas of the ocean. Whether you're enjoying the sun’s warm embrace in the early hours or basking in the glow of sunset, this tranquil area is the perfect place to unwind and take in the breathtaking beauty of Samui.
At Sun Lounge, we believe in serving food that makes you feel as good as it tastes. Our menu is designed around
real, unrefined, whole foods
, and we focus on using
free-range meats
,
cold-pressed oils
, and
organic ingredients
to ensure the healthiest, most flavorful dishes. We take care to avoid
artificial flavors
,
trans fats
, and
processed ingredients
, so you can enjoy meals that are as wholesome as they are delicious.
Complement your meal with our selection of
raw juice blends
,
superfood smoothie bowls
, and
natural sodas
, all made with fresh, high-quality ingredients to refresh and energize you. For those who enjoy a glass of wine, we also offer a selection of
organic wines
, perfect for pairing with your meal or enjoying on their own while you soak in the panoramic views."

name: Moon Restaurant
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Beachfront, Meat Lovers, Seafood, Thai Food, Airconditioned Area, Outdoor Dining, International Food, Breakfast Buffet
description:
Positioned above one of the resort’s two infinity pools,
Moon
offers guests a stunning setting with floor-to-ceiling windows that provide uninterrupted views of the serene seascape. Whether you’re enjoying breakfast, lunch, or dinner, the restaurant's ambiance is designed to enhance your dining experience—capturing the beauty of the morning sunrise, the vibrant energy of the day, or the tranquil allure of evening.
Moon features a
glass-walled wine cellar
, showcasing an exclusive collection of some of the most sought-after
wines and champagnes
from around the globe. Whether you're pairing a fine wine with your meal or simply enjoying a glass on its own, the wine cellar offers a remarkable selection to complement your dining experience.
At
Moon
, every meal is a celebration of taste, quality, and ambiance, making it the perfect place to indulge in international fare, fresh seafood, or the best cuts of meat, all while soaking in the stunning beauty of Silavadee’s surroundings."

name: Star Rooftop
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Rooftop Venues, Bars & Entertainment, Beachfront, Dj Music, Live Music, Thai Food, Airconditioned Area, Outdoor Dining, Fusion Food, International Food, Cocktails
description:
Perched atop Silavadee Pool Spa Resort,
STAR
is one of the very few rooftop bars and restaurants on Samui Island, offering unparalleled panoramic views of
Lamai Bay
. With its breathtaking sunset vistas and unique design, STAR is not just a dining destination – it’s an unforgettable experience.
One of the standout features of STAR is its
four sunken tables
built into the infinity pool, allowing guests to dine with their feet just above the water. This innovative design creates an intimate and immersive dining experience unlike any other on the island. In addition, ample seating options are available, including
Lounge Beds
,
Bar Stools
, and traditional dining tables, ensuring comfort and style for all guests.
At STAR, each cocktail is crafted with precision and creativity, using only the finest ingredients. Whether you’re in the mood for a refreshing classic or an innovative new creation, our expert mixologists are sure to delight. For wine connoisseurs, the restaurant offers a carefully curated wine menu to pair perfectly with your meal or enjoy on its own as you watch the sunset."

name: Silavadee Spa
tags: Beauty & Wellness, Massage, Spa & Beauty, Steam Room, Body Scrub, Body Wrap, Facial, Foot Scrub
description:
Escape the stresses of everyday life and indulge in the ultimate relaxation at
Silavadee Spa
. Set amidst the natural beauty of our serene surroundings, our spa offers a luxurious experience designed to rejuvenate both body and mind. Immerse yourself in tranquility with a range of soothing treatments that will leave you feeling pampered and completely renewed.
At Silavadee Spa, you are in the hands of skilled therapists who are dedicated to providing a personalized, therapeutic experience. Whether you're seeking to relieve stress, ease muscle tension, or simply indulge in some well-deserved pampering, our treatments are designed to meet your individual needs and restore balance to your body and mind."

name: Silavadee Private Classes
tags: Sports & Fitness, Gym & Fitness, Yoga, Combat Sports, Personal Trainer, Muay Thai
description:
Silavadee: Creating Balance in Life Through Holistic Wellness
At
Silavadee
, we believe that true wellness goes beyond just outer beauty. Our approach to wellness is designed to inspire individuals to cultivate balance in their lives, focusing on both
inner peace
and
physical health
. We understand that achieving harmony is not just about looking good, but feeling good from the inside out. That's why our programs integrate ancient healing traditions with modern techniques to nourish the
body
,
mind
, and
soul
.
A Holistic Approach to Wellness
Our holistic wellness programs are carefully curated to offer more than just relaxation. They are designed to create a
complete sense of well-being
. At
Silavadee
, we focus on restoring balance and harmony in every aspect of your life. Through our specially crafted treatments, you will experience:
Ancient Healing Traditions:
Pampering treatments inspired by time-honored practices designed to rejuvenate the body and refresh the spirit. Our therapies harness the power of nature, using natural ingredients that nourish both the skin and the soul.
Guided Movement Sessions:
Experience the therapeutic effects of movement surrounded by the beauty of nature. Our sessions are designed to connect you with your body, improve flexibility, and restore energy. Whether through yoga, Tai Chi, or other mindful practices, we encourage you to move in a way that aligns with your personal wellness goals.
Healthy Eating:
We believe that wellness also comes from the food you nourish your body with. Our healthy eating philosophy emphasizes fresh, locally sourced ingredients to fuel the body with nutrients and vitality. Our nourishing meals are not just delicious but also designed to support your overall health and well-being.
Restoring Body, Mind, and Soul
At
Silavadee
, we understand that wellness is a personal journey. That’s why our approach goes beyond just physical treatments – it’s about creating a sense of tranquility, peace, and balance in all areas of life. Whether you’re seeking relaxation, physical health improvement, or emotional well-being, our programs offer the tools and support needed to restore balance to your life.
Mind:
Engage in mindfulness practices, meditation, and wellness rituals to calm the mind and relieve stress, allowing you to achieve mental clarity and inner peace.
Body:
Our wellness treatments are designed to nourish and rejuvenate the body, helping to increase energy, promote relaxation, and improve overall physical health.
Soul:
Connect with your inner self through relaxation techniques and self-care rituals that encourage emotional healing and spiritual growth.
Experience True Balance at Silavadee
Step into a world where wellness is not just about appearances but a holistic approach to health that nurtures your body, mind, and soul. Whether you are seeking to
recharge
,
detoxify
, or simply
relax
,
Silavadee
offers a sanctuary where you can create lasting balance and well-being in your life.
Join us and embark on a journey toward
wholeness
, leaving feeling rejuvenated, restored, and rebalanced. At
Silavadee
, we help you find your perfect harmony."

name: Silavadee Weddings
tags: Professional Services, Wedding Planners, Wedding Venues
description:
Koh Samui is the ultimate wedding destination, renowned for its pristine beaches, lush landscapes, and tranquil ambiance. Silavadee Pool Spa Resort offers an unparalleled setting for couples seeking to celebrate their love with an unforgettable ceremony. Whether you dream of an intimate beachfront wedding or a luxurious celebration amidst the stunning tropical scenery, we bring your vision to life in the most exquisite way.
Our experienced wedding coordinators are dedicated to turning your wedding dreams into reality. From the moment you book your wedding, we work with you to create a tailor-made experience, ensuring every detail is perfect. Whether it’s an intimate ceremony or a grand celebration, we cater to your specific needs and desires with creativity and passion.
Delight in a gourmet culinary experience with our award-winning chefs, who will create a bespoke menu tailored to your tastes. From exquisite Thai delicacies to international cuisine, every dish is prepared with the finest ingredients, ensuring a memorable dining experience for you and your guests."

description:
Discover the perfect escape at
Impiana Resort Chaweng Noi
, a stunning beachfront resort in Koh Samui, Thailand. Nestled along the pristine shores of Chaweng Noi Beach, this serene retreat offers crystal-clear waters, soft white sand, and breathtaking views, allowing you to relax and rejuvenate in the embrace of nature.
With 96 beautifully appointed rooms, including
Superior Rooms
,
Deluxe Rooms
,
Cottages
, and
Impiana Suites
, the resort caters to every type of traveler. Most rooms feature spectacular
sea views
, ensuring you wake up to the gentle sound of waves and the panoramic beauty of the ocean. Whether you're seeking a romantic getaway or a family vacation, Impiana Resort has the perfect accommodation for you."

Dining at
Sabai Beachfront Restaurant
in Chaweng Noi is a feast for the senses. Nestled along the picturesque coastline of Koh Samui, this exceptional dining destination invites you to indulge in the finest
local and international specialties
while enjoying stunning beach views. Whether you're looking for a relaxed beachfront buffet, a tantalizing BBQ, or a refreshing cocktail, Sabai offers a range of dining options that will satisfy both your hunger and your soul.
Sabai's menu features a creative blend of
authentic Thai cuisine
, known for its bold flavors, vibrant colors, and aromatic spices, alongside global dishes that offer something for every taste. From the
rich textures of Thai curries
to the
freshness of local seafood
, each dish is crafted with precision and passion, making every bite an experience in itself."

name: Wild Ginger Restaurant and Bar
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Beachfront, Thai Food, International Food, Breakfast
description:
Wild Ginger, our beachside restaurant and bar, offers an eclectic mix of Thai and contemporary Western culinary creations. Enjoy the open terraces for a relaxed outdoor dining experience.
We pride ourselves on serving only the most authentic local flavours of Thai food on our menu. From the most complex combination of spices in our currie, to the freshest ingredients grown in the area. You can be sure to have the most delectable meals at our restaurant.The freshest local ingredients and the finest imported ingredients combine to give you the most delectable international dishes for a romantic candlelit dinner by the sea.
Sip your favourite beverage and order light snacks while you relax by the pool. Our poolside service is available throughout the day"

name: Coral Cliff Beach Resort
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Pool Villas, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Room With Private Pool, Wifi Access In Room, Private Room, Air Conditioning, Private Bathroom, Parking, Rooms With Seaview, Rooms With Balcony, Family Rooms
description:
Nestled on the hillsides of Koh Samui, Coral Cliff Beach Resort offers a peaceful retreat just 20 minutes from Samui International Airport. Located away from the crowds of Chaweng and Lamai, it combines tranquility with easy access to the island's attractions.
Ideal Location with Stunning Views
Surrounded by lush tropical gardens, the resort boasts panoramic ocean views. The Southern Thai design complements modern amenities, allowing guests to enjoy breathtaking vistas of crystal-clear waters and pristine sands from their rooms or balconies.
Exclusive Beach Access & Coral Reefs
With direct access to a private beach, guests can easily explore vibrant coral reefs, perfect for snorkeling and diving, just offshore.
Why Choose Coral Cliff Beach Resort?
Secluded Location: Peaceful yet close to the airport.
Private Beach: Ideal for swimming and relaxation.
Majestic Views: Ocean views from every room.
Book your stay at Coral Cliff Beach Resort for the perfect blend of relaxation and adventure."

name: Coral Cliff Restaurant & Bar
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Thai Food, Outdoor Dining, Family Friendly, International Food, Wifi Access In Restaurant
description:
At Coral Cliff Restaurant and Bar, indulge in mouthwatering Thai and Western dishes, complemented by fresh seafood caught by local fishermen. Whether you’re in the mood for traditional Thai flavors or international favorites, our menu has something to delight every palate.
Our casual yet comfortable dining area, designed with local traditional decor, creates the perfect setting for a relaxing meal with loved ones. As you dine, enjoy the stunning panoramic views of the ocean below, adding to the overall experience.
Our friendly and dedicated staff are committed to making your dining experience unforgettable, ensuring that every meal is not only delicious but also memorable."

name: Banyan Tree resort

description:
A Tropical Sanctuary
Nestled on Lamai Beach, Banyan Tree Samui offers a luxurious escape with stunning beachfront views and world-class amenities. This all-pool villa resort is perfect for those seeking tranquility and excitement in Koh Samui.
Secluded Private Bay:
Surrounded by lush jungle and clear waters, enjoy a peaceful retreat, just a short distance from Koh Samui’s top attractions.
Luxury Pool Villas:
Each villa features a private infinity pool, spacious interiors, and breathtaking views, ensuring privacy and comfort.
Personalized Service:
Enjoy bespoke service from your own Villa Host, dedicated to arranging everything from tours to dining reservations.
Banyan Tree Samui
offers the perfect tropical paradise for relaxation and luxury."

name: Saffron Restaurant @ Banyan Tree
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Beachfront, Michelin Star, Thai Food, Outdoor Dining, Barbecue
description:
A culinary journey where traditional Thai cuisine meets modern innovation. Nestled in a stunning beachfront setting, this Michelin-recognized restaurant serves up a creative blend of bold flavors and fresh, locally sourced ingredients. With a sophisticated yet welcoming atmosphere, Saffron offers both indoor and outdoor dining options that showcase breathtaking views of Koh Samui’s lush landscape.
Saffron’s menu features a combination of classic Thai dishes with contemporary twists, ensuring a unique and unforgettable dining experience. Whether you're savoring signature dishes or enjoying a relaxed barbecue, every meal is crafted with precision and passion. As part of the prestigious MICHELIN Guide Thailand 2025, Saffron stands as a testament to excellence in culinary innovation and Thai gastronomy.
Whether you're visiting for a special occasion or a casual meal, Saffron promises an exceptional dining experience that celebrates the essence of Thailand."

name: Banyan Tree Spa
tags: Beauty & Wellness, Massage, Spa & Beauty
description:
At Banyan Tree Spa in Lamai, we offer an exceptional spa experience where tranquility and relaxation await. Our sanctuary is designed to awaken your senses and provide a serene escape from the stresses of everyday life. Using ancient healing techniques and time-tested wellness practices, our therapies cater to both the body and mind. Whether you're looking to rejuvenate, heal, or simply unwind, our wide range of treatments, including massage therapies, facials, and holistic practices, are customized to meet your individual needs.
Our spa isn’t just about treatments—it’s a journey toward wellness. We encourage guests to embrace not only physical rejuvenation but also emotional and mental well-being. With a focus on holistic healing, our wellness offerings extend beyond the spa, providing balanced dining and activities that enrich your overall experience. Located in the heart of Lamai, our peaceful setting is the perfect place to reconnect with yourself and nature."

name: Beach Republic
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Pool Villas, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Bar, Wifi Access In Room, Private Room, Air Conditioning, Private Bathroom, Laundry Service, Rooms With Balcony, Family Rooms, Sun Loungers Or Beach Chairs, Sun Umbrellas, Wellness
description:
Luxury Beachfront Villas and Penthouses in Koh Samui
Located on the stunning beaches of Koh Samui, Beach Republic offers a chic Mediterranean-inspired resort with a fun and sophisticated twist. Perfectly blending luxury, relaxation, and cosmopolitan vibes, it’s an ideal escape for discerning travelers.
The Residence features 42 private pool villas, luxurious penthouses, and spacious suites, each offering unparalleled privacy and comfort. With modern designs, every accommodation includes a private low-chlorine pool, perfect for a tranquil swim.
Each villa is fully equipped with a kitchen, dining area, microwave, flat-screen Smart TV, and wireless internet, ensuring a seamless stay. Whether you’re relaxing in your villa, enjoying the sun by the pool, or exploring the vibrant atmosphere of Koh Samui, this resort provides the ultimate tropical getaway."

tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Pool Villas, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Spa Retreat, Restaurant, Bar, Room With Private Pool, Wifi Access In Room, Private Room, Air Conditioning, Private Bathroom, Parking, Rooms With Seaview, Laundry Service, Rooms With Balcony, Family Rooms, Sun Loungers Or Beach Chairs, Sun Umbrellas, Room Service, 5* Accommodation
description:
Discover the ultimate tropical escape at Sala Chaweng Beach Resort on Koh Samui. Our stunning private pool villas and elegant luxury rooms provide the perfect retreat, offering unparalleled comfort and privacy. With breathtaking ocean views, exceptional service, and a serene atmosphere, our resort is designed to offer a memorable getaway.
Indulge in world-class dining with a variety of gourmet options, or simply unwind on the pristine Chaweng Beach, just steps from your room. Whether you're looking to relax, explore, or enjoy the vibrant island life, Sala Chaweng is the ideal destination for your next vacation."

name: The Tent @ Sala Chaweng
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Beachfront, Seafood, Thai Food, Fusion Food, Family Friendly, Brunch, International Food, Mediterranean Food, Breakfast Buffet
description:
Indulge in a memorable dining experience at The Tent Restaurant and Bar located within SALA Samui Chaweng Beach Resort. Situated in a breathtaking beachfront setting, this open-air restaurant offers a curated selection of the finest fresh seafood, delicious western dishes, and authentic Thai cuisine. Whether you're in the mood for a flavorful seafood feast or traditional Thai delicacies, you'll find something to satisfy every craving.
With a range of dining options, from the intimate indoor dining room to the covered outdoor decks with panoramic views of the beach. For the ultimate in romance and privacy, consider booking a private dining gazebo or a private beachfront dinner, where you can enjoy your meal under the stars while being served by attentive staff."

name: Sexy Fish
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Seafood, Thai Food, Airconditioned Area, Fusion Food, International Food
description:
Step into our world at
Sexy Fish
, where the atmosphere pulses with good vibes, sultry tunes, and an enticing selection of coastal cuisine and crafted cocktails.
Our menu is a symphony of flavours inspired by the abundant treasures of the coast, thoughtfully curated to delight even the most discerning palate. From the freshest catches of the day to our signature creations, each dish embodies the fusion of locally sourced seafood and global culinary influences.
Whether you’re here to mingle, unwind, or simply indulge in life’s pleasures, Sexy Fish invites you to immerse yourself in an experience tailored for those who relish the finer things in life."

name: Sala Chaweng Private Beach BBQ
tags: Food & Beverage, Private Dining, Beachfront, Seafood
description: Enjoy a private BBQ whilst relaxing in a sala on the sand and let our team create a wonderful experience for you.

name: Sala Chaweng Dinner under the stars
tags: Food & Beverage, Private Dining, Beachfront, Seafood, Thai Food, International Food
description:
Couples seeking an unforgettable evening can enjoy a romantic dinner in a private tent on the soft sands of Chaweng Beach. Available every night from 6pm, this romantic set-up allows guests to dine in perfect privacy, illuminated by candles and serenaded by the gentle whisper of the ocean waves. This is a wonderful way to celebrate an anniversary, birthday or simply to share a magical and memorable moment with your loved one. The perfect setting for romantic getaways.
Price: THB 3,000++ per couple, not including food. A choice of à la carte cuisine is available, including Asian, Western and fresh seafood (prices vary)."

name: Sala Chaweng Spas
tags: Beauty & Wellness, Massage, Spa & Beauty, Body Scrub, Bath Therapy, Body Wrap, Facial, Wax, Foot Scrub, Thai Massage, Foot Massage, Coconut Oil Massage, Neck And Shoulder Massage, Speciality Massages
description:
“SALA Chaweng spa is truly heavenly – a haven of tranquillity that will transport your senses into another world of serenity. The six treatment and massage rooms are named after the planets of the solar system and all come equipped with a soothing bathtub, shower and twin spa beds. Guests can enjoy a wide selection of treatments, including blissful body scrubs, wraps and massages, and separate steam rooms are also available. Our professional massage therapists use only natural products from two leading Thai brands, I Plus Q and Dermalogica, to leave your skin feeling smooth, your body refreshed and you mind revitalized.
The SALA Chaweng spa is located near the lobby, The serene Thai massage spa consists of six private air-conditioned treatment rooms, steam rooms, showers and changing rooms with lockers."

name: Sala Chaweng Wedding Events
tags: Professional Services, Wedding Planners, Wedding Venues
description:
SALA Samui Chaweng Beach Resort is the ideal location for a
dream island wedding
, a romantic honeymoon, or any special event. Our
dedicated team of experts
will work with you from the very beginning, carefully listening to your ideas and tailoring every detail to match your vision. Whether you're envisioning an intimate beach ceremony, a lavish reception under the stars, or a private celebration in a lush garden setting, we make it happen seamlessly.
Choose from our expansive
beachfront lawn
, where the soft sand meets the ocean, or our beautiful
tropical garden setting
, surrounded by vibrant greenery and the sounds of nature. Our venues are versatile and perfect for any occasion, from an intimate wedding ceremony to a grand celebration with your closest family and friends."

name: SALA Samui Choengmon Beach Resort
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Pool Villas, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Spa Retreat, Restaurant, Bar, Room With Private Pool, Wifi Access In Room, Private Room, Air Conditioning, Private Bathroom, Parking, Rooms With Seaview, Laundry Service, Rooms With Balcony, Family Rooms, Sun Loungers Or Beach Chairs, Sun Umbrellas, Room Service, 5* Accommodation
description:
Escape to the luxury of Sala Choengmon Beach Resort, an exquisite tropical retreat offering private pool villas and stylish rooms with stunning ocean views. Nestled on the tranquil shores of Choeng Mon Beach, our resort provides the perfect setting for a romantic getaway or a relaxing vacation in Koh Samui.
Enjoy gourmet dining at our beachfront restaurant, unwind by the crystal-clear waters, and experience exceptional service in a peaceful, idyllic environment. Whether you're looking to indulge in a romantic escape, relax on the beach, or rejuvenate in your private villa, Sala Choengmon ensures an unforgettable luxury experience.
Book your stay today and immerse yourself in the beauty and serenity of one of Koh Samui’s finest resorts. Discover the ultimate destination for relaxation, romance, and indulgence in the heart of the island."

name: Sala Choengmon Dinner under the stars
tags: Food & Beverage, Private Dining, Beachfront, Seafood
description:
Couples seeking an unforgettable evening can enjoy a romantic dinner in a private tent on the soft sands of Choengmon Beach.
Available every night from 6.00 pm, this romantic set-up allows guests to dine in perfect privacy, illuminated by candles and serenaded by the gentle whisper of the ocean waves.
This is a wonderful way to celebrate an anniversary, birthday or simply to share a magical and memorable moment with your loved one. The perfect setting for romantic getaways.

name: Sala Choengmon Cooking Class
tags: Things To Do, Cooking Classes
description:
Learn how to cook authentic Thai cuisine and western dishes at SALA’s Samui Choengmon luxury beach resort.
We provide you with your very own personal chef and a choice of dishes, an activity that is perfect for a relaxing romantic getaway.
After the completion of the class, we will provide you with a CD of all the recipes, a certificate, and a SALA-branded apron.
Our private cooking class is available seven days a week start from 1 pm, each takes approximately two hours,
THB 1,300++ per person or THB 2,400++ for 2 persons."

name: Sala Choengmon Restaurant
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Beachfront, Thai Food, Outdoor Dining, Fusion Food, Vegetarian, International Food, Mediterranean Food, Breakfast Buffet

With an idyllic setting, just meters from the lapping shores of Choengmon Beach, SALA Samui Beach Resort’s signature restaurant delights diners with an exciting all-day dining selection.
The extensive breakfast buffet is renowned as one of the best on the island, whilst the lunch and dinner à la carte selections offer the perfect combination of international and Thai favourites."

Dermalogica

The facilities at SALA’s Samui luxury hotel on Choengmon beach include four private indoor treatment rooms with steam rooms and four floating massage salas at the tropical lotus pond.
Facilities also include a steam room."

name: Royal Muang Samui Villas
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Pool Villas, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Bar, Room With Private Pool, Wifi Access In Room, Private Room, Air Conditioning, Private Bathroom, Parking, Rooms With Seaview, Rooms With Balcony, Family Rooms, Sun Loungers Or Beach Chairs, Sun Umbrellas, Wellness, 5* Accommodation
description:
An exceptional resort located on the serene and picturesque Choeng Mon Beach, in the northeast of Koh Samui. Its central and convenient location, just 4 km from Samui International Airport and 25 km from Nathon City and the ferry pier to Surat Thani, makes it the perfect destination for a relaxing getaway.
Nestled beside the soft, white sands of Choeng Mon Beach, this luxurious resort offers beautifully designed villas with crafted wooden furniture and top-tier amenities. Each suite features a spacious outdoor terrace and a private whirlpool Jacuzzi, ensuring an indulgent stay.
Surrounded by lush greenery, pristine beaches, and crystal-clear waters, Royal Muang Samui Villas provides a tranquil escape from the bustle of everyday life. Ideal for couples and those seeking peace and romance, this resort is the perfect haven to relax, unwind, and rejuvenate in an unspoiled natural paradise."

name: Spice Zone Beach Restaurant
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Private Dining, Beach Bars, Beachfront, Seafood, Thai Food, Outdoor Dining, Italian Food, International Food, Breakfast, Sunbeds
description:
Indulge in a truly unforgettable beachfront dining experience at Spice Zone Beach Restaurant. Savor the finest Royal Thai cuisine, traditional Italian dishes, and fresh, expertly prepared seafood, all made with the freshest ingredients. Our diverse international menu offers something for every taste, set against the backdrop of an idyllic, breathtaking beachfront atmosphere.
For a truly unique and romantic experience, we highly recommend creating your own private beach dining experience. Whether it’s a special celebration or a quiet evening with your loved one, our exclusive beachfront setting offers the perfect environment to enjoy an exquisite meal under the stars, enhancing your romantic getaway. Let us help you craft the ultimate dining experience that will leave you with lasting memories."

name: Tara Bistro
tags: Food & Beverage
description:
Tara Bistro is open daily for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Krua Tara offers Thai, European and local dishes.
Tara Bistro is created by Khun Kosol and Khun Sulipon, originally from Surat Thani. Both have their own prawn farms. Therefore, bringing prawn from their farm to be the main ingredient of the bistro. So, you can guarantee that the prawns served at the bistro are big, fresh, and sweet.
The bistro is located in the Cascade Tara Resort, slightly off the road around the island. Our place has convenient parking and very nice atmosphere.
The bistro is in the middle of the orchard and surrounded by streams and mountains. It's like slipping into another world. Good service, friendly atmosphere and affordable prices.
Our kitchen has many recommended menus such as ‘’Tara Bistro Cold Prawns ‘’served with a spicy sauce, we use large tiger prawns from our own farm and there are also many other famous dishes from the restaurant such as ’’ Goong Saep Tara’’ [Stir-fried prawns with our secret homemade spicy sauce], everyone must to order. including beef or pork in Massaman curry, traditional recipes from grandfathers and grandmothers to future generations to taste There are also many dishes that are famous form our restaurant such as ‘’Tara Spicy Seafood Salad’’ With young coconut meat and avocado, ‘’Prawns Satay ‘’[Grilled prawns skewers with Fresh Thai herb marinated serve with peanut sauce, roasted shrimp with chilli and salt, and ‘’Hae Guen’’[ Deep fried prawn rolls dim-sum] and special  local food of Samui."

name: Samui Sailor Grill & Restaurant
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Seafood, Thai Food, Fusion Food, Italian Food, International Food
description:
Located at the heart of Choeng Mon on the main road, Samui Sailor Grill & Restaurant offers a romantic, serene, and chic atmosphere, making it the ideal dining spot for both holidaymakers and residents of Koh Samui. Whether you’re looking for a quiet evening out or a special place to celebrate, this grill & restaurant provides an unforgettable experience.
At Samui Sailor Grill & Restaurant, you’ll enjoy a selection of Western-European fusion cuisines, all expertly crafted to delight your taste buds. Specially recommended are the Royal Thai delicacies prepared by former Royal Chef Ajarn Amintra Dinakara Na Ayuthaya, offering an authentic and refined taste of Thailand’s royal culinary heritage.
Whether you're indulging in international flavors or savoring traditional Thai dishes, Samui Sailor Grill & Restaurant is a must-visit for food lovers seeking quality dining in Koh Samui."

name: Noori India Indian Restaurant
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Indian Food
description:
Authentic Indian Dining in Koh Samui
Experience the rich, diverse flavors of India at Noori India, where traditional recipes come to life with fresh, high-quality ingredients. Our menu offers both vegetarian and non-vegetarian dishes, from spicy curries to savory biryanis and tandoori treats, prepared with authentic Indian spices ground daily for maximum flavor.
Savor the vibrant dishes of India, from the south’s spicy curries to the north’s fragrant biryanis, each made with passion and respect for tradition. Complement your meal with freshly made naan, samosas, and kebabs, ensuring a satisfying experience.
Relax in a warm, inviting atmosphere with exceptional service. Whether dining with family, friends, or colleagues, Noori India offers the perfect setting for a memorable dining experience.
Why Choose Noori India?
Authentic Indian cuisine with freshly ground spices.
Wide selection of vegetarian and non-vegetarian dishes.
A culinary journey across India’s diverse regional flavors.
Book your table today and embark on a flavorful journey!"

name: Four Seasons Resort
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Pool Villas, Beachfront, Breakfast, Butler / Private Chef, Pet Friendly, Swimming Pool, Detox & Weight Loss Retreat, Spa Retreat, Muay Thai / Fitness, Restaurant, Bar, Room With Private Pool, Wifi Access In Room, Gym, Tennis Court, Private Room, Air Conditioning, Private Bathroom, Parking, Rooms With Seaview, Laundry Service, Airport Shuttle, Rooms With Balcony, Family Rooms, Sun Loungers Or Beach Chairs, Sun Umbrellas, Wellness, 24 Hours Front Desk, Concierge Services, Room Service
description:
Escape to the tranquil paradise of Four Seasons Resort Koh Samui, where you can immerse yourself in the natural beauty of Thailand’s islands. Our luxury resort offers you the perfect tropical retreat, complete with pristine sandy beaches, lush greenery, and calm blue seas. Spend your days lounging by our infinity pool with a refreshing drink, exploring the serene beaches, or relaxing on your private deck with stunning views of the Gulf of Siam. Every moment at Four Seasons Koh Samui is crafted to provide you with unparalleled comfort and luxury.
At Four Seasons, true luxury is about more than just indulgence—it’s about creating a meaningful sense of belonging. Our commitment to providing exceptional care is rooted in how we treat our guests, with a focus on personal service and genuine warmth. Luxury here is defined by humanity and generosity, offering you not just a stay, but an experience that makes you feel like you’re the center of our world."

name: Four Seasons Spa & Wellness
tags: Beauty & Wellness, Massage, Spa & Beauty, Sauna, Sound Healing, Reiki, Body Scrub, Bath Therapy, Body Wrap, Facial, Slimming Massage, Foot Scrub, Thai Massage, Foot Massage, Coconut Oil Massage, Aloe Vera Massage, Head Massage, Hot Stone Massage, Speciality Massages
description:
Nestled in the heart of Thailand’s tropical paradise,
Four Seasons Spa & Wellness Koh Samui
offers a sanctuary where luxury, relaxation, and rejuvenation come together. Inspired by the lush natural surroundings and rooted in Thailand’s rich wellness traditions, our spa invites you to experience a transformative journey designed to restore balance to both body and mind.
Our expert therapists are dedicated to crafting
tailored treatments
and
relaxing therapies
that are customized to meet your individual needs. Whether you’re seeking a moment of deep relaxation, a boost in energy, or a holistic wellness experience, our treatments draw from time-honored Thai healing practices and modern wellness techniques."

name: Four Seasons Weddings
tags: Professional Services, Wedding Planners, Wedding Venues
description:
Celebrate your love at
Four Seasons Resort Koh Samui
, the ultimate destination for a luxury beach wedding in Thailand. Set amidst the island’s serene tropical beauty, our resort offers you the chance to exchange vows on a pristine beach, where privacy and romance come together in perfect harmony. Whether you're dreaming of an intimate ceremony, a grand celebration, or a romantic honeymoon getaway, we are here to make your vision come to life.
At Four Seasons Resort Koh Samui, we believe every detail matters. From the setting to the flowers, the cuisine to the décor, and everything in between, our expert wedding planners will work closely with you to ensure every aspect of your celebration is exactly as you’ve imagined.
From the moment you arrive until the final toast, we are committed to making your wedding day one you’ll never forget. Let Four Seasons Resort Koh Samui be the backdrop for your most cherished memories—whether you’re planning a
luxury beach wedding
, an intimate
honeymoon getaway
, or a grand celebration with loved ones."

name: Koh Thai Kitchen
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Seafood, Thai Food, Airconditioned Area, Outdoor Dining, Fusion Food, French Food, Family Friendly, Breakfast, Wifi Access In Restaurant
description:
Hilltop Dining with a View
Perched on a palm-fringed hilltop with panoramic sea views, this vibrant restaurant offers a serene yet stylish setting where Southern Thai cuisine takes the spotlight. The breezy, open-air atmosphere is the perfect backdrop for a culinary journey rooted in tradition and elevated with a modern touch.
Southern Thai Flavors with a Twist
The menu features bold, authentic flavors—from slow-cooked curries to fresh local seafood—crafted with premium ingredients. Each dish is thoughtfully prepared, offering a balance of spice, texture, and depth that reflects the soul of Southern Thai cooking.
Led by Chef Sumalee Khunpet
At the helm is Chef Sumalee Khunpet, known for her mastery of Thai and French-fusion cuisine. With decades of experience, she brings passion and precision to every plate. Her signature Southern Dry-Chicken Curry is a standout favorite, blending heritage and creativity in every bite.
Memorable Meals, Any Time of Day
Whether enjoying a fresh morning breakfast or a flavorful dinner under the stars, each meal is enhanced by the stunning surroundings and heartfelt cuisine."

name: Pla Pla
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Airconditioned Area, Fusion Food, Family Friendly, International Food, Wifi Access In Restaurant
description:
At
Pla Pla Restaurant
, we offer a unique dining experience that blends laid-back charm with sophisticated elegance.  Being served up the freshest seafood and the finest cuts of meat, makes it the perfect spot to indulge in delicious meals while enjoying breathtaking views of the Gulf of Siam.
Whether you’re savoring a grilled lobster, succulent prawns, or a perfectly cooked steak, Pla Pla is renowned for its selection of fresh, locally sourced ingredients. Our expert chefs craft every dish with care, ensuring each bite is a flavorful reflection of the island's vibrant culinary traditions.
By day, Pla Pla offers a relaxed, open-air atmosphere, ideal for a leisurely lunch with ocean breezes and stunning views. As the sun sets, the ambiance transforms into a stylish and sophisticated setting perfect for evening dining."

name: Salefino
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Beachfront, Meat Lovers, Seafood, Italian Food, Vegetarian, Mediterranean Food
description:
Indulge in the authentic flavors of the Mediterranean at
Salefino
, an exquisite Italian restaurant located in the heart of Bangrak, Koh Samui. With a menu that showcases the finest Italian cuisine, from freshly made pasta and rich risottos to a variety of seafood dishes and vegetarian delights, Salefino offers something for every palate. Our seafood is always fresh, caught daily, and prepared to perfection, while our Italian classics are crafted with the finest ingredients imported directly from Italy.
Our welcoming ambiance, attentive service, and stunning views of the surrounding area make Salefino the perfect dining destination. We pride ourselves on providing an exceptional culinary experience in a relaxed and inviting atmosphere.
Come experience the true taste of Italy with a Mediterranean twist at Salefino in Bangrak – where every meal is a celebration of good food, great company, and unforgettable moments."

name: SIAM Restaurant
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Thai Food, Belgian Food, International Food, Wifi Access In Restaurant
description:
Siam Bar Choeng Mon
is the perfect spot to enjoy the finest Belgian beers and authentic Belgian cuisine in Koh Samui. Nestled in the laid-back and picturesque Choeng Mon Beach area, our bar offers a wide selection of premium Belgian brews, including classic Belgian ales, rich Trappist beers, and unique seasonal specialties. Whether you’re a craft beer connoisseur or simply looking for a refreshing drink, Siam Bar has something to satisfy every beer lover’s palate.
Pair your favorite beer with a range of delicious Belgian-inspired dishes. From crispy fries (with traditional Belgian mayonnaise) to hearty stews, savory snacks, and fresh seafood options, our menu is designed to transport you straight to Belgium. Enjoy a relaxed meal or snack as you sip on your beer and soak up the island’s tropical atmosphere.
Whether you're visiting with friends, enjoying a romantic evening, or unwinding after a day of sightseeing, Siam Bar Choeng Mon offers a warm and welcoming setting for any occasion. Our friendly staff and cozy ambiance ensure that every visit is a memorable one, with great food, drinks, and service."

name: SIAM BAR
tags: Bars & Nightlife, Bars & Pubs, Pool Table, Beer Gardens, Cocktail Bars
description:
Siam Bar Choeng Mon
is the ultimate destination for beer lovers, cocktail enthusiasts, and those seeking a laid-back, tropical vibe in Koh Samui. Located in the scenic
Choeng Mon Beach
area, our bar offers an impressive selection of
Belgian beers
, including rich Trappist brews, crisp ales, and unique seasonal varieties. Whether you're a connoisseur or a casual beer drinker, you'll find the perfect brew to enjoy as you unwind by the pool.
In addition to our renowned beer collection, Siam Bar features a creative cocktail menu with classic favorites and island-inspired drinks. Sip on expertly crafted cocktails while relaxing by the pool, enjoying the sea breeze, and taking in beautiful surroundings. Our pool bar is the ideal spot to cool off, whether you're swimming, lounging, or socializing with friends.
We also offer a variety of delicious snacks and light bites, from crispy Belgian fries to fresh seafood. Whether you're here for a casual drink or a fun night out,
Siam Bar Choeng Mon
provides the perfect atmosphere for any occasion."

name: Duomo Italian Restaurant
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Wood Oven, Airconditioned Area, Italian Food, Vegetarian, Wifi Access In Restaurant
description:
Italian Charm Meets Thai Freshness
Set in a tropical paradise, this authentic Italian restaurant offers a culinary journey where timeless Italian recipes are elevated with fresh, local Thai ingredients. The relaxed, breezy setting creates the perfect atmosphere for enjoying bold flavors in a vibrant and inviting space.
Italian Flavors, Thai Influence
The menu fuses traditional Italian cuisine with the tropical tastes of Thailand. From creamy pastas and crispy wood-fired pizzas to seafood dishes infused with local herbs, each plate is crafted with care using ingredients sourced from nearby markets and the Gulf of Thailand.
Something for Every Palate
Duomo caters to a wide range of tastes, whether you’re after comforting Italian classics or dishes with a modern twist. The pizzas are a must-try, featuring thin, crisp crusts and rich, flavorful toppings. Seafood lovers will appreciate the fresh, beautifully prepared catch of the day.
A Relaxed Tropical Escape
Beyond the menu, the open, tropical setting enhances the dining experience with sea breezes and lush surroundings. Ideal for families, couples, or groups of friends, this is a place to unwind and savor unforgettable meals in paradise."

name: Rob's Dogs
tags: Charity, Sanctuaries & Animal Shelters, Dog / Cat Sanctuary
description:
Our vision is a world where no animal suffers from mistreatment, abuse, or neglect. Our mission is to reduce the number of stray dogs and cats in Southeast Asia through targeted sterilization programs and community education.
We focus on preventing unwanted births and reducing overpopulation through our CNVR (Catch, Neuter, Vaccinate, Return) programs. By doing so, we address the root cause of stray animal populations while also keeping rabies and other infectious diseases at bay through vital vaccination efforts.
Every donation helps us make a lasting difference in the lives of countless animals. Join us in creating positive change and fostering a more compassionate world for all living beings. Together, we can make a difference."

name: The Library
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Pool Villas, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Room With Private Pool
description:
A WELL-VERSED RETREAT
Nestled on the shores of Koh Samui’s Chaweng Beach, The Library offers a serene escape blending luxury, tranquility, and natural beauty. This minimalist beachfront resort features 46 elegantly designed studios, suites, and pool villas, each offering privacy and stunning views of the beach and tropical landscape.
Inspired by literature, The Library encourages quiet contemplation. Relax by the beachfront pool, take a stroll through lush gardens, or find a peaceful spot to read. The resort also offers luxurious amenities including a fitness center, spa, and exquisite dining experiences, ensuring a truly rejuvenating stay.
Whether you’re a book lover or seeking a peaceful getaway, The Library provides the perfect sanctuary for relaxation, introspection, and indulgence, making it an unforgettable destination for those looking to reconnect with nature and themselves."

name: Ezra Beach Club
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Beach Clubs, Beach Bars, Beachfront, Thai Food, International Food, Cocktails
description:
Ezra Beach Club – A Sophisticated Escape in Bangrak
Located on the stunning shores of Bangrak Beach, Ezra Beach Club offers a chic, upscale experience with breathtaking views and world-class service. This stylish retreat is the perfect blend of modern design, comfort, and elegance. Whether you're relaxing by the pool, enjoying delicious meals at the on-site restaurant, or exploring the vibrant atmosphere of nearby Fisherman's Village, Ezra Beach Club provides the ultimate beach getaway.
Each room at Ezra Beach Club is fully equipped with modern amenities such as flat-screen TVs, free Wi-Fi, and comfortable seating areas, ideal for unwinding after a day of exploration. Guests can enjoy views of the sea, pool, or lush garden, making every moment here one of pure relaxation.
With its prime location near key attractions like the Big Buddha and Fisherman’s Village, Ezra Beach Club offers a luxurious and convenient escape in the heart of Koh Samui."

dinner styles, with a selection of beverages to complement the experience. We pride ourselves on flexibility, ensuring that every detail is customized to reflect the preferences of the couple, whether you're hosting an intimate gathering or a grand celebration."

name: Melati Resort
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Pool Villas, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Bar, Room With Private Pool, Wifi Access In Room, Private Room, Private Bathroom, Rooms With Seaview, Rooms With Balcony, Family Rooms, Sun Loungers Or Beach Chairs, Sun Umbrellas, Room Service, 5* Accommodation
description:
A Luxurious Beachfront Escape
Melati Beach Resort & Spa is one of the top 5-star resorts in Koh Samui, offering a luxurious beachfront experience. With 77 contemporary guest rooms, suites, and private pool villas, it promises an exquisite stay. Guests enjoy exclusive access to the stunning Thongson Bay, with breathtaking beachfront views, all while being surrounded by tranquil gardens.
The Perfect Getaway
Located just 15 minutes from the vibrant nightlife of Chaweng Beach and a short drive from Samui Airport, Melati is the ideal destination for an unforgettable beach resort getaway. Whether you are here for a romantic retreat, family vacation, or special event, this luxury resort has everything to make your experience extraordinary.
Diverse Accommodations for Every Traveler
Melati Beach Resort & Spa offers a wide range of accommodations to meet the needs of all guests. Choose from Grand Deluxe rooms, Private Garden Pools, Pool Villas, Family Pool Villas, and even the Presidential Suite, ensuring the perfect setting for any occasion."

name: The View Restaurant
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Beachfront, Seafood, Thai Food, Outdoor Dining, Vegetarian, International Food, Mediterranean Food, Breakfast Buffet
description:
A Relaxing Dining Experience
The View Restaurant at Melati Beach Resort & Spa offers an all-day dining experience that combines a relaxed atmosphere with exceptional food. Whether you're starting your day with a hearty breakfast or enjoying a casual lunch, this Koh Samui restaurant provides a delightful setting for every meal.
Exquisite Breakfast and Beyond
Begin your day with a selection of Eastern and Western specialties, complemented by our fresh juice bar. Melati Mornings at The View Restaurant are designed to be an exquisite start to your day, making each breakfast experience something special and memorable.
International Cuisine with a Mediterranean Flair
Not just a beachfront restaurant, The View Restaurant invites you to explore international cuisine with a Mediterranean twist. Perfect for a casual lunch or a romantic beach dinner, it’s your gateway to discovering the unique flavors of Koh Samui while dining in style."

name: Melati Spa
tags: Beauty & Wellness, Massage, Spa & Beauty, Body Scrub, Body Wrap, Facial, Slimming Massage
description:
A Luxurious Spa Experience in Koh Samui
Melati Spa is the best place for spa and wellness in Koh Samui, offering a luxurious and rejuvenating experience. Located beside a calming waterfall and pond, the spa combines the timeless traditions of Thailand with modern design elements, creating an atmosphere of pure serenity. The moment you step inside, you're greeted with an ambiance that transports you to a world of relaxation.
Signature Treatments and Relaxation
Melati Spa offers a wide range of treatments, including luxurious wraps, facials, and massages, with a focus on ""The Essence of the Orient."" Indulge in our signature Melati massages and luxury spa treatments designed to calm your mind and body. From the moment you arrive, you'll experience complete relaxation that lasts until you leave.
Award-Winning Indigenous Coconut Experience
One of the spa's newest and most popular treatments, the Indigenous Coconut Experience, is a signature treatment combining natural ingredients, traditional herbs, and modern massage techniques. This award-winning treatment is designed to enhance relaxation and rejuvenation, providing an exceptional wellness experience.
Comprehensive Wellness Facilities
Melati Spa features a full range of luxury spa services, including a manicure and pedicure salon with OPI products, a Yoga Sala, Beauty Sala, Waxing Studio, Thai Massage Room, and Private Treatment Room with a shower. We also offer a Boutique and a Children’s Spa Room, ensuring that everyone can enjoy a relaxing experience. Whether with a loved one or alone, Melati Spa guarantees comfort, privacy, and the best spa treatments in Koh Samui."

name: Dara Serene
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Adult Only, Beachfront, Thai Food, International Food, Cocktails
description:
Embark on an unforgettable evening of alfresco dining on the beach at Dara Serene. With its unique theme exuding a romantic and relaxed atmosphere, immerse yourself in tantalizing flavors sourced from both land and sea, meticulously prepared with passion for an exquisite dining experience.
Whether you're enjoying the fresh catch of the day or savoring expertly crafted dishes from the land, every bite promises to be a delightful journey of taste. The serene beach setting, paired with the soothing sound of the waves, creates a perfect backdrop for a memorable dining experience.
Please note that dining availability may be subject to sea water levels."

name: Dara Samui Weddings
tags: Professional Services, Wedding Planners
description:
Dreaming of a wedding on a tropical (but not deserted) island? Here at Dara Samui Beach Resort, the team will fine-tune this dream to make it a reality. Choose a Traditional Thai Wedding Ceremony or a Western Beach Wedding Ceremony … OR BOTH … the Dara Samui team will orchestrate these magical moments for you.
Whether you envision an intimate beachside ceremony at sunset or a grand celebration surrounded by lush tropical gardens, Dara Samui offers a perfect setting. The resort provides a variety of customizable wedding packages, allowing you to select from beautiful locations, such as the pristine beachfront or a private garden area, both offering stunning views.
The resort's experienced wedding planners will take care of every detail—from floral arrangements to traditional blessings, photography, and music—ensuring your wedding is flawlessly executed.
Make your wedding day an unforgettable experience with Dara Samui, where luxury meets romance in a breathtaking tropical setting."

name: Sareeraya Villas
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Pool Villas, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Room With Private Pool, Wifi Access In Room
description:
Beyond Desires
– A legendary destination in the heart of Koh Samui, offering an unparalleled blend of Thai hospitality and ""Oriental Chic"" tropical luxury. Step into a world where every moment is a celebration of life’s finest qualities, nestled in one of the island's most sought-after locations. This exclusive resort redefines excellence, offering a sanctuary of serenity and sophistication rarely found in such a remarkable setting.
Indulge in architecture designed to inspire contemplation, with elegant furnishings that elevate your experience. The resort invites you into a world of intoxicatingly pleasurable ambiance, where every detail is crafted to provide a sense of peace and luxury. Escape to your private seaside villa with a luxurious private pool, or relax in the expansive suites featuring spacious terraces and stunning views.
Sareeraya Villas
is more than just a resort—it’s an experience that transcends the ordinary, allowing you to fully embrace the essence of Koh Samui’s tropical allure."

name: Sareeraya Chefs Table
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Private Dining, Beachfront, Thai Food, International Food, Breakfast Buffet
description:
Indulge in an unforgettable culinary journey at Sareeraya Chef's Table, where world-class food, exquisite wines, and exotic drinks meet the breathtaking beauty of Koh Samui’s beachfront. Set in a tropical paradise, this exclusive dining destination offers a perfect blend of international cuisine and local signature dishes, crafted to delight every palate.
Exquisite International & Local Cuisine
: Enjoy a carefully curated menu that features the freshest seafood, along with a variety of international flavors and local Thai specialties.
Luxurious Tropical Ambience
: Dine by the beach in a stylish, intimate setting that complements the serene surroundings of the island.
Fine Wines & Exotic Drinks
: Complement your meal with a selection of wines and tropical drinks, chosen to enhance every dish.
Whether you’re celebrating a special occasion or simply seeking a refined dining experience, Sareeraya Chef's Table promises an unforgettable evening of culinary excellence, paired with stunning ocean views."

name: Raya Spa by Sereeya
tags: Beauty & Wellness, Massage, Spa & Beauty, Steam Room, Body Scrub, Bath Therapy, Body Wrap, Facial, Foot Scrub
description:
Raya Spa offers a unique fusion of ancient Asian traditions and modern luxury, creating a serene sanctuary for relaxation and wellness. With its stunning modern Thai design, the spa embodies the essence of “Modern Asian Culture” and provides a tranquil atmosphere for guests seeking balance and rejuvenation.
Indulge in a variety of premium treatments, from soothing massages to revitalizing spa packages, designed to harmonize both mind and body. Our expert therapists use aromatic oils, healing herbs, and time-honored Asian ingredients like honey, turmeric, coconut, lemongrass, tamarind, sesame, and white clay.
Combining Eastern and Western wellness techniques, Raya Spa provides a holistic experience that promotes deep relaxation, improved circulation, and overall well-being. Discover the ultimate in self-care and wellness at Raya Spa, where luxury meets tradition for a truly transformative experience."

tags: Professional Services, Wedding Planners, Wedding Venues
description:
Weddings at Sareeraya Villas & Suites
Set on the serene, white-sand shores of
Chaweng Beach
,
Sareeraya Villas & Suites
offers one of Koh Samui's most breathtaking beach wedding venues. With its tranquil atmosphere and stunning ocean views, your dream wedding becomes a reality. From the moment you book your date, our dedicated wedding planner will guide you through every detail—from custom flower arrangements to personalized menus and wedding cakes. We also offer professional photographers, videographers, and entertainment options, ensuring a flawless experience. Let us take care of everything so you can focus on creating beautiful memories on your special day.
Events at Sareeraya Villas & Suites
Sareeraya Villas & Suites
is also an ideal venue for business events, meetings, and intimate VIP gatherings. Whether it’s a senior-level management retreat, seminar, or corporate gathering, our stylish venue combines elegance with modern amenities. Equipped with state-of-the-art technology, we ensure every event runs seamlessly. From business retreats to special occasions, Sareeraya’s combination of luxury and practicality provides the perfect setting for success."
