tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Pool Villas, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Spa Retreat, Restaurant, Bar, Wifi Access In Room, Private Room, Air Conditioning, Private Bathroom, Parking, Rooms With Seaview, Laundry Service, Rooms With Balcony, Family Rooms, Sun Loungers Or Beach Chairs, Sun Umbrellas, Wellness

name: Prasuthon Restaurant
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Private Dining, Beach Bars, Beachfront, Thai Food, Outdoor Dining, International Food, Breakfast Buffet, Wifi Access In Restaurant
description:
Prasuthon Restaurant at Nora Beach Resort in Bophut offers a unique dining experience with a mix of traditional Thai cuisine and international dishes.
As the resort’s main restaurant, Prasuthon serves Royal Thai dishes made from ancient recipes passed down through generations, giving guests a taste of Thailand’s culinary heritage. A wide selection of Western dishes and fusion food is also available.
Every morning, guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast from 06:30 – 10:30 hrs, featuring global favorites like bacon, eggs, fruit, and freshly baked bread. The beachfront restaurant also offers a fantastic seafood experience with a barbeque serving freshly caught fish and seafood from the Thai Gulf, perfect for dining under the stars."

name: Anodas Spa Signature
tags: Beauty & Wellness, Massage, Spa & Beauty, Body Scrub, Facial, Thai Massage, Coconut Oil Massage, Neck And Shoulder Massage
description:
Escape into pure serenity at The Anodas Spa Signature in Bophut, where the art of relaxation meets the science of well-being. Our signature spa offers a unique fusion of Eastern and Western wellness traditions, designed to provide an unparalleled experience of rejuvenation, tranquility, and healing.
Unveil the timeless beauty secrets of Asian-inspired spa treatments, seamlessly combined with modern therapies backed by scientific innovation. Whether you're seeking deep relaxation, emotional healing, or a revitalizing energy boost, The Anodas Spa Signature is your ultimate destination for holistic wellness.
Every detail is carefully crafted to ensure your ultimate relaxation and well-being, allowing you to let go of stress and sink into a deep sense of peace and rejuvenation."

name: Nora Weddings
tags: Professional Services, Wedding Planners, Wedding Venues
description:
Nora Weddings in Bophut offers professional wedding planning services to create the perfect destination wedding in Koh Samui, one of Thailand’s most sought-after wedding destinations.
With pristine beaches, azure waters, lush landscapes, and iconic coconut palms, a Samui beach wedding is the ultimate romantic setting. Our experienced wedding planners will handle every detail, from the ceremony and reception to flowers, music, catering, and more, ensuring a seamless and stress-free experience.
Whether you’re dreaming of an intimate ceremony or a grand celebration, Nora Weddings will help make your wedding day as beautiful as your love story."

description:
At
The Hive Hotel Samui
, we pride ourselves on offering an exceptional stay that combines luxury, comfort, and convenience. Our mission is to provide guests with an unforgettable experience, where impeccable accommodations meet personalized service. Whether you’re here for relaxation, adventure, or a blend of both, our attentive staff is dedicated to ensuring your stay is as enjoyable as possible.
We offer a range of
accommodation options in Koh Samui

name: The Lodge Hotel
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Beachfront, Breakfast, Restaurant, Bar
description:
The Lodge – A Beachfront Hotel with a Bar & Restaurant in Fisherman’s Village
Located directly on the shores of Fisherman’s Village, The Lodge offers a perfect blend of comfort, relaxation, and coastal charm. Enjoy stunning ocean views from our spacious, elegantly designed rooms, each equipped with modern amenities. Wake up to the sound of waves and the beauty of the beach just steps from your door.
Relax at our beachfront restaurant, serving fresh seafood, Thai cuisine, and international favorites, paired with refreshing drinks from our bar. Whether you’re unwinding or exploring the vibrant Fisherman’s Village, The Lodge provides an ideal environment for every traveler.
With its prime beachfront location, cozy rooms, and lively atmosphere, The Lodge is the perfect base to enjoy both relaxation and the energy of the local village. A memorable stay awaits, combining luxury, comfort, and coastal charm."

name: The Lodge Restaurant
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Beachfront, Thai Food, International Food, Breakfast, Wifi Access In Restaurant
description:
The Lodge – All-Day Dining at Our Beachfront Restaurant in Fisherman’s Village
Located on the stunning beachfront of Fisherman’s Village,
The Lodge
offers a unique dining experience that blends fresh, flavorful cuisine with breathtaking ocean views. Open all day, our restaurant provides a relaxed, inviting atmosphere where guests can enjoy delicious meals from breakfast to dinner, all while soaking in the beauty of the surrounding beach.
Why Choose The Lodge?
All-Day Dining
: From a hearty breakfast to a leisurely lunch and a flavorful dinner,
The Lodge
offers an extensive menu that caters to every dining need throughout the day.
Beachfront Location
: Enjoy stunning ocean views while you dine. The soothing sound of the waves and the refreshing sea breeze create the perfect backdrop for your meal.
Diverse Menu
: Whether you're a seafood lover, craving comfort food, or seeking international cuisine, our menu offers a wide range of options made from the freshest ingredients.
Perfect for Every Occasion
: Ideal for casual meals, romantic dinners, or special celebrations, our relaxed yet stylish atmosphere makes every dining experience memorable.
Whether you’re exploring Fisherman’s Village or unwinding by the beach,
The Lodge
is the perfect spot for great food, drinks, and an unforgettable view."

name: Pure Vegan Heaven
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Vegan
description:
Pure Vegan Heaven – A Plant-Based Paradise in Koh Samui
Pure Vegan Heaven is a fully vegan restaurant offering a delightful and creative menu for plant-based eaters in Koh Samui. Set in a laid-back ambiance, this hidden gem serves beautifully presented dishes that nourish both the body and the eyes. From vibrant vegan lasagna to zesty jackfruit tacos, and wholesome Buddha bowls to refreshing smoothie bowls, there's something for everyone to enjoy.
Why Visit Pure Vegan Heaven?
Creative Vegan Menu
: A celebration of fresh, locally sourced ingredients and innovative plant-based cooking. Enjoy dishes like vegan lasagna, Buddha bowls, and jackfruit tacos.
Fresh & Nutritious Dishes
: Thoughtfully crafted meals that balance taste and nutrition, featuring wholesome ingredients like quinoa, avocado, fresh greens, and tropical fruits.
Beautifully Presented Food
: Each dish is Instagram-worthy and designed to be a feast for both the eyes and the taste buds.
Laid-Back Ambience
: The cozy, relaxed atmosphere is perfect for enjoying a leisurely meal with friends, family, or fellow food lovers.
Whether you're a seasoned vegan, a curious eater, or someone seeking a healthy meal, Pure Vegan Heaven is the perfect spot for nourishing, delicious plant-based dishes."

description:
Vikasa’s Life Café – Nourishing Body, Mind, and Spirit
Vikasa’s Life Café is more than just a place to eat—it's a celebration of health, vitality, and conscious living. As one of Thailand’s best vegan cafés, we believe that food is a powerful tool for personal transformation. Our food philosophy aligns with the holistic values of the Vikasa community, offering dishes that nourish not only your body but also your mind and spirit.
Why Life Café?
Holistic Approach
: Every dish is thoughtfully crafted using fresh, local ingredients to fuel your energy, promote wellbeing, and support your journey towards balance and happiness.
Plant-Based Delights
: Enjoy nourishing meals that align with a healthy lifestyle, from wholesome breakfasts to refreshing smoothies and vibrant lunch options.
A Community of Wellness
: Life Café is a hub for health-conscious individuals, where our vibrant Samui tribe thrives on unique flavors designed to elevate wellbeing.
Join us at Life Café to experience a menu that supports vitality, happiness, and a conscious way of living. Every bite is a step towards a healthier, more balanced you."

name: NH Collection Peace Resort
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Pool Villas, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Bar, Wifi Access In Room, Private Room, Air Conditioning, Private Bathroom, Parking, Rooms With Seaview, Rooms With Balcony, Family Rooms, Sun Loungers Or Beach Chairs, Sun Umbrellas, Wellness, 5* Accommodation
description:
The Island Dream – Peace Resort
Welcome to Peace Resort, a sanctuary where you can escape the everyday rhythms of life. Nestled amidst lush gardens, our elegant accommodations open onto the serene Bophut Bay, with its wide sandy beach lined with palm trees and calm waters perfect for daily swims.
Experience the extraordinary in our beachfront pool villas, where you can live the dream and embrace a lifestyle of pure tranquility. Feel the magic of this special place and make it your own."

name: NH Collection Sea Wrap
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Beachfront, Thai Food, International Food, Breakfast, Breakfast Buffet
description:
Culinary Pleasures Overlooking the Ocean
Start your day with a delightful breakfast at our beachfront restaurant, featuring a vibrant buffet and eggs made to order. The perfect way to fuel up while enjoying stunning ocean views.
For lunch and dinner, indulge in international comfort foods alongside an array of authentic Thai dishes, bringing the flavors of the destination right to your table."

name: Escape Beach Resort
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Bungalows, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Wifi Access In Room, Private Room, Air Conditioning, Private Bathroom, Rooms With Seaview, Rooms With Balcony, Sun Loungers Or Beach Chairs, Sun Umbrellas
description:
A stunning beachfront getaway with panoramic sea views. Guests can unwind by the outdoor pool or enjoy free Wi-Fi throughout the resort. The resort features a variety of accommodations, from charming bungalows to comfortable rooms in the main building, all with air conditioning and views of either the garden or the sea. Rooms are equipped with flat-screen TVs, fridges, safety deposit boxes, and private bathrooms with both hand and rain showers, plus complimentary toiletries.
For adventure seekers, the resort offers sunset tours, island excursions, and fishing trips, all available for an extra fee. Guests can also enjoy convenient services like motorbike and car rentals, as well as transportation arrangements. After a day of exploration, guests can indulge in a traditional Thai massage or other relaxing treatments at the front desk.
Dining at Castaway Restaurant & Bar is a treat, serving a blend of Thai and international cuisine from 07:00 - 22:00 hrs, with refreshing drinks and cocktails by the pool. The resort is just 30 meters from Mae Nam Beach, 8 km from Samui Airport, and close to Bophut’s Fisherman’s Village (2 km) and Wat Phra Yai (7 km)."

name: W Koh Samui
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Pool Villas, Beachfront, Breakfast, Pet Friendly, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Bar
description:
A Perfect Blend of Tranquility and Luxury
Nestled on a 30-square-mile tropical island in the Gulf of Thailand, W Koh Samui is the ultimate 5-star resort offering stunning views of beaches and lush forests. Whether you're seeking relaxation or vibrant nightlife, the resort caters to every mood, with unforgettable experiences awaiting you as the sun sets.
The resort features 74 luxury villas, each a private sanctuary with an outdoor pool for complete relaxation and privacy. Inside, contemporary elegance meets cutting-edge technology, including W signature pillow-top beds, Away Spa amenities, and the exclusive Whatever/Whenever® service to ensure your stay is extraordinary."

Relax, unwind, and enjoy the serene ambiance as you savor your meal with the soothing sound of the waves in the background."

name: Mr. Tee Lawyer
tags: Legal & Financial Services, Lawyers, Notaries, Property Law, Family Law, Corporate Law, Criminal Law, Labour Law, Civil Law, Labor Disputes
description:
Your Trusted Business and Legal Partner in Thailand
Welcome to Mr. Tee Lawyer, the go-to destination for expert business and legal consulting services in Koh Samui, Thailand. Whether you are a business owner looking to incorporate, seeking ongoing legal counsel, or in need of assistance with finance, taxes, or human resources, our team of experienced professionals is ready to support you every step of the way. We are dedicated to providing comprehensive solutions that ensure smooth and efficient business operations, helping you navigate the complex legal landscape with confidence.
Property and Legal Due Diligence
When acquiring property or engaging in mergers and acquisitions in Thailand, thorough due diligence is essential. We specialize in property due diligence, ensuring your investment is secure and legally sound. Our team also offers legal due diligence for mergers and acquisitions, verifying ownership and third-party rights, mitigating risks, and ensuring secure and transparent transactions.
Comprehensive Business Services
Our legal team provides a wide range of services to help both businesses and individuals operate effectively. We offer company set-up assistance, help with business licenses, visa and work permit applications, accounting services, and corporate legal consulting. Our services ensure compliance with Thai regulations and offer ongoing support for your business operations.
Why Choose Mr. Tee Lawyer?
With years of experience in Thai business law, Mr. Tee Lawyer offers personalized legal services tailored to meet your needs. Whether you're starting a new business, investing in real estate, or navigating mergers and acquisitions, we ensure your operations are legally protected and your business thrives."

description:
Mitan Design & Fine Furnishings: Elevating Your Space
Located in Maenam, Mitan Design & Fine Furnishings offers premium indoor and outdoor furniture, décor, and expert interior design services. We specialize in stylish, functional furnishings and accessories to transform your home or business.
Indoor Furniture: Style & Comfort
From luxurious sofas to elegant coffee tables, our indoor collection combines quality, comfort, and design to suit any space, whether residential or commercial.
Outdoor Furniture: Tropical Elegance
Designed for Koh Samui’s climate, our outdoor pieces, including lounge sets and sunbeds, provide comfort and durability for your garden, patio, or poolside.
Accessories & Fabrics: Personalized Touches
Add warmth and personality with our selection of vases, cushions, and fabrics, designed to complement your furniture and bring your space to life.
Interior Design Services: Tailored to You

name: Bre-Eze Restaurant and Bar
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Pool Bars, Beachfront, Seafood, Thai Food, Outdoor Dining, Italian Food, International Food, Breakfast Buffet, Cocktails, Wifi Access In Restaurant
description:
Situated in the scenic Maenam area, Bre-Eze Restaurant and Bar offers a unique culinary experience with a perfect blend of authentic Thai and international cuisine. The restaurant takes pride in using only the freshest ingredients, many sourced directly from its organic garden. The menu is a fusion of vibrant Thai flavors with influences from surrounding regions, offering dishes that are not only delicious but also environmentally conscious.
Whether you are enjoying a casual lunch or a romantic dinner, Bre-Eze provides a stunning setting with breathtaking views of the Gulf of Siam. The restaurant offers outdoor dining for those who want to enjoy the tropical atmosphere, along with a Pool Bar that serves light snacks and refreshing beverages by the water. This combination of scenic views, delicious food, and excellent service makes Bre-Eze a perfect destination for all occasions, whether you’re dining with family, friends, or on a romantic evening."

description:
The Island View Restaurant: A Serene Dining Experience with Breathtaking Beachside Views
Located along the picturesque coastline of Taling Ngam, one of Koh Samui’s most serene and tranquil areas,
The Island View Restaurant
offers an unforgettable dining experience with breathtaking beachside views. Enjoy stunning vistas of the sparkling sea and nearby islands while you indulge in delicious food and refreshing drinks. Whether you're here to watch a spectacular sunset or simply relax in a peaceful atmosphere, this hidden gem is the perfect spot to unwind.
A Variety of Cuisines to Satisfy Every Taste
The Island View Restaurant caters to every taste with a diverse menu that blends traditional Thai dishes and European favorites. From authentic Thai flavors, such as Tom Yum and Pad Thai, to familiar comforts like pizza, pasta, and more, there's something for everyone to enjoy. Whether you're craving bold, aromatic Thai spices or a comforting classic, you'll find a dish that suits your mood and appetite."

name: Hyatt Regency
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Pool Villas, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Spa Retreat, Restaurant, Bar, Wifi Access In Room, Private Room, Air Conditioning, Private Bathroom, Parking, Rooms With Seaview, Laundry Service, Airport Shuttle, Rooms With Balcony, Family Rooms, Sun Loungers Or Beach Chairs, Sun Umbrellas, Wellness, 24 Hours Front Desk, 5* Accommodation
description:
Luxury Oceanfront Escape
Set in the vibrant North Chaweng area, just 8 minutes from Koh Samui International Airport, the Hyatt Regency is a luxurious 5-star resort offering unparalleled views of the ocean. Surrounded by natural beauty, this gallery-inspired resort is perfect for families, couples, or anyone seeking a rejuvenating retreat.
Ultimate Comfort & Amenities
The resort boasts multiple swimming pools, a private beach, an on-site spa, and a variety of dining options to suit all tastes. Every detail, from spacious rooms with modern amenities to top-tier service, is designed to provide ultimate comfort and relaxation.
Ideal for All Travelers
Whether you’re here for relaxation or adventure, the Hyatt Regency offers both energizing experiences and peaceful moments. With family-friendly entertainment, local and international cuisine, and an array of activities, it’s an ideal choice for any getaway."

tags: Food & Beverage, Private Dining, Beachfront, Thai Food, Vegan, Vegetarian, International Food
description:
Exclusive Beachfront Dining
For an intimate and unforgettable dining experience, indulge in a private table set on the sand at the northern end of Choengmon Beach. Curated by Hyatt Destination Dining, this exclusive setting offers the ultimate romantic escape with breathtaking views of the Gulf of Thailand.
Tailored to Perfection
Whether you prefer a candlelit dinner by the shore, a secluded spot under a tree, or a private villa, every detail is carefully crafted by the expert culinary team to ensure a memorable evening. Enjoy world-class Thai and international cuisine in an atmosphere designed for romance.
A Magical Experience
Dedicated to delivering a truly magical experience, Hyatt Destination Dining tailors each evening to your desires, making it the perfect choice for creating lasting memories in a serene, picturesque setting."

description:
Stylish Beachfront Accommodation on Lamai Beach
Stylish beachfront accommodations on Lamai Beach, just 30 minutes from Koh Samui Airport. Ideal for those seeking a peaceful, tropical escape, the resort features an expansive outdoor pool and traditional Thai massage facilities for the ultimate relaxation.
The spacious guestrooms blend traditional local features with modern amenities. Each room includes a private balcony with stunning sea views, living areas with satellite flat-screen TVs, and a private bathroom with a shower and slippers.
Enjoy al fresco dining at the resort’s restaurant, offering a variety of Thai specialties and international dishes, served with breathtaking sea views. Whether you're craving traditional Thai flavors or international favorites, the restaurant provides a delightful dining experience in a relaxed, scenic setting."

Free car parking and complimentary Wi-Fi are provided, allowing you to stay connected and explore the island with ease. Whether you're here for relaxation or adventure, you'll enjoy the flexibility to come and go as you please.
The property is just a short distance from popular attractions like Fisherman's Village and the renowned Chaweng Beach, where you can experience the island's beautiful scenery and vibrant atmosphere. Guests can also enjoy on-site amenities including a restaurant, hot tub, and a fitness center, ensuring a complete and relaxing stay."

name: HD Visa
tags: Legal & Financial Services, Visa Services, Visa Assistance, Border Bounce
description:
Welcome to HDVisa-Thailand.com!
Founded in 2003 by Herbert,
HDVisa-Thailand.com
began as the first organized and guided
Border Bounces
from Koh Samui, providing a much-needed service to foreigners needing to renew their visa stamps. These border trips, originally designed to help travelers maintain their legal status in Thailand, quickly became popular. Herbert's expertise and knowledge of the visa process made it easy for expatriates and tourists to navigate the sometimes complex and evolving Thai immigration laws.
The Evolution of HDVisa
In 2006, significant changes were made to Thai immigration law, which spurred Herbert to adapt and offer even more streamlined services for travelers. At that time, he realized the need for a legal solution that would allow foreigners to obtain
valid visas
for extended stays in Thailand. Through extensive research, Herbert discovered the
Thai consulate in Kota Bharu
, Malaysia, a location less known at the time compared to the Penang consulate, which became a pivotal destination for those needing visa services.
Launching Weekly Services
In December 2006, Herbert launched a
weekly service
that catered to all foreigners wishing to stay legally in Thailand. The service provided guided trips to the consulate in
Kota Bharu
, offering an efficient and reliable way to obtain the necessary visas. These trips were particularly beneficial for expatriates and long-term travelers who wished to remain in Thailand without the hassle of frequent visa runs or confusion about the ever-changing regulations.
Exploring New Areas
In the early days of the service, the trips took travelers through areas that were considered
non-tourist
regions, including districts such as
Pattani
,
Narathiwat
, and
Songkhla
. These locations were relatively unknown to tourists, which added an element of adventure and discovery for those taking the guided trips. Despite the uncertainty about the destination, Herbert's service continued to gain trust and recognition as a reliable solution for visa renewals.
Why Choose HDVisa?
Expertise
: With over 20 years of experience in the visa industry,
HDVisa-Thailand.com
offers trusted and reliable visa services for foreigners in Thailand.
Convenience
: Our services are tailored to help travelers stay legal in Thailand with minimal hassle, offering guided trips to consulates and other official visa locations.
Personalized Service
: We provide one-on-one assistance and guidance, ensuring that your visa application and border runs are smooth and efficient.
Whether you’re a long-term resident or just visiting Thailand,
HDVisa-Thailand.com
remains your go-to service for all things related to Thai visas. Our expertise and commitment to customer satisfaction will ensure that you stay legal and stress-free during your time in the Kingdom."

name: Pattraporn Consulting
tags: Legal & Financial Services, Visa Services, Visa Assistance
description:
Pattraporn Consulting – Expert Visa Services for Thailand
At
Pattraporn Consulting
, we offer professional visa services for foreigners seeking to live and work in Thailand, as well as for Thai nationals needing assistance with visa-related matters. Our experienced team ensures a smooth, efficient, and stress-free process for work permits, visa extensions, and long-term residency.
Our Services Include
:
Work Permits & Employment Visas
: We help secure work permits and employment visas, ensuring compliance with Thai immigration laws.
Business Visas
: Guidance on obtaining business visas for managing or investing in Thai businesses.
Tourist & Temporary Visas
: Assistance with tourist visa applications and extensions.
Long-Term & Retirement Visas
: Expertise in retirement and long-term residency visas.
Visa Extensions & Re-Entries
: Support for extending your stay and obtaining re-entry permits.
Family & Dependent Visas
: Helping families reunite with spouses, children, and dependents.
Our team ensures quick, hassle-free visa processing while staying up-to-date with immigration regulations."

tags: Accommodation, Hostels, Beachfront, Breakfast
description:
The Dreamcatcher or Samui Sunset Hostel: A Relaxing Stay in Nathon
Located in Nathon, just one mile from Bang Makham Beach,
The Dreamcatcher or Samui Sunset Hostel
offers a serene escape with convenient access to Koh Samui's beautiful surroundings. This charming hostel features a garden, free private parking, a shared lounge, and a terrace, creating the perfect environment to unwind and enjoy your stay.
Comfortable and Cozy Rooms
At
The Dreamcatcher or Samui Sunset Hostel
, guests can enjoy rooms equipped with balconies, perfect for soaking in the tropical atmosphere. The rooms feature shared bathrooms with showers and hairdryers, offering essential comforts during your stay. Free WiFi is available throughout the property, and some rooms boast stunning sea views. Bed linen is provided to ensure a restful stay.
Beachfront Relaxation and Amenities
The hostel offers a private beach area for guests to relax, swim, and soak up the sun. Additional amenities include an ATM, a tour desk, and currency exchange services to ensure your stay is as comfortable and convenient as possible.
Start Your Day with a Delicious Breakfast
An Asian breakfast is available each morning, offering a delicious and energizing start to your day. Whether you're heading out to explore or enjoying a relaxing day at the beach, the breakfast sets the tone for a perfect day in Koh Samui."

tags: Accommodation, Bungalows, Private Room, Fan Room
description:
Samui Circus Studio & Ville – Eco-Friendly Bamboo Tiny Houses in Koh Samui
Escape to Samui Circus Ville for a unique, eco-friendly stay in brand-new bamboo tiny houses. Made from sustainable, locally sourced materials, our cozy bungalows are nestled in the heart of Bangrak, Koh Samui. This serene retreat offers the perfect balance of nature and comfort, making it an ideal getaway for eco-conscious travelers.
Sustainable and Comfortable Living
Eco-Friendly Design
: Stay in beautifully designed bamboo houses built with sustainable practices.
Prime Location
: Enjoy easy access to local attractions like Bangrak Beach and the Big Buddha Temple.
Convenience at Your Doorstep
: Restaurants, shops, and services are just a short walk away, making it easy to explore or relax.
Whether you're here to relax, work, or explore, Samui Circus Ville provides the perfect blend of eco-conscious living and comfort."

name: Circus School
tags: Children's Needs, Child Activities
description:
Welcome to Samui Circus Studio – Circus Training for All Ages, Levels, and Tastes
Looking for an exciting way to improve focus, coordination, and creativity? Samui Circus Studio offers a wide range of circus arts classes for all ages and skill levels. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced performer, our circus training programs are designed to help you develop strength, flexibility, discipline, and teamwork, all while having fun and expressing yourself through movement.
At Samui Circus Studio, we believe that circus arts are not just about performance—they’re about fostering personal growth and building a sense of community. Our team of professional instructors, including fire performers, jugglers, dancers, and athletes, is here to guide you every step of the way. With both group and private lessons available, there’s something for everyone, from children to adults.
Fun & Engaging Activities for All Ages
: Whether you're a child discovering the magic of circus arts or an adult looking to try something new, our classes are perfect for anyone interested in performance arts. No prior experience is necessary—just bring your enthusiasm and energy!
Wide Range of Circus Classes
: We offer both fire and non-fire activities, including poi spinning, juggling (balls & clubs), contact ball, dragon staff & dragon flag, Thai stick or double sticks, swing club, devil stick, and much more. Whether you’re looking to learn a specific skill or just have fun, our classes cater to all interests.
Physical, Mental, and Social Benefits
: Circus training helps develop important life skills such as improved coordination and spatial awareness, increased strength and flexibility, enhanced focus and discipline, and fostering team spirit and creativity.
Professional, Friendly Instructors
: Our founder, Poppy, and a team of skilled instructors will be your privileged teachers, ensuring a supportive and encouraging environment. Learn from experienced fire performers, jugglers, athletes, and dancers who are passionate about sharing their knowledge.
Safe & Fun Environment
: At Samui Circus Studio, we prioritize safety while ensuring that every class is enjoyable and rewarding. Whether you're learning to spin poi, juggle, or perform with fire, you’ll be in a safe, welcoming environment where you can grow and express yourself."

name: Circus Fire Show
tags: Live Performers, Fire Shows
description:
Looking for an unforgettable entertainment experience in Koh Samui? Our Traditional Thai Fire Show and Island Style Fire Show offer a thrilling fusion of fire dancing, vibrant costumes, and interactive elements, guaranteed to mesmerize your guests.
Tailored to your event, the Traditional Thai Fire Show features skilled performers using traditional fire tools such as poi, fire sticks, and clubs, choreographed to music with a stunning Sparkle Finale. Meanwhile, the Island Style Fire Show brings a high-energy, freestyle approach, inspired by the famous Full Moon Parties of Koh Phangan.
Performers engage the audience with dynamic fire tricks, fire limbo games, and plenty of photo opportunities. Whether you choose a classic Thai theme or a more spontaneous, island-inspired vibe, both shows promise an unforgettable and exhilarating experience, perfectly matched to your event's atmosphere and music."

description:
Samui Zenity Hotel is a charming boutique hotel located on the stunning island of Koh Samui, Thailand, in the tranquil area of Maenam. With its serene and relaxing atmosphere, it’s the perfect choice for those seeking a peaceful retreat.
The hotel features a selection of modern rooms and villas, each thoughtfully designed with stylish, contemporary decor. Many of the accommodations offer private balconies or patios, providing guests with scenic views of the inviting pool and lush tropical surroundings.
Not far away is the idyllic Maenam Beach, known for its quiet charm, soft sand, and natural beauty. Whether you're looking to unwind in a tranquil setting, enjoy a leisurely stroll along the beach, or relax in your stylish room, Samui Zenity Hotel is the ideal getaway to experience the best of Koh Samui’s peaceful side."

name: Specs Optic
tags: Shopping, Optics, Sun Glasses, Reading Glasses, Vision Optic Glasses, Lenses
description:
SPECS OPTIC: Your Trusted Eyeglass Specialist in Koh Samui
With over 40 years of experience in the eyeglasses industry, SPECS OPTIC is the go-to destination for top-quality eyewear in Koh Samui. Whether you are a local resident or a visitor, we are here to provide you with the best vision solutions, from fashionable eyeglasses to prescription lenses and professional eye care services. Our commitment to quality, affordability, and personalized service has made us a trusted name in the industry, ensuring that you get the perfect eyewear to suit your needs and style.
Why Choose SPECS OPTIC in Koh Samui?
Decades of Expertise:
With over four decades in the eyewear business, SPECS OPTIC has built a reputation for excellence. Our team of experienced optometrists and eyeglass specialists is dedicated to delivering the best possible vision care. We combine expert knowledge with personalized attention to ensure that each customer finds the ideal eyewear solution.
Fashion-Forward Eyewear:
At SPECS OPTIC, we understand that eyewear is not just about vision—it's also about style. Our extensive collection of stylish frames includes options for every taste, from classic to trendy designs. Whether you need prescription eyeglasses, high-quality sunglasses, or unique fashion-forward frames, you’ll find eyewear that enhances both your vision and personal style.
Quick Service, No Wait:

Whether you need a new pair of prescription glasses or a quick lens replacement, SPECS OPTIC ensures you won’t have to wait long to enjoy clear vision.
Affordable and High-Quality Eyewear:
At SPECS OPTIC, we believe that top-quality eyewear should be accessible to everyone. We offer competitive pricing on all our products, ensuring you can find the perfect pair of glasses to fit your budget without compromising on quality. From everyday eyeglasses to specialized frames, we have something for every need and every price range.
Convenient Location in Koh Samui:
Located in the heart of Koh Samui, SPECS OPTIC is easily accessible to both locals and tourists. Whether you're in need of a new pair of glasses or a quick eye check-up, our convenient location ensures you can find us when you need us most. We are dedicated to providing personalized care and expert services to meet your eyewear needs, right here in Koh Samui.
Your Vision, Our Priority
At SPECS OPTIC, we understand that good vision is essential for everyday life. That’s why we offer high-quality eyewear and expert services to ensure your vision is clear and comfortable. With over 40 years of experience, our team is committed to providing the best vision care and eyewear fashion in Koh Samui. Whether you're in need of a new prescription, stylish frames, or professional advice, SPECS OPTIC is your trusted partner in eyewear."

name: Mr. Samui Tours
tags: Things To Do, Tour Companies, Quad Tours, Zip Line, Jeep Safari, Private Tours, Waterfalls
description:
Discover Koh Samui Through Exclusive Tours with MrSamui.com
Experience the best of Koh Samui with MrSamui.com’s carefully crafted tours. Whether you’re looking for a relaxing beach day, thrilling adventures, or cultural immersion, our tours are designed to showcase the island’s unique beauty and charm. Let us help you explore like a local with private, tailor-made experiences that go beyond the typical tourist path.
Tailored Tours for Every Traveler
At MrSamui.com, we specialize in creating personalized tours that align with your interests. From full-day sightseeing tours and extreme activities to half-day Instagram trips and cultural explorations, we ensure every experience is perfectly suited to your preferences. Explore the island’s hidden gems, local markets, temples, and more—all with a local guide to show you the way.
Expert Guides, Seamless Experiences
Our combination of local knowledge and European expertise ensures that each tour is well-planned and executed to perfection. Our guides are passionate about sharing the island’s stories, from its rich cultural heritage to its stunning natural beauty, providing you with a deeper understanding of Koh Samui.
Flexible and Comfortable Adventures
Whether you want to tour the island by private car, enjoy a bike ride through scenic routes, or try thrilling outdoor activities, we’ve got you covered. Our vehicles and tours are tailored to offer you maximum comfort and flexibility, so you can enjoy Koh Samui at your own pace and in style.
Create Unforgettable Memories
With MrSamui.com, you’re not just taking a tour—you’re making memories. From the vibrant nightlife to serene nature spots and everything in between, every tour is designed to create lasting experiences that you’ll treasure forever."

Whether you're craving classic Pad Thai, spicy green curry, or unique Thai street food, our menu will satisfy your taste buds.

Perfect for a fun night out, a casual dinner with friends, or a special celebration, our restaurant is the ultimate destination for food, fun, and great vibes.
Join us for a memorable experience – where amazing food meets great music and even better company!"

name: Take a Chef

description:
Take a Chef: The Ultimate Private Dining Experience in Koh Samui
Since 2017, Take a Chef has been redefining dining on Koh Samui, offering personalized culinary experiences that turn any occasion into a memorable feast. What started with a single talented chef has now blossomed into a team of 23+ chefs, each with a passion for crafting extraordinary meals tailored just for you.
Why You’ll Love Take a Chef:
Expert Chefs, Tailored to You
: Our chefs bring years of expertise, from local Thai delicacies to global gourmet flavors. Whatever your cravings or dietary needs, we’ll design a menu that’s perfect for your occasion—whether it's a cozy villa dinner or a grand celebration.
Dining, Your Way
: From romantic candlelit dinners on the beach to festive family feasts, we create a bespoke experience that’s just right for you. We’ll bring the restaurant to your villa, your favorite beach, or any spot on Koh Samui and Surat Thani.
Fresh, Local & Sustainable
: We’re passionate about supporting local farmers and sourcing the freshest ingredients. Every dish is made with the highest-quality, sustainably grown produce, ensuring that your meal is as kind to the planet as it is to your tastebuds.
Anywhere, Anytime
: With over 23 chefs available across Koh Samui, we’ll bring fine dining to you—whether you're on a remote beach or tucked away in a villa, we’ll create an unforgettable meal wherever you are.
Whether it’s a honeymoon, birthday, or simply an evening to remember,
Take a Chef
is here to make your dining experience truly exceptional. Book today, and let us bring the magic of Koh Samui’s flavors directly to you."

description:
Your Tropical Paradise in Koh Samui
Escape to Pinnacle Samui Resort, a peaceful retreat nestled in the heart of Koh Samui, one of Thailand’s most beautiful islands. With 71 carefully designed accommodations, including private bungalows and hotel rooms in a charming low-rise building, our resort offers a perfect blend of comfort, privacy, and natural beauty. Surrounded by lush tropical gardens, each room provides a serene escape where you can unwind and reconnect with nature.
Whether you’re seeking a relaxing beach getaway, a romantic escape, or simply a peaceful sanctuary, Pinnacle Samui Resort promises a tranquil environment where you can enjoy the best of Koh Samui’s stunning beaches and vibrant island life. Located just minutes away from pristine sands, crystal-clear waters, and the island's top attractions, our resort is an ideal choice for travelers looking to enjoy a calm yet unforgettable holiday experience."

name: Pinnacle Beach Restaurant
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Beachfront, Thai Food, Outdoor Dining, Family Friendly, International Food, Breakfast Buffet
description:
Start your day with an indulgent international buffet breakfast, featuring freshly baked pastries, tropical fruits, hot dishes, and freshly brewed coffee. Whether you're gearing up for an adventure or unwinding, our buffet energizes your day with vibrant flavors.
In the evening, immerse yourself in the bold, aromatic flavors of Thailand with dishes like green curry, Pad Thai, and Som Tum salad. For seafood lovers, we offer the freshest catches, prepared with local flair. International favorites like pasta and grilled meats are also available, ensuring every craving is satisfied.
For a romantic touch, indulge in our Pinnacle Light Dinner on the beach. Dine under the stars with the soothing sound of waves and a gentle breeze, creating an unforgettable evening.
Every meal is an experience, combining exceptional cuisine with breathtaking views for a sensory journey you'll cherish."

description:
Indulge in an unforgettable dining experience at KC Beach Restaurant & Bar, where every meal is paired with breathtaking ocean views and a relaxed, beachside ambiance. Located on the shores of Chaweng Beach, we serve a diverse range of international dishes, catering to all tastes—from hearty breakfasts to light lunches and delicious dinners.
Our menu features a perfect blend of local Thai flavors and international favorites, with fresh seafood and classic Western dishes made from the finest local ingredients. Each dish is crafted to delight your senses.
Whether you're enjoying a romantic dinner, a casual lunch, or a meal with loved ones, the stunning beachfront setting and cool ocean breeze create the perfect backdrop. Don’t forget to visit KC Beach Bar, where you can sip on refreshing cocktails and light snacks, all while taking in the vibrant Samui atmosphere."

name: KC Cooking Class
tags: Things To Do, Cooking Classes
description:
Immerse yourself in the vibrant flavors of Thai cuisine with our exclusive oceanfront cooking class at KC Beach Resort, set right on the shores of Chaweng Beach. Whether you're a seasoned foodie or a beginner in the kitchen, our hands-on cooking experience offers the perfect opportunity to discover the art of traditional Thai cooking under the guidance of our expert chef.
Using only the freshest local ingredients, you’ll learn to create authentic Thai dishes, from aromatic curries to flavorful stir-fries and refreshing salads. With the serene backdrop of Chaweng Beach and the sound of gentle waves, this culinary experience is as much about the location as it is about the food."

name: Mind Your Language
tags: Professional Services, Education
description:
Master Thai, English, and Italian in Koh Samui
Start your language journey in Koh Samui with Mind Your Language Thailand, the premier language school since 2001. Offering courses in Thai, English, and Italian for all levels, we guide you toward fluency with expert instructors in a relaxed environment.
We provide comprehensive courses tailored to your needs, whether you’re a beginner or advanced learner. Using our unique T.M.C. (Total Method of Communication), we make learning enjoyable and effective with visual, auditory, and kinesthetic techniques.
Our experienced instructors create personalized lessons that match your goals, whether for travel, business, or personal enrichment. The stunning island setting enhances your learning experience, and cultural immersion opportunities help you practice in real-world contexts.
With flexible learning options, you can learn at your own pace or accelerate your progress, making Mind Your Language Thailand the ideal place for your language studies."

description:
Kamalaya Soma Restaurant: Nourishing Cuisine for Body and Soul
Located in the serene Kamalaya Resort,
Soma Restaurant
offers a dining experience that complements your wellness journey. Focusing on organic, nutrient-rich dishes made from locally sourced ingredients, Soma creates meals that support balance, vitality, and well-being.
The menu caters to a range of dietary preferences, featuring vegetarian, vegan, gluten-free, and dairy-free options, along with detox meals designed to support cleansing. Soma’s fusion of Thai and international flavors incorporates superfoods like spirulina, chia seeds, and acai to deliver nutrient-dense dishes.
With an open-air design amidst lush gardens, Soma’s peaceful ambiance encourages mindful dining—slow down, savor each bite, and appreciate the nourishment it provides. Complement your meal with health-focused drinks like fresh juices, smoothies, and herbal teas.
Kamalaya Soma Restaurant offers a unique, holistic dining experience that nourishes both body and soul in a tranquil, sustainable setting."

At Samui Language School, we offer high-quality language instruction tailored to your individual needs, whether you're a complete beginner or an advanced learner. Our personalized approach ensures that you gain practical skills, build fluency, and master the nuances of both Thai and English in a supportive and encouraging environment.
In addition to language courses, we also offer support for those seeking an ED Visa to stay and study in Koh Samui. Our team provides all the necessary guidance to help you through the application process and ensure a smooth and hassle-free experience."

With a focus on hands-on, non-tech activities, JUNIO offers a variety of engaging programs that are both fun and educational. From arts and crafts to active games and themed adventures, there’s something to spark every young mind.

The Pizza Company
in Koh Samui! We offer a wide range of delicious, freshly made pizzas, pasta, sides, and desserts—perfect for any occasion, whether you're dining in, ordering delivery, or hosting a special event.

name: Windfield International School
tags: Children's Needs, Schools
description:
Windfield International School seeks to inspire children to become global citizens through an inquiry-based learning environment of total immersion in multiple languages and cultures.
We seek to incorporate the best of traditional values and Thai culture, with an engaging and forward thinking programme that equips students for life and work in the 21st Century.
Our Programme engages students in a holistic, challenging academic curriculum. Our inquiry-based approach nurtures curiosity, language fluency, and cultural intelligence.
Our passionate, multicultural faculty and staff are dedicated to the needs of all students. Our vibrant and inclusive community is engaged and supportive.
Our children take responsible action within and beyond our school community.
Our graduates thrive in a diverse global environment.
Our diverse language programme promotes intercultural awareness and aids 21st century learning skills (Communication).
By achieving the above, we strive to be the school of choice in Koh Samui."

description:

with
Mahalo
, the premier destination for unforgettable water sports lessons in [location]. Whether you're a beginner eager to try something new or an experienced enthusiast, our Efoil kite surfing lessons are designed to elevate your skills while ensuring a safe, exciting, and eco-friendly way to explore the waves.
Efoil kite surfing combines the excitement of kite surfing with cutting-edge electric hydrofoil technology, allowing you to glide effortlessly above the water. The power of the kite and hydrofoil lets you ride waves, accelerate, and enjoy a smooth, silent ride that feels almost like flying. It’s a whole new way to experience the ocean!
Our team of certified, passionate instructors are here to help you succeed. From first-timers to advanced riders, we offer personalized lessons to ensure you feel confident, safe, and ready to master this exhilarating sport. Join us at Mahalo and ride the waves like never before!"

Your Ultimate Escape on Bangrak Beach
Escape to Samui Pier Beach Front Resort, a tranquil haven on the stunning shores of Bangrak Beach. Whether you’re here with family, as a couple, or solo, our resort offers the perfect environment for relaxation and unforgettable memories. Indulge in delicious local and international cuisine at our beachside restaurant, where each meal is paired with the calming sounds of the ocean.
With 19 rooms designed to offer breathtaking views of the beach, you’ll wake up to the beauty of the sea every day. Choose from three room categories to suit your style, whether it’s a romantic retreat, family vacation, or peaceful getaway. Enjoy exceptional service and a prime location right on the beach at Samui Pier Beach Front Resort – your perfect destination for a memorable Koh Samui escape."

name: Ninja Water Park
tags: Children's Needs, Child Activities, Children Playgrounds
description:
Nestled on the beautiful Bangrak Beach of Koh Samui, Ninja Water Park is the perfect destination for both locals and tourists seeking fun in the sun and to have great family times.
As the one and only inflatable sea water park in Koh Samui, we pride ourselves on providing a unique and thrilling experience. Our park features a variety of inflatable obstacles, slides, trampolines, and climbing walls that promise hours of fun and excitement.
Your safety is our top priority. Our park is staffed with trained lifeguards and our inflatables are regularly inspected to ensure they meet the highest safety standards. We provide life jackets for all guests, ensuring a safe and enjoyable experience for everyone.
Looking for a unique venue for a birthday party, or group outing? Ninja Water Park is the perfect place to create unforgettable memories. Contact us for special group rates and event planning services."

name: Samui Pier Boat Charter
tags: Things To Do, On The Water, Private Boat, Ang Thong Marine National Park, Koh Tao
description:
Samui Pier Boat Charter offers luxury speedboats, yachts, and sailboats to explore the best destinations in the Gulf of Thailand. We provide private and VIP charters to places like Koh Tao for snorkeling and scuba diving, Angthong National Marine Park for kayaking and stunning views, and Koh Phangan for relaxing or enjoying the Full Moon Party.
Our flexible private charters mean no rush or strict schedules—start your journey when you want and enjoy secluded beaches at your own pace. We pride ourselves on exceptional service, safety, and tailor-made experiences. Whether it's big game fishing, whale shark diving, or island hopping, our experienced crew and English-speaking guides ensure an unforgettable adventure."

name: Holiday Inn Resort
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Wifi Access In Room, Gym, Private Room, Air Conditioning, Private Bathroom, Rooms With Seaview, Rooms With Balcony, Family Rooms, Sun Loungers Or Beach Chairs, Sun Umbrellas, Kid's Club
description:
Holiday Inn Resort Samui Bophut Beach: A Tropical Getaway on Bophut Beach
Situated on the stunning white sands and crystal-clear waters of Bophut Beach, Holiday Inn Resort Samui Bophut Beach offers the ideal destination for those seeking a tropical escape in one of the world’s most sought-after vacation spots.
Idyllic Accommodations for Every Traveler
With 203 guest rooms spread across 9 towers, our resort offers a variety of accommodations to suit every type of traveler. From cozy Standard Rooms to spacious Kid Suites, we ensure ultimate comfort and convenience for romantic getaways, family vacations, and group retreats alike.
Family-Friendly Paradise
Designed with families in mind, our resort offers endless opportunities for fun and adventure. Kids will love the thrilling waterpark with exhilarating slides and splash zones. The Kids Club provides a dedicated space for young adventurers to enjoy exciting activities, ensuring an unforgettable stay for families.
Whether you're relaxing on the beach, enjoying family-friendly amenities, or exploring the beauty of Bophut, every moment at our resort is filled with joy and relaxation."

name: Holiday Inn Lazy Coconut
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Pool Bars, Beachfront, Thai Food, Outdoor Dining, Family Friendly, International Food
description:
Pool Bar at Holiday Inn Koh Samui: Your Paradise to Unwind
Relax, refresh, and enjoy the tropical vibes at our Pool Bar at Holiday Inn Koh Samui. Whether you're soaking up the sun, cooling off in the pool, or lounging on a comfy chair, our poolside bar is the perfect spot to kick back with a delicious drink and light bites.
Sip, Savor, and Relax:
Cold Beers
: Chill with ice-cold local and international beers.
Signature Cocktails
: Try our expertly crafted cocktails, from tropical creations to classic favorites.
Wines & Spirits
: Elevate your poolside experience with a glass of fine wine or premium spirits.
Smoothies & Juices
: Refresh with fresh tropical smoothies and juices.
Light Bites:
Pair your drink with fresh salads, gourmet sandwiches, and crispy fries – the perfect poolside snacks.
Join us at the Pool Bar and let the laid-back atmosphere and delicious flavors make your day unforgettable."

name: Holiday Inn Essence Bar & Lounge
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Thai Food, Airconditioned Area, Outdoor Dining, Family Friendly, International Food
description:
Dining at Holiday Inn Koh Samui: A Culinary Journey to Remember
Indulge in a memorable dining experience at Holiday Inn Koh Samui, where every meal offers the best of local and international flavors. Whether you're dining indoors in a chic, air-conditioned restaurant or enjoying the tropical breeze in our spacious outdoor seating area, every moment is crafted to delight your senses.
Indoor Dining
Relax in a stylish, contemporary setting with soft lighting and cozy furnishings. Whether it's a leisurely breakfast, a hearty lunch, or a delightful dinner, our indoor dining space provides the perfect atmosphere for any occasion.
Outdoor Dining
Take advantage of Koh Samui’s stunning weather with al fresco dining. Enjoy the fresh tropical breeze and beautiful island views as you savor each bite in our inviting outdoor space.
Cocktail Hour
As the sun sets, treat yourself to vibrant cocktails—refreshing mojitos, piña coladas, and inventive house specials. Whether you’re by the pool or unwinding with friends, our expertly crafted cocktails are the perfect way to relax.
Culinary Delights
From Thai-inspired dishes to Western classics, our menu combines the freshest local ingredients with international flavors. Every dish is thoughtfully prepared to deliver a unique taste experience that captures the essence of Koh Samui.
Come and discover the perfect balance of flavor, ambiance, and island charm at Holiday Inn Koh Samui!"

name: Holiday Inn Family Fun
tags: Children's Needs, Child Activities, Child Friendly Places, Children Playgrounds
description:
Family Fun at Holiday Inn Resort Samui
At Holiday Inn Resort Samui, the real family fun starts the moment you arrive! Designed with families in mind, our resort offers a range of activities and amenities that make it one of the most family-friendly destinations on Koh Samui. A great family holiday is all about fun, peace of mind, and quality time together – and we're here to provide all that and more!
Kid-Friendly Amenities and Attractions
From the moment your kids step into our resort, they'll be immersed in a world of fun and excitement! Here's a glimpse of the family-friendly attractions waiting for you:
Splash Zones & Water Play
: Let your little ones cool off and enjoy water slides, fountains, and interactive water features in our dedicated splash zones.
Play Zones
: Safe, fun-filled areas where kids can run, jump, and explore, keeping them entertained for hours.
Swimming Zones
: Our kid-friendly pools are perfect for young swimmers, with trained staff always nearby to ensure a safe and supervised environment.
Family Bonding and Togetherness
At Holiday Inn Resort Samui, we’re committed to creating special moments for the entire family. Whether it’s exploring the grounds, enjoying activities, or relaxing by the pool, our family-focused environment ensures everyone can enjoy quality time together.
Family-Friendly Dining
Enjoy meals together in our family-friendly restaurants. With the Kids Eat Free program, dining is delicious, convenient, and affordable. Share quality meals with your little ones while experiencing the vibrant flavors of our diverse menus.
At Holiday Inn Resort Samui, we make sure your family vacation is as enjoyable and stress-free as possible. With endless entertainment, bonding opportunities, and all the comforts of home, it's the perfect place to create lasting memories."

name: Nicolazi design
tags: Property Services, Interior Design & Furniture Shops, Home Improvement, Outdoor Furniture, Pergola, Car Ports
description:
Nicolazi Design – Luxury Outdoor Furniture & High-End Outdoor Kitchens
For over 14 years, Nicolazi Design has been a French leader in creating contemporary outdoor furniture and premium outdoor kitchens. We offer a diverse range of customizable designs, perfect for both private individuals and professionals, transforming outdoor spaces into sophisticated retreats.
Elevate Your Outdoor Experience with Nicolazi Design
Stylish Garden Furniture: From lounges and sunbeds to sofas, chairs, and tables, our furniture is designed for comfort and durability. Options include LED-equipped chaises, daybeds, and umbrellas with integrated LED lights and Bluetooth speakers.
Custom Outdoor Kitchens: Our luxury kitchens are modular, customizable, and built to last, offering the perfect setting for gatherings.
Innovative Outdoor Accessories: Enhance your space with plancha braziers, fireplaces, and LED lighting for a cozy atmosphere.
Outdoor Spas: Relax in luxury with spas featuring integrated LED lights, screens, and Bluetooth speakers.
Why Choose Nicolazi Design?
With over 200 exclusive designs, our pieces are made from premium materials for exceptional durability and comfort. Every item can be customized to match your style, allowing you to create the perfect outdoor oasis.
Transform your outdoor living space today with Nicolazi Design’s luxury furniture, kitchens, and accessories."

name: Seedaeng Bungalows
tags: Accommodation, Bungalows, Beachfront, Restaurant, Bar
description:
See Daeng Bungalow is a boutique hotel, nestling on a beautiful swimming beach in Maenam, Koh Samui looking out towards the island of Koh Phangan.  Marie is the genial Swedish host, always happy to provide that extra touch to make you feel at home.
We have a range of rooms available from beach bungalows on the beach, comfortable side rooms looking over Maenam to glorious seascapes from the terraces in the upper rooms. All our rooms have a fridge to keep your drinks and snacks cool, aircon, overhead fans and a flat screen TV.
The beach bar serves exotic cocktails, cool beers and fresh coconuts.    For an extra treat try a  green coconut with a shot of rum while you are sitting in the soft waves.  Our kitchen serves traditional Thai cuisine and  Western food.
We are always happy to cater for special ocassions, weddings  and parties,  just let us know what you need."

name: The Florist Resort
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Bar
description:
Discover the ultimate tropical getaway at The Florist Resort, located in the heart of Maenam CBD, Koh Samui.  This beautiful beachfront resort offers an unbeatable combination of relaxation, convenience, and luxury.
Situated steps away from the soft, sandy shores of a pristine beach — perfect for barefoot strolls — the resort ensures you can enjoy a safe and peaceful environment right at your doorstep. Unlike rocky beaches, the gentle sands make it an ideal spot for sunbathing, swimming, or simply unwinding by the sea.
In addition to its prime beachfront location, The Florist Resort is surrounded by a variety of local shops, restaurants, and attractions, providing you with easy access to everything you need during your stay. Whether you're craving a delicious meal, shopping for unique souvenirs, or exploring local culture, everything is within walking distance.
The resort also features
3 stunning swimming pools, offering guests multiple options to relax and cool off in style. Whether you prefer a serene poolside experience or the refreshing ocean breeze, there's something for everyone at The Florist Resort."

name: Sue's Ocean Restaurant
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Beachfront, Seafood, Thai Food, Outdoor Dining, International Food, Breakfast Buffet, Pool Day Pass, Wifi Access In Restaurant
description:
Location & Ambience
Sue’s Ocean Restaurant, located on the scenic Chaweng Beach, offers an unforgettable beachfront dining experience. With stunning views of the ocean and the gentle sound of waves, this restaurant is the ideal setting for a relaxing meal at any time of the day. Whether you’re enjoying breakfast, lunch, or a romantic dinner, the laid-back ambiance, chill-out music, and beautiful surroundings create a memorable experience.
Dining Experience
The restaurant specializes in both Thai and international cuisine, ensuring there's something for every palate. Enjoy freshly prepared seafood with the option to select your catch and have it cooked to your liking. Pair it with a fresh salad bar and flavorful dressings for a complete meal. Dining right on the beach allows guests to dip their toes in the sand while savoring their meals under the stars, adding a unique touch to the dining experience.
Customer Satisfaction
Sue’s Ocean Restaurant is committed to providing excellent food and an exceptional atmosphere. Whether you're a local or a tourist, our staff is dedicated to offering a seamless dining experience with great service and delicious food."

name: Chaweng Garden Beach Bar
tags: Bars & Nightlife, Bars & Pubs, Beachfront, Open Air, Snack Menu, Hotel Bars
description:
Beachfront Relaxation and Scenic Views
Nestled beside Sue’s Ocean Restaurant, this beachfront bar offers a peaceful haven with sweeping sea views and lush gardens. Guests can unwind while feeding playful squirrels that add a unique touch to the experience.
Signature Cocktails and Refreshing Beverages
Enjoy a variety of tropical cocktails and classic drinks, all crafted with care by the friendly staff. From refreshing beverages to expertly made cocktails, there’s something for everyone to enjoy.
Memorable Relaxation Experience
Whether you're lounging by the beach or enjoying the panoramic view, the Beach Bar is the perfect spot to relax and make lasting memories. Visit for a tranquil escape and enjoy a truly special experience."

Located at the stunning Monkey Pool near the main lobby, Monkey Pool Bar offers a unique swim-up bar experience. Lounge by the pool or take a dip, all while enjoying refreshing drinks and tasty snacks served right to you.
Variety of Drinks and Snacks
From tropical cocktails to chilled beers, our wide selection of beverages caters to every preference. Enjoy your favorite drink without ever leaving the water, perfect for those wanting to relax and indulge by the pool.
Relaxation and Comfort
With top-notch service from our friendly, well-trained staff, Monkey Pool Bar combines comfort, fun, and excellent service for a truly memorable poolside experience. Dive in and unwind today!"

description:
Pechvadee Furniture
At Pechvadee Rattan Furniture, we specialize in creating and restoring beautiful handcrafted rattan furniture. Whether you need new, custom-made pieces or expert repairs for your existing furniture, we offer high-quality solutions to suit your needs.
Our Services Include
:
Custom Rattan Furniture
: Handcrafted, tailored pieces in various styles, from modern to classic.
Rattan Furniture Repairs
: Restoring damaged furniture to its original beauty and durability.
Eco-Friendly Craftsmanship
: Made from sustainably sourced rattan for long-lasting, eco-conscious products.
Indoor & Outdoor Furniture
: Perfect for any space, from living rooms to gardens.
Transform your home with our exquisite new pieces or bring your old favorites back to life with professional repairs. Contact us today for custom designs or repair quotes."

name: Malibu Resort
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Bar, Wifi Access In Room, Private Room, Air Conditioning, Private Bathroom, Rooms With Seaview, Rooms With Balcony, Sun Loungers Or Beach Chairs, Sun Umbrellas, 24 Hours Front Desk, 4* Accommodation
description:
Paradise Awaits at Malibu Resort & Beach Club
Located in the heart of Koh Samui on the iconic Chaweng Beach, Malibu Resort & Beach Club offers the perfect blend of modern luxury and tropical beauty. Situated just across from the Central Festival Department Store, guests can enjoy both serene beachfront relaxation and vibrant cultural experiences.
This intimate resort, surrounded by lush foliage, provides a peaceful escape from the bustle of city life. Malibu features elegantly furnished rooms with classic interiors, each with a private balcony or terrace to soak in the natural beauty of the surroundings.
Choose from a variety of accommodations including Superior Cottage, Superior Terrace, Deluxe Terrace, Log Home, and Beachfront Cottage. With a total of 32 units, connecting rooms are also available for families or groups. Whether you're seeking privacy or a family getaway, Malibu Resort is the perfect place to unwind and enjoy Koh Samui's charm."

description:
Main focus at the moment on 1month + rentals
Nestled on a scenic hillside with stunning views of the Gulf of Thailand, this luxurious beachfront resort offers the perfect tropical retreat. Located at Laem Set Beach, ShaSa Resort and Residences provides a range of premium accommodations, including private beachfront villas and spacious sea-view suites, each designed to offer relaxation and comfort.
The resort features cascading pools, beautifully landscaped gardens, and expansive balconies, making it an ideal getaway for families, couples, and friends. Enjoy exceptional service, a large swimming pool, and a variety of activities, ensuring your stay is both relaxing and memorable. Whether you're soaking in the panoramic sea views or dining in a tranquil atmosphere, ShaSa Resort and Residences offers the perfect blend of luxury and nature."

tags: Sports & Fitness, Gym & Fitness, Air Gym, Pole Dance
description:
Family Fitness for Everyone
AirGym is Bophut’s premier fitness center, offering a welcoming, family-friendly environment for all ages and fitness levels. Whether you're into full-body workouts, group fitness, or fun activities for the kids, AirGym has something for everyone.
Train Smart, Move Strong
With expert trainers, personalized programs, and state-of-the-art equipment, our gym supports your journey—whether it's HIIT, yoga, pilates, cardio, or strength training. We make fitness accessible, motivating, and fun for the whole family.
Wellness in the Heart of Bophut
Located conveniently in Bophut, AirGym Family is your one-stop destination for health, energy, and balance—for both adults and children alike."

name: AirGym Family & Children
tags: Children's Needs, Child Activities, Children Sports
description:
Active Fun for Kids in Bophut
AirGym Family & Children in Bophut is the ultimate indoor play space, designed for kids to move, explore, and thrive. With a focus on strength, balance, and coordination, it’s a safe, energetic haven for children to stay active while having a blast.
Bounce, Climb, and Soar
From trampoline zones to aerial swings and climbing features, every activity is crafted to inspire movement and joy. It’s more than just play—it’s a fun and healthy way to build confidence and motor skills in a supportive environment.
Air-Filled Adventures Await
Perfect for kids of all ages, AirGym Family offers a vibrant, air-filled experience where fun and fitness go hand in hand."

name: Thai Fight Hotel
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Pool Villas, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Spa Retreat, Muay Thai / Fitness, Restaurant, Bar, Wifi Access In Room, Private Room, Private Bathroom, Rooms With Balcony, Sun Loungers Or Beach Chairs, Sun Umbrellas, Wellness, 4* Accommodation
description:
A Muay Thai Legend by the Sea
Thai Fight Hotel brings the spirit of Muay Thai to life, perfectly embodying its concept as a ""Muay Thai Legend Destination by the Sea."" Immerse yourself in the heart of Thai culture, with a theme that celebrates Muay Thai, one of Thailand’s most treasured traditions, and an atmosphere that blends natural elegance with exciting, authentic experiences.
Inspiration from Muay Thai
At Thai Fight Hotel, you'll be inspired by the legacy of Muay Thai, a martial art that represents the strength, discipline, and rich history of Thailand. The hotel’s design reflects this vibrant spirit, combining natural elements with elegance, ensuring that every corner evokes the energy of this ancient sport.
Relaxation and Local Delights
Savor delicious local dishes that capture the essence of Thai cuisine, while relaxing in a serene environment. Indulge in an herbal bath, a perfect way to unwind after a day of adventure. The hotel offers a unique blend of rejuvenation and excitement, with a Muay Thai gym on-site where you can experience the intensity and focus of this powerful art."

name: Savana Bar Restaurant
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Bars & Entertainment, Thai Food, Fast Food
description:
Savana Bar Restaurant, Chaweng: Enjoy Great Food, Drinks, and Fun
Located in the vibrant heart of Chaweng, Savana Bar Restaurant is the perfect spot to relax, enjoy delicious food, or unwind with a drink. Whether you're craving authentic Thai dishes, juicy burgers, tasty pizzas, or a refreshing cocktail, we have something to satisfy every appetite.
At Savana, everyone is welcome. Whether you're here for a full meal or just a drink, the key is to enjoy yourself in a friendly, welcoming atmosphere. Dining with friends, family, or enjoying a night out, we guarantee you'll have a great time!
Why Visit Savana Bar Restaurant?
Wide Menu Selection
: Enjoy flavorful Thai dishes, Western favorites, burgers, pizzas, and more.
Relaxed Atmosphere
: A laid-back setting perfect for casual meals, drinks, and socializing.
Family and Group-Friendly
: Plenty of space for families or groups looking for a fun time.
Enjoy Drinks or a Meal
: Not hungry? No problem—grab a cold drink and soak in the lively Chaweng vibe."

name: Thai Fight Physports
tags: Sports & Fitness, Gym & Fitness, Personal Trainer, Muay Thai
description:
THAI FIGHT PHYSPORTS – Energize Your Mind, Body, and Spirit
Discover the ultimate fusion of tradition and modern fitness at THAI FIGHT PHYSPORTS, where the powerful art of Muay Thai meets cutting-edge exercise. Located in one of Thailand’s most dazzling gyms, this is the place to challenge yourself, build strength, and enhance your well-being.
Unleash Your Power with Muay Thai
Muay Thai is not just a martial art; it’s a full-body workout that pushes your limits, builds endurance, and boosts mental focus. Whether you’re a beginner or experienced, our specially designed program allows you to train like a fighter, transforming your fitness journey while learning one of the world’s most powerful combat sports.
FREE BEGINNER MUAY THAI CLASS
Join us for our FREE Beginner Muay Thai Class from 16:00 - 17:00 hrs, where you can learn the basics and experience the power of this ancient martial art in a welcoming environment.
Mind-Body Connection
At THAI FIGHT PHYSPORTS, we believe in training that strengthens not just the body, but the mind and spirit. Our unique program helps you build confidence, discipline, and inner peace—all while getting fit.
Come join the revolution and transform your fitness with Muay Thai at THAI FIGHT PHYSPORTS."

name: Niramai Spa @ Thai Fight Hotel
tags: Beauty & Wellness, Massage, Spa & Beauty, Body Scrub, Sports Massage, Thai Massage, Foot Massage, Coconut Oil Massage, Speciality Massages, Indoor Swimming Pool
description:
The Tranquil Sanctuary in Koh Samui
Discover a unique and serene retreat at Niramai, a one-of-a-kind massage experience that blends the ancient techniques of Thai martial arts with modern sports science. Located in the heart of Koh Samui, Niramai offers an exclusive, holistic treatment designed to rejuvenate your mind, body, and soul.
A Unique Fusion of Thai Martial Arts & Sports Science
Unlike any other, Niramai’s signature massage combines the precision of Thai martial arts with the therapeutic benefits of sports science. This innovative fusion targets deep relaxation while promoting physical well-being, ensuring you leave feeling completely revitalized.
Ultimate Relaxation for Mind, Body, and Soul
Whether you're seeking to relieve stress, recover from physical strain, or simply unwind, Niramai provides the perfect sanctuary. Our treatments are tailored to enhance flexibility, improve circulation, and restore balance, offering a holistic approach to total relaxation.
An Exclusive Experience in Paradise
Nestled in a peaceful environment, Niramai offers an escape from the hustle and bustle, making it the ideal destination for those looking to experience true tranquility. Let the blend of ancient and modern healing practices transform your time in Koh Samui into an unforgettable wellness journey."

name: Padel Paradise
tags: Sports & Fitness, Ball Sports, Personal Trainer
description:
Padel courts in the center of Lamai
Ideally located in Koh Samui, right in the center of Lamai,
Padel Paradise
offers you two padel courts, a friendly Club House and several spaces where you can relax.
Covered, our courts allow you to play whatever the conditions, sheltered from the sun or the rain.
To ensure your satisfaction, the Club team welcomes you over a wide range of hours: from 7:00 a.m. in the morning to 11:00 p.m. in the evening.
Padel Paradise
is open to all! You can play whatever your age or level. If you’re a beginner, you can learn the fun sport of Padel in the best possible conditions. If you’re an experienced player, you’ll be able to find
accomplished
partners.
Padel Paradise
is also a social environment where you can meet new people in a friendly, sporting spirit. Whether you’re a beginner or looking to perfect your technique, you’ll be able to talk to club members and benefit from personalized advice to improve your game.
You can also take advantage of the services of a coach, in private or group lessons, and take part in tournaments organized by the Club."

name: Outrigger Beach Resort
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Bar, Wifi Access In Room, Gym, Private Room, Air Conditioning, Private Bathroom, Rooms With Seaview, Airport Shuttle, Rooms With Balcony, Family Rooms, Sun Loungers Or Beach Chairs, Sun Umbrellas, Wellness, 5* Accommodation
description:
Experience celebrity treatment with world-class service at Outrigger Koh Samui Beach Resort - SHA Extra Plus. Located on the serene shores of Lamai Beach, this beautifully appointed colonial-style resort offers the perfect blend of local culture and Outrigger hospitality.
The resort features 146 spacious rooms and suites, ideal for both families and couples. Choose from rooms with private balconies, French-style balconies, or private garden terraces, offering views of the courtyard pool, lush gardens, or the surrounding neighborhood. For a more luxurious experience, guests can enjoy exclusive access to our Voyager 47 Club, which includes daily non-alcoholic beverages, afternoon tea, cocktails, and snacks.
Our Edgewater Beach Club is a favorite spot, featuring four swimming pools, a children’s water slide, a restaurant, bar, and three massage salas by the beach. Families can enjoy poolside dining, while couples can indulge in our signature romantic dining packages by the sea.
Each morning, guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast at Mala Kitchen, conveniently located in front of the resort’s swimming pool. The resort also offers a range of family-friendly facilities, including a games room, Coral Kids Club, indoor laser tag, a souvenir shop, fitness center, activity program, and non-motorized water sports."

Whether you’re strategizing with your team or aiming for the high score, this dynamic activity is fun for all ages. With state-of-the-art equipment and immersive environments, Koh Samui Laser Tag promises an adrenaline-pumping adventure for thrill-seekers."

activities.

Inspire each other, collaborate, and live a joyful life together."

name: Samui Float Centre
tags: Beauty & Wellness, Spa & Beauty
description:
Zero Gravity Zero Stress
At our Floatation center on Koh Samui; state-of-the-art floatation tanks and the comfortable feeling they provide enable you to truly unplug and disconnect; blocking out all visual, audio, and tactile distractions.
Floating, also known as floatation therapy or Sensory deprivation therapy, is a form of relaxation technique that involves floating in a tank or pod filled with water,  heated to skin temperature and with a high concentration of Epsom salt which makes the body float effortlessly.
This allows the individual to experience a sense of weightlessness and complete relaxation, as there is no pressure on the joints or muscles. The soundproof and lightproof environment also eliminates external stimuli, allowing the individual to focus on their inner thoughts and sensations and provides a unique environment that can help promote relaxation, reduce stress, and enhance physical and mental wellbeing.
Float therapy has gained popularity in recent years as a holistic approach to wellness, with many people reporting benefits such as reduced stress, improved sleep quality, enhanced creativity, and relief from physical pain. While float therapy may not be for everyone, it is a unique experience that can help individuals disconnect from the stress and distractions of everyday life and promote relaxation and overall wellbeing."
