name: The Palms Bar & Grill
tags: Bars & Nightlife, Bars & Pubs, Live Music, Dj Music, Snack Menu, Pool Table, Sports Bar, Rock Music
description:
Located in the heart of Lamai, this bar and grill is your go-to spot for delicious food, refreshing drinks, and live music. Whether you're seeking a relaxed meal or a lively night out, The Palms Bar and Grill offers a vibrant atmosphere for every occasion.
Enjoy a variety of mouthwatering dishes, including steaks, burgers, fresh seafood, and vegetarian options, all paired with a great selection of cocktails, beers, and wines. Whether you're craving comfort food or something new, there's something for everyone.
The Palms keeps the energy high every evening with live music, ranging from classic rock to acoustic sets. Our talented musicians ensure a fun and dynamic experience, making it the perfect place to unwind or dance the night away.
With a laid-back tropical vibe, this spot is ideal for groups, couples, or solo visitors. Located in the heart of Lamai, The Palms Bar and Grill is the perfect place to enjoy a great meal, vibrant entertainment, and a welcoming environment."

name: The Cliff Bar & Grill
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Beachfront, Seafood, Vegetarian, International Food, Aussie Food, Cocktails, Wifi Access In Restaurant, Fine Dining
description:
Located in Lamai, this restaurant offers a culinary journey inspired by the best flavors of Portugal, Spain, and Italy. Since 2004, it has set the standard for excellence in Koh Samui’s dining scene, combining premium Australian meats, locally-sourced seafood, and organic vegetables grown in its own garden. Every dish reflects the commitment to quality that has made The Cliff a beloved spot for locals and visitors alike.
Led by Chef Sergio Martelli from Italy, the restaurant brings a sophisticated twist to authentic Italian cuisine. Using fresh, hand-picked herbs and daily-caught seafood, every meal showcases the finest ingredients, ensuring a memorable experience for all guests.
With stunning ocean views and impeccable service, The Cliff is the ideal place for a romantic evening or a family celebration, making it a must-visit destination for anyone seeking exceptional dining in Koh Samui."

name: Piri Piri Flaming Grill
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Barbecue, International Food, Delivery, Wifi Access In Restaurant
description:
Located in Lamai, this grill offers a unique dining experience centered around flame-grilled Peri Peri chicken and other mouthwatering dishes. Our signature chicken, marinated in a special blend of spices and grilled over an open flame, provides a perfect balance of crispy skin and tender meat. You can choose your preferred spice level, ranging from mild to extra hot, for a personalized kick!
Beyond chicken, the menu features a variety of grilled meats such as steaks, burgers, and ribs, all cooked to perfection. Complement your meal with sides like crispy fries, seasonal salads, and hearty rice dishes, creating a complete and satisfying dining experience.
With a casual, family-friendly atmosphere, this is the perfect spot for a relaxed meal with friends or loved ones. Indulge in the sizzling hot flavors of our signature peri peri sauce, made from African Bird’s Eye Chilli, and enjoy a truly unique meal."

name: Ice Bar
tags: Bars & Nightlife, Bars & Pubs, Ice Bar
description:
Located in the heart of Chaweng, Ice Bar Koh Samui is the island's first and only ice-themed bar, offering a truly unique experience. Step into a frosty wonderland where everything—from the walls and bar to the seats and cocktail glasses—is made of real ice. At temperatures as low as -10°C (14°F), Ice Bar provides the perfect escape from the tropical heat of Koh Samui.
Inside, you'll find stunning ice sculptures, furniture, and frozen art that create a mesmerizing atmosphere. Chill out with creative cocktails or enjoy an ice-cold beer served in frosted glasses, adding to the refreshing experience. Whether you're seeking a cool refuge from the heat or looking to enjoy a fun, unforgettable night out, Ice Bar offers something truly special.
Come for the cool vibes, stay for the unforgettable experience at Ice Bar Koh Samui—your ultimate frosty escape in the heart of Chaweng."

name: Mr.Kai’s Kitchen
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Thai Food
description:
The heart of authentic Thai cuisine in Koh Samui. Whether you're a local or visiting the island, our cozy restaurant is the perfect place to enjoy a true taste of Thailand. We serve a wide range of traditional dishes made with love, using fresh, organic ingredients sourced from local markets.
Why Mr. Kai’s Kitchen?
Authentic Thai Flavors
: Our menu is a celebration of Thailand’s culinary heritage, featuring favorites like Pad Thai, Green Curry, Tom Yum, and more, all prepared with traditional techniques and bold, fresh flavors.
Fresh & Local Ingredients
: We believe in using only the best locally-sourced ingredients to create dishes that are not only delicious but nourishing.
Warm, Inviting Atmosphere
: Whether you’re dining with family, friends, or a loved one, our relaxed, welcoming atmosphere makes for the perfect dining experience.
Join us at Mr. Kai’s Kitchen for an unforgettable meal that brings the vibrant flavors of Thailand to life!"

name: Pizzeria Sorte
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Italian Food
description:
Authentic Neapolitan Pizzeria in Koh Samui – Taste Italy with Every Slice
Welcome to
Sorte Pizzeria
, Koh Samui’s ultimate destination for authentic Neapolitan pizza! Located in the heart of the island, we bring the true flavors of Italy right to your table. Our commitment to quality means we use only the finest ingredients imported directly from Italy, so you can enjoy a real Italian pizza experience like no other.
From our hand-tossed dough to the creamy mozzarella, rich olive oil, and traditional recipes passed down through generations in Naples, every pizza is made with passion and care. Whether you're here for a casual meal with friends, a cozy family dinner, or a special evening with loved ones, our warm, inviting atmosphere makes us the perfect spot for any occasion.
Craving a slice of Italy? Come to
Sorte Pizzeria
and enjoy the best Neapolitan pizza on Koh Samui, crafted with love and the finest ingredients. Book your table today and discover what true pizza perfection tastes like!"

Located in the heart of Fisherman's Village, Beach Coconuts Bowls offers a unique dining experience where health and flavor come together. Focused on organic, fresh ingredients, this cafe serves meals free from artificial preservatives, additives, and refined sugars, ensuring you enjoy pure, unprocessed goodness in every bite.
Whether you're here for a nutritious breakfast or a refreshing brunch, Beach Coconuts Bowls is dedicated to delivering dishes made with love and care. From wholesome vegetarian options to delicious Mexican-inspired meals, each dish is crafted to nourish your body and satisfy your taste buds.
With its relaxing atmosphere and focus on health, Beach Coconuts Bowls is the perfect spot to enjoy a meal that aligns with your lifestyle and wellness goals."

description:
An Oasis of Wellness on a Fascinating Island
Meliá Koh Samui seamlessly blends the natural beauty of southern Thailand’s coastline with the luxury of a premium hotel. Situated on the tranquil Choeng Mon Beach, this resort offers an escape into a world of serenity, featuring top-tier facilities, exceptional service, and easy access to the island's main attractions.
A Perfectly Positioned Paradise
Located just 5km from Samui International Airport, Meliá Koh Samui boasts elegant, designer suites surrounded by lush, vibrant vegetation. This tropical haven offers a relaxing retreat, where guests can enjoy breathtaking views and a peaceful atmosphere, all within reach of the island's vibrant attractions.
Dining and Events at Your Doorstep
Indulge in a diverse range of international dishes at Koko Kitchen or savor Mediterranean flavors at Breeza. Whether you're here for a casual meal or a fine dining experience, the resort offers exquisite dining options. The stunning location also makes Meliá the perfect venue for events, from corporate meetings to glamorous gala dinners."

name: The Breeza Beach Restaurant
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Beachfront, Airconditioned Area, Mediterranean Food, Breakfast
description:
Versatility by the Sea
Indulge in a captivating à la carte menu at Meliá Koh Samui, where superior local ingredients meet a fusion of international and oriental flavors. Each dish is crafted with passion and served on artisan tableware, handmade by local artisans, offering a unique culinary experience with every bite.
A Beachfront Dining Experience
Marvel at the shimmering ocean views while enjoying the gentle sea breeze, all while savoring expertly prepared dishes from our talented chefs. Whether you’re here for a casual meal or a special occasion, the atmosphere at our beach restaurant is designed to provide a memorable dining experience.
Casual Elegance with Exclusive Offerings
The restaurant offers a laid-back vibe with a casual dress code, making it perfect for all kinds of guests. In addition to a wide range of delectable dishes, enjoy an exclusive selection of beverages from our well-curated winery, elevating your dining experience to new heights."

name: Koko Kitchen

Indulge in a wide variety of international and Thai dishes, all served in a beautiful garden view setting. Start your day with a delicious breakfast and enjoy the interactive experience of watching chefs at work, whether at the show-cooking stations indoors or in the fresh outdoor areas.
Inclusive and Family-Friendly Dining
This restaurant is thoughtfully designed for all guests, including those with reduced mobility, and accommodates allergies and intolerances. A dedicated children’s area ensures that families can enjoy a relaxing meal together, making it a great choice for all ages.
An Indoor and Outdoor Dining Experience
With both indoor and outdoor seating options, the restaurant provides a remarkable setting for any meal. Whether you’re inside or outside, every dish is prepared with care to create a memorable and accessible dining experience for all."

Whether you're indulging in fresh seafood, savory Thai food, or Mediterranean specialties, each dish is crafted to perfection. Pair your meal with one of their signature tropical cocktails or a fine wine selection to enhance your dining experience.
With both air-conditioned and outdoor dining options, Miss Olive Oyl offers the ideal setting for any meal, bringing people together in a beautiful and elegant environment."

description:

The menu features an array of freshly baked pastries, from buttery croissants to indulgent cakes, all paired beautifully with signature beverages. For a light snack or a quick bite, enjoy made-to-order sandwiches crafted from the freshest ingredients.
No visit is complete without a cup of perfectly brewed coffee. Bean / Co serves rich, aromatic coffee made to satisfy every coffee lover, while tea enthusiasts can choose from a curated selection of premium blends, offering both classic and refreshing options. Whether you're enjoying a frothy cappuccino, a bold espresso, or a calming pot of tea, each sip is a moment of indulgence.
With its air-conditioned area and outdoor seating, Bean / Co offers both comfort and gourmet flavors in a tranquil setting, making it an ideal stop for a casual meal, afternoon tea, or coffee break."

name: Virtual Kitchens @ Miss Olive Oyl
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Thai Food, Airconditioned Area, Outdoor Dining, International Food, Mediterranean Food, Breakfast, Wifi Access In Restaurant
description:
Miss Olive Oyl – A Culinary Adventure at SAii Koh Samui
One of the standout dining destinations at SAii Koh Samui, Miss Olive Oyl offers a sophisticated yet relaxed dining experience. With its spacious and welcoming atmosphere, this beloved eatery has elevated its culinary offerings by introducing a unique concept: Virtual Kitchens. Now, guests can enjoy a diverse selection of Thai and Chinese dishes, alongside the restaurant’s signature Mediterranean fare, all without leaving their seat.
In collaboration with Mr. Tomyam and Jiaowo, Miss Olive Oyl brings a world of flavors to the heart of Koh Samui. The Virtual Kitchens concept allows diners to indulge in a variety of international cuisines, from local Thai specialties to regional Chinese favorites, all within the same venue. This innovative approach enriches the Mediterranean menu, creating an exciting fusion of tastes and making Miss Olive Oyl the perfect place to explore multiple culinary worlds in one meal."

description:
Holistic Wellness
Welcome to Moringa Spa, your exclusive sanctuary of tranquility and rejuvenation. Dedicated to providing a guilt-free indulgence, we prioritize natural, clean, and eco-conscious luxury. Every treatment is thoughtfully crafted with the finest ingredients, centered around the powerful benefits of Moringa Oleifera, to offer a holistic experience that nourishes both body and soul.
Natural, Vegan, & Cruelty-Free
Our treatments are designed with wellness in mind, using 100% natural, vegan, and cruelty-free products. We ensure that every product we use not only delivers effective results but also aligns with our commitment to ethical beauty and animal welfare.
Eco-Conscious Indulgence
In addition to our dedication to wellness, Moringa Spa operates with sustainability at its core. We incorporate eco-friendly materials, minimize waste, and prioritize recyclable packaging, ensuring your indulgence is as kind to the planet as it is to you."

name: Yoga Studio @ Cielo
tags: Sports & Fitness, Yoga, Pilates, Combat Sports
description:
Tailored Yoga Experience
At Cielo Samui, we provide professional yoga classes designed to suit all levels, from beginners to advanced practitioners. Our expert instructors guide you through various yoga styles that focus on promoting balance, flexibility, strength, and mindfulness, helping you achieve your personal goals in a peaceful and supportive environment.
Core Strength & Flexibility with Pilates
For those looking to enhance their yoga practice or focus on core strength, we offer Pilates classes. This method is perfect for improving posture, flexibility, and overall body alignment, promoting stability and strength for a well-rounded fitness routine.
Dynamic Muay Thai Workouts
If you're seeking a more intense workout, our Muay Thai classes provide the perfect challenge. Known as the ""Art of Eight Limbs,"" this traditional Thai martial art uses punches, kicks, elbows, and knees for a full-body workout that improves strength, endurance, agility, and mental focus."

name: Pizza MakMak
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Italian Food, Wifi Access In Restaurant
description:
Charming Location & Atmosphere
Located in the vibrant heart of Lamai, Koh Samui, this inviting pizzeria offers a relaxed, welcoming atmosphere perfect for any occasion. With a cozy interior and an outdoor seating area, guests can enjoy their meal while soaking in the lively surroundings. The ambiance creates a laid-back yet upbeat vibe, ideal for a family gathering or a casual date night.
Authentic Wood-Fired Pizzas
At the core of the menu are our wood-fired pizzas, each baked to perfection with a crispy crust and fresh toppings. The traditional wood oven enhances the flavor, giving each pizza a smoky aroma that elevates the entire dining experience.
Variety & Customization
We offer a wide range of pizzas, from classic favorites like Margherita and Pepperoni to inventive, signature creations. For those with dietary preferences, we provide gluten-free and vegetarian options, ensuring there's something for everyone.
Commitment to Customer Satisfaction
Pizza MakMak is dedicated to providing an unforgettable experience with high-quality, locally-sourced ingredients and exceptional customer service. Our goal is to create a memorable meal each time you visit, with every pizza crafted to your satisfaction."

name: The Waterfront Boutique Hotel
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Bungalows, Beachfront, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Bar
description:
Discover a serene escape at
The Waterfront Boutique Hotel
, situated right by the beach in the charming Fisherman’s Village, our hotel offers a tranquil atmosphere with breathtaking views of the turquoise sea and surrounding islands.
With just 18 thoughtfully designed rooms, our boutique hotel provides an intimate and peaceful setting, perfect for those looking to relax and unwind in style. Each room is meticulously maintained to ensure comfort and elegance, offering you a home-away-from-home experience with a touch of luxury.
At
The Waterfront
, enjoy direct access to the beach, where you can bask in the sun, take leisurely walks along the shoreline, or indulge in various water activities. In addition to our idyllic location, the hotel’s
Café
serves a range of delicious dishes, crafted with fresh local ingredients, offering you the perfect dining experience."

name: Samui Diving Resort
tags: Things To Do, Diving, Koh Tao, Padi Course
description:
Welcome to Samui Diving Resort, nestled in a tropical paradise where adventure meets relaxation. Whether you're an experienced diver, a nature enthusiast, or simply seeking peace, our resort offers the perfect blend of comfort, security, and stunning surroundings.
Located on a private 1600 m² plot, our resort features three traditional Thai-style villas, providing a peaceful, secure environment surrounded by walls and a main gate for privacy.The Big Villa is perfect for families or groups, with 3 bedrooms, a cozy living room, and a fully equipped kitchen. The Smaller Villa, ideal for couples or smaller groups, offers 2 bedrooms, a living room, and kitchen for an intimate stay.
Dive into Koh Samui's crystal-clear waters to encounter whale sharks and explore vibrant coral reefs. With decades of experience, we offer diving training for all levels, from beginners to professionals, plus a range of specialty courses."

tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Bar, Wifi Access In Room, Gym, Private Room, Air Conditioning, Private Bathroom, Wheelchair Accessible, Rooms With Seaview, Laundry Service, Airport Shuttle, Rooms With Balcony, Family Rooms, Sun Loungers Or Beach Chairs, Sun Umbrellas, Wellness, 24 Hours Front Desk
description:
Your Personalized Getaway
At OZO Chaweng Samui, we know that the perfect getaway is about finding your rhythm. Whether you're unwinding by the pool, exploring the bustling streets of Chaweng Beach, or recharging in a relaxed atmosphere, our hotel provides a welcoming space to help you relax and refresh.
Relax and Recharge

Explore the Best of Samui
Located in the vibrant heart of Chaweng, OZO Chaweng lets you dive into the local culture, indulge in exciting water sports, and enjoy the island's buzzing nightlife. Our ideal location ensures you're close to everything while still enjoying the comfort of a laid-back atmosphere."

name: Stacked Burger by OZO
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Meat Lovers, Airconditioned Area, Barbecue, American Food, International Food, Cocktails, Wifi Access In Restaurant
description:
Relaxed Beachfront Vibes
Located just steps away from Chaweng Beach, this spot offers a relaxed and inviting atmosphere where you can unwind and enjoy delicious food while soaking in the scenic coastal views. The laid-back ambiance, combined with an easygoing beach vibe, makes it the perfect place to spend a leisurely day with friends or family.
Gourmet Burgers and Comfort Food
The menu features mouthwatering gourmet burgers made with U.S. grass-fed beef, fresh homemade buns, and a variety of delicious toppings. In addition to the burgers, a selection of comfort food classics such as loaded fries, wings, and decadent desserts will satisfy any craving. Each dish is crafted to provide a delicious, satisfying experience.
Exceptional Customer Experience
Every visit is designed to be memorable, with attentive service and a welcoming atmosphere. Whether you're here for a quick bite or a relaxed meal by the beach, the focus is on ensuring every guest enjoys a fantastic dining experience."

description:
Beachfront Bliss at Chaweng Beach
Nestled right on the sands of Chaweng Beach, this beach bar offers the perfect escape where you can relax with your toes in the sand and enjoy the refreshing ocean breeze. It’s the ideal spot to unwind with a drink in hand, whether you’re sipping on expertly crafted cocktails, chilled beers, or a variety of refreshing drinks.
Stunning Ocean Views & Signature Cocktails
Take in breathtaking ocean views while enjoying a wide selection of signature cocktails and chilled beverages that suit every taste. Whether you're lounging during the day or enjoying evening cocktails, the atmosphere is perfect for relaxation.
Perfect for Sunsets & Socializing
Ozo Beach Bar provides an exceptional location to watch the sunset over the Gulf of Thailand. It’s a great place to enjoy beachside snacks, socialize with friends, or simply soak in the relaxed vibes of the beach."

Whether you're in the mood for something light and healthy or a hearty breakfast spread, Ozo Eat has everything you need to fuel up for a day of adventure, relaxation, or exploration.
What’s offered:
A variety of breakfast options catering to all tastes, from traditional to international dishes
Freshly prepared dishes and live cooking stations for a personalized touch
A relaxed atmosphere with both indoor and outdoor seating, perfect for a leisurely breakfast
Healthy choices and local flavors, alongside classic breakfast favorites
Ozo Eat offers the perfect way to begin your day, whether you're here for a quick bite or a leisurely meal with friends and family."

Refreshing Drinks and Homemade Pizza

Chill, Enjoy, and Socialize

Perfect for Any Occasion

description:
Your Go-To Spot for Food, Drinks & Good Vibes in Koh Samui
Discover the perfect mix of flavor and fun. Whether you're out for a laid-back dinner, enjoying drinks with friends, or catching live music, YOYO delivers an unforgettable experience.
Our menu brings together international favorites and local Thai classics, all made with fresh, quality ingredients. From tasty starters to satisfying mains, there’s something for every appetite. Don’t forget to pair your meal with a signature cocktail, cold beer, or a glass from our curated wine list.
Located in a vibrant corner of Koh Samui, YOYO is perfect for casual nights out, birthday celebrations, or just soaking in the island atmosphere. With friendly service and a lively vibe."

Whether you're looking for a post-workout boost or simply want to enjoy a light and refreshing meal,
The BAR Bowls

name: Tamarind Springs Forest Spa
tags: Beauty & Wellness, Massage, Spa & Beauty, Steam Room, Body Scrub, Facial, Health Food
description:
Nestled amidst lush hillsides and surrounded by breathtaking granite rock formations,
Tamarind Springs Forest Spa
offers a unique and serene escape into nature. Since opening in 1998 as
Koh Samui's first dedicated day spa
, it has earned international recognition as one of Asia’s most outstanding and distinctive destination day spas.
Immerse Yourself in Nature’s Healing Power
At
Tamarind Springs
, every moment is designed to rejuvenate your body, mind, and spirit. Drift between the
steam caves
and
plunge pools
, surrounded by the tranquility of the forest, as the soothing sounds of nature help you fully unwind and let go of stress. Our
experienced therapists
use holistic treatments that focus on restoring balance to your physical, mental, and emotional well-being."

name: Tamarind Springs Home Stay
tags: Accommodation, Bungalows, Breakfast, Spa Retreat, Restaurant
description:
Simple Luxury in Nature
Discover the perfect balance of
privacy, serenity
, and
luxury
at
Tamarind Springs Home Stay
. Ideal for independent travelers, our unique homes offer a peaceful retreat surrounded by lush gardens and the natural beauty of Koh Samui. Just a short distance from the world-renowned
Tamarind Springs Forest Spa
, our homes provide easy access to the spa's relaxing and rejuvenating facilities.
Experience Nature with Comfort and Privacy
Each of our
luxury houses
is thoughtfully designed to blend seamlessly with the landscape, ensuring complete privacy while offering an immersive connection to nature. With open-plan architecture,
wooden roof structures
, high ceilings, and expansive terraces, our homes create a spacious and airy atmosphere. Semi-open bathrooms, open-air showers, and large wooden decks enhance the experience of living within nature, bringing the outside in and allowing you to unwind in a peaceful, eco-friendly environment."

A Recipe for Happiness in the Heart of Nature
At

Tamarind Springs
, our open-air café invites you to dine in tranquility, surrounded by lush greenery and the calming atmosphere of Koh Samui's tropical forest.
Authentic Southern Thai Flavors & Thai Fusion Delights
Indulge in the tastes of
authentic Southern Thai cuisine
, lovingly crafted using fresh, organic ingredients. Our menu also features unique
Thai Fusion dishes
, carefully designed to offer a modern twist on traditional favorites. With a focus on
organic produce
and – when available –

Forest Whisper Café

tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Bar, Wifi Access In Room, Private Room, Air Conditioning, Private Bathroom, Rooms With Seaview, Rooms With Balcony, Family Rooms, Sun Loungers Or Beach Chairs, Sun Umbrellas, Fan Room

name: InterContinental Resort
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Pool Villas, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Spa Retreat, Restaurant, Bar, Room With Private Pool, Wifi Access In Room, Gym, Private Room, Air Conditioning, Private Bathroom, Parking, Rooms With Seaview, Laundry Service, Airport Shuttle, Rooms With Balcony, Family Rooms, Sun Loungers Or Beach Chairs, Sun Umbrellas, Wellness, 24 Hours Front Desk, Concierge Services, 5* Accommodation
description:
Experience World-Class Service at InterContinental Koh Samui Resort, an IHG Hotel
Set on the serene west coast of Taling Ngam, InterContinental Koh Samui Resort offers a beachfront retreat surrounded by 22 acres of coconut groves. This luxurious resort features six swimming pools, a cliff-top Thai spa, and free WiFi, all just steps from the white sands of western Koh Samui.
All air-conditioned rooms and villas showcase Thai architecture and include flat-screen TVs, DVD players, and day beds. Some villas have private pools, and en suite bathrooms offer both bathtubs and showers.
Located 45 minutes from Samui International Airport, the resort is 3.1 km from Lamai Beach, 10.3 km from Bophut Beach, and 24 km from Chaweng Beach. Speedboat transfers to Angthong Marine National Park and Koh Phangan are available, along with free water sports equipment.
Dining options include Amber and Flames for Thai and international dishes, Air Bar for drinks, and Serene Lounge for afternoon tea and imported coffees."

name: Baan Thai Spa By Harn
tags: Beauty & Wellness, Massage, Spa & Beauty, Steam Room, Body Scrub, Facial, Thai Massage, Foot Massage, Coconut Oil Massage
description:
Baan Thai Spa by HARNN offers an elevated wellness experience, blending ancient Thai healing traditions with modern relaxation techniques.
Nestled high above the coconut trees in Taling Ngam, the spa provides breathtaking views and a peaceful atmosphere, perfect for those seeking rejuvenation for the mind, body, and soul. The spa offers a variety of signature treatments, including traditional Thai massages and indulgent spa rituals. Each therapy is personalized, using only the finest organic products, ensuring a truly luxurious and revitalizing experience.
Escape to Baan Thai Spa by HARNN for tranquility and complete relaxation."

name: Air Bar @ Intercontinental
tags: Food & Beverage, Rooftop Venues, Thai Food, Viewpoint, Tapas, International Food, Wine Bar, Wifi Access In Restaurant
description:
One of Koh Samui’s most stunning sunset spots, Air Bar offers an unrivaled location to witness the island’s breathtaking sundown views. As the sky transforms into a canvas of vibrant colors, enjoy a creative cocktail or refresh yourself with a wide selection of premium gins and fine wines, perfect for sipping as the sun sets.
A Culinary Experience to Match the View
Complement your evening with our unique selection of regional snacks, featuring the freshest local ingredients to prepare your taste buds for dinner. For those seeking something more, our menu also includes a range of world-famous dishes, expertly prepared to satisfy every craving. Whether you're in the mood for Thai delicacies or international favorites, our offerings are designed to enhance your sunset experience."

name: Amber Restaurant
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Thai Food, Airconditioned Area, Outdoor Dining, Indian Food, Vegan, International Food, Wifi Access In Restaurant
description:
Indulge in a one-of-a-kind dining experience where Thai cuisine meets innovation. With a breathtaking ocean-view setting, Amber offers more than just a meal – it’s a journey through flavors, textures, and beautifully presented dishes inspired by the very best of Thai culinary traditions, all with a contemporary twist by our MasterChef.
Savor authentic Thai dishes that perfectly balance the spicy, salty, and sweet elements that define Thai cuisine. Our menu features masterfully remixed versions of traditional favorites, using only the finest local produce to create bold, yet refined flavors.
Themed Buffets & A Special Kids' Menu
Amber offers themed buffets that take you on a culinary adventure, inspired by the rich diversity of the oriental world. These buffets bring together the finest produce and ingredients, offering a chance to taste a wide array of flavors in one sitting.
For families, our specially curated kids' menu introduces young diners to exciting new tastes, ensuring that every member of the family has a memorable dining experience."

name: Flames Beach Restaurant @ Intercontinental
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Beachfront, Thai Food, Wood Oven, Outdoor Dining, Fusion Food, Vegetarian, International Food, Breakfast, Cocktails, Wifi Access In Restaurant
description:
Indulge in lavish seafood and prime meat cuts, all flame-grilled to perfection right from your beachfront table. With stunning panoramic ocean views, dining at Flames is a one-of-a-kind experience, especially when you’re surrounded by the natural beauty of the beach, lantern light, and the warmth of a beach bonfire. Celebrate romantic occasions, birthdays, or simply enjoy a memorable evening with loved ones in this exclusive, magical setting.
Relax under a canopy of stars, while the soft glow of lanterns sets the perfect mood for a truly rustic dining experience. Whether you’re here for a special celebration or just to enjoy a delicious meal, Flames offers an intimate ambiance that makes every moment unforgettable.
Drop by during the day for a more laid-back experience. Enjoy a refreshing beer and burger by the beach, or share a delicious wood-fired pizza with your family after a fun-filled morning of swimming in the infinity pool. Whether you’re craving something casual or indulging in a gourmet meal, Flames offers the perfect balance of relaxed beachside vibes and upscale dining"

name: Intercontinental Weddings & Events
tags: Professional Services, Wedding Planners, Wedding Venues
description:
InterContinental Weddings & Events in Taling Ngam offers the perfect setting for your dream wedding or special event. Situated on the stunning shores of Taling Ngam Bay, this exclusive venue provides a serene and private backdrop for your celebration.
Whether you're planning an intimate wedding for two or a grand event with all your loved ones, the resort offers unique options, including the opportunity to rent out the entire resort for ultimate privacy. The venue also caters to corporate events, offering exclusive meeting spaces designed with modern amenities and panoramic ocean views, making it ideal for business meetings or large-scale conferences.
Every detail is taken care of by the dedicated team, ensuring an exceptional experience for both personal and professional occasions."

tags: Bars & Nightlife, Bars & Pubs, Live Music, Dj Music, Snack Menu, Pool Table, Cocktail Bars, Hotel Bars, Lounge Bars
description:
Elegant Lounge with Panoramic Views
Perched at the highest point of the Hyatt Regency Koh Samui, KUBE Lounge offers a serene, stylish space to unwind and enjoy stunning panoramic views of the entire resort. Located just off the lobby, it’s the perfect setting for any occasion, from quiet moments to social gatherings.
Sophistication & Relaxation
Whether you’re enjoying a light bite, indulging in a Thai-inspired afternoon tea, or sipping on a handcrafted cocktail, KUBE Lounge provides a relaxed atmosphere with a touch of sophistication. Its tranquil surroundings make it ideal for reading, casual meetings, or unwinding with a nightcap as the sun sets.
Unforgettable Moments
With its inviting design and breathtaking views, KUBE Lounge is the perfect place to enjoy peaceful moments or socialize, all while taking in the beauty of Koh Samui."

tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Pool Bars, Outdoor Dining, Family Friendly, International Food, Cocktails, Wifi Access In Restaurant
description:
Relaxing Poolside Oasis
Located next to Yangna at the Hyatt Regency Koh Samui, the Hyatt Cobalt Bar offers stunning views of the Gulf of Thailand. With its serene atmosphere and relaxed poolside setting, it’s the perfect place to unwind while sipping on refreshing beverages.
Refreshing Beverages
From freshly squeezed juices to chilled iced teas and expertly brewed coffee, the bar serves a variety of drinks to keep you refreshed. Whether you're cooling off after a swim or simply enjoying the peaceful surroundings, Cobalt Bar offers something for everyone.
Family-Friendly & Tranquil
The casual setting makes it an ideal spot for guests of all ages, offering a family-friendly experience. Enjoy the beautiful tropical ambiance and tranquil vibes while overlooking the resort’s expansive pool and the serene Gulf of Thailand."

name: Hyatt Regency Club
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Afternoon Tea, Private Dining, Thai Food, Airconditioned Area, Outdoor Dining, Vegan, Vegetarian, International Food, Breakfast, Breakfast Buffet, Wifi Access In Restaurant
description:
Exclusive Luxury for Hotel Guests
Reserved exclusively for Hyatt Regency Koh Samui guests, the Regency Club offers a premium experience with personalized service in a serene, sun-drenched setting. With breathtaking views of the Gulf of Thailand, it’s the ideal space to relax, work, or simply enjoy the beauty of Koh Samui.
Perfect Blend of Relaxation & Productivity
Designed for both leisure and business travelers, the Regency Club provides exclusive benefits for those staying in Regency Club rooms and suites. Enjoy a complimentary breakfast buffet at Yangna Cuisine, light bites, refreshing beverages, and, in the evening, indulge in seasonal hot and cold canapés with complimentary drinks—perfect for unwinding after a busy day.
Unforgettable Experience
Every detail of the Regency Club is designed to enhance your stay, offering an unforgettable escape with both relaxing moments and opportunities for productivity."

name: OZO Cooking Class
tags: Things To Do, Cooking Classes
description:
OZO Chaweng Cooking Class – Discover Authentic Thai Cuisine
Book now for only
1,750.- NET per person
(price can be changed, so always check before booking)!
Join the OZO Chaweng Cooking Class in Koh Samui for a hands-on experience learning to cook iconic Thai dishes like Pad Thai, Green Curry, Tom Yum Soup, and Mango Sticky Rice. Led by expert chefs, the class teaches you how to use fresh, locally sourced ingredients and offers insights into Thai food culture.
What’s included:
Hands-on cooking experience with skilled chefs
Fresh, authentic ingredients
Tasting session of your creations
Insights into Thai food history and culture
Perfect for beginners or seasoned cooks, this class ensures an immersive, educational experience in the heart of Koh Samui. Reserve your spot today for
1,750.- NET per person
(price can be changed, so always check before booking)!"

description:
INTERACTIVE & EDUCATIONAL
Experience the art of Thai cuisine with our interactive cooking classes at The Club by Zazen. Led by our expert chefs, you will learn to prepare traditional dishes using the finest ingredients sourced from local markets.
Enjoy a hands-on experience as you chop, mix, cook, and discover the secrets behind the flavours and aromas of Thai cuisine. Sip on refreshing beverages as you learn, and at the end of the class, savour the fruits of your labour with a delicious meal.
We’re dedicated to delivering what you need and want, allowing you to fully immerse yourself in the educational and interactive experience of Thai cooking."

tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Thai Food, International Food
description:
Chura@Bar in Chaweng offers the perfect blend of delicious food and refreshing drinks, making it the ideal spot for dining and unwinding. Located in the heart of Chaweng, our restaurant and bar provide a vibrant atmosphere with stunning views and a relaxed vibe.
Enjoy a diverse menu featuring mouthwatering dishes, from fresh seafood to international favorites, all crafted with the finest ingredients. Pair your meal with expertly mixed cocktails, cold beers, or fine wines while soaking in the beachside ambiance.
Whether you're here for a casual meal, a sunset drink, or a lively evening out, Chura@Bar delivers an unforgettable dining and drinking experience. Join us for great food, great drinks, and the best island vibes in Chaweng."

name: KAN Restaurant
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, International Food, Breakfast
description:
Savor a delightful blend of local and international cuisine at KAN Restaurant, located in the heart of our lobby. From a hearty breakfast to a relaxing afternoon tea, we offer a variety of dishes to satisfy every craving.
Whether you're starting your day with a delicious breakfast, enjoying a midday meal, or unwinding with an afternoon tea, KAN Restaurant promises a memorable dining experience. Our menu features carefully crafted dishes using the finest ingredients, perfect for any time of day.
Join us at KAN Restaurant, where exceptional flavors and a welcoming atmosphere come together to create the perfect dining experience, from morning until dusk."

name: Banana Fan Sea Cooking class
tags: Things To Do, Cooking Classes
description:
Learn Authentic Thai Cooking in Chaweng
Elevate your Thai cooking skills with an exclusive cooking class at Banana Fan Sea Resort in Chaweng. Led by a professional chef, this hands-on class takes you through every step of creating authentic Thai dishes. Begin by visiting local markets where you'll handpick fresh, exotic ingredients essential for traditional Thai cooking. Learn the traditional method of pressing fresh coconut milk, and discover the secrets to crafting delicious Thai dishes that will impress friends and family.
This cooking class offers an immersive experience that goes beyond just preparing food. Under the guidance of an expert chef, you’ll gain valuable skills and techniques to replicate these dishes at home. The class is not only educational but also fun and family-friendly, making it a perfect activity for all ages. By the end, you’ll have new cooking skills and a deeper appreciation for Thai culture and cuisine.
Class Details
Price:
2,500 THB per person
Booking:
Please book at least 1 day in advance."

name: Banana Fan Sea Wedding
tags: Professional Services, Wedding Planners, Wedding Venues
description:
Celebrate your dream wedding on the pristine shores of Chaweng Beach, Koh Samui, with a personalized wedding experience that will leave you with unforgettable memories. Whether you envision a traditional religious ceremony or a chic European-style celebration, we offer bespoke wedding packages designed to make your special day perfect. Our team works with you to craft a ceremony that reflects your personal style and cultural preferences, ensuring a unique and meaningful experience.
The stunning beachfront setting provides the ideal backdrop for your vows, with turquoise waters and palm trees creating a romantic atmosphere. Our tropical floral arrangements will enhance the beauty of your ceremony, while the private reception area allows you to continue the celebration with your loved ones by the sea. We offer fully customizable packages, ensuring every aspect of your wedding is exactly as you’ve imagined it.
With expert coordination and attention to detail, our dedicated team takes care of everything so you can relax and enjoy your special day. Say ""I do"" in paradise, and let us help you create the wedding of your dreams on Chaweng Beach."

name: Sands Restaurant @ Banyan Tree
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Beachfront, Thai Food, Outdoor Dining, Barbecue, International Food
description:
Located on the pristine beachfront of Koh Samui, this restaurant offers a unique and memorable dining experience with stunning views of the Gulf of Thailand. Whether you're seeking a relaxed lunch, a romantic dinner, or a vibrant celebration, the picturesque setting enhances every meal, making it feel like a special occasion.
The diverse menu seamlessly blends international dishes with modern Asian cuisine, using fresh, locally sourced ingredients combined with international techniques and local Thai flavors. This culinary fusion ensures an unforgettable dining experience for all guests, whether you’re enjoying a casual bite or a gourmet feast.
With its beachfront location and panoramic views, this spot is perfect for casual dining, intimate dinners, or social gatherings. Every meal is an opportunity to indulge in delicious food while surrounded by the beauty of Koh Samui’s tropical paradise."

name: The Edge Restaurant @ Banyan Tree
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Beachfront, Thai Food, Outdoor Dining, International Food, Breakfast
description:
Perched on a serene, private bay, this restaurant offers an unforgettable dining experience with spectacular views of the water. Guests can choose to enjoy their meals indoors or in the fresh air of the outdoor terrace, where the stunning scenery enhances every bite.
The menu is a celebration of global flavors, offering a range of dishes from Asian to Western, as well as locally-inspired creations. Begin your day with a hearty international breakfast, or indulge in vibrant meals made with fresh, seasonal ingredients that cater to a variety of tastes.
With a relaxed atmosphere, this is the ideal spot for enjoying leisurely meals with loved ones or finding a quiet retreat. Every visit promises exceptional food paired with breathtaking views."

name: Outrigger Mala Kitchen
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Thai Food, Family Friendly, International Food, Breakfast Buffet
description:
A Delightful Breakfast Buffet to Start Your Day
Begin your day at Mala Kitchen with a delicious breakfast buffet offering something for every taste. Enjoy Thai specialties like fragrant sticky rice, or indulge in sweet treats like pancakes, waffles, and freshly made jams. Classic favorites such as cheeses, hearty breads, glazed ham, and crispy Thai fried chicken provide the perfect start to the morning.
Dine indoors or on our bamboo-covered deck, set amidst a lush garden. At Mala Kitchen, breakfast is more than just a meal—it’s a flavorful experience to energize your day."

name: Nanny Samui
tags: Children's Needs, Nanny Services
description:
At Nanny Samui, we understand that your children's well-being is a top priority. Based in Bophut, we offer trusted and personalized childcare services that provide both parents and children with peace of mind. Our professional, experienced nannies are dedicated to offering loving, attentive care that meets the unique needs of each family.
Whether you require full-time care, occasional help, or support during special events, our flexible services are designed to fit your schedule. From daily assistance to just a helping hand when needed, Nanny Samui ensures that your children are cared for in a safe, nurturing environment.
Nanny Samui is the trusted choice for parents seeking reliable, experienced, and caring nannies, whether you're at home, on vacation, or attending events."

name: Dining @ Beach Republic
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Beach Clubs, Thai Food, International Food, Breakfast, Pool Day Pass, Wifi Access In Restaurant
description:
Dining at Beach Republic
Located along the pristine shores of Lamai, Beach Republic offers an unforgettable dining experience with panoramic ocean views and a vibrant, all-day dining concept. Indulge in a mix of Mediterranean and Thai cuisines, with tapas-style grazing options perfect for every occasion. Whether you're starting your day with a delicious breakfast, enjoying a relaxed lunch, or dining at sunset, the beautiful beachfront setting enhances every meal.
The restaurant serves breakfast from 7:00 AM to 10:00 AM, and offers a laid-back atmosphere with DJ music to elevate your experience. Guests can enjoy pool and sunbed access with a minimum spend, and also rent private cabanas for a more exclusive experience. Dress in casual beachwear, and soak in the relaxing vibes while savoring delightful dishes made from the finest ingredients."

Lamai Bay
. The breathtaking views of the crystal-clear waters and lush surroundings create the perfect ambiance for a relaxed yet sophisticated dining experience. Whether dining with a loved one or enjoying a special occasion,
TawaNN
offers the ideal setting to complement its exceptional cuisine."

Savor a variety of light bites and snacks from our tasty
international menu
, designed to complement your poolside experience. From fresh salads and flavorful tapas to tropical fruits and indulgent treats, each dish is crafted to satisfy your cravings while you enjoy the sunshine.
Treat yourself to one of our signature
specialty cocktails
, expertly crafted by our talented mixologists. With an extensive selection of refreshing beverages, including classic cocktails, tropical concoctions, and freshly squeezed juices, you'll find the perfect drink to quench your thirst and enhance your poolside relaxation."

description:
Coco Scoop: Your Go-To Spot for Delicious Dining
Experience the perfect blend of international and Thai flavors at Coco Scoop, a renowned restaurant near Chaweng. Our open kitchen and open-air dining room create a vibrant, beachside atmosphere, making it the ideal spot for a casual and delicious meal.
Indulge in Our World-Class Breakfast
Start your day right with our mouthwatering breakfast menu. From fluffy pancakes to savory omelets, we have something to satisfy every craving.
Savor Our Diverse Cuisine
Our diverse menu offers a wide range of dishes to tantalize your taste buds. From classic Thai favorites to international cuisine, there's something for everyone.
Join Us for a Memorable Dining Experience
Whether you're looking for a romantic dinner or a fun family outing, Coco Scoop is the perfect place to create lasting memories."

Unforgettable Dining Experience
Panoramic Ocean Views:

Authentic Thai Cuisine:

Thai-Inspired Cocktails & Craft Beers:

Experience the tranquility of our beachfront setting, complemented by our friendly and attentive hospitality."

Your Tropical Oasis for Dining and Cocktails

tags: Sports & Fitness, Ball Sports, Tennis
description:
Tennis at Sheraton Samui Resort
Our well-maintained tennis court offers a perfect opportunity to enjoy a game of tennis under the warm Samui sun. Whether you're a seasoned player or a casual enthusiast, our court is open to all.
Court Details:
Red Hardcourt:
Ideal for a challenging and enjoyable game.
Equipment Rental:
Rent rackets and balls for a hassle-free experience.
Opening Hours and Rental Fees:
Daytime:
8:00 AM - 6:00 PM (THB 350++/hour)
Evening:
6:00 PM - 7:00 PM (THB 500++/hour)
Equipment Rental:
THB 150++/hour (racket and 3 balls)
Tennis Partner (Knockers):

2 Knockers: THB 1,500 net/hour
Reserve your court time in advance to ensure availability."

Pool Bar

Beachfront Casual Dining & Bar
Lobster Bar
is a relaxed beachfront dining outlet offering both indoor and outdoor seating, perfect for beach lovers who want to enjoy a refreshing drink or light meal while taking in stunning sea views. Whether you choose to relax indoors with the cooling breeze or enjoy the outdoors on the shaded terrace under sun umbrellas,

At
Lobster Bar
, we serve a variety of soft drinks, cocktails, and light meals & snacks, perfect for a laid-back beachside experience. With a relaxed vibe and beautiful views, it’s the ideal place to unwind and savor your favorite drinks and bites by the sea."

name: The Roof @ Resotel
tags: Food & Beverage, Bars & Entertainment, Beachfront, Thai Food, Tapas, International Food
description:
Outdoor Rooftop Chic Bar
The Roof
is a trendy rooftop bar located on the spacious terrace of
Lobster Bar
, offering a stylish setting with breathtaking views of the sea. Guests can unwind with appetizers, cocktails, or a selection of fine wines while enjoying the cool sea breeze under the shade of a large overhead tent. Whether you're looking for a pre-dinner drink or a nightcap,
The Roof
is the perfect place to relax and socialize in a chic, laid-back atmosphere.
Seating Capacity:
30 guests
Experience the ultimate in rooftop dining and cocktails at
The Roof
, where the ambiance and views are just as unforgettable as the drinks you’ll enjoy."

name: Samui Resotel Beach Resort
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Pool Villas, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Wifi Access In Room, Gym, Rooms With Seaview, Laundry Service, Rooms With Balcony, Family Rooms, Sun Loungers Or Beach Chairs, Sun Umbrellas, Wellness, Kitchen, Family Friendly
description:
A Chic Seaside Retreat on Chaweng Beach
Samui Resotel Beach Resort
is a brand new, stylish resort located on a pristine 200-meter stretch of white sand beachfront on the quieter southern section of
Chaweng Beach
. Offering a perfect blend of modern architecture and natural beauty, this chic resort features 79 elegantly appointed guest rooms and pool villas, each equipped with full amenities and facilities.
Whether you're looking for a refined retreat or a relaxed beach holiday experience,
Samui Resotel
provides spectacular sea views, ideal for unwinding by the ocean.
Enjoy a tranquil stay with access to top-tier amenities, including a beachside location, luxurious accommodations, and exceptional service, all designed to make your beach getaway in Koh Samui unforgettable."

name: The Journey Bar & Restaurant
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Bars & Entertainment, Beachfront, Thai Food, International Food, Breakfast, Breakfast Buffet, Wifi Access In Restaurant
description:
Unique Atmosphere
The Journey Bar & Restaurant offers a relaxed, beachfront dining experience in Chaweng, with both indoor and outdoor seating that boasts stunning panoramic sea views. Located poolside, the venue combines a casual ambiance with delicious Thai and international cuisine, all crafted from fresh, local ingredients. Whether you’re enjoying a meal inside or soaking up the serene outdoor atmosphere, it’s the perfect place to unwind.
Key Services
The Journey Bar & Restaurant features a diverse menu with options for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Start your day with a refreshing buffet breakfast, including cereals, tropical fruit, baked goods, and both Asian and Western dishes. For lunch and dinner, enjoy fresh, flavorful dishes such as light salads, soups, curries, and appetizers. The Journey Terrace provides a more laid-back option, offering coffee, cocktails, and a great spot to relax with bean bags and stunning sea views.
Commitment to Satisfaction
At The Journey Bar & Restaurant, we focus on providing a memorable dining experience. Whether it’s the romantic poolside dinners, the serene terrace views, or the fresh, flavorful meals made with local ingredients, we ensure each guest has a relaxing and enjoyable time. With a dedicated atmosphere, delicious cuisine, and friendly service, we make sure every visit is unforgettable."

and

Abscesses, Lumps, and Inflammation:

,

Facial Rejuvenation with Platelet-Rich Plasma (PRP) Treatment:

name: Bangkok Hospital
tags: Health & Medical, Dental Services, Hospitals, Gynecology, Ultrasound, Laparoscopy, Ophthalmology, Traditional Chinese Medicine, Gastroenterologist, Health Check, Iv Drips, Food Intolerance, Hormone Screening, Cancer Screening, Digital Mamogram, Mri Abdomen, Dental Implants, Dental Bone Graft, Dental Full Xray, Internal Medicine, Surgery, Cardiac Department, Radiology, Emergency Service, Pulmonology, Urology, Bloodwork, Electrocardiogram (ecg), Dental Braces, Prosthodontics, Orthodontics, Endodontics, Wound Care And Stitch, Medical Certificates
description:
Bangkok Hospital Samui, located in Chaweng, is an internationally accredited medical facility that offers top-quality healthcare services to both locals and visitors. Established in 2004, the hospital boasts 50 beds and a dedicated team of 72 well-trained medical professionals. As part of the Bangkok Dusit Medical Services (BDMS) network, one of the largest healthcare providers in the Asia-Pacific region, Bangkok Hospital Samui is recognized globally for its excellence in patient care.
The hospital provides a comprehensive range of medical services, including gynecology, dental services, ultrasound, laparoscopy, and traditional Chinese medicine. Notably, it is the only hospital in Koh Samui offering Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI). With more than 60% of patients being foreigners, Bangkok Hospital Samui is well-equipped to meet international healthcare standards. The hospital also offers a unique emergency Hydrolance service (Boat Ambulance) to transport patients from nearby islands, ensuring timely medical care wherever needed."

name: Pediatrics Bangkok Hospital
tags: Children's Needs, Pediatricians
description:
At Pediatrics Bangkok Hospital in Chaweng, we provide comprehensive and compassionate care for children from newborns to adolescents. Our experienced pediatricians use advanced technology in a child-friendly environment to deliver high-quality healthcare tailored to meet the unique needs of young patients.
Whether it’s a routine check-up or specialized care, we ensure that every child receives the attention they deserve.Our services include general pediatrics, well-child check-ups, age-appropriate vaccinations, and newborn and infant care, such as breastfeeding support and developmental assessments.
We also offer specialized care in pediatric respiratory, neurology, infectious diseases, surgery, and emergency care, providing a complete healthcare solution for your child’s growth and well-being. We are committed to supporting your child’s health at every stage of their development."

and

Affordable, Quality Care

name: The Sea Koh Samui Resort & Residences by Tolani
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Bar
description:
The Sea Koh Samui Resort & Residences by Tolani: Your Tropical Escape in Paradise
Located on the pristine sands and crystal-clear waters of
Koh Samui
,
The Sea Resort & Residences by Tolani
offers a serene tropical getaway nestled between lush palms and vibrant gardens. Immerse yourself in a peaceful oasis where the air is filled with the sweet scent of blooming flowers, and the rhythmic sound of waves gently hitting the shore creates an intoxicating atmosphere.
Whether you're seeking a relaxing beach holiday or a luxurious home away from home,
The Sea Koh Samui
promises a memorable experience with exceptional service and stunning natural beauty. Each of our residences combines modern comfort with traditional Thai charm, providing an intimate and unforgettable escape in one of Thailand’s most sought-after destinations.
Come unwind in paradise, where every moment feels like a breath of fresh air."

Discover an unforgettable dining experience at

name: I -Talay Restaurant
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Beach Bars, Beachfront, Thai Food, International Food
description:
The restaurant offers a relaxed yet refined dining experience right by the sea in Koh Samui. With sweeping views of the ocean and a focus on authentic Thai cooking, it’s a place to enjoy great food in a setting that feels both special and easygoing.
What You'll Find at I-Talay:
Real Thai Flavors:
From rich, aromatic curries to freshly grilled seafood, the menu highlights classic Thai dishes made with care and attention to flavor.
Uninterrupted Sea Views:
The restaurant’s open layout makes the most of its location, offering clear views of the turquoise water while you dine.
Fresh, Local Ingredients:
Daily-sourced seafood and seasonal produce bring bright, clean flavors to every dish.
Laid-Back Atmosphere:
With a modern design and a peaceful coastal vibe, the space invites you to unwind and take your time."

name: Melati Romantic beach dinner
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Beachfront, Seafood, Thai Food, Outdoor Dining, Vegetarian, International Food, Mediterranean Food
description:
An Unforgettable Romantic Beach Dinner
Melati Beach Resort & Spa offers the ultimate romantic beach dinner experience, bringing your dreams to life under the stars. Set against the symphony of the sea and the shimmering moonlit waves, a private dinner on the beach creates the perfect atmosphere for a truly memorable evening.
Exquisite Dining by the Sea
Indulge in a culinary journey as our expert chefs prepare the finest meals, right on the beach. With a table for two, a glass of Kir Royale, and the sound of the waves, this intimate experience is the perfect way to celebrate love and create lasting memories with your significant other.
A Perfect Night to Remember
Celebrate romance in style with a private beachfront setting at Melati Beach Resort & Spa. Surrounded by the beauty of Koh Samui, the evening promises an unforgettable dining experience, complete with a swim-up bar and exceptional service to make your night truly special."

name: Kan Sak Thong Restaurant
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Beachfront, Seafood, Thai Food, Outdoor Dining, Vegetarian, International Food, Mediterranean Food
description:
A Scenic Dining Location
Located just next to Melati Resort’s beautiful waterfalls, Kan Sak Thong offers a picturesque setting that enhances your dining experience. Surrounded by nature’s tranquility, this top-rated Samui restaurant provides a serene atmosphere for enjoying delicious meals.
Authentic Thai Cuisine with a Fusion Twist
Kan Sak Thong presents the authentic flavors of Koh Samui, delivering traditional Thai dishes with a unique twist. Our international team of chefs specializes in crafting Thai-French fusion cuisine, offering an exceptional culinary experience that you won’t find in any other resort on the island.
Unforgettable Dining Experience
Experience Thai cuisine as it was meant to be experienced at Kan Sak Thong. The combination of authentic Thai flavors and French culinary influences creates a dining experience unlike any other, making it a must-visit destination for food lovers."

name: The Sea View Bar at Melati
tags: Food & Beverage, Pool Bars, Beachfront, Thai Food, Tapas
description:
Your Ultimate Relaxation Spot
The Sea View Bar is the perfect place to unwind and cool down after a long day. Located at our all-inclusive resort, it features a swim-up bar where you can enjoy refreshing drinks while soaking in the beauty of Koh Samui. The relaxed atmosphere and stunning views create the ideal setting for a peaceful escape.
Crafted Cocktails by Expert Bartenders
Our talented bartenders, trained by renowned mixologist Joseph Broski, are ready to serve you artisan cocktails and cold drinks that are as delightful as the view. Whether you're enjoying a quiet moment by the pool or socializing with friends, our team is dedicated to providing a top-tier experience at the Sea View Bar.
A Perfect Evening by the Sea
Whether you're sipping a crafted cocktail after a busy day or simply soaking in the sultry sea breeze while dining, the Sea View Bar offers an unforgettable experience. Come and enjoy Koh Samui's best resort with a swim-up bar, where relaxation and great drinks await."

name: Wild Cottages Elephant Sanctuary Resort
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Room With Private Pool
description:
Wild Cottages Sanctuary Resort: Eco-Friendly Luxury in Koh Samui
Nestled in a lush, 25-rai sanctuary, Wild Cottages Sanctuary Resort is an exclusive eco-friendly getaway where luxury and nature converge. Our resort offers a unique opportunity to connect with nature while supporting wildlife conservation.
What Makes Us Special:
Elephant Sanctuary:
Partnering with Samui Elephant Haven, we provide a safe haven for rescued elephants, allowing guests to observe and interact with them in their natural environment.
Sustainable Luxury:
Our eco-friendly accommodations seamlessly blend with nature, prioritizing sustainability without compromising comfort.
Ethical Animal Interactions:
Enjoy wildlife encounters with a commitment to conservation and ethical practices, free from circus-style shows.
Serene Setting:
Set on 25 acres of tropical paradise, our resort offers tranquility and rejuvenation amidst lush vegetation and wildlife.
Book your stay today and experience a unique blend of luxury, nature, and conservation."

name: Wild Cottages Sanctuary
tags: Things To Do, On The Land, Elephants
description:
The Ultimate Elephant Experience in Koh Samui
Connect with elephants in their natural, ethical habitat at our sanctuary for rescued elephants. Located in the lush jungles of Koh Samui, it’s a rare opportunity to observe these majestic creatures living freely in a stress-free environment.
What Makes Us Special:
Ethical Sanctuary:
Rescued elephants live freely, roam, forage, and interact naturally, away from exploitation.
Natural Habitat:
Set in a jungle with panoramic views of the Gulf of Thailand, ensuring peace and freedom for the elephants.
Expert Care:
Under Maew Suriya, founder of Samui Elephant Haven, elephants receive expert care and love.
Mahout Program:
Learn from caretakers, feed, bathe, and bond with elephants.
Walking with Elephants:
Experience walking with elephants in their natural environment.
Elephant Gastronomy:
Discover their diet and watch them enjoy natural meals.
Wild Cottages Day Passes:
Lunch Day Pass:
850 THB++ (includes credit, elephant feeding, and activities)
VIP Day Pass:
1500 THB++ (includes higher credit, sanctuary pool access, and sunbeds)
Operating Hours:
11:00 AM – 10:00 PM |
Elephant Feeding:
1:30 PM – 2:30 PM daily"

name: Wild Cottages Spa
tags: Beauty & Wellness, Massage, Facial
description:
Indulge Your Body, Nourish Your Soul at Wild Cottages Spa
Escape to serenity at Wild Cottages Spa, where traditional Thai wellness practices blend with luxurious treatments to rejuvenate both body and mind. Our holistic therapies offer a calming experience that nurtures your soul while enhancing physical well-being.
What Makes Us Special:
Traditional Thai Treatments:
Inspired by ancient healing practices, our spa offers treatments like Thai massage and herbal compresses, designed to balance the mind, body, and spirit.
Signature & Classic Massages:
Choose from soothing options like the Classic Oil Massage for deep relaxation, or our Signature Massage, which combines traditional techniques with contemporary therapies.
Holistic Therapies:
Our treatments detoxify, rejuvenate, and revitalize, promoting circulation, stress relief, and mental clarity.
Peaceful Oasis:
Set amidst lush nature, our spa is the perfect escape to unwind in complete tranquility.
Treat yourself to an unforgettable experience at Wild Cottages Spa."

name: Wild Cottages
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Pool Villas, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Room With Private Pool
description:
Wild Cottages: Luxury & Adventure in Koh Samui
Nestled in the heart of Koh Samui, Wild Cottages offers an unforgettable blend of luxury, adventure, and nature. Designed to reflect our passion for travel, this resort is inspired by the best moments of our journeys worldwide. Since opening in 2019, we have won three prestigious awards at the Thailand Property Awards, recognizing our excellence in design, architecture, and decoration.
Why Choose Wild Cottages?
Award-Winning Design:
Our cottages seamlessly blend with nature, offering luxury and comfort.
Tranquil & Unique:
Set in lush surroundings, perfect for both peaceful retreats and adventurous escapes.
Personalized Service:
Tailored experiences and exceptional hospitality ensure a memorable stay.
Ideal for All Travelers:
Whether you’re on a romantic getaway, family vacation, or solo retreat, Wild Cottages has something for everyone.
Experience the ultimate in luxury and nature at Wild Cottages, Koh Samui."

name: Nikki Beach
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Pool Villas, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Bar, Wifi Access In Room, Private Room, Air Conditioning, Private Bathroom, Parking, Airport Shuttle, Rooms With Balcony, Family Rooms, Sun Loungers Or Beach Chairs, Sun Umbrellas, Wellness, Room Service, 5* Accommodation
description:
On Lipa Noi’s calm western shore,
Nikki Beach Resort Samui
brings together island style, barefoot luxury, and the unmistakable energy of the world-famous Nikki Beach brand. It’s where mornings begin with sea breezes and sunsets turn into celebrations.
Stay Your Way
Choose your perfect retreat — from pool villas tucked in tropical gardens to spacious sea-view suites designed for privacy, comfort, and effortless style.
Eat, Sip & Celebrate
Dine on Mediterranean favorites, enjoy creative cocktails, and take in ocean views from every table. Whether it’s a lazy brunch or sunset dinner, every meal here feels like an occasion.
The Beach Club Experience
Feel the beat of the island at Nikki Beach’s iconic beach club. Lounge by the pool, dance under the palms, and join legendary themed events that make every day feel like a holiday.
Reconnect & Recharge
Balance the fun with relaxation. Unwind with spa rituals, take a yoga class by the sea, or head out for water sports — however you like to recharge, it’s all part of the Nikki Beach rhythm."

name: Explorar Spa
tags: Beauty & Wellness, Massage, Adults Only, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Body Scrub, Body Wrap, Facial, Thai Massage
description:
Escape the hustle and bustle of daily life at Explorar Spa, a sanctuary designed for modern travelers seeking relaxation and rejuvenation. Whether you’re relieving stress from office syndrome or indulging in self-care, our treatments help restore balance and tranquility.
Our skilled therapists tailor each session to your needs, offering massages that release tension and target problem areas, revitalizing full-body scrubs, hydrating facials, and luxurious mani-pedi packages. With four private treatment rooms and a nail salon, we cater to solo guests and couples alike, providing the ultimate relaxation experience.
Beyond physical treatments, Explorar Spa offers transformative therapies to nurture mental and emotional well-being. Sound therapy rejuvenates your mind with resonant frequencies, while light therapy boosts mood and reduces stress. Guided meditation and breathwork calm your system, promoting deep relaxation."

name: Hansar Wedding on the beach
tags: Professional Services, Wedding Planners, Wedding Venues
description:
Imagine exchanging vows on a pristine beach, with the sparkling blue waters of the Gulf of Thailand as your backdrop. At Hansar Bophut Resort, located in the heart of Bophut, Samui, we offer the perfect setting for a romantic beach wedding that you and your guests will remember for a lifetime. With its luxurious beachfront location, world-class service, and elegant venues, Hansar is the ideal place to celebrate your love.
Hansar Bophut Resort offers an idyllic beachfront location that sets the stage for a truly magical wedding. The soft sand, the gentle sound of the waves, and the stunning views of Bophut Bay create an unforgettable atmosphere.
Whether you’re planning an intimate ceremony with just a few loved ones or a grand celebration, the resort provides a picture-perfect setting to say ""I do.""
At Hansar, we understand that every couple has a unique vision for their wedding day. That's why we offer customizable wedding packages to suit your preferences and ensure your celebration is exactly as you’ve dreamed. From elegant beach ceremonies to private receptions with gourmet dining, our team works closely with you to create a personalized experience."

name: The Jolly Fisherman
tags: Bars & Nightlife, Bars & Pubs, Open Air, Live Music, Snack Menu
description:
The Jolly Fisherman
is Koh Samui’s go-to spot for good food, refreshing drinks, and an unbeatable atmosphere. Whether you're looking for a fun night out or a relaxed day with friends and family, this lively gastro pub promises an experience that combines the best of hearty dining, great drinks, and live entertainment.
From classic pub comfort food to exciting international dishes, we’ve got something for everyone. Enjoy everything from juicy burgers to flavorful seafood, all crafted with the finest ingredients. The perfect evening comes with great tunes! Enjoy live performances as the music flows through the air, enhancing the lively, laid-back vibe of our beer garden.
Whether you’re in the mood for a crisp draft beer, an artisanal craft brew, or a glass of premium wine, we offer a wide selection to complement your meal and elevate your experience."

name: The Hive Restaurant
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Bars & Entertainment, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Beachfront, Thai Food, Restaurant, Fast Food, International Food, Breakfast
description:
The Hive Restaurant: A Perfect Beachfront Dining Experience
Nestled at Lamai's premier beachfront resort,
The Hive Restaurant
offers an unforgettable dining experience with stunning ocean views and a laid-back atmosphere. Whether you’re looking to enjoy a leisurely meal with family and friends or celebrate a special occasion, The Hive provides the perfect setting for every occasion.
A Unique Dining Experience
At
The Hive Restaurant
, we take pride in offering a diverse menu that blends international flavors with fresh, local ingredients. Enjoy everything from fresh seafood to grilled meats, creative salads, and comforting Western classics. The fusion of flavors, combined with the serene beachside setting, makes every meal here a truly special experience.
Celebrate in Style
The Hive is also the perfect place to celebrate life’s milestones, whether it’s a birthday, anniversary, or holiday celebration. Our team is dedicated to making your visit memorable, providing exceptional service in an inviting, relaxed atmosphere.
A Destination for Every Occasion
With its stunning views, delectable cuisine, and friendly service,
The Hive Restaurant
is the ideal choice for dining in Koh Samui. Whether you're watching a sunset, enjoying a cocktail by the beach, or savoring a delicious meal, this hidden gem promises a memorable experience every time."
