name: Samui Wood Projects
tags: Property Services, Carpentry, Indoor Furniture, Made To Order, Woodwork, Custom Doors, Custom Wardrobes, Kitchens
description:
At
Samui Wood Projects
, we specialize in turning your custom design ideas into reality for your home. From kitchens, wardrobes, and doors to beds and more, we offer expertly crafted, bespoke solutions tailored to your needs. Using advanced 3D designs and high-quality imported materials, we ensure your vision is brought to life with precision and attention to detail.
With Belgian management and a team of highly experienced professionals, your projects are in trusted hands. We pride ourselves on delivering craftsmanship that exceeds expectations, backed by a commitment to sustainability and quality.
At Samui Wood Projects, we are dedicated to improving the well-being of our planet. We carefully select materials that are environmentally friendly and non-damaging, including imported waterborne paints, glues, bamboo veneers, and paneling. Our aim is to provide long-lasting products with a conscience, so you can feel good about your choices."

name: Samui Walking Street - Fisherman's Village
tags: Things To Do, Markets, Evening Markets

name: Chaweng Night Market
tags: Things To Do, Markets, Evening Markets
description:
Koh Samui Night Market
Experience the Best of Koh Samui's Nightlife
Chaweng Night Market offers a vibrant and authentic shopping and dining experience in the heart of Koh Samui. Known for its bustling atmosphere, the market is a must-visit for anyone seeking to explore traditional Thai street food, unique local crafts, and handmade souvenirs. Located just a short walk from Chaweng Beach, it’s the perfect place to enjoy delicious Thai dishes like Pad Thai, Som Tum (green papaya salad), and sticky rice with mango while soaking in the lively ambiance.
Street Food & Local Delights
The market is a haven for foodies, with a variety of food stalls offering an array of flavors. From savory Thai favorites to sweet Thai desserts, there’s something for everyone. Don’t miss out on authentic Thai street food, local snacks, and fresh fruits, perfect for sampling while you explore.
Shopping & Souvenirs
In addition to food, the market is lined with vendors selling handmade crafts, jewelry, and souvenirs, offering a great selection for those looking to take a piece of Koh Samui home."

name: Na Muang 1 Waterfall
tags: Things To Do, Must See, Waterfalls
description:
A Family-Friendly Retreat in Koh Samui
Hidden within Koh Samui’s vibrant jungle, this waterfall offers a perfect escape for families looking to enjoy nature. A short, easy walk through the lush greenery leads to a tranquil spot where you can cool off in a natural pool.
The Journey:
The pathway to the waterfall is a gentle walk, lined with tropical flora, offering a relaxing way to connect with the island’s natural beauty. While some areas are rocky, the trail remains manageable and accessible for all ages.
The Waterfall & Pool:
This impressive waterfall cascades down into a natural pool, ideal for a refreshing swim. The shallow edges make it safe for younger children to explore, while the quiet surroundings provide a peaceful environment for families to relax and unwind.
Family Fun:
Children can enjoy the refreshing water, explore the nearby area, or have a picnic in the shaded spots around the waterfall. It’s an excellent way for families to spend time together in the heart of nature."

name: Na Mueang Waterfall 2
tags: Things To Do, Must See, Waterfalls
description:
A serene, secluded waterfall in Koh Samui, perfect for nature lovers and families looking for a peaceful escape. Unlike the more crowded Na Mueang 1, this waterfall offers a quieter, more intimate experience.
The Journey:
A 15-20 minute trek through the jungle path takes you through lush tropical surroundings, with the chance to spot occasional wildlife along the way. The trail can be muddy, especially during the rainy season, so proper footwear is recommended.
The Waterfall & Pool:
The waterfall drops 80 meters into a deeper, larger natural pool. The cool, clear waters are perfect for swimming, but caution is advised due to slippery rocks.
Secluded Experience:
With fewer tourists, Na Mueang 2 offers a peaceful atmosphere for reflection, picnics, and nature walks, making it an ideal retreat from the busier parts of the island.
Best Time to Visit:
For the fullest flow, visit during the rainy season (May–October). Alternatively, enjoy the tranquility of the dry season with fewer crowds."

name: Hin Lad Waterfall
tags: Things To Do, Must See, Waterfalls
description:
Hidden gem tucked away in the heart of Koh Samui. Surrounded by lush tropical jungle, it's a perfect spot for those looking to immerse themselves in nature away from the island’s busy tourist hubs.
The Journey:
The hike to the waterfall is a 1.5 km trek through the jungle, taking 20-30 minutes. The path is easy to follow, though it can get slippery during the rainy season, so caution is advised. Along the way, you’ll encounter local wildlife and birds, adding to the peaceful ambiance.
The Waterfall & Pool:
At the end of the trail, the waterfall spills into a pristine natural pool, offering a refreshing spot for a swim. The quiet surroundings make it a more intimate experience than other waterfalls on the island, with fewer visitors.
A Relaxing Spot:
Hin Lad Waterfall is ideal for unwinding, taking photos, or enjoying a picnic in nature’s embrace.
Best Time to Visit:
For a full flow of water, visit during the rainy season (May–October). Alternatively, the dry season offers a quieter, more peaceful visit."

name: Tan Rua Waterfall
tags: Things To Do, Must See, Waterfalls
description:
A Serene Escape in Koh Samui
Tan Rua Waterfall, also known as ""Elephant Waterfall,"" is a tranquil, secluded gem nestled in Koh Samui’s lush jungle, offering a peaceful escape from the crowds. A short 10-15 minute hike from the main road leads to the waterfall, which cascades gently over rocks into small natural pools, perfect for a refreshing dip.
Surrounded by dense jungle, this serene spot provides a quiet retreat for nature lovers, ideal for relaxation, photography, or enjoying a picnic on the flat rocks near the falls.
Best Time to Visit:
For the fullest flow, visit during the rainy season (May–October). Early mornings or late afternoons are the best times for a quieter experience, though it remains peaceful in the dry season too.
Practical Information:
Entrance fee: 30-50 THB. The trail can be steep and slippery, so sturdy footwear is advised."

name: Zong Raue Waterfall
tags: Things To Do, Must See, Waterfalls
description:
Zong Raue Waterfall is a hidden gem located in the central region of Koh Samui, perfect for those looking to escape the crowds and immerse themselves in nature. Accessible via a short 10-15 minute hike through dense jungle, the trail is moderately challenging, with uneven and slippery paths, so sturdy footwear is recommended.
Once you reach the waterfall, you’ll be greeted by clear, tranquil pools surrounded by lush vegetation, offering a peaceful spot for swimming or relaxation. Ideal for nature lovers, photographers, or anyone in search of serenity, Zong Raue Waterfall is a must-visit for those exploring the natural beauty of Koh Samui.
The best times to visit are early mornings or late afternoons, and the rainy season (May-Oct) offers fuller flow and vibrant surroundings."

name: Khun Si Waterfall
tags: Things To Do, Must See, Waterfalls
description:
A Majestic Hidden Treasure in Koh Samui
Tucked away in the lush heart of Koh Samui’s central jungles, this waterfall offers a peaceful escape with its stunning multi-tiered cascade and serene natural pools. Located between Nathon and the island’s western coastline, it remains a hidden gem, perfect for those seeking tranquility and a break from the more crowded attractions on the island.
The Journey:
The 15-20 minute trek through dense jungle provides a refreshing nature experience, with the path offering glimpses of vibrant tropical plants and the sounds of wildlife. When you reach the falls, you’re rewarded with crystal-clear pools ideal for a peaceful swim, especially during the rainy season when the waterfall flows at its most majestic.
A Quiet Escape:
This waterfall provides an uncrowded, tranquil retreat, offering the perfect spot to unwind, swim, or enjoy a quiet moment surrounded by nature’s beauty."

name: Samui Snake & Wildlife Rescue
tags: Charity, Snake Rescue
description:
Samui Snake and Wildlife Rescue is a dedicated wildlife rescue organization based on Koh Samui, Thailand. Specializing in the rescue, rehabilitation, and safe release of wild animals, this organization plays a vital role in preserving the island's biodiversity and ensuring the safety of both wildlife and human residents.
Services Provided by Samui Snake and Wildlife Rescue include Snake Rescue and Relocation, Wildlife Rescue and Rehabilitation, Emergency Response and Education and Conservation Efforts.
How You Can Support Samui Snake and Wildlife Rescue
Donations
: Like many wildlife rescue organizations, Samui Snake and Wildlife Rescue relies on donations to fund its operations. Contributions help pay for the rescue team's training, medical care for animals, and the resources needed for animal rehabilitation.
Volunteer Opportunities
: The rescue organization often welcomes volunteers who can assist in various tasks, from helping with animal care to promoting wildlife awareness.
Spreading Awareness
: Another way to support the cause is by spreading the word about Samui Snake and Wildlife Rescue’s work. Whether through social media or simply talking to others about the importance of wildlife conservation, increasing awareness can lead to more community involvement and support.
If you encounter an animal in need of rescue on Koh Samui, the team can be reached via phone, email, or social media. They offer a prompt response service and are prepared to handle emergencies at any time of day or night."

name: NailStudio.samui
tags: Beauty & Wellness, Manicure, Nail Color, Nail Gel, Nail Acrylic
description:
NailStudio.samui: Your Premium Nail Care Destination on Koh Samui
NailStudio.samui is a top-tier nail salon located on the beautiful island of Koh Samui, Thailand. Known for its exceptional nail care services and luxurious atmosphere, the salon offers a wide range of treatments designed to make your nails look beautiful and feel healthy. Whether you’re a resident or a tourist visiting this tropical paradise, NailStudio.samui is the perfect place to pamper yourself and enjoy world-class nail services.
Services Offered at NailStudio.samui
Manicure and Pedicure
: NailStudio.samui provides high-quality manicure and pedicure services tailored to your needs. Whether you’re looking for a classic look, a trendy design, or a relaxing spa experience, their skilled nail technicians will ensure your nails are treated with the utmost care. From simple grooming to intricate nail art, every service is designed to leave your hands and feet looking and feeling fantastic.
Nail Art and Design
: For those looking to add a touch of creativity to their nails, NailStudio.samui is famous for its stunning nail art services. Whether it’s a minimalist design, intricate patterns, or seasonal themes, the salon’s talented artists can bring your vision to life with precision and creativity. Custom designs, glitter nails, and 3D embellishments are just a few of the artistic options available.
Gel Nails
: If you’re after long-lasting, chip-free nails, NailStudio.samui specializes in gel nails. Gel manicures provide a glossy, durable finish and can last up to two weeks without losing their shine. This service is perfect for those with a busy lifestyle or anyone looking for low-maintenance nail care that stays flawless for longer.
Acrylic Nails
: For those who want added length and durability, acrylic nails are a popular choice. NailStudio.samui offers professional acrylic nail applications, ensuring a natural look with the perfect balance of strength and flexibility. The salon also provides regular maintenance and filling services for acrylic nails to keep them in perfect shape.
Nail Treatments
: The salon also offers specialized nail care treatments such as paraffin wax treatments, which are great for moisturizing dry skin and promoting relaxation. These treatments help restore health to your nails and cuticles, leaving them soft, hydrated, and rejuvenated.
Pedicure Spa
: Indulge in a luxurious pedicure experience at NailStudio.samui with their signature spa pedicure. This treatment includes exfoliation, a soothing soak, and massage to promote relaxation and improve circulation. It’s the ideal way to treat your feet after a long day of sightseeing or beach activities.
Why Choose NailStudio.samui?
Expert Technicians
: NailStudio.samui is home to a team of highly skilled and experienced nail technicians who are dedicated to providing exceptional service. Each technician is trained in the latest nail care techniques and trends, ensuring that every client receives the best possible treatment.
Top-Quality Products
: The salon uses only premium, high-quality nail care products to ensure that your nails stay healthy and beautiful. From gentle cuticle removers to long-lasting gel polish, NailStudio.samui is committed to using products that are safe for your nails and skin.
Hygienic Environment
: NailStudio.samui prioritizes hygiene and cleanliness. All tools are sanitized between clients, and the salon follows strict hygiene protocols to ensure a safe and comfortable experience for everyone.
Relaxing Ambience
: Designed to provide a tranquil and soothing environment, NailStudio.samui offers a relaxing atmosphere where clients can unwind and enjoy their treatment. The comfortable seating, calming music, and friendly staff make each visit a truly enjoyable experience.
Convenient Location
: Located in a central area of Koh Samui, the salon is easily accessible for both locals and tourists. Whether you’re staying in Chaweng, Lamai, or another part of the island, NailStudio.samui is just a short drive away, making it a convenient stop for your nail care needs.
Perfect for Tourists and Locals
Whether you’re visiting Koh Samui for a short stay or you call the island home, NailStudio.samui is an ideal choice for both tourists and locals. For tourists, it’s the perfect way to treat yourself to some relaxation and pampering during your vacation. Locals, on the other hand, can enjoy regular, professional nail care in a peaceful setting that feels like a home away from home.
How to Book an Appointment at NailStudio.samui
Booking an appointment at NailStudio.samui is simple and convenient. You can either call the salon directly or use their online booking system through their website or social media pages. The salon also offers walk-in services, but to avoid long wait times, it’s always a good idea to book in advance, especially during the busy tourist seasons."

and

Why Choose Nail Story Lamai?
Skilled Technicians

name: Sisters On Samui
tags: Charity, Community
description:
The Sisters on Samui Foundation is dedicated to supporting the local community on Koh Samui, Thailand. With a focus on education, healthcare, and community development, the foundation aims to provide essential resources and create long-term solutions for those in need.
The foundation supports local children with school supplies, scholarships, and mentoring, helping break the cycle of poverty. It also improves healthcare access by organizing medical clinics and offering mental health support. The foundation provides direct assistance to vulnerable families, offering emergency housing, legal aid, and food assistance.
Through sustainability programs, environmental initiatives, and support for local businesses, especially those owned by women, the foundation works to strengthen and empower the Samui community. It relies on donations, fundraising events, and volunteers to continue its work."

name: Kamalaya Wellness

Discover Serenity and Healing at Kamalaya: Koh Samui’s Premier Holistic Wellness Retreat
Escape the stresses of daily life and embark on a transformative journey at
Kamalaya
, one of
Koh Samui’s
most renowned destinations for
mind-body wellness

Whether you're looking to reduce anxiety, alleviate stress, enhance vitality, or rejuvenate your spirit, Kamalaya provides the perfect environment for personal growth and lasting wellness.
A Fusion of Ancient Eastern Wisdom and Modern Western Medicine
At Kamalaya, we take a
holistic approach
to wellness by combining
ancient Eastern healing traditions
with the latest insights from
Western medical research
. This unique blend of therapies ensures that every guest receives a comprehensive and individualized experience, addressing both physical and emotional well-being. Our bespoke wellness programs are designed to meet the specific needs of each guest, guiding you towards lasting improvements in both health and overall quality of life.
Wellness Programs Tailored Just for You
Kamalaya offers a wide range of
bespoke wellness programs
that focus on different aspects of health and personal development. Whether you're looking to detoxify your body, reduce stress, enhance your energy levels, or embark on a deep spiritual journey, our holistic programs provide personalized care that will support your goals.
Stress and Anxiety Management

Vitality and Rejuvenation
: Through targeted therapies, yoga, and nutritional guidance, we help you reenergize your body and mind. Our vitality programs are perfect for those looking to renew their energy, boost their immune system, and embrace a more balanced lifestyle.
Mind-Body Detox
: Cleanse and revitalize with programs that focus on detoxifying the body while promoting mental clarity. Our detox offerings include dietary plans, herbal treatments, and holistic therapies to cleanse the system and support long-term health.
Spiritual Awakening and Meditation
: For those seeking to reconnect with their inner self, Kamalaya offers meditation and mindfulness practices, yoga sessions, and spiritual guidance. Our tranquil setting and expert instructors create the ideal environment for deep reflection, personal insight, and transformation.
Personalized Wellness Therapies
At Kamalaya, we understand that every person’s wellness journey is unique. That’s why we offer a range of
personalized therapies
designed to meet your specific health needs. Our experienced team of wellness practitioners will work with you to create a program that includes:
Yoga and Meditation

Massage and Body Therapies
: Traditional Thai massage, aromatherapy, lymphatic drainage, and other therapeutic treatments to release tension, improve circulation, and promote relaxation.
Nutritional Guidance

Holistic Healing

Reconnect with Nature at Kamalaya’s Serene Location
The
serene natural surroundings
of Kamalaya enhance the wellness experience, allowing you to fully immerse yourself in a peaceful environment. The retreat is nestled in a lush hillside, overlooking the crystal-clear waters of
Koh Samui
, offering the perfect setting to escape the fast pace of modern life. The sounds of nature, from the rustling leaves to the gentle waves, provide a calming backdrop for meditation, yoga, and reflective moments. This tranquil setting is the ideal place to disconnect, reflect, and find clarity amidst the beauty of nature.
Kamalaya: A Complete Wellness Experience
Kamalaya is not just a retreat—it's a
holistic journey
that nurtures your mind, body, and soul. The combination of personalized wellness programs, expert guidance, and a serene environment makes Kamalaya the perfect place to achieve your health and wellness goals. Whether you're looking to de-stress, regain balance, or embark on a life-changing transformation, Kamalaya offers everything you need to nurture your well-being in a truly special way.

Expert Wellness Practitioners

Holistic Approach to Healing
: We combine the wisdom of
Eastern traditions
with modern techniques, creating a comprehensive approach that addresses both physical and emotional health.
Stunning Natural Setting

Long-Lasting Results

name: Overlap Stone
tags: Things To Do, On The Land
description:
Explore the Natural Wonder of Overlap Stone
Nestled in the heart of Koh Samui, Overlap Stone is a breathtaking geological marvel featuring large boulders stacked in a nearly mystical formation. These rocks, which seem to defy gravity, form one of the island's most captivating natural wonders.
Why Visit?
Unique Rock Formations:
Marvel at the naturally stacked boulders that have formed over centuries.
Photography Paradise:
Capture striking shots of the rocks set against the island’s lush landscapes.
Serene Escape:
Enjoy a peaceful retreat, surrounded by greenery and fresh air.
Great for Hiking:
Scenic trails lead to the site, making it accessible for families and nature lovers alike.
What to Expect:
Panoramic Views:
From the top, enjoy stunning vistas of Samui’s coastline and nearby islands.
Accessible Location:
Easily reachable by car or a moderate hike."

name: Mehdi Fahraji
tags: Professional Services, Artists, Mural Paintings
description:
Mural Painting Pricing Guide
We offer a variety of mural painting styles to suit different preferences and budgets. Here’s a breakdown of our pricing:
Complex & Highly Detailed Murals (Premium Paints)
Price:
3,500 to 5,000 Baht per sqm
Ideal for intricate designs with high detail and premium materials.
Less Detailed & Mostly Flat (2-3 Colors)
Price:
2,000 to 3,000 Baht per sqm
Simple designs with fewer colors, perfect for a modern, minimalist look.
Linear Monochrome Designs
Price:
1,000 to 1,500 Baht per sqm
Elegant, simple designs using a single color.
Minimum Project Cost
:
Bangkok
: 10,000 Baht
Provinces
: 12,000 Baht
Note: Prices may increase for more complex designs. Final pricing will be provided after the sketch is approved and based on the size and specifics of your project."

name: Tembo Beach Club & Resort
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Bar, Wifi Access In Room, Private Room, Air Conditioning, Private Bathroom, Parking, Rooms With Seaview, Rooms With Balcony, Sun Loungers Or Beach Chairs, Sun Umbrellas, 24 Hours Front Desk, 4* Accommodation
description:
TEMBO Beach Club & Resort
– Where Island Glamour Meets Tranquility
Nestled along the stunning north coast of Koh Samui, TEMBO Beach Club & Resort is a colonial-style beachfront retreat offering uninterrupted views over the sparkling Gulf of Thailand. The resort blends modern island luxury with a laid-back atmosphere, creating the perfect place to relax and unwind. With soft Balearic beats playing in the background, the resort invites guests to indulge in a serene escape.
The word ""TEMBO"" means ""elephant"" in Swahili, reflecting our dedication to elephant conservation in Southeast Asia through TEMBO Cares, an initiative focused on supporting the protection and welfare of these magnificent creatures.
Whether you're enjoying the peaceful beach, dining on exquisite cuisine, or relaxing in our stylish accommodations, TEMBO offers a tranquil sanctuary where every moment feels like a retreat."

description:
Transformative Breathwork & Ice Bath Retreat
Located in the tranquil surroundings of Lamai, Koh Samui, Breathflow Connection offers a unique retreat combining breathwork and ice bath sessions. Designed to enhance mental clarity, emotional resilience, and physical vitality, our workshops help you unlock your inner strength and transform your well-being.
Breathwork for Mental Clarity
Led by expert instructors, our breathwork sessions guide you in connecting deeply with your body and mind. Release stress, improve focus, and increase energy while promoting emotional balance and clarity, laying the foundation for personal growth and well-being.
Ice Baths for Resilience
Experience the benefits of cold immersion, which boosts circulation, reduces inflammation, and enhances recovery. Complementing breathwork, our ice baths build both physical and mental resilience, promoting relaxation and healing for a complete wellness experience.
Join Us for Transformation
Embark on a life-changing journey of self-discovery, vitality, and transformation with our breathwork and ice bath retreat in Koh Samui."

The stylish club features a restaurant serving a variety of international dishes, fresh seafood, and delicious cocktails, all while you enjoy breathtaking views of the turquoise sea. Whether you're lounging by the pool, soaking up the sun on the beach, or swimming in the inviting waters of Chaweng Beach, ARKbar has something for everyone.
Known for its lively atmosphere, daily events, live music, and a friendly crowd, ARKbar is the perfect spot for daytime relaxation and vibrant evening entertainment. Whether you're here for a laid-back meal, to socialize with friends, or to party under the stars, ARKbar guarantees an unforgettable experience."

Located on the ground floor, our spacious, open-air restaurant is thoughtfully furnished with real wood and all-natural materials, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere that allows you to dine in harmony with nature.
Indulge in the rich flavors of authentic Italian cuisine, prepared with the highest quality ingredients to deliver an unforgettable dining experience. Whether you're enjoying a romantic dinner or a casual meal with family and friends, our menu offers a wide selection of Italian classics, crafted with passion and precision.
Join us at Coco Tam’s Restaurant for a culinary journey that combines the best of Italy with the beauty of Koh Samui."

name: Pit Stop Bar
tags: Bars & Nightlife, Open Air
description:
Looking for the perfect spot to unwind on Koh Samui? Look no further! The Pit Stop Bar is your go-to destination for fun, relaxation, and great vibes. Shoot a game of pool with friends, sip on an ice-cold beer, and take in the breathtaking views of the water—it’s the ultimate island hangout.
But that’s not all! The PIT STOP BAR is the official starting and ending point of the legendary BarCycle trips—a one-of-a-kind adventure on wheels that combines sightseeing, good company, and unforgettable moments.
Don’t miss the BarCycle Sunset Trip!
Departing daily at 6:00 PM, this experience takes you on a journey like no other, exploring the beauty of Samui as the sun sets over the horizon. For just 750 Baht per person, it’s the perfect way to make your evening special.
Whether you’re starting your night or finishing your day, the Pit Stop Bar is where the fun begins and ends. So come on over and make some memories with us!"

tags: Food & Beverage, Bakeries & Coffee Shops, Ice Cream & Sweets
description:
Samui Sweetness: A Delightful Retreat
Located in the heart of Samui, Samui Sweetness is a unique spot offering ice cream, crepes, and cocktails all in one place. Whether you're craving a sweet treat, refreshing drink, or savory snack, this cozy venue has something for everyone.
Handcrafted Ice Cream
The handcrafted ice cream is a standout, featuring fresh local ingredients and tropical flavors like coconut and mango. It's the perfect way to cool off and enjoy the island's vibrant vibe.
Refreshing Cocktails
The bar serves up a variety of refreshing cocktails, from classic mojitos to tropical concoctions. It's the ideal spot to relax and unwind.
Delicious Crepes
Samui Sweetness also offers a variety of sweet and savory crepes, made to order with fresh ingredients. From Nutella to cheese and ham, there’s a crepe for every taste.
Whether you're stopping by for ice cream, a drink, or a crepe, Samui Sweetness is the perfect place to indulge and relax in a fun, welcoming atmosphere."

name: Khwan Beach Wellness
tags: Beauty & Wellness, Spa & Beauty
description:
Experience a personalized healing program focused on complete health rehabilitation and immune system support. Just 50 meters from Khwan Beach Resort, our trusted Health Center partner offers a serene beachfront setting for relaxation, rejuvenation, and long-term wellness.
Their approach addresses the root causes of illness, not just symptoms - strengthening the immune system with proven natural therapies. Their philosophy is centered on true healing through an integrated model that treats the person, not the diagnosis.
Each program is customized to your specific needs, whether you're seeking preventative care, recovery support, enhanced performance, or a better quality of life. The Health Center’s expert team will guide you through “The MHG Way,” a unique treatment model focused on long-term results.
Let their team support your journey to optimal health with a holistic plan designed just for you."

description:
A Dreamy Destination for Your Special Day
Lipa Lodge offers an idyllic setting for couples seeking a stunning, peaceful location to celebrate their wedding. Nestled along the serene shores of Koh Samui, the venue combines natural beauty with exceptional service, providing the perfect backdrop for exchanging vows and starting your journey together.
Breathtaking Views
With panoramic ocean views and lush tropical landscapes, Lipa Lodge sets the stage for a spectacular ceremony. Whether you choose the beach or a private garden, the stunning surroundings will elevate your special day, adding a touch of nature’s elegance.
Intimate and Personalized
Designed for small to medium-sized weddings, Lipa Lodge is renowned for its intimate atmosphere. The dedicated team collaborates with couples to craft a personalized experience, ensuring the ceremony and reception reflect your unique style and preferences.
Exquisite Dining
From elegantly plated meals to buffet-style spreads, Lipa Lodge offers diverse dining options using fresh, local ingredients. Whether you crave traditional Thai flavors or international cuisine, the culinary team guarantees a memorable dining experience for your guests.
A Relaxing Honeymoon Retreat
After the celebration, unwind in luxurious accommodations at Lipa Lodge. Its peaceful atmosphere and exceptional service make it an ideal retreat for a romantic honeymoon, allowing couples to relax and cherish their new beginning."

name: Samui Diving Resort
tags: Accommodation, Pool Villas, Bungalows, Swimming Pool, Wifi Access In Room, Private Room, Air Conditioning, Private Bathroom, Rooms With Balcony, Family Rooms, Sun Loungers Or Beach Chairs, Sun Umbrellas, Kitchen
description:
Welcome to Samui Diving Resort, nestled in a tropical paradise where adventure meets relaxation. Whether you're an experienced diver, a nature enthusiast, or simply seeking peace, our resort offers the perfect blend of comfort, security, and stunning surroundings.
Located on a private 1600 m² plot, our resort features three traditional Thai-style villas, providing a peaceful, secure environment surrounded by walls and a main gate for privacy.The Big Villa is perfect for families or groups, with 3 bedrooms, a cozy living room, and a fully equipped kitchen. The Smaller Villa, ideal for couples or smaller groups, offers 2 bedrooms, a living room, and kitchen for an intimate stay.
Dive into Koh Samui's crystal-clear waters to encounter whale sharks and explore vibrant coral reefs. With decades of experience, we offer diving training for all levels, from beginners to professionals, plus a range of specialty courses."

name: Samui Teerak 663
tags: Children's Needs, Child Activities, Football
description:
Football Training for Kids: Developing Skills in Paradise
If you're traveling with children or looking to enhance their football skills, Koh Samui offers exciting opportunities for young players to train and improve. The island features coaching sessions specifically tailored for kids, providing a fun and supportive environment to develop their football talent.
Local Programs for Youth
There are various local football programs designed to cater to different age groups and skill levels. These programs focus on building fundamental skills like passing, dribbling, and teamwork while encouraging physical fitness and confidence. Whether your child is a beginner or already has some experience, there’s a program that can help them grow as a player.
Fun & Active Vacation
Football training for kids offers a great way to stay active while on vacation in paradise. With beautiful weather and a relaxed atmosphere, kids can enjoy learning and playing in a fun environment, all while being surrounded by the island’s stunning natural beauty.
Find the perfect football training session for your family and ensure your children have an unforgettable, active vacation!"

name: Samui Water Park
tags: Children's Needs, Child Activities, Waterpark
description:
Nestled in the peaceful Maenam area in the north of Koh Samui, Samui Water Park is the island’s first professional water park, set amid a serene palm grove just 1,500 meters from the main road. This expansive water paradise is designed for guests of all ages, with special emphasis on thrilling fun for kids. From exhilarating water slides to splash zones, younger adventurers will find endless excitement.
With state-of-the-art rides and the latest water park trends, we ensure top-quality experiences for both thrill-seekers and those looking to relax. Whether you're racing down slides, exploring interactive play areas, or enjoying a peaceful day by the water, Samui Water Park has something for everyone. Bring the whole family and make unforgettable memories in this tropical paradise!
There is a 1 year pass available for frequent visitors"

name: Nanny Service Koh Samui
tags: Children's Needs, Nanny Services
description:
When planning your family holiday in Koh Samui, it's crucial to book early—especially during peak times. Our nannies are in high demand and tend to book out quickly, so securing your personal nanny well in advance ensures you don't miss out. By inquiring early, you'll also be able to have the same nanny for the duration of your stay, allowing for consistency and comfort for your child/children.
Our nannies are happy to travel with you around the island, and often know of hidden local spots for you to explore. Whether you're relaxing by the pool at your villa or out and about, your nanny will take care of all your childcare needs, allowing you to truly unwind and enjoy your holiday.
If you'd like the nanny to travel with you to nearby islands like Koh Tao or Koh Phangan, they are usually available for that too—just cover her expenses off the island and a small “away from home” allowance of 1000 baht per day."

Using high-quality, safe paints, we create designs that reflect your child’s or teen’s personality and interests. From cartoon characters to abstract art, we bring imagination to life, creating spaces where they can grow, learn, and play.
Let
NAMWA Painting Samui
help make your child's room or teen's space a place of joy and creativity."

MK Ultra Artists Pottery Studio, established in 2022, offers a fun and educational space for children to explore the world of ceramics. Join Us in Koh Samui

description:
Located along Koh Samui’s Ring Road in the picturesque Ban Tai area of Maenam, Homemade Burgers and Sandwiches offers a cozy and inviting dining experience. Famous for our mouthwatering burgers and sandwiches, our menu also features a variety of options to suit every taste. From flavorful Thai dishes and healthy meals to hearty pastas, mixed salads, and vegan and vegetarian-friendly options, there's something for everyone.
Start your day with our breakfast specialties, indulge in a delicious dessert, or cool off with a refreshing drink.
Family-Friendly Atmosphere
Our outdoor dining space, nestled in a natural setting, is perfect for families, couples, or solo diners. With a playground for the little ones and a welcoming environment for furry friends, we strive to make every visit enjoyable. We offer convenient street parking, wheelchair accessibility, and free Wi-Fi to enhance your experience.
Drinks and Payment
Looking for a place to relax with a drink? Enjoy a selection of wines, beers, and other beverages to complement your meal. We offer easy payment options, including cash, digital payments, and major credit cards.
Whether you're here for breakfast, lunch, dinner, or just a quick snack, our team is dedicated to making your meal memorable. We look forward to welcoming you to Homemade Burgers and Sandwiches on Koh Samui!"

name: Lek Bar
tags: Bars & Nightlife, Bars & Pubs, Snack Menu, Pool Table, Cocktail Bars
description:
Lek Bar is a cozy and casual spot perfect for a relaxed evening on Koh Samui. Known for its inviting atmosphere, friendly vibe, and tournament-standard pool tables, it’s a go-to destination for locals and visitors alike who want to unwind and have fun.
Whether you’re in the mood for expertly crafted cocktails, a refreshing beer, or a fine selection of wine and spirits, Lek Bar offers something to satisfy every taste. For those feeling peckish, the menu includes small plates and late-night food that pair perfectly with your drinks.
Lek Bar provides a mix of outdoor seating and cozy indoor spaces, creating the ideal setting for a casual dinner, a fun night out with friends, or a chilled drink by yourself. Equipped with a fully stocked bar, clean facilities, and a welcoming atmosphere, it’s designed to make every visit enjoyable.
The tournament-standard pool tables are a standout feature, making Lek Bar a fantastic place for billiards enthusiasts to test their skills or simply enjoy a game with friends.
Whether you’re here to sip a drink, savor delicious bites, or challenge your friends to a game of pool, Lek Bar promises an unforgettable experience in the vibrant Maenam neighborhood. Come for the fun, stay for the company, and discover why Lek Bar is a beloved hangout on Koh Samui."

,

live rock performances

Delicious Food & Drinks
Alongside the great music, enjoy a variety of
mouth-watering food
and drinks. From hearty meals to light bites, their menu has something for all tastes, complemented by an impressive drink list to keep the party going.
Your Go-To Night Out in Lamai
Whether you’re grabbing a bite to eat or partying the night away to live rock tunes,
The Viper Room
offers a welcoming atmosphere for locals and visitors alike."

name: The Bar

description:
Maenam's Vibrant Hots
The Bar is the ultimate destination for great drinks, lively entertainment, and a fun, friendly atmosphere. It's the perfect spot to unwind, socialize, or enjoy a night out.
With a large bar counter, a fantastic selection of beers, handcrafted cocktails, and classic spirits, there’s something for everyone. Enjoy live music performances or catch your favorite sports on TV. Hungry? The menu features tasty breakfast and snack options, including fresh popcorn and hot dogs, all at very reasonable prices.
For game lovers, two pool tables are available for friendly matches or practice. Whether you're here for a casual drink, a quick bite, or to keep the party going, The Bar is the place to be!"

name: Meeting Bar
tags: Bars & Nightlife, Bars & Pubs, Live Music, Snack Menu, Beer Gardens, Cocktail Bars
description:
Looking for a place with great music, amazing cocktails, and unbeatable vibes? Meeting Bar Samui is the perfect spot to relax, enjoy live performances, and connect with new people.
Known as one of the best band bars on Koh Samui, Meeting Bar offers an electrifying atmosphere with regular live music that keeps the energy alive all night long. Whether you're here to dance, sing along, or simply soak in the vibes, you'll feel right at home.
The bar serves a range of great cocktails crafted to perfection, making it the ideal place to kick back with your favorite drink in hand. Pair this with the welcoming crowd, and it’s the perfect recipe for an unforgettable night.
At Meeting Bar, it’s not just about the drinks and music—it’s about the people. Come meet new friends, share good times, and make lasting memories in a vibrant, friendly setting.
Join us at Meeting Bar Samui, where every night is a celebration of music, connection, and pure island vibes."

name: Suzette Creperie
tags: Children's Needs, Child Activities, Children & Parenting, Party Needs, Children Playgrounds
description:
Suzette Creperie is a family-friendly restaurant offering a variety of delicious dishes made from fresh, organic ingredients. Located near Lotus’s Chaweng, we specialize in savory galettes made from 100% organic buckwheat flour, as well as sweet crepes, waffles, quiches, wraps, and salads.
Every dish is carefully homemade, ensuring a fresh and flavorful experience. Our spacious 300 sqm indoor playground provides a safe and fun space for kids aged 0 to 12, allowing parents to enjoy their meal while their little ones play.
We also offer birthday party services for children, creating memorable moments for families. Whether you’re stopping by for a casual meal or a special celebration, Suzette Creperie is the perfect destination for both adults and kids."

name: Samui Sky Lounge
tags: Bars & Nightlife, Rooftop Venues, Open Air, Dj Music, Snack Menu, Cocktail Bars, Swimming Pool
description:
The Ultimate Rooftop Experience
Located at the highest point of Koh Samui, our rooftop pool bar offers an unforgettable experience with stunning 360-degree panoramic views. Enjoy vibrant beats from a live DJ while sipping on refreshing cocktails or premium champagne, creating the perfect ambiance for relaxation and fun.
Breathtaking Views & Atmosphere
Admire the island's lush mountains, serene coastline, and the beauty of Bophut, Maenam, Bangpor, and Nathon beaches. Whether you're watching the sunset or enjoying a lively night out, this rooftop bar provides an unmatched setting to unwind and soak in the spectacular surroundings.
Daytime Chill & Evening Thrills
Perfect for both daytime relaxation and evening excitement, this rooftop bar is the ultimate spot to experience the best of Koh Samui in a vibrant and elevated setting."

name: Koh Samui Tower
tags: Accommodation, Condos & Apartments, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Bar, Wifi Access In Room, Air Conditioning, Private Bathroom, Parking, Rooms With Balcony, Family Rooms, 24 Hours Front Desk
description:
Relaxation & Luxury in Maenam
Located in the heart of Maenam, Koh Samui Tower offers a luxurious stay with top-tier amenities in a serene and tranquil environment. This 4-star hotel features an outdoor swimming pool, a fully equipped fitness center, and free private parking, making it an ideal choice for both business and leisure travelers.
Spacious Rooms with Modern Comforts
Guests can unwind in spacious rooms equipped with modern amenities, including air conditioning, a wardrobe, a fridge, and a flat-screen TV. Many rooms offer private balconies with breathtaking sea views, while some come with a fully equipped kitchen, perfect for longer stays.
Convenience & Entertainment
Koh Samui Tower ensures comfort and convenience with free WiFi, a 24-hour front desk, room service, and the option to enjoy a game of table tennis or dine at the in-house restaurant. Whether you're here for work or relaxation, this hotel offers everything you need for a memorable stay."

name: Sky Lounge - Jamaican Bar & Grill
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Rooftop Venues, Viewpoint, Family Friendly, Barbecue, Delivery, Cocktails, Wifi Access In Restaurant, Jamaican Food, Panoramic Views, Pick Up Service, Parking
description:
Unmatched Views and Authentic Jamaican Cuisine
Sky Lounge Samui offers a dining experience that goes beyond the ordinary. Located high above the island, it boasts a stunning panoramic view that will captivate you from the moment you arrive. Imagine golden sunsets sinking into the horizon, shimmering waters stretching endlessly, and lush tropical greenery surrounding you. This breathtaking view is the perfect backdrop for a memorable evening.
In addition to its incredible scenery, Sky Lounge serves the best Jamaican food in Koh Samui. Indulge in authentic, flavorful dishes that bring the vibrant taste of Jamaica to your plate. From mouthwatering jerk chicken to Oxtale and fresh tropical sides, every bite is a taste of the Caribbean.
Whether you’re looking to relax with a cocktail as the sun sets or enjoy a delicious meal, Sky Lounge offers an unforgettable experience that combines stunning views with exceptional cuisine."

Born from a shared vision, Samaya Wellness is a sanctuary dedicated to bridging the wisdom of Eastern and Western healing traditions. Nestled on the stunning southern island of Koh Samui, this haven offers a space to pause, reconnect, and rejuvenate—mind, body, and soul.
At Samaya Wellness, every guest is welcomed like family, invited to nourish themselves and embark on a transformative journey of love, vitality, and self-discovery.
Our Offerings Include:

Heart-nourishing, wholesome cuisine
Sound healing sessions to restore harmony
A serene yoga space surrounded by mountains and water
A turquoise beachfront pool for relaxation and reflection
A growing array of holistic mind-body activities
Located in Lamai, Koh Samui, Samaya Wellness is more than a resort—it’s a community. Join us to inspire, collaborate, and embrace a joyful, balanced life."

Whether you need help with a malfunctioning MacBook, iMac, Apple laptop, desktop, or tablet, our skilled technicians provide quick, efficient, and reliable repairs to get your device back to peak performance.
At Samui Computer, we’re committed to delivering fast, professional service with a focus on quality and customer satisfaction. Visit our shop today and experience why we’re the go-to destination for computer repair and Apple services in the area."

name: Toyota Motor Company
tags: Cars & Bikes, Car Body Work, Car Mechanics, New Car Purchases
description:
Toyota Motor Thailand – Driving Innovation and Quality
Toyota Motor Thailand is a leading automotive manufacturer and distributor in the country, recognized for delivering high-quality, innovative vehicles that meet the diverse needs of consumers. As part of the global Toyota family, the company is dedicated to offering exceptional driving experiences, cutting-edge technology, and sustainable mobility solutions for both individuals and businesses.
With a strong commitment to customer satisfaction, Toyota Motor Thailand offers a comprehensive range of vehicles, from compact cars to powerful SUVs and pickups. Popular models like the Toyota Corolla, Toyota Hilux, Toyota Fortuner, and Toyota Camry are known for their reliability, fuel efficiency, and advanced safety features. These vehicles have earned the trust of drivers across Thailand, making Toyota a top choice for those seeking performance, value, and innovation in every drive."

name: The Proud Therapeutic Massage
tags: Beauty & Wellness, Massage
description:
Experience the ultimate relaxation and rejuvenation at The Proud Therapeutic Massage Clinic, located in Ban Saket in the heart of Koh Samui. We offer a wide range of therapeutic massage treatments using reflexology, which is designed to relieve stress, ease muscle tension, promote overall wellness. A reflexologist uses their thumbs, fingers, and sometimes tools to gently apply pressure to these reflex areas. The therapy is known to help with a variety of conditions such as headaches, digestive issues, pain management, and relaxation, as well as promoting a sense of well-being.
At The Proud Therapeutic Massage Clinic, we prioritize your comfort and well-being, using high-quality techniques in a serene environment to ensure a deeply relaxing experience. Ideal for both locals and tourists, our clinic is the perfect place."

name: Mui Dim Sum
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Thai Food, Brunch, Breakfast
description:
Indulge in authentic and flavorful dim sum at
Mui Dim Sum Restaurant
, located in the vibrant Ban Saket area of Koh Samui. Known for its exquisite selection of freshly made dim sum, Mui Dim Sum offers an exceptional dining experience that combines traditional Cantonese recipes with a cozy, welcoming atmosphere. Whether you're a local resident or a visitor to Samui, Mui Dim Sum is the perfect place to enjoy a variety of delicious dumplings, buns, and other bite-sized treats.
Our menu features a wide range of dim sum options, including steamed and fried dumplings, bao buns, spring rolls, and more. Every dish is crafted with the finest ingredients and served hot and fresh, ensuring an authentic taste with every bite. Mui Dim Sum is a must-visit spot for dim sum lovers and food enthusiasts alike."

Saree Lagoon Villa – A Tranquil Escape in Koh Samui
Experience the perfect blend of comfort, luxury, and serenity at Saree Lagoon Villa, an idyllic retreat nestled in the lush tropical beauty of Koh Samui. These private villas offer a peaceful sanctuary, surrounded by vibrant greenery and offering breathtaking garden views that set the stage for ultimate relaxation and rejuvenation.
Saree Lagoon Villa features spacious, beautifully designed interiors that seamlessly combine elegance and modern amenities. Each villa is thoughtfully furnished to provide a comfortable and peaceful atmosphere, ensuring an unforgettable stay. Whether you're lounging by the pool, dining al fresco in the outdoor area, or relaxing in your garden-facing bedroom, every detail is tailored to meet your needs. Immerse yourself in tranquility and luxury at Saree Lagoon Villa, where every moment is designed for relaxation and bliss."

name: Maraleina Fitness Center
tags: Sports & Fitness, Gym & Fitness, Ball Sports, Yoga, Pilates, Sauna, Squash, Plunge Pool
description:
Welcome to Maraleina Fitness Center – Koh Samui’s Premier Fitness Hub
Located in the heart of Koh Samui, Maraleina Fitness Center offers everything you need to achieve your health and fitness goals. Whether you're an elite athlete, a fitness enthusiast, or someone simply looking to stay active, our state-of-the-art facility is designed to cater to all fitness levels with a wide range of equipment and professional services.
Spanning 800 m², Maraleina Fitness Center features cutting-edge training tools and functional fitness zones, providing a comprehensive fitness experience. Our gym is equipped with top-tier Technogym apparatus, while our high-performance center for professional athletes boasts world-class Keiser equipment. Whether you're focusing on strength training, cardiovascular fitness, or improving performance, we have the resources to help you reach your potential.
We also offer expert-led classes including Strength and Conditioning, Pilates Mat, and Yin Yoga, designed to enhance your workout and promote overall well-being. After a hard session, relax and rejuvenate in our changing rooms, sauna, or take a refreshing dip in the plunge pool.
Maraleina Fitness Center is not just a gym—it's a complete wellness destination for anyone serious about fitness in Koh Samui."

name: Maraleina Sports Bar & Restaurant
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Thai Food, Airconditioned Area, Outdoor Dining, Family Friendly, International Food, Breakfast, Wifi Access In Restaurant
description:
Looking for a place where great food meets exciting sports action? Welcome to
Maraleina Sports Bar & Restaurant
, your go-to spot for an unforgettable dining and entertainment experience. Whether you're here to catch the big game, enjoy delicious food, or unwind with friends, we've got you covered.
From mouthwatering appetizers to hearty entrees, our menu offers a wide variety of options to satisfy every craving. Enjoy classic pub fare, fresh seafood, grilled steaks, and much more, all crafted with the finest ingredients.  Don’t miss a moment of the game! With multiple large-screen TVs throughout the venue, you can enjoy live coverage of all your favorite sports—from tennis and basketball to soccer and more. Feel the excitement in the air as you cheer on your team with fellow fans.
Maraleina Sports Bar & Restaurant offers a lively and welcoming atmosphere, perfect for socializing, watching sports, or simply enjoying a night out with friends and family."

tags: Children's Needs, Child Activities, Football
description:
At
Paris Saint-Germain Academy Samui
, we are dedicated to developing young football players from ages 4 to 18, helping them unlock their full potential both on and off the pitch. Our mission is simple: to nurture the next generation of football stars by providing a world-class training environment that promotes growth, discipline, and passion for the game.
From technical and tactical skills to physical conditioning and mental toughness, our programs are designed to enhance every aspect of a player's game. We focus not only on developing athletic abilities but also on fostering important life skills that will help players thrive both on and off the field.
With Paris Saint-Germain’s world-renowned legacy in the football world, players at our academy gain access to elite coaching methods and cutting-edge training techniques used by top professionals. This gives them a unique opportunity to develop in an internationally recognized system."

name: Cafe Meow Co-Working Space
tags: Professional Services, Co Working Spaces
description:
Unique Atmosphere
Nestled in the heart of Koh Samui, Cafe Meow offers a one-of-a-kind setting combining a cozy cat cafe with a professional 24/7 co-working space. The charming ambiance invites both relaxation and productivity, with the added bonus of friendly, adoptable cats roaming freely. Whether you're seeking a serene environment to work or a cozy space to unwind, Cafe Meow provides the perfect escape.
Key Services
At Cafe Meow, we offer flexible co-working packages designed to suit your needs, including daily, weekly, and monthly options. With fast Wi-Fi, comfortable seating, and access to delicious food and beverages, our space ensures you can stay productive and energized. Enjoy exclusive menu discounts with our monthly subscription, making it easier to refuel during your workday.
Commitment to Satisfaction
We are dedicated to providing an exceptional experience where both work and play seamlessly come together. Our friendly staff and welcoming atmosphere ensure you can focus, relax, and create unforgettable memories at Cafe Meow."

name: La Rhumerie de Koh Samui
tags: Things To Do, On The Land, Local Specialities
description:
Step into the world of artisanal rum at
La Rhumerie de Koh Samui
, South Samui’s premier
handcrafted rum distillery
. Nestled in the island’s scenic southern region, we invite you to immerse yourself in the passion and craftsmanship that goes into every drop of our premium rum.
Explore our distillery with a
free guided tour
where our expert staff will walk you through the steps of crafting rum from start to finish, from the careful fermentation of sugarcane to the distillation process. Learn the secrets behind our artisanal rum-making techniques and the history of rum production.
After the tour, enjoy an exclusive
tasting session
of our handcrafted rum. Sample a range of rums, each with its unique character and flavor, from light and fruity to bold and aged varieties. Whether you’re a seasoned rum connoisseur or a newcomer, there's something to excite every palate."

name: The Stoned Table Samui
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Beach Bars, Beachfront, Thai Food, Mexican Food, Vegetarian, International Food, Cocktails, Sunset Restaurant
description:
The Stoned Table: A Unique Dining Experience in Thong Krut, Koh Samui
Tucked away in the charming fishing village of Thong Krut, The Stoned Table offers a one-of-a-kind dining experience on Koh Samui. Located away from the tourist crowds, this intimate restaurant combines creative, high-quality cuisine with a rustic yet relaxed atmosphere, capturing the island’s laid-back essence.
At The Stoned Table, every dish is crafted to perfection, fusing local Thai flavors with international influences. The menu features fresh, locally-sourced ingredients from Thong Krut’s surrounding waters and farms, ensuring a truly authentic taste. From exquisite seafood to vibrant salads and vegan-friendly options, there's something to delight every palate.
The open-air design lets guests dine al fresco, enjoying stunning views of lush greenery and coastal landscapes. With its tranquil setting and warm ambiance, The Stoned Table is the ideal spot for a relaxed yet memorable dining experience. Whether you’re here for a casual meal or a special evening, this restaurant promises a unique taste of Koh Samui’s culinary scene."

name: Cheese Art Gallery
tags: Shopping, Food & Convenience, Deli
description:
A Cheese Lover’s Paradise in Lamai
Cheese Art Gallery, nestled in the heart of Lamai, is a must-visit destination for cheese aficionados. With an extensive selection of artisanal cheeses from around the world, it’s the perfect place to indulge in the finest flavors and textures.
Discover, Taste, Learn
Whether you're looking to purchase premium cheeses for home or enjoy an exclusive tasting experience, this unique gallery offers a space for exploration and culinary discovery. With expert recommendations and personalized service, every visit is an opportunity to deepen your appreciation for cheese.
A Culinary Hub in Lamai
Cheese Art Gallery is more than a shop—it’s a community for cheese lovers, from connoisseurs to curious newcomers, where you can learn, share, and savor the best of global cheese culture."

Located in the peaceful area of Plai Leam, offers a perfect retreat for both short and long stays on Koh Samui. With spacious, fully furnished apartments, it provides a comfortable and private atmosphere ideal for relaxation.
The property features an inviting outdoor swimming pool, a fully equipped gym, and a serene environment perfect for unwinding. Just a short drive from Chaweng Beach, Bophut, and the Fisherman’s Village, guests enjoy easy access to local attractions, dining, and shopping options.
Whether you're seeking a peaceful getaway or a base for exploring the island, Samui Emerald Condotel combines convenience, comfort, and leisure in one perfect package."

This stunning property features spacious pool villas, each designed for comfort and privacy, perfect for families or groups seeking a home-away-from-home experience.
Guests can enjoy an array of on-site facilities including a large outdoor pool, tennis courts, basketball court, and a fully equipped gym. The attentive reception staff is available to assist with any needs, ensuring a hassle-free and enjoyable stay.
Whether you're here to relax by the pool, engage in sports, or explore nearby attractions like Fisherman's Village or Chaweng Beach, Replay Residence & Pool Villa offers the perfect balance of convenience and luxury."

name: LINK Lounge Rooftop
tags: Bars & Nightlife, Rooftop Venues, Open Air, Dj Music, Sunset, Snack Menu, Tapas, Cocktail Bars
description:
LINK Lounge Rooftop, located in the vibrant Fisherman's Village, offers stunning panoramic views of Koh Samui’s coastline and beyond. This stylish rooftop bar is the perfect spot to unwind and enjoy a relaxed atmosphere while sipping on expertly crafted cocktails. Whether you're here for a casual drink with friends or a special evening out, LINK Lounge provides a sophisticated and laid-back setting with a great selection of beverages.
With its elevated position, the lounge offers an unforgettable sunset view, ideal for those looking to enjoy Koh Samui’s natural beauty. The welcoming staff and chic décor make LINK Lounge Rooftop a must-visit destination for both locals and visitors looking for a memorable evening out in Fisherman’s Village."

name: The Beach Samui
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Bar, Wifi Access In Room
description:
Arriving in Thong Krut, a traditional fishing village on the serene southern coast of Koh Samui, is like stepping back in time to the island’s untouched, authentic beauty. Surrounded by a pristine marine park dotted with humpbacked tropical islands, this idyllic location offers the perfect escape to relax and reconnect with nature.
The Beach Samui
offers luxurious accommodations, including Grand Suites, Family Suites, Mezzanine Penthouses, and Superior Suites, are thoughtfully designed to provide ultimate comfort and privacy. Each suite features a spacious private terrace with a hand-carved tub, ideal for unwinding while watching the breathtaking island sunsets. Whether you’re enjoying a soothing infused bath or simply embracing the peaceful ambiance, the evening views promise a truly rejuvenating experience.
Escape the hustle and bustle and rediscover yourself in the tranquil paradise of Thong Krut."

name: The Beach Wellness Retreat
tags: Beauty & Wellness, Massage, Sound Healing
description:
Escape to
The Beach Samui
, where transformative healing and wellness await. Our curated wellbeing retreats are designed to help you reconnect with your best self through holistic lifestyle-change programs that nurture your mind, body, and spirit. Whether you seek to build healthier habits, break negative cycles, or embrace a new version of yourself, our all-inclusive retreats offer the perfect environment for deep, meaningful transformation.
Our carefully curated retreats feature a blend of traditional and modern techniques, led by expert practitioners, including movement specialists, local healers, and herbal pharmacists. Through these transformative practices, you will gain greater self-awareness, mind-body connection, and a renewed sense of purpose.
Enjoy nutritionally balanced meals, carefully crafted to fuel your body and mind with nourishing, whole foods. Our culinary offerings are aligned with our philosophy of wellness, supporting your journey toward better health and vitality."

name: Dining @ The Beach Samui
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Beach Bars, Beachfront, Thai Food, Outdoor Dining, Marijuana Infused Food, Family Friendly, International Food, Mediterranean Food, Breakfast, Wifi Access In Restaurant
description:
At The Beach Samui, food is more than just sustenance; it’s part of your
wellbeing journey
. We believe that nourishing your body with fresh, wholesome ingredients not only supports your physical health but also nurtures your
mind and spirit
. Whether you’re enjoying a casual meal with friends or indulging in a private, curated dining experience, every dish is made with love and the intention to heal, energize, and inspire.
Chef Nui’s culinary creations focus on the freshest,
locally sourced ingredients
that celebrate the essence of Thai cooking. Each dish is thoughtfully prepared to enhance your well-being, offering a balance of flavors that are both delicious and
nutrient-rich
. From aromatic curries and fragrant soups to light, flavorful salads, every meal is an opportunity to experience the true heart of Thai food.
We encourage guests to explore the unique
fusion of Thai cuisine and cannabis
through our specially designed cooking experiences."

name: Cooking Class @ The Beach Samui
tags: Things To Do, Cooking Classes
description:
At
The Beach Samui
, we offer a one-of-a-kind
Private Cooking Class
with
Chef Nui
, where you can learn to prepare a
delicious three-course Thai meal
using traditional recipes passed down through generations. Whether you want to explore the rich flavors of Thai cuisine or infuse your dishes with cannabis for an added wellness boost, Chef Nui will guide you through every step of the process, ensuring a fun, educational, and unforgettable experience.
For those looking to explore the therapeutic benefits of
cannabis-infused cuisine
, Chef Nui will walk you through the process of incorporating cannabis into your dishes in a safe, controlled, and enjoyable way. Each dish will be carefully tailored to your needs and preferences, ensuring a personalized experience that caters to both your culinary tastes and wellness desires.
At the end of your class, you’ll not only enjoy the fruits of your labor with a delicious, homemade three-course meal, but you’ll also walk away with new cooking skills and a
Beach Samui workwear apron
—a special souvenir to remember your culinary adventure."

name: Tan Marina Bay Resort
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Camping, Beachfront, Breakfast, Restaurant, Bar
description:
For those looking for a comfortable base to explore Koh Tan,
Tan Marina Bay Resort & Restaurant
is ideally located. Offering easy access to both the east and west sides of the island, it’s perfect for visitors wanting to explore Koh Tan’s diverse landscapes, enjoy its natural beauty, and relax by the beach. With a welcoming atmosphere and close proximity to key attractions, the resort is an excellent spot to experience the peaceful charm of the island.
Koh Tan is a serene island, covered by mature forests, offering a tranquil escape from Koh Samui. It features two hills, one in the center and one in the north, providing stunning views of the ocean and landscape. The west bay is home to a small mangrove forest, rocky shores, white sandy beaches, and vibrant coral reefs, offering both beauty and tranquility."

name: Samui Photo Express
tags: Professional Services, Photo & Video, Photo Express, Photo Framing
description:
Samui Photo Express and Framing
is a local photography and framing service based in Nathon on Koh Samui, Thailand. They cater to both locals and tourists by offering photography services, including photo prints, as well as custom framing for photos, artwork, and memorabilia.
Samui Photo Express offers bespoke framing solutions to showcase your artwork, photos, and other memorabilia. Whether it's a beautiful island landscape or a cherished family photograph, they can provide a frame that complements the piece. Clients can choose from a variety of materials, including wood, metal, and contemporary designs. They also offer a selection of matting and glass finishes to ensure your framed piece looks its best and is protected."

name: Superpro Gym
tags: Sports & Fitness, Gym & Fitness, Brazilian Jiu-jitsu, Muay Thai, Mixed Martial Arts, Martial Arts
description:
Superpro Samui: Premier Training Facility in Koh Samui
Superpro Samui, located on Koh Samui, Thailand, is a premier training facility for athletes and fitness enthusiasts. Whether you’re a professional fighter, a beginner improving your skills, or looking for a fitness retreat, Superpro Samui has everything to elevate your training experience.
The facility features four Muay Thai rings, perfect for training and sparring, with world-class coaching in this traditional martial art. For Mixed Martial Arts (MMA) practitioners, Superpro Samui offers an official MMA cage, ideal for grappling, striking, and cage work in a safe environment.
In addition, a spacious Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu (BJJ) and MMA dojo provides ample space for ground fighting, submissions, and transitions, crucial for athletes training in grappling or MMA.
With top-tier equipment and expert instruction, Superpro Samui is the perfect place to enhance your training, whether you're starting out or competing at the highest level."

name: Tan Marina Bay Restaurant
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Beachfront, Thai Food, International Food, Breakfast
description:
Tan Marina Bay Restaurant: Exceptional Dining with a View of Koh Tan
Tan Marina Bay Restaurant offers a unique dining experience, nestled near the serene waters of Koh Tan, a small island just off the coast of Koh Samui. Known for its stunning views and tranquil atmosphere, our restaurant provides the perfect setting to enjoy delicious meals while surrounded by nature’s beauty. Whether you're here for a casual lunch or a special evening dinner, Tan Marina Bay ensures a memorable experience.
Our menu features a variety of dishes, focusing on fresh seafood and locally sourced ingredients. From flavorful Thai cuisine to international favorites, each dish is crafted with precision to deliver authentic and satisfying flavors. While dining, enjoy picturesque views of Koh Tan and the surrounding bay, making every meal feel like a special occasion.
At Tan Marina Bay, we pride ourselves on offering both a relaxed and upscale atmosphere, where guests can unwind and savor exceptional food with a stunning backdrop. Whether you’re visiting for a quick bite or a leisurely dinner, our restaurant offers an unforgettable dining experience just a short distance from the island of Koh Samui."

description:
Welcome to Samui Aquarium and Tiger Zoo, a premier animal park on the beautiful island of Koh Samui. Established 20 years ago as part of the renowned Ocean Resort Koh Samui, we have been committed to providing a unique and memorable experience for visitors, while ensuring the highest standards of care for our animals.
As we continue to upgrade and evolve, we remain dedicated to offering a world-class experience without compromising the comfort of our guests or the well-being of our animals. Our goal is to be the leading animal park in southern Thailand, and we are constantly improving our facilities to make your visit even more enjoyable.
At Samui Aquarium and Tiger Zoo, we take pride in the happiness and health of our animals. Our team is carefully selected to ensure that only true animal lovers, with a genuine passion for wildlife, care for our creatures."

name: The Ocean Restaurant
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Private Dining, Beachfront, Meat Lovers, Seafood, Thai Food, Outdoor Dining, Breakfast, Cocktails
description:
Nestled at the absolute beachfront, The Ocean Restaurant offers a unique dining experience that combines the best of traditional Thai home-cooking with modern culinary techniques.
With breathtaking, undisturbed views of the ocean, our restaurant serves authentic Siamese seafood dishes crafted from the freshest seasonal ingredients, making every meal a true celebration of Thailand's rich culinary heritage.
At The Ocean Restaurant, we proudly feature recipes passed down through generations—granny's secret recipes that showcase the diverse flavors of Thailand.
Unlike many hotel and resort dining options, we focus on serving dishes that are rarely found outside of local homes, ensuring you get an authentic taste of Thai cuisine. From fragrant curries to spicy salads and savory stir-fries, our menu highlights the healthy and vibrant dishes that define Thai food."

Whether you dream of an intimate ceremony by the water or a grand celebration surrounded by loved ones, we ensure every detail is crafted to perfection.
Our dedicated wedding team will work tirelessly to bring your vision to life, providing personalized service and creating an atmosphere that reflects your unique love story. From the moment you say ""I do"" to the last dance, we’ll ensure that every moment is memorable, enjoyable, and filled with joy—a treasure you’ll hold dear for a lifetime.
Allow

to be a small but meaningful part of your beautiful love story. Let us help you create the wedding of your dreams, where cherished memories are made and love is celebrated."

name: Centara Villas
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Pool Villas, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Bar, Room With Private Pool, Wifi Access In Room, Air Conditioning, Family Rooms, Sun Loungers Or Beach Chairs, Sun Umbrellas, Wellness, 24 Hours Front Desk
description:
Escape to the enchanting island of Koh Samui, where palm-fringed beaches, lush jungle hills, and sprawling coconut groves await. Located in the Gulf of Thailand, Koh Samui is the perfect blend of natural beauty, laid-back charm, and international sophistication.
At Centara Villas Samui, located on the southern tip of the island with stunning beachfront views, you’ll find an idyllic retreat like no other. Our resort features a collection of luxurious beachfront villas set amidst tropical gardens.
Centara Villas Samui offers the perfect blend of modern comfort and natural beauty. The villas gently cascade down a hillside, offering panoramic views of the crystal-clear waters of the Gulf of Thailand and each villa is designed to seamlessly blend into the surrounding verdant landscape creating a serene ambiance and an unforgettable experience."

Our dive center is known for its comfortable boats and small-group or private diving experiences. With highly experienced European instructors, we provide personalized attention, ensuring you feel safe and confident underwater.
Koh Samui offers ideal diving conditions, including 30°C water, mild winds, and calm, current-free dive sites for most of the year, making it the perfect place to learn and explore the underwater world."

description:
Welcome to Ohm Auto Chaweng, your trusted destination for all things automotive! Whether you're gearing up for your next adventure, upgrading your vehicle, or keeping it in top shape, we offer everything you need to enhance your ride. Our wide selection of wheels, tires, suspension systems, bumpers, and winches is designed to meet the needs of both everyday drivers and off-road enthusiasts. Plus, we’ve got a full range of maintenance essentials to keep your vehicle running smoothly, including premium MOTO oils and lubricants.
Upgrade your ride with our high-quality wheels and tires, available for all types of vehicles, from cars and trucks to off-road vehicles. We carry top brands known for durability, performance, and style. Whether you need hybrid tires, off-road tires, or performance wheels, we’ve got the perfect match for your vehicle.
Experience smoother, safer driving with our top-of-the-line suspension systems. From lifting kits to shock absorbers and struts, we offer parts that improve handling, comfort, and stability. Whether you’re looking to level your truck, enhance your off-road capabilities, or simply replace worn-out components, we have the suspension solutions you need."

description:
The Dive Academy
Welcome to The Dive Academy, a renowned PADI 5-Star Dive Centre in Koh Samui, offering unforgettable diving and snorkeling experiences. Founded in 2005, we’ve earned a reputation for excellence underwater and above. Whether you're a beginner or looking to advance your skills, we provide a safe, fun, and professional environment for all levels.
We offer a full range of PADI courses, from certifications to professional dive training, with lessons available in English, French, German, Russian, Spanish, and Polish. Our multilingual team ensures clear communication throughout your training.
In addition to daily diving and snorkeling trips, we also offer private tours for a more personalized, exclusive experience."

name: Seatran Ferry Discovery
tags: Transport, Ferries, Full Moon Party Transfer
description:
Seatran Ferries
With over 16 years of experience in the ferry and cruise industry, Seatran Ferries is a trusted name for travel between Koh Samui, Koh Phangan, and Koh Tao. Our fleet of modern, high-capacity ferries ensures fast, safe, and reliable service, offering a smooth and comfortable journey.
Our goal is to provide the highest level of comfort and luxury for passengers. We’ve partnered with top interior designers to craft stunning yacht interiors and incorporated the latest technological innovations for an exceptional experience. Every detail is designed to make your time on board relaxing and enjoyable."

name: Seatran Ferry
tags: Transport, Ferries
description:
Seatran Ferries
Seatran Ferries offers round-trip services between Donsak and Koh Samui, providing a fast, reliable, and comfortable travel experience. Our modern fleet can carry up to 90 cars and 600 passengers per trip, with a journey time of around 1 hour 30 minutes.
Ferries run every hour from 05:00 to 18:00, and additional boats are added during peak times to ensure a smooth experience. Certified by both domestic and international bodies, we prioritize safety, comfort, and reliability.
We’re committed to continuous improvement, aiming to offer world-class ferry services to all passengers."

Samui Sight and Sound is a state-of-the-art music studio designed to inspire and support artists of all genres. Whether you're a seasoned producer or a budding talent, our meticulously crafted space is tailored to bring your sound to life.
Our studio boasts custom-designed isolation booths, a bass-friendly control room for editing, mixing, and mastering, and a dedicated drum/grand piano room. The main area features adjustable acoustics and high ceilings, ensuring a perfect balance between sound and space. Every detail is designed to help you make the most of your creativity.
Nestled in the natural beauty of Koh Samui, Samui Sight and Sound offers an unparalleled recording experience in a tropical paradise."

Your local brunch house offering a fresh, healthy, and delicious dining experience on the beautiful island of Koh Samui. At SO Cafe, we believe in nourishing your body with wholesome, quality ingredients, which is why we take pride in serving homemade bakery items that are freshly baked daily. Our baked goods are crafted with love and care, ensuring the highest quality and taste in every bite. Savor our rich, aromatic specialty coffee, the perfect pairing for your meal.

Plus, our smoothies contain no added sugar or ice, delivering a clean, refreshing taste. Whether you're in the mood for a wholesome breakfast, a revitalizing smoothie, or a delightful treat, SO Cafe Samui is the perfect spot to satisfy your cravings and enjoy fresh, homemade delights. tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Live Music, Thai Food
description:
Srikwan Restaurant offers a delightful dining experience in a tranquil setting, perfect for both locals and tourists. The restaurant serves a variety of mouth-watering dishes that combine traditional Thai flavors with international influences, making it an ideal spot for all tastes.
With a focus on fresh, locally sourced ingredients, Srikwan Restaurant creates vibrant and flavorful dishes that reflect the essence of Thai cuisine. Whether you're in the mood for spicy curries, fresh seafood, or savory grilled meats, there’s something to satisfy every palate. The restaurant also offers a range of vegetarian and vegan options, ensuring a welcoming dining experience for all guests.
Srikwan Restaurant is known for its relaxed atmosphere, friendly service, and picturesque views, making it a great choice for a casual meal or a special gathering with family and friends. Whether you're stopping by for a quick bite or a leisurely meal, you're sure to enjoy a memorable dining experience."

description:
Yobye Rooftop Samui offers the perfect setting to create unforgettable moments. With stunning views of Koh Samui, it's the ideal spot to relax with a drink in hand, enjoy soothing music, and share a chat with friends and family. The rooftop bar provides a casual, laid-back atmosphere where you can unwind while enjoying delicious Thai foof dishes.
Whether you're watching the sunset, having fun with loved ones, or simply enjoying the beautiful scenery, Yobye Rooftop guarantees a memorable experience. It’s the place to be for a fun and relaxing time in Koh Samui!"

name: House Of Lucie
tags: Things To Do, Art & Culture
description:
House of Lucie, Koh Samui, Thailand
Located on the beautiful island of Koh Samui, House of Lucie is a cultural hub showcasing global photography talent. It highlights works from Lucie Awards and IPA winners, offering diverse exhibitions, lectures, and events.
This three-story space also hosts the Koh Samui Art Center, where locals can engage in photography, painting, sculpting, pottery, and paint-making workshops. Nestled in a tropical setting, House of Lucie fosters global connections and artistic dialogue. A unique event, ""One Shot – One Minute,"" invites participants to share a photograph and discuss its emotional impact."
