name: MG Bistro Restaurant
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Bars & Entertainment, Fast Food, International Food, Cocktails
description:
The Perfect Spot to Eat, Drink & Chill
Welcome to MG Bistro Restaurant, the place where every meal is an experience. Nestled in the heart of Fisherman’s Village, Ko Samui, we’re here to offer a taste adventure you won’t want to miss. Open daily, our laid-back vibe and delicious offerings make it the perfect spot to enjoy great food, drinks, and good company.
At MG Bistro, dining is more than just about the food – it’s about the atmosphere. Our stunning garden setting adds something special to every meal. Surrounded by lush tropical plants and the sounds of birds chirping, you can enjoy breakfast in the sunshine or dinner under the stars, all while soaking in the peaceful vibes. Whether you’re here for a casual meal or celebrating with friends, our spacious seating areas inside and in the garden ensure everyone feels at home.
And don’t forget – we’re cannabis-friendly! Whether you’re with family, friends, or a big group, just show up and relax. No need for reservations; just come and enjoy the good times at MG Bistro."

name: Oriental Princess
tags: Shopping, Beauty & Personal Care, Cosmetic Products
description:
A leading beauty brand offering a wide range of high-quality products for both women and men. Oriental Princess offers a wide collection of products that include rejuvenating skincare, vibrant makeup, and indulgent personal care items, all designed to enhance your natural beauty and promote healthy, radiant skin.
For men, we offer a dedicated line of grooming essentials, including soothing face washes, energizing serums, and shaving products, tailored to meet their unique skincare needs.
Infused with natural ingredients and advanced skincare technology, each product delivers visible results. Whether you’re seeking luxurious skincare, bold cosmetics, or effective grooming solutions, Oriental Princess cosmetics has everything you need for a complete beauty routine."

Shades & Construction
We specialize in providing high-quality, UV-stabilized High Density Polyethylene (HDPE) sail shades, perfect for a variety of uses. Our products are designed to offer both protection and style for homes, gardens, building sites, farms, and agricultural areas.
The durable, weather-resistant fabric ensures long-lasting performance while effectively blocking harmful UV rays. Whether you're looking to shade your outdoor living area, protect crops, or cover construction sites, our sail shades are the ideal solution.
Trust Sail Shades Thailand for premium shading solutions that enhance both functionality and aesthetics. Explore our range today for a versatile, durable, and eco-friendly option to meet your shading needs!"

name: Nature Jewelry
tags: Shopping, Jewelry & Watches
description:
In ancient times, shamans, priests, and healers harnessed the power of crystals and stones for protection and healing. Today, their power and beauty continue to have a profound effect on all who come in contact with them.
Crystals are pure energy that sparkle and call out, inviting you to experience their healing effects. Known for their ability to lift spirits, heal the body, and open chakras, these natural wonders help clear auras, improve memory, repel electromagnetic emissions, and support personal growth. Each stone carries its own unique energy, waiting to support you on your journey.
Created by Micha and Shai, our collection of unique crystal jewelry combines beauty with healing properties. With a deep love and understanding of the power of crystals, Micha and Shai are dedicated to sharing their knowledge and educating the public about the transformative qualities of stones. Through their creations, they aim to bring the healing power of crystals to you, offering pieces that are not only stunning but also deeply nourishing for the mind, body, and soul."

Our service excellence is why many customers choose Seara for both pre-owned and brand-new equipment—something you won’t find with department stores or online sellers of entry-level products. When you shop with Seara, you're investing in more than just equipment; you're investing in long-lasting quality and top-notch support."

name: Samui Lapidary
tags: Shopping, Jewelry & Watches, Handcrafted
description:
Explore Koh Samui's premier destination for fine jewelry, located in the island's northern town of Maenam, conveniently just off the ring road. As the largest jewelry store and manufacturer on the island, we offer a magnificent selection of gold, white gold, and silver accessories, featuring both classic and contemporary international designs, each crafted with meticulous attention to detail.
Our extensive collections include stunning pieces for every occasion, from timeless classics to the latest trends. Additionally, Samui Lapidary showcases vibrant individual gemstones—both precious and semi-precious—along with exquisite South Sea pearls. Our store also offers a variety of unique regional and local souvenirs, allowing you to take home a piece of the island’s charm.
Samui Lapidary provides unmatched quality and craftsmanship. Visit us today and immerse yourself in the beauty of our jewelry collections, hand-selected to delight and inspire."

name: Prima
tags: Shopping, Jewelry & Watches, Handcrafted
description:
A leading name in the world of luxury jewelry, renowned for its 99.9% pure 24K gold pieces and exquisite diamond jewelry. With a legacy built on quality, craftsmanship, and innovation, PRIMA continues to captivate jewelry enthusiasts with its stunning collections that showcase superior gold and diamond craftsmanship.
Each PRIMA creation is a testament to meticulous attention to detail, utilizing special techniques that highlight the artistry of skilled craftsmen. These craftsmen have honed their expertise through years of collaboration with world-class brands, ensuring that every piece of PRIMA jewelry is both beautiful and expertly crafted.
Whether you're looking for a striking gold necklace, a dazzling diamond ring, or a custom-made piece, PRIMA offers a unique blend of timeless design and exceptional quality. Experience the luxury and elegance of PRIMA jewelry – a symbol of Thailand's finest craftsmanship."

tags: Shopping, Jewelry & Watches, Delivery, Women's Clothes
description:
Belle and Shine, located in Chaweng, offers a stylish and accessible collection of costume jewelry designed to complement every woman’s unique style. Our pieces are versatile, allowing you to effortlessly mix and match for any occasion, whether it's a casual day out or a formal event.
Our stunning range includes necklaces, earrings, bracelets, and rings, available in both gold and silver finishes. Crafted with high-quality materials and gold-plated designs, each piece feels like a second skin—elegant, minimalist, and timeless. At Belle and Shine, we make luxury accessible by providing beautiful jewelry at affordable prices, ensuring every woman can shine with confidence."

name: The Hangout
tags: Bars & Nightlife, Bars & Pubs, Cannabis Friendly, Cannabis & Games
description:
Welcome to our cannabis emporium in Maenam, Koh Samui, your ultimate hangout spot! Step into our indoor chill lounge and relax in a laid-back atmosphere, perfect for unwinding with friends or enjoying some solo time. We offer hand-curated craft cannabis alongside a selection of craft beers, ensuring your visit is filled with top-quality options to elevate your experience.
For those who love a good game, we feature the newest video games in a cozy setting where you can game, chill, and sip on a refreshing drink. Whether you're a cannabis connoisseur or a gamer looking to vibe out, The Hangout is the place to be. Come hang out with us, enjoy the good vibes, and indulge in everything we have to offer in the heart of Samui."

name: Samui Health Shop
tags: Shopping, Food & Convenience, Clothing, Beauty & Personal Care, Health Food, Clothing Accessories, Organic Products
description:
We are dedicated to providing natural, safe, and effective personal care and lifestyle products at reasonable prices. Our mission is to make natural lifestyle choices accessible to a wider market, offering a true and authentic alternative to mass-produced synthetic products. Sourced from all over Thailand, our products are crafted with care and tradition, ensuring the highest quality.
We pride ourselves on offering only the finest organic and natural products, created using simple, traditional methods that preserve the integrity and potency of nature’s ingredients. Whether you’re looking for skincare, wellness, or personal care essentials, our collection reflects our commitment to purity and sustainability.
In addition to promoting well-being, we are mindful of our environmental impact. Samui Health Shop carefully selects products with eco-friendly packaging, ensuring they are recyclable and have minimal impact on the environment."

name: Lamphu Kitchen
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Keto Friendly, Fusion Food, Vegan, Vegetarian, Health Food
description:
We believe that being healthy and fit isn’t just a fad or trend—it’s a lifestyle. Our mission is to pair great-tasting, wholesome ingredients with healthy living, creating meals that not only nourish your body but also excite your taste buds.
We offer a wide selection of healthy food options, including vegetarian dishes and superfoods that provide the nutrients your body needs to thrive. Try our veggie-packed meals and superfood options for a longer, healthier life, or enjoy our super juices to feel revitalized and energized.
Inspired by the concept of ""from farm to table,"" our menu celebrates traditional cuisine while using the freshest, locally grown and raised ingredients. We focus on serving honest food that’s not only delicious but also economical, authentic, and healthy."

Our range includes tennis racquets tailored to suit various playing styles and skill levels, ensuring you find the perfect match for your game. We also offer tennis shoes designed for comfort, durability, and support, keeping you agile and ready for every match. Additionally, we provide tennis and badminton stringing services, where our experts ensure your racquets are strung to perfection, giving you the best performance on the court.
At PP Samui Tennis Padel Shop, we are dedicated to providing excellent customer service and offering only the best gear and equipment to help you succeed. Visit us today and get ready for your next match!"

description:

description:
Transform your game room into the ultimate entertainment hub, we offer a selection of high-quality billiard tables and table games that cater to players of all skill levels. Whether you're hosting friends, family, or looking to add a touch of luxury to your home, our premium pool tables promise durability, style, and hours of fun.

name: Samui Safety Box
tags: Legal & Financial Services, Safe Deposit Box, Safe Deposit Box
description:
In today’s world, safeguarding your valuable assets has never been more crucial. With major banks discontinuing safe deposit box services, Samui Safety Box provides an excellent alternative, meeting the highest standards in security and privacy. Our facility offers a range of safe deposit boxes designed to suit various customer needs, ensuring your valuables are stored with the utmost care and protection.
We offer boxes in a variety of sizes:
Small boxes: Perfect for storing jewelry, cash, precious coins, computer backup discs, and important documents.
Medium-sized boxes: Ideal for important papers, property deeds, and other essential documents.
Large boxes: Designed for luxury watches, jewelry, large quantities of valuables, and even artwork that requires secure storage.
Located in a first-class building, Samui Safety Box is equipped with a state-of-the-art surveillance system, including smoke, motion, and vibration sensors, as well as CCTV cameras that are monitored 24/7. Our control room ensures constant monitoring for the highest level of security."

name: Trash Hero
tags: Charity, Community
description:
The mission of Trash Hero is to unite communities to clean up and reduce waste through impactful action and awareness.
We achieve this by:
Action and Awareness
: Our volunteers actively clean up and inspire others to join in, helping people understand the importance of waste reduction and management.
Education
: Through our multilingual kids’ programme, we teach children about the impact of plastic on the ocean, while adults participate in hands-on activities and workshops to learn effective waste management.
Sustainable Projects
: We implement long-term initiatives to help communities better manage and reduce waste, while also developing strategies to prevent future waste generation.
Inspiration
: We encourage individuals to adopt plastic-free habits in their daily lives, promoting small steps toward a zero-waste world through positive messaging and a vision of sustainable change.
Join us in making a difference—become a Trash Hero!"

description:
We are dedicated to providing exceptional veterinary care for your beloved pets. Our clinic offers a wide range of services to ensure your pet’s health and well-being, from routine check-ups to advanced medical treatments. With a team of compassionate and highly skilled veterinarians, we are committed to delivering the highest standard of care for your furry friends.
At Youngnum Pet Hospital, we provide comprehensive services including preventative care, vaccinations, diagnostic testing, and surgical procedures. Our state-of-the-art facilities are equipped with the latest technology to diagnose and treat a variety of conditions, ensuring that your pet receives the best care possible. Whether your pet needs emergency care, dental treatments, or a simple wellness check, our team is here to offer personalized and professional care."

name: VitaXcell
tags: Health & Medical, Doctors & Clinics, Physiotherapy & Rehab, Iv Drips, Stemcell Therapy, Shockwave Therapy, Plasmapheresis, Laser Light Iv
description:
We specialize in high-potency stem cell therapy combined with a range of advanced therapeutics designed to alleviate pain, accelerate injury recovery, combat autoimmune diseases, and promote anti-aging. Our cutting-edge treatments are tailored to restore and optimize both your physical and cognitive performance, empowering you to live a pain-free, vibrant life.
We offer a comprehensive suite of advanced treatments, including IV stem cell therapy, PRP (platelet-rich plasma), plasmapheresis, laser light IV, and focused shockwave therapies. These therapies work synergistically to provide long-lasting chronic pain relief, enhance cognitive function, and accelerate recovery from injuries.
Whether you are seeking an alternative to risky and expensive surgery, aiming to boost your energy and cognitive function, or looking to regain a youthful appearance and support longevity, VitaXcell offers personalized treatments to meet your needs. We focus on helping you recover faster, feel stronger, and age gracefully."

name: Success Gym
tags: Sports & Fitness, Gym & Fitness, Yoga, Personal Trainer, Sauna, Muay Thai
description:
The largest and most advanced fitness center in the center of Chaweng, whether you're a local or a visitor, we provide the perfect environment to reach your fitness goals with our brand-new equipment and spacious facilities. Our gym is designed to cater to every fitness need, offering a variety of areas to maximize your workout experience.
At Success Gym, we offer a separate cardio zone to get your heart pumping, along with a dedicated classroom for group fitness classes. Whether you're into high-energy workouts or strength training, we have everything you need to stay motivated and achieve your fitness aspirations.
In addition to our state-of-the-art gym equipment, we also provide free sauna access, allowing you to relax and unwind after a tough workout. Plus, with ample parking space, you’ll never have to worry about finding a spot when you visit."

name: Cascade Tara
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Parking, Mini Golf
description:
The perfect blend of luxury, comfort, and nature with 36 elegantly designed rooms, each boasting contemporary decor and stylish furnishings, the resort promises an unforgettable stay. Guests can enjoy breathtaking panoramic views of the magnificent mountain range, a serene stream, lush fruit gardens, and the fresh air of nature right from the comfort of their rooms. Some rooms even feature private balconies, allowing guests to immerse themselves in the tranquil beauty of the island.
Whether you're seeking a peaceful getaway or an adventure in nature,
Cascade Tara Resort
is the perfect destination. The idyllic surroundings, combined with world-class amenities, ensure that your stay is both relaxing and rejuvenating. Experience the essence of Koh Samui’s natural beauty while enjoying modern luxury at Cascade Tara Resort. Book your stay now and indulge in a truly unforgettable experience!"

name: Cascade Tara Camping
tags: Accommodation, Camping, Breakfast, Parking
description:
Experience the beauty of nature with a unique camping experience at our spacious camping area, surrounded by tranquil streams and majestic cliffs, offers the perfect escape for those seeking adventure and serenity. Enjoy the soothing sounds of nature while being shaded by lush, natural forests – a true retreat from the hustle and bustle of everyday life.
Whether you're bringing your own gear or choosing from our fully-equipped, comfortable campground tents, the experience promises comfort and convenience. For those who enjoy outdoor cooking, we provide areas where you can grill and relax with friends and family.
With clean and accessible bathroom facilities on-site, you can immerse yourself in nature without sacrificing comfort. Whether you're an avid camper or new to the experience, the
Cascade Tara Resort camping area
offers the ideal blend of adventure and relaxation, all within the stunning surroundings of Koh Samui."

name: Tara Bistro
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Afternoon Tea, Seafood, Thai Food, Outdoor Dining, Family Friendly, Vegetarian, International Food
description:
Where every dish is crafted with the finest ingredients and a touch of local flair. Our kitchen takes pride in offering an array of delicious, signature dishes that will satisfy every craving.
Start your meal with our Tara Bistro Cold Prawns, served with a zesty, spicy sauce. We use large tiger prawns from our very own farm, ensuring the freshest taste in every bite. Another must-try is the Goong Saep Tara – stir-fried prawns cooked in our secret homemade spicy sauce, a dish everyone must order.For those who love traditional flavors, enjoy our Massaman Curry made with tender beef or pork, following recipes passed down through generations. Savor the rich and comforting taste of this beloved dish.
Whether you're looking for bold and spicy or rich and comforting, Tara Bistro at Cascade Tara Resort provides an unforgettable dining experience that brings the best of Thai and International cuisine to your table."

name: Cascade Tara Events
tags: Professional Services, Wedding Planners, Wedding Venues, Meeting Rooms & Venues
description:
Celebrate your love and special occasions in style at the perfect venue for both Thai and Western weddings, as well as unforgettable parties. Set amidst the stunning natural beauty of Koh Samui, our resort offers a breathtaking atmosphere that’s ideal for romantic couples looking for a picturesque setting to say ""I do.""
Whether you're envisioning a traditional Thai wedding ceremony or a Western-style celebration, our team is here to help bring your dream event to life. From intimate ceremonies to grand receptions, our venue can accommodate your every need, with a selection of elegant settings surrounded by lush greenery, tranquil streams, and majestic cliffs.
With expert event planning services and personalized touches, your wedding or celebration at
Cascade Tara Resort
will be nothing short of magical. Whether it's an intimate gathering or a large celebration, we ensure your special day is flawlessly executed, creating memories that will last a lifetime."

name: Tropical Kaleidoscop
tags: Children's Needs, Child Activities, Excursions, Children's Camp
description:
An exciting and unforgettable experience for children looking to spend a summer full of adventure, creativity, and learning on the beautiful shores of Koh Samui. Set in a stunning, natural environment, this camp provides the perfect blend of active recreation and educational activities in a safe, fun-filled atmosphere.
Each morning at the camp begins with invigorating exercises in the fresh island air, followed by a delicious breakfast featuring fresh local fruits. The day is packed with a wide range of exciting activities, including swimming, sports, and outdoor games, designed to keep children active and engaged.Creative minds will thrive with hands-on workshops in drawing, modeling, mosaic, collage, and crafting using natural materials – all designed to inspire imagination and creativity.
As the sun sets, the camp transforms into a magical space for evening activities. Bonfires, songs around the campfire, storytelling, and friendly competitions create a warm and inclusive atmosphere that fosters lasting friendships"

description:
A Unique Street Bar with an Artistic Touch
Located in the heart of Bophut, this inspirational street bar offers a refreshing atmosphere with daily changing art and decoration. It’s the perfect spot to meet new people, unwind after a relaxing day at the beach, or begin your night out on Samui.
Art and Souvenirs with a Personal Touch
The bar is uniquely decorated with art influenced by the owner’s fine art knowledge, offering a creative and exotic ambiance. Many visitors fall in love with the art and choose to take home souvenirs, such as handmade gifts, reflecting the essence of Samui. Reasonably priced, the On Street Bar Samui souvenir collection is the perfect gift for loved ones or as a special addition to your home. Here at On Street Bar Samui, we share smiles, good vibes, and create lasting memories for all who visit."

tags: Things To Do, On The Water, Private Boat, Ang Thong Marine National Park, Private Tours

A Unique Island Experience
Set against the stunning backdrop of Koh Samui’s coastline, this VIP boat service offers an exceptional way to explore the Southern Islands and the renowned Angthong National Marine Park. Designed for comfort and luxury, the boat provides a unique, personalized experience tailored to your preferences, ensuring a memorable adventure in paradise.
Tailored Tours and Experiences
Choose from a variety of tours, including private trips to secluded beaches, island hopping adventures, and scenic explorations of the Angthong Marine Park. Whether you’re looking for a peaceful day on the water or an exciting island discovery, the tours are crafted to meet your needs, with flexible itineraries and top-notch service.
Dedicated to Exceptional Service
With a focus on luxury, comfort, and personalized attention, this service is committed to delivering a premium experience, ensuring that every journey is unforgettable. From booking to the end of the tour, the priority is always customer satisfaction."

name: Mr. Tappo Van and Taxi Samui
tags: Transport, Minivan & Car With Driver, Private Taxi
description:
Your trusted transportation provider on the beautiful island of Koh Samui. Whether you're a local resident or a visitor, we offer reliable, safe, and comfortable transportation services to meet all your travel needs. Our fleet of well-maintained vans and taxis is available for both short and long-distance journeys, ensuring a stress-free experience every time.
We specialize in providing quick and convenient airport transfers, ensuring you can start your trip with ease and comfort. Our private taxi services allow you to enjoy a comfortable ride to any destination, be it a hotel, tourist attraction, or business meeting. For larger parties, family outings, or corporate events, we offer group transfers with our spacious vans. If you’re looking to explore Koh Samui’s scenic beauty, our sightseeing tours are a great option to discover stunning beaches, viewpoints, and cultural landmarks. Additionally, we offer hourly and daily rentals for those who need a taxi or van for a full day of travel."

name: Samui airport shuttle service

description:

Samui International Airport

Our
airport shuttle service

private transport services
offer a personalized and direct ride to your destination, be it a hotel, villa, or any other location on the island.
For those seeking comfort and privacy, our
private transport services

luxurious cars

name: The Driver Samui
tags: Transport, Minivan & Car With Driver, Private Taxi
description:
Trusted transportation provider for seamless airport and ferry pier transfers on the beautiful island of Koh Samui. Whether you’re arriving by air or sea, we ensure a smooth and hassle-free journey from your arrival point to your destination. Our airport transfer service guarantees timely pickups and drop-offs at Samui International Airport. With our professional drivers, you can rest assured that your trip will start or end with comfort and ease. We offer a range of vehicles to suit your needs, from private cars to spacious vans, ensuring you and your group travel in style and comfort.

Whether you’re arriving from Don Sak Pier or Nathon Pier, our drivers are ready to greet you with a warm welcome and take you directly to your next stop.At The Driver Samui, we prioritize customer satisfaction, offering affordable, reliable, and professional services."

description:
Looking for a professional wedding makeup artist in Koh Samui to enhance your natural beauty on your special day? Our expert team of professional makeup artists is here to create a flawless and personalized bridal look that complements your unique style. Whether you’re planning an intimate beach wedding, a lavish ceremony, or a romantic sunset celebration, we specialize in creating stunning bridal makeup that lasts all day and night.
In addition to wedding makeup, we also offer makeup services for other special events, including engagement parties, anniversaries, birthdays, and any occasion where you want to look and feel your best. Our Koh Samui-based makeup artists use high-quality products and techniques to ensure your makeup not only looks beautiful but also feels comfortable and long-lasting. From soft, glowing natural looks to bold, glamorous styles, we work closely with you to bring your vision to life."

name: Wedding Shop
tags: Shopping, Clothing, Wedding Dresses
description:
Discover the perfect wedding dress for your dream day at our exclusive wedding shop in Koh Samui. Whether you're envisioning a classic Western-style gown or a beautifully traditional Thai dress, we offer a wide selection of stunning wedding dresses that will make you feel like royalty as you walk down the aisle. Our collection features a blend of intricate designs, luxurious fabrics, and flattering cuts that cater to both Western and Thai bridal styles, ensuring that every bride finds the dress that reflects her unique personality and cultural heritage.
Our expert team of consultants will work closely with you to understand your vision, helping you choose the ideal dress for your special day. From the timeless elegance of Western bridal gowns to the rich cultural beauty of Thai wedding dresses, we ensure that each dress is tailored to perfection for a flawless fit. We also offer customization services, allowing you to personalize your dress with exquisite details that make it truly yours."

name: Vida Mandala Art Samui
tags: Things To Do, Art & Culture, Arts & Crafts
description:
Immerse yourself in the calming and therapeutic process of creating Mandala art, a centuries-old tradition passed down by Tibetan monks of the Mahayana sect. The word ""Mandala"" means 'center of everything,' symbolizing the balance and harmony within your mind and spirit, often referred to as the 'Realm of Enlightenment' in Buddhist spirituality.
At Vida Mandala, we offer a unique opportunity to explore your creative potential through the peaceful and meditative practice of Mandala Dot Painting Art Therapy. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced artist, our workshops are designed to help you tap into your inner creativity while promoting mindfulness and relaxation. The rhythmic, repetitive nature of dot painting not only encourages self-expression but also provides a sense of calm and focus, making it a perfect activity for stress relief and personal growth."

Chawenghill Village – Chaweng, Koh Samui
Nestled on the scenic mountainside of Chaweng, Chawenghill Village offers a range of spacious and modern accommodation options, including studio, 1-bedroom, 2-bedroom, and 3-bedroom apartments and villas. Each unit is designed with comfort and style in mind, making it the perfect choice for families, couples, or solo travelers looking to stay in a tranquil setting while still being close to the vibrant Chaweng area.
Accommodation Features
Variety of Units
: Choose from studio apartments to 3-bedroom villas, catering to different group sizes and preferences.
Communal and Private Pools
: While most apartments have access to a communal pool, some offer a private pool or a small pool shared with only a few other apartments, ensuring a peaceful and intimate experience.
Scenic Location
: Enjoy breathtaking views of the mountainside, perfect for those seeking a serene retreat away from the hustle and bustle.
Whether you're seeking a peaceful getaway or a home base close to Chaweng's excitement, Chawenghill Village is an ideal choice for your stay on Koh Samui."

name: Sweden Village

description:
Sweden Village – Luxury Stay in Chaweng, Koh Samui
Sweden Village offers a luxurious and affordable retreat for those seeking quality time on the paradise island of Koh Samui. Located in the vibrant area of Chaweng, our accommodation features stylish 1, 2, and 3-bedroom villas and apartments available for rent on a weekly, monthly, or yearly basis. Whether you're planning a short getaway or a long-term stay, Sweden Village provides the perfect blend of comfort, luxury, and affordability.
Accommodation Features
Luxury Living at an Affordable Price
: Enjoy a high-end stay without the high-end price tag.
Flexible Rental Options
: Choose from weekly, monthly, or yearly rental options tailored to your needs.
Perfect Location
: Situated in Chaweng, you'll have easy access to the island’s best attractions while enjoying a peaceful, luxurious environment.
Sweden Village is the ideal place for anyone who enjoys a blend of luxury, comfort, and the beauty of Koh Samui."

name: The Little SUP Samui
tags: Things To Do, On The Water, Stand Up Paddleboarding
description:
Whether you're a seasoned paddleboarder or trying it for the first time, we offer everything you need to enjoy stand-up paddleboarding (SUP) in paradise. From high-quality SUP boards and equipment for rent to options for purchase, we ensure you have the best experience exploring the crystal-clear waters and stunning shoreline of Samui.
Our range of stand-up paddleboards caters to all levels, from beginners to experts, so you can easily find the perfect board for your adventure. The tranquil waters and calm conditions of Samui make it an ideal place for SUP, offering both relaxation and a fun way to stay active.
At The Little SUP Samui, we also provide professional guidance and tips for anyone new to SUP, ensuring you feel confident on the water. Whether you're renting for the day or looking to purchase your own board, we make it easy to enjoy the best of Koh Samui from a unique perspective."

name: Samui Lost Souls Scooter Club
tags: Things To Do, On The Land, Private Tours, Scooters
description:
Cruising around Samui on a Vespa or another classic scooter? That’s how the Samui Lost Souls Scooter Club rolls — with chrome shining, engines humming, and the spirit of freedom in the air.
This isn’t your average club. It’s a crew of scooter lovers, retro rebels, and laid-back legends keeping the mod culture alive while exploring the island together. From vintage Vespas to stylish customs, it’s all about the look, the sound, and the lifestyle.
The club hosts regular ride-outs around Samui — not just for fun (though they are a blast), but as a way to connect, share stories, and show off a bit. Guided scooter tours take in stunning coastlines, secret backroads, temples, bars, and sunset spots only the locals know.
There’s always a good mix of people: Thai, expat, long-time residents, and the occasional curious tourist tagging along. What they all share is a love for scooters, a cold drink at the end of the ride, and a laugh along the way.
No pressure, no politics — just good company, great views, and the sound of classic engines echoing through the hills.
Find them online, join a ride, or just give a thumbs up when you see the convoy pass by. You’ll know it when you feel it — that’s the Lost Souls vibe."

name: Samui Custom Gift
tags: Professional Services, Graphic Design & Printing, Laser Engraving Service
description:
Tailored Customization
Located in Lamai, Samui Custom Gift specializes in on-demand laser engraving, allowing you to personalize gifts with precision and style. Whether for home, hotel, restaurant, or shop items, their expert engraving service adds a unique touch to any product, making each piece special and memorable.
Versatile Services
Samui Custom Gift offers a wide range of customization options, from personalized gifts to branded items for businesses. Their laser engraving service can be applied to various materials, ensuring that your gifts or products stand out with intricate, lasting designs.
Exceptional Quality
With a focus on delivering superior craftsmanship, Samui Custom Gift ensures that every engraving is perfect. Their dedication to high-quality service guarantees that each personalized item is made to impress, whether for a special occasion or corporate need."

name: The Barrel
tags: Shopping, Wine & Liquor
description:
Your One-Stop Wine & Spirits Destination
Located right on the main road in the heart of Samui, The Barrel Samui offers a chic Wine Outlet-style atmosphere that’s both convenient and welcoming. Whether you're looking to enjoy a bottle in-store or take home a special selection, it’s the perfect spot for wine lovers and spirit enthusiasts alike.
Over 400 Wine Labels & More
With a curated collection of over 400 wine labels from around the world, you’ll find everything from entry-level bottles for everyday enjoyment to premium wines perfect for gifting or special occasions. Knowledgeable staff are always on hand to help you choose the right bottle for any moment.
Beyond Wine
Explore a wide range of top-shelf liquors including whiskey, gin, rum, tequila, and vodka from globally renowned brands. You'll also find Japanese sake, syrups, mineral waters, teas, and coffee from both Thailand and Australia. Don’t miss the selection of imported accessories like coffee makers and Riedel glassware—ideal for your home bar or as a thoughtful gift."

name: Skandi Collection
tags: Shopping, Clothing, Tailors, Shoes, Clothing Accessories, Men's Clothes, Women's Clothes, Wedding Dresses
description:
Welcome to the largest and most trusted tailor shop in Lamai, Koh Samui. Founded on Sunil’s unwavering commitment to customer satisfaction, we don’t just tailor garments — we tailor experiences. At Skandi Collection, if you’re not 100% satisfied, we’ll work tirelessly until your vision is brought to life.
More than just a tailor shop, Skandi Collection is a place where fashion meets passion. Sunil takes pride in connecting with customers from around the world, learning about different cultures, languages, and styles. Every suit, shirt, or dress we create is handcrafted with precision, care, and a deep appreciation for individuality.
Whether you're in Koh Samui for a short visit or an extended stay, stop by Skandi Collection in Lamai for a truly personalized tailoring experience. Custom fits. Global flair. Tailoring with heart."

name: Lolamui Cafe
tags: Food & Beverage, Bakeries & Coffee Shops, Afternoon Tea, Outdoor Dining, Coffee Shop
description:
Tucked away in the charming town of Lamai, experince a cozy escape for freshly baked cakes, desserts, afternoon tea, and expertly brewed coffee.
Our menu is crafted with love, offering everything from indulgent slices of cake to light, sweet treats perfect for pairing with a hot cappuccino or refreshing iced tea. Whether you're meeting friends, taking a break from the beach, or just craving something sweet, Lolamui Cafe is the perfect spot to relax and recharge.
Come for the flavors, stay for the vibes – your sweet escape awaits at Lolamui Cafe in Lamai."

name: Monkey Samui Hostel
tags: Accommodation, Hostels, Shared Dorm, Air Conditioning, Private Bathroom, Parking
description:
Planning to hit the Full Moon Party at Haad Rin, Koh Phangan? Stay at the perfect launchpad! We offer Full Moon Party transfer tickets, a hostel shuttle service, and car rentals at unbeatable prices — everything you need to start your island adventure right.
Our cozy hostel features 28 beds in a clean and comfy bunk-bed dormitory along with private rooms for those seeking extra privacy. Guests have access to a fully-equipped kitchen, ideal for cooking and sharing meals with fellow travelers.
Set in a peaceful green coconut garden passed down from our great-grandparents, Monkey Samui Hostel offers a blend of tradition, nature, and modern convenience. Enjoy a relaxed vibe with beautiful tropical scenery, just minutes from Samui International Airport, Big Buddha, and Choeng Mon Beach."

name: Car Washing Wurth
tags: Cars & Bikes, Car Wash & Wax, Interior Detailing

name: Samui Car Wash Station
tags: Cars & Bikes, Car Wash & Wax, Self Service
description:
Your go-to self-service wash station for both cars and motorbikes on Koh Samui. Our facility is fully equipped with high-pressure power washers, premium car foams, and easy-to-use bays that make cleaning your vehicle fast and convenient.
Whether you're giving your scooter a quick rinse or detailing your car after a long drive, we've got everything you need to get the job done right. Affordable, efficient, and open 24 Hrs daily, Samui Car Wash Station is the perfect choice for locals, tourists, and anyone who takes pride in a clean ride.
Clean it your way — at Samui Car Wash Station."

name: Samui Car Wash Station
tags: Cars & Bikes, Car Wash & Wax, Self Service
description:
Your go-to self-service wash station for both cars and motorbikes on Koh Samui. Our facility is fully equipped with high-pressure power washers, premium car foams, and easy-to-use bays that make cleaning your vehicle fast and convenient.
Whether you're giving your scooter a quick rinse or detailing your car after a long drive, we've got everything you need to get the job done right. Affordable, efficient, and open 24 Hrs daily, Samui Car Wash Station is the perfect choice for locals, tourists, and anyone who takes pride in a clean ride.
Clean it your way — at Samui Car Wash Station."

name: POSH
tags: Things To Do, Tour Companies, Private Boat, Pink Dolphins, Pig Island, Ang Thong Marine National Park, Private Tours, Koh Taen, Koh Madsum, Koh Mat Lang
description:
Discover the magic of the Koh Samui archipelago with the premier provider of high-end boat tours in Thailand. More than just a boat service, POSH offers a luxury experience that takes you beyond the ordinary—into the heart of Koh Samui’s most stunning and secluded islands.
Cruise in style aboard our 50-foot luxury long-tail boat, a traditional Thai vessel reimagined with modern elegance and premium comfort. For those seeking a faster-paced adventure, our private speed boat tours are perfect for exploring multiple islands in one day, all while enjoying top-tier service and safety.
Every trip is designed to combine relaxation, adventure, and exclusivity. Our boats are equipped with spacious lounging areas and stylish interiors, offering the perfect setting to unwind. Safety is always a priority, with full insurance, life jackets, and an experienced crew on board."

name: Tk 168 Garage
tags: Cars & Bikes, Car Wash & Wax, Interior Detailing
description:
Located in the heart of Koh Samui your trusted destination for professional car and motorbike care. We specialize in high-quality auto detailing, offering both exterior and interior cleaning to restore your vehicle to showroom condition.
From cars to motorbikes, we provide full-service detailing that includes paint protection, polishing, deep interior cleaning, and more. Whether your vehicle needs a quick refresh or a full restoration, TK 168 Garage delivers precision and care with every service.Our experienced team uses top-grade products and techniques to ensure your ride not only looks its best but is protected from the island’s sun, salt, and humidity.
For reliable, professional vehicle care on Koh Samui, TK 168 Garage is your go-to for detailing done right."

name: Visit Natural Detox Resort
tags: Beauty & Wellness, Detox & Weight Loss, Swimming Pool, Ice Bath/pool, Retreat
description:
We believe in a holistic approach to health, balance, and lasting lifestyle change. Nestled in the serene surroundings of Koh Samui, our wellness retreat offers fun, effective, and transformative programs tailored to your personal goals and lifestyle.
Our carefully crafted retreat programs are designed for all ages and fitness levels, combining fitness, nutrition, mindfulness, and natural detox techniques. Whether you're looking to kickstart a healthier routine, boost your energy, or simply relax and reset, we provide the support and guidance to help you succeed.
With experienced coaches, nourishing meals, and a welcoming community, Visit Natural Detox Resort is more than a getaway — it's a step toward the best version of yourself."

name: Wild Tribe Superfood Cafe
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Keto Friendly, Outdoor Dining, Fusion Food, Gluten Free Options, Vegan, Vegetarian, International Food, Breakfast, Health Food

name: Health Retreat Samui
tags: Beauty & Wellness, Detox & Weight Loss, Swimming Pool, Reiki, Herbal Steam Room, Thai Massage

name: The Journey Cooking class
tags: Things To Do, Cooking Classes, Cocktail Class
description:
Thai Cooking Class
Set in the cozy and vibrant ambiance of The Journey Bar & Restaurant, this class offers an immersive experience in the art of Thai cuisine. Learn to prepare Southern Thailand's most beloved dishes, using fresh, locally sourced ingredients, herbs, and spices. With hands-on guidance, you’ll gain the skills to recreate these delicious recipes in your own kitchen.
Cocktail Class
Experience the best cocktail course in Samui! Dive into the fascinating history of mixed drinks and bartending while mastering the art of crafting the perfect cocktail. Whether you’re a beginner or a cocktail enthusiast, this class will elevate your bartending skills.
Pricing & Details
Thai Cooking Class: From THB 1,250
Cocktail Class: From THB 200

name: The Life Aquatic Dive Center
tags: Things To Do, On The Water, Diving, Private Boat, Ang Thong Marine National Park, Koh Tao, Koh Nangyuan
description:
Experience world-class scuba diving and snorkeling in the stunning Gulf of Thailand, whether you're a first-time diver, a seasoned Divemaster, or just looking to enjoy snorkeling in crystal-clear waters, we offer unforgettable underwater adventures for everyone.
Our daily dive trips depart from Koh Samui aboard a modern, purpose-built speedboat, taking you to some of the best dive sites around Koh Tao, Sail Rock, and beyond. We’re passionate about sharing the beauty of Thailand’s vibrant coral reefs, exotic marine life, and warm, turquoise waters.
At The Life Aquatic, safety, fun and personalized service are at the heart of everything we do. Our experienced certified instructors and dive masters provide professional guidance and support, ensuring an enjoyable and safe experience for all levels."

name: Lamai Fitness Retreat
tags: Beauty & Wellness, Health Clubs, Detox & Weight Loss, Ice Bath/pool, Health Food, Retreat
description:
Transform your body, mindset, and lifestyle with a results-driven weight loss and fitness retreat located in beautiful Lamai, Koh Samui. More than just a bootcamp, we offer a fully personalized approach to health and wellness that guarantees real, lasting results.
At Lamai Fitness Retreat, we help you burn fat, build lean muscle, increase strength, and boost mobility, power, and flexibility – all while having fun and building sustainable habits that stick. Our expert coaches tailor each program to the individual, ensuring that your fitness journey is aligned with your goals, current fitness level, and long-term health aspirations.
Whether you're looking to kickstart your fitness journey, lose weight, train for performance, or simply reset your lifestyle in a positive, supportive environment, Lamai Fitness Retreat is the perfect place to recharge, refocus, and reclaim your health."

name: The Source
tags: Beauty & Wellness, Detox & Weight Loss, Swimming Pool, Health Food, Speciality Massages
description:
A unique herbal detox, weight loss, and wellness retreat nestled in the natural beauty of Lamai. Rooted in the healing power of nature, our retreat offers a safe, effective, and time-tested approach to cleansing the body, boosting vitality, and restoring natural balance.
At The Source, we harness the wisdom of herbal medicine — using potent, plant-based remedies that have been trusted for generations. These herbal compounds are recognized by the body and used to cleanse the system, rebuild organs, and restore full-body vitality. This natural detox process works in harmony with your body’s innate intelligence, offering a gentle yet powerful path to healing and renewal.
Whether you are seeking natural weight loss, relief from chronic conditions, or simply a deeper connection with your health, our personalized programs are designed to meet you where you are and guide you toward lasting transformation."

name: Workshop Sport Design
tags: Shopping, Clothing, Sports Clothes
description:
Step up your game with high-quality custom sports jerseys, retro football shirts, and unique designs representing European, Thai, and national teams. Whether you're a club, a team, or a dedicated fan, we bring your vision to life with stylish, performance-ready sportswear.
From vintage-inspired football kits to fully custom team shirts, we combine top-quality materials with bold, creative designs. Our workshop specializes in creating tailor-made jerseys that celebrate both modern and classic football culture — perfect for matches, training, or streetwear.
Whether you're looking for a one-of-a-kind retro kit, team branding, or a personalized shirt that stands out, Workshop Sport Design delivers authentic style and athletic function, all with a professional finish."

name: Samui Crocodile Farm
tags: Things To Do, Must See, On The Land, Cobra Show
description:
A must-visit destination for animal lovers and thrill-seekers alike. This popular attraction features action-packed live crocodile shows performed daily by skilled handlers, offering an up-close and unforgettable experience with some of nature’s most powerful predators.
Beyond crocodiles, the farm is home to a diverse collection of exotic animals and reptiles, including snakes, lizards, monkeys, tropical birds, and more. Visitors can explore well-maintained enclosures, learn about each species, and take memorable photos in a safe and educational environment.
Whether you're traveling with family, friends, or as a solo explorer, Samui Crocodile Farm offers a fun and interactive wildlife adventure you won’t forget. Open year-round and just minutes from the airport, it’s the perfect stop on your Koh Samui itinerary."

name: Samui Top Gun
tags: Things To Do, Adrenaline Seekers, Shooting Range
description:
Located in the heart of Lamai, we offer an adrenaline-pumping experience for shooting enthusiasts and first-timers alike. At our professionally operated shooting range, you can fire a wide selection of guns and calibers, from handguns to powerful rifles, all under the guidance of trained experts.
We pride ourselves on maintaining the highest safety standards, ensuring a secure and thrilling environment for every visitor. Whether you're looking to test your aim or simply feel the power of real firearms, Samui Top Gun delivers an unforgettable experience.
Perfect for individuals, groups, and thrill-seeking tourists, our range is open daily and easily accessible from anywhere in Koh Samui."

name: Mr.Ung’s Safari Tours
tags: Things To Do, Tour Companies, Private Boat, Jeep Safari, Private Tours, Fishing, Waterfalls
description:
Experience the best of Koh Samui with your gateway to authentic off-road jungle safaris, island hopping adventures, and local fishing trips! Hop into our rugged 4x4 jeeps and explore the island’s lush mountains, secret waterfalls, hidden beaches, and vibrant local culture — all led by our expert local guides.
But the adventure doesn’t stop there. Set sail on one of our popular island hopping tours and discover nearby tropical gems with white-sand beaches and crystal-clear waters. Or try your hand at traditional Thai fishing with our guided excursions, perfect for both beginners and seasoned anglers.
Whether you’re looking for adrenaline, relaxation, or cultural connection, Mr. Ung’s Safari Tours offers something for everyone — making your time on Samui truly unforgettable."

name: Saiyor Garden
tags: Children's Needs, Child Friendly Places, Children Playgrounds, Waterpark
description:
Vibrant and family-friendly escape where fun, learning, and nature come together! Perfect for a day out with kids, Saiyor Garden features a safe and exciting play area, a mini Thai cultural museum for curious minds, a refreshing swimming pool, and a beautiful garden space for children to explore and enjoy nature.
Whether you're looking to relax while your kids play, learn something new, or just cool off in the pool, Saiyor Garden offers a wholesome experience for families of all ages. Clean, secure, and full of charm — it’s the perfect spot to make joyful memories in a peaceful setting."

name: Samui Soul
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Live Music, Thai Food, Brunch, International Food, Breakfast, Coffee Shop
description:
Looking for a spot on Samui that serves up tasty bites, solid drinks, and proper good vibes? Samui Soul Bar & Brunch has you covered. It’s the kind of place you walk into for breakfast and somehow end up staying through lunch, a few cocktails, and maybe even a bit of live music.
Samui Soul doesn’t try too hard — and that’s exactly why it works. You’ve got cozy outdoor seating, colorful decor, and an atmosphere that hits the sweet spot between laid-back and lively. Whether you're solo, on a date, or rocking up with friends, it feels like a place you’ll want to return to.
It’s not just the vibe — the food gets love too. Brunch classics, tasty smoothies, quality coffee, and cocktails that don’t skimp. Portions are generous, and the menu’s got something for everyone. Oh, and the music? Always on point. From acoustic sets to live DJs, there's usually something happening that makes it more than just a meal out."

name: Samui Marketing
tags: Professional Services, Marketing, Seo Services, Digital Marketing, Logo Design
description:
The primary concept that ties everything that we do together is our consultative approach.
We are marketing consultants first, and our goal is to correctly diagnose the challenges you’re experiencing, and fit you with the appropriate solution that will help you to get the results you’re looking for.
As marketing consultants, we coach our clients on helping them to reach their dreams.
We help with business start ups, entrepreneur challenges, ideas, questions, and so much more. Our clients rely on us for marketing everything from starting their businesses to selling them, and all things in between.
As your dedicated marketing resource, the most common request that we receive is for us to become a partner.
Small businesses and medium-sized businesses need a partner to help them to accomplish their goals with marketing and business growth.
With the right expertise, you are much more likely to reach your goals. We expertly guide people along their journey."

description:
Culinary Innovation
Experience Thai cuisine reimagined through bold creativity and refined technique. This dining concept elevates iconic flavours with modern interpretations, creating a unique blend of tradition and innovation.
Heritage with a Twist
Classic Thai dishes are thoughtfully transformed, preserving cultural roots while introducing contemporary flair. Each plate is a tribute to Thailand’s rich culinary heritage, presented with sophistication and style."

name: Mango Tree Sunset Bar & Cafe
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Beach Bars, Beachfront, Thai Food, Outdoor Dining, Family Friendly, International Food, Cocktails, Wifi Access In Restaurant, Sunset Restaurant
description:
Relaxed Beachside Vibes
Drinking, eating, and chilling come together in perfect harmony at this relaxed beachside spot. Located on Bangmakham Beach, it offers a laid-back escape with panoramic sea views and the best sunset views on the island.
Diverse Culinary Offerings
The menu features a wide selection of Thai favorites and international classics, expertly prepared and served in a casual yet stylish setting. Whether you're in the mood for a cocktail or a full meal, there's something for every taste.
Scenic Coastal Setting
Ideal for travelers and locals alike, the beachfront location provides the perfect backdrop for everything from a leisurely lunch to an evening drink as the sun dips below the horizon in a dazzling display."

tags: Accommodation, Bungalows, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Wifi Access In Room, Air Conditioning, Parking, Laundry Service, Airport Shuttle, Family Rooms, Sun Umbrellas, 24 Hours Front Desk, 4* Accommodation, Family Friendly, Kid's Friendly

tags: Things To Do, Tour Companies, On The Land, Jeep Safari, Private Tours, Waterfalls, Local Specialities, Temples

name: Anantara Lawana Koh Samui Resort
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Pool Villas, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Bar, Room With Private Pool, Wifi Access In Room, Gym, Private Room, Air Conditioning, Private Bathroom, Parking, Rooms With Seaview, Laundry Service, Airport Shuttle, Rooms With Balcony, Family Rooms, Sun Loungers Or Beach Chairs, Sun Umbrellas, Wellness, 24 Hours Front Desk, Room Service, Kid's Club, 5* Accommodation, Family Friendly, Kid's Friendly
description:
Anantara Lawana Koh Samui Resort will unveil its newly renovated beachfront on 16 November 2024, marking a fresh chapter in island luxury. Recently awarded a MICHELIN Guide One Key and named among Thailand’s top 10 resorts in the Condé Nast Traveller UK Reader’s Choice Awards 2024, the resort combines contemporary comfort with Samui’s cultural charm, making it a standout destination in Chaweng.
The design draws inspiration from the island’s Thai-Chinese heritage. Pool Suites resemble Nathon’s traditional shop-houses, while Pool Villas feature maritime blues and soft lighting, reflecting a tranquil fishing village. The upgraded beachfront and pool deck now offer sweeping ocean views and a peaceful escape by the sea.
Dining at Anantara Lawana is equally memorable. Tree Tops Signature Dining, nestled in a 120-year-old jungle canopy, now offers an even more intimate experience. The newly opened Cay Restaurant serves elevated Thai cuisine with views of the coastline. Ocean Kiss offers all-day dining indoors or al fresco, and Crab Shack brings a casual seaside vibe with fresh seafood and relaxed charm.
Blending heritage, nature, and comfort, the resort invites guests to discover the renewed spirit of Koh Samui in a setting that honors the island’s rich past and natural beauty. Arabic, Chinese, English, French, German, Russian, Spanish, Thai"

name: The Singing Bird Lounge @ Anantara Lawana
tags: Bars & Nightlife, Bars & Pubs, Beachfront, Open Air, Cocktail Bars, Hotel Bars
description:
Perched high in the canopy of a 120-year-old tree, The Singing Bird Lounge provides a unique setting for pre-dinner drinks, offering breathtaking views of Koh Samui’s natural beauty. Officially recognized as a filming location for
The White Lotus
Season 3, Episode 1, this charming lounge also serves as the exclusive entrance to Tree Tops Signature Dining, one of the island’s premier gourmet experiences.
The cocktail menu draws inspiration from Thailand’s bird-singing tradition, with each drink named after a local bird species. Guests can also try the signature
Anantara White Lotus Mirage
, a special creation celebrating the HBO series.
As the sun sets, the sounds of Samui’s avian chorus fill the air, creating a magical ambiance. To deepen the connection with nature, our resident mixologist crafts his own bitters using ingredients from the resort’s garden and garnishes each cocktail with fresh herbs and fruits grown on-site, providing a truly immersive experience."

name: Creative Adventure
tags: Things To Do, On The Water, Tour Companies, On The Land, Cooking Classes, Diving, Elephants, Quad Tours, Private Boat, Pink Dolphins, Pig Island, Ang Thong Marine National Park, Koh Tao, Jeep Safari, Private Tours, Fishing, Waterfalls, Koh Taen, Sunset Cruise, Koh Madsum, Koh Nangyuan

name: Babysitter Samui
tags: Children's Needs, Nanny Services
description:
At Babysitter Samui, we prioritize the safety and happiness of your children. Based in Bophut, we offer personalized babysitting services that give parents peace of mind while providing attentive care for their little ones. Whether you need daily assistance or occasional help, our experienced team is here to support you.
Our flexible services cater to your unique needs, from full-time care to just a helping hand for an evening out or during special events. We understand that every family has different requirements, so we tailor our approach to ensure your children receive the best care possible.
Babysitter Samui is the trusted choice for parents looking for reliable, caring, and experienced babysitters, whether you're at home, on holiday, or attending events."

name: Nanny Samui
tags: Children's Needs, Nanny Services
description:
At Nanny Samui, we understand that your children's well-being is a top priority. Based in Bophut, we offer trusted and personalized childcare services that provide both parents and children with peace of mind. Our professional, experienced nannies are dedicated to offering loving, attentive care that meets the unique needs of each family.
Whether you require full-time care, occasional help, or support during special events, our flexible services are designed to fit your schedule. From daily assistance to just a helping hand when needed, Nanny Samui ensures that your children are cared for in a safe, nurturing environment.
Nanny Samui is the trusted choice for parents seeking reliable, experienced, and caring nannies, whether you're at home, on vacation, or attending events."

name: Samui Grand Safari Tour
tags: Things To Do, Tour Companies, On The Land, Jeep Safari, Private Tours, Waterfalls, Local Specialities, Temples
description:
Experience the wild side of Koh Samui with the ultimate 4x4 jungle tour designed for thrill-seekers and nature lovers. Our Jungle 4x4 Discovery takes you off the beaten path into the heart of the island’s lush rainforest, mountain trails, and hidden waterfalls.
Led by experienced local drivers and guides, this action-packed safari adventure offers breathtaking panoramic views, cultural stops, and a deep dive into the island’s natural beauty. Ride in a rugged 4x4 vehicle through rivers, tropical forests, and remote villages for a truly immersive and unforgettable experience.
Perfect for families, couples, or solo travelers looking for something beyond the beach, Samui Grand Safari Tour delivers excitement, discovery, and eco-friendly exploration—making it one of the top jungle tours in Koh Samui."

name: Tree Tops @ Anantara Lawana
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Thai Food, International Food, Wifi Access In Restaurant
description:
Elevate your taste with sophisticated flavours at Tree Tops Signature Dining, the island's only treetop restaurant. Set within an enchanting garden, our exclusive salas are built around a 120-year-old tree, offering panoramic views of Koh Samui. This intimate setting is perfect for those seeking a romantic dining experience, surrounded by lush greenery.
Our culinary philosophy is deeply inspired by the island’s natural environment, local weather, and cultural influences. We blend Mediterranean and Asian traditions with a modern twist, focusing on healthy fine dining and eco-friendly practices. Each dish reflects a commitment to the planet, community, and exceptional cuisine. Enjoy an 8-course set menu like ‘Embers of Earth & Ocean,’ a celebration of the ocean and earth, or ‘Roots of Earth & Bloom,’ featuring healing vegetarian dishes that nourish both body and soul."

name: Cay Restaurant @ Anantara Lawana
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Thai Food, Wifi Access In Restaurant
description:
A Taste of Koh Samui’s Thai Heritage in Every Bite
Step into Cay Restaurant in Koh Samui, where the island’s rich history comes to life through a unique fusion of traditional Thai flavors.
Drawing inspiration from generations of family recipes and classic cooking techniques, Cay celebrates the perfect blend of authentic Thai cuisine. Our menu features a variety of flavorful dishes that highlight the essence of home-style cooking, with a particular emphasis on fresh seafood.
The restaurant’s sophisticated ambiance, enhanced by coastal-inspired design and cultural accents, creates an elegant setting for an unforgettable dining experience. Cay is the ideal destination for those looking to savor both tradition and innovation in every bite."

name: Crab Shack @ Anantara Lawana
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Thai Food, International Food, Mediterranean Food, Wifi Access In Restaurant
description:
Oceanside Restaurant in Koh Samui for Seafood Lovers!
If you’re a seafood enthusiast, Crab Shack is the perfect spot for you. Indulge in a mouthwatering selection of the freshest locally sourced seafood, expertly prepared by our talented culinary team to showcase the best of the ocean’s bounty.
Ditch the fine dining formality — and even the cutlery! At Crab Shack, the seafood menu is all about getting hands-on, with the famous seafood bucket being a crowd favorite. Roll up your sleeves, put on an apron, and get ready for a deliciously messy and fun dining experience by the sea."

name: Sandal - Beach Lounge @ Anantara Lawana
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Beach Bars, Beachfront, Thai Food, Fusion Food, Wine Bar, Wifi Access In Restaurant
description:
Located between Ocean Kiss and Crab Shack, Sandal is an outdoor bar on Chaweng Beach that offers a peaceful retreat with stunning ocean views.
This relaxed lounge captures the essence of Koh Samui’s coastal charm, providing guests with a tranquil outdoor space to relax and enjoy the scenery."

name: Palette Cafe & Studio @ Anantara Lawana
tags: Food & Beverage, Bakeries & Coffee Shops, Airconditioned Area, Fusion Food, Wifi Access In Restaurant
description:
The vibrant heart of artistic expression near the sun-kissed shores of Chaweng Beach, this chic and contemporary coffee shop in Samui celebrates the blend of art and coffee culture.
With locally sourced beans from Thailand's northern regions, every cup is a carefully crafted experience. The interior design, inspired by the colorful Manora dance of Southern Thailand, creates a unique atmosphere where tradition and modernity beautifully come together, offering a space to enjoy both creativity and coffee."

name: Designer Dining @ Anantara Lawana
tags: Food & Beverage, Private Dining, Beachfront, Thai Food, Fusion Food, International Food, Wifi Access In Restaurant
description:
Romance by the Seaside
Experience unforgettable moments with Designer Dining by Anantara, where romance meets exceptional cuisine in stunning outdoor settings. Choose to dine with your toes in the sand or tucked away in a tropical garden illuminated by flickering torchlight.
Your personalized menu is created in collaboration with a private chef, complemented by expertly selected wines and discreet butler service, making every detail of your evening truly special."

name: Ocean Kiss @ Anantara Lawana
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Beachfront, Thai Food, Fusion Food, Vegetarian, International Food, Mediterranean Food, Breakfast, Breakfast Buffet, Wifi Access In Restaurant
description:
Iconic tastes of Thailand with a modern twist at our Chaweng beach restaurant.
Ocean Kiss offers a wide selection of Asian and Western dishes, served from morning to night in a stunning beachfront setting. Start your day with freshly brewed coffee and ocean views during breakfast, or enjoy the comfort of the newly renovated air-conditioned dining area.
Whether you prefer indoor or outdoor seating, you'll experience scenic coastal views, an extensive à la carte menu, and a carefully curated wine selection—perfect for a relaxed meal or a romantic evening by the sea."

name: Spice Spoons @ Anantara Lawana
tags: Things To Do, Cooking Classes
description:
Experience the art of cooking on Koh Samui.
Join an interactive Thai cooking class where you’ll learn to prepare authentic dishes with guidance from our expert chef. Choose from experiences that include visits to local markets or tours of organic farms to discover the origins of your ingredients.
You’ll leave with new culinary skills, recipe cards, and your own apron—bringing a taste of Thailand home with you."

name: Anantara Bophut Koh Samui Resort
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Bar, Room With Private Pool, Wifi Access In Room, Gym, Private Room, Air Conditioning, Private Bathroom, Parking, Rooms With Seaview, Laundry Service, Airport Shuttle, Rooms With Balcony, Family Rooms, Sun Loungers Or Beach Chairs, Sun Umbrellas, Wellness, 24 Hours Front Desk, Room Service, Kid's Club, 5* Accommodation, Family Friendly, Kid's Friendly
description:
The ultimate Samui resort getaway.
Anantara Bophut Koh Samui Resort offers elegant rooms with contemporary Thai design and warm natural light. Relax on your private balcony with views of tropical gardens or the Gulf of Thailand.
Whether you're seeking a romantic retreat, a spacious family suite for longer stays, or the indulgence of a private pool villa, the resort provides a range of luxurious options. Enjoy exclusive benefits designed to elevate your comfort and create a truly personalized island escape."

name: Anantara Bophut Koh Samui Resort
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Bar, Room With Private Pool, Wifi Access In Room, Gym, Private Room, Air Conditioning, Private Bathroom, Parking, Rooms With Seaview, Laundry Service, Airport Shuttle, Rooms With Balcony, Family Rooms, Sun Loungers Or Beach Chairs, Sun Umbrellas, Wellness, 24 Hours Front Desk, Room Service, Kid's Club, 5* Accommodation, Family Friendly, Kid's Friendly
description:
The ultimate Samui resort getaway.
Anantara Bophut Koh Samui Resort offers elegant rooms with contemporary Thai design and warm natural light. Relax on your private balcony with views of tropical gardens or the Gulf of Thailand.
Whether you're seeking a romantic retreat, a spacious family suite for longer stays, or the indulgence of a private pool villa, the resort provides a range of luxurious options. Enjoy exclusive benefits designed to elevate your comfort and create a truly personalized island escape."

name: Guilty @ Anantara
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Mexican Food, Cocktails, Wifi Access In Restaurant

name: Tan Beach Lounge @ Anantara
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Beachfront, Italian Food, Vegetarian, International Food, Mediterranean Food, Cocktails, Wifi Access In Restaurant, Use Of Swimming Pool
description:
Relaxed VibesSoak up the scenery in a laid-back pool and beach lounge designed for ultimate relaxation. Plush daybeds invite all-day lounging while the tranquil setting creates the perfect escape from the everyday.
Casual DiningDelight in Tropical Tidbits—an enticing menu of gourmet sandwiches, crisp salads, flavour-packed pastas, and hearty sharing platters, all made for easy enjoyment. As the sun sets, transition seamlessly to the bar for expertly mixed sundowners."

name: Thin Tai @ Anantara
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Vegetarian, Cocktails, Wifi Access In Restaurant
description:
Modern Thai Dining Experience
Indulge in a refined take on Thai cuisine, where each course features seafood freshly caught from local waters, paired with traditional dishes crafted using native herbs and spices. Every plate is a celebration of bold, authentic flavors presented with contemporary flair.
Guests can choose between two inviting settings: a stylish, modern dining room ideal for a sleek, intimate meal, or a serene garden veranda that offers a more relaxed, open-air ambiance. Whether enjoying a quiet dinner or a lively gathering, this is a destination that elevates Thai dining with elegance and taste."

name: Designer Dining @ Anantara
tags: Food & Beverage, Private Dining, Beachfront, Vegetarian, International Food, Cocktails, Wifi Access In Restaurant
description:
Private Outdoor Culinary Experience
Dine in a secluded outdoor setting, from a peaceful lotus pond sala to the soft sands of Koh Samui’s beach, with every detail tailored to your occasion. Anantara’s signature Designer Dining experience transforms meals into unforgettable moments, with gracious hospitality and refined rituals.
Whether it's an intimate beachfront evening or a celebration among blooming lotus, our team collaborates with you to create an elegant, personalised atmosphere—complete with curated table décor, floral arrangements, and music. Savour authentic Thai dishes, Mediterranean"

name: Spice Spoons @ Anantara
tags: Things To Do, Cooking Classes
description:
Interactive Thai Culinary Journey
Spice Spoons offers more than a cooking class—it’s a hands-on journey into Thailand’s renowned culinary heritage. Begin with a guided market tour alongside a skilled Thai chef to discover indigenous ingredients and cultural insights into Thai and Southern Thai cuisine.
Learn about the balance of salty, sweet, spicy, and pungent flavors, along with health benefits and practical substitutions for home cooking. Back at the Spice Spoons show kitchen near Thin Tai, follow step-by-step instructions to prepare authentic regional recipes. Afterward, enjoy your creations in a tropical setting and take home a shopping bag with a certificate, apron, and recipe-filled USB for lasting memories and culinary confidence."

name: Paradise Beach Resort
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Bungalows, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Bar, Wifi Access In Room, Private Room, Air Conditioning, Private Bathroom, Rooms With Seaview, Rooms With Balcony, Family Rooms, Sun Loungers Or Beach Chairs, Sun Umbrellas, Wellness, 24 Hours Front Desk, 4* Accommodation, Family Friendly
description:
Tropical Comfort & Tranquility
A beachfront escape offering a perfect blend of relaxation and modern comfort. Located directly along the sands of Maenam Beach, the resort provides stunning ocean views, spacious accommodations, and easy access to Samui’s natural beauty.
Thoughtful Amenities
Guests enjoy a large outdoor swimming pool, a beachfront restaurant, spa services, and complimentary shuttle to Fisherman’s Village. Rooms feature private balconies and are surrounded by tropical gardens—ideal for couples, families, and long-stay visitors.
Island Experience Redefined
Whether lounging by the sea or exploring nearby attractions, this peaceful resort delivers a laid-back island experience with warm, attentive service."

name: Central Samui
tags: Shopping, Food & Convenience, Clothing, Electronics, Wine & Liquor, Optics, Beauty & Personal Care, Jewelry & Watches, Sports & Outdoor Equipment, Deli, Health Food, Specialised Food, Supermarkets, Beachwear, Sun Glasses, Reading Glasses, Vision Optic Glasses, Bakery, Mobile Phones & Accessories, Shoes, Cosmetic Products, Computers & Accessories, Handbags, Clothing Accessories, Mobile Sim & Internet, Organic Products, Butchery, Muay Thai & Boxing Accessories, Footwear, Fitness Equipment, Men's Clothes, Women's Clothes, Diving & Snorkeling Gear, Swimming Gear, Sports Clothes, Cleaning Equipment, Mobile Gaming Accessories, Beach Shoes, Flipflops, Sandals, Sport Shoes, Swim Wear, Luggage & Accessories, Home Goods
description:
Central Festival Samui: More Than Just Shopping
The Island’s Lifestyle Hub
Central Festival Samui isn’t just a mall — it’s the beating heart of Koh Samui, blending shopping, dining, and culture in one resort-style destination. Designed with a nod to the island’s heritage, it has become both a local landmark and a must-visit spot for travelers.
Distinct Zones, Unique Vibes
From the port-inspired Chaweng Pier and the colorful Sino-Portuguese Birdcage, to the rustic Fishing Village and the Colonial Old Market, each zone has its own character. Every visit feels like exploring a different part of Samui’s story.
Where Shopping Meets Experience
With Central Department Store, Tops Market, Power Buy, Supersports, and a full mix of fashion and lifestyle brands, the choices are endless. Add to that international dining, the buzzing Beach Bazaar, and a state-of-the-art cinema, and you’ve got a destination where people come not just to shop — but to spend the day."

name: Central Samui
tags: Shopping, Food & Convenience, Clothing, Electronics, Wine & Liquor, Optics, Beauty & Personal Care, Jewelry & Watches, Sports & Outdoor Equipment, Deli, Health Food, Specialised Food, Supermarkets, Beachwear, Sun Glasses, Reading Glasses, Vision Optic Glasses, Bakery, Mobile Phones & Accessories, Shoes, Cosmetic Products, Computers & Accessories, Handbags, Clothing Accessories, Mobile Sim & Internet, Organic Products, Butchery, Muay Thai & Boxing Accessories, Footwear, Fitness Equipment, Men's Clothes, Women's Clothes, Diving & Snorkeling Gear, Swimming Gear, Sports Clothes, Cleaning Equipment, Mobile Gaming Accessories, Beach Shoes, Flipflops, Sandals, Sport Shoes, Swim Wear, Luggage & Accessories, Home Goods

name: Wave of Samui
tags: Food & Beverage, Bakeries & Coffee Shops, Airconditioned Area, Wifi Access In Restaurant, Coffee Shop, Sweets, Sunset Restaurant, Fresh Roasted Coffee
description:
Sunset Views & Relaxed Ambience
Located in Nathon, one of Samui’s most picturesque sunset spots, this stylish coffee shop offers a welcoming space to unwind, meet friends, or catch up on work. The large, air-conditioned seating area provides a cool retreat from the island heat, complemented by a clean, modern interior that feels both comfortable and contemporary.
Crafted Coffees & Sweet Moments
Whether you're in the mood for a rich, hot espresso or a refreshing iced latte, the drink menu caters to every preference. In addition to coffee, a range of cold beverages is available, perfect for a tropical afternoon. A tempting assortment of cakes and sweet treats adds the finishing touch—ideal for a quick indulgence or a leisurely break as you watch the sky turn gold over the sea."

name: Samui Deep Well
tags: Property Services, Well Drilling, Well Service, Water Services
description:
Trusted partner for professional well drilling, well cleaning, and fresh water delivery services on Koh Samui. With a team of skilled drillers and fully equipped machinery, we specialize in delivering reliable and efficient solutions for residential, commercial, and hospitality clients.
We offer clean fresh water delivery in tank sizes of
2,000, 6,000, and 15,000 liters
, serving homes, rental properties, dormitories, hotels, and swimming pools. Our large water reserves ensure consistent supply even during peak demand.
In addition to water delivery, we provide groundwater pump installation, maintenance, and expert advice to help you choose the right pump system for your well size and water needs. Whether you’re drilling a new well or maintaining an existing one, Samui Deep Well ensures quality, safety, and customer satisfaction."

name: Sasatorn Koh Samui
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Bakeries & Coffee Shops, Airconditioned Area, Brunch, International Food, Breakfast, Aussie Food
description:
A cozy all-day breakfast café offering a carefully curated menu of fresh, high-quality food, specialty coffee, and homemade bakery items. With a focus on using the freshest local produce to bring you delicious meals with a touch of comfort and creativity.
Our specialty coffee is crafted with precision, each cup is a perfect balance of strength and softness, clarity and depth. Inspired by Melbourne’s breakfast culture, we serve all-day breakfast in a relaxed, no-rush atmosphere where every morning feels like a new beginning.
Satisfy you're craving with a wholesome brunch, a smooth pour-over, or a freshly baked treat, Sasatorn Koh Samui is your go-to café for a relaxed and flavorful experience."

name: Komaya Samui

tags: Accommodation, Pool Villas, Beachfront, Breakfast, Butler / Private Chef, Swimming Pool, Wifi Access In Room, Gym, Air Conditioning, Parking, Rooms With Seaview, Laundry Service, Airport Shuttle, Rooms With Balcony, Sun Loungers Or Beach Chairs, Concierge Services, 5* Accommodation, Family Friendly

name: The Gourmet Cookies
tags: Food & Beverage, Bakeries & Coffee Shops, Gluten Free Options, Delivery, Sweets, Pick Up Service
description:
Craving something soft, warm, rich... but not just any cookie? With a passion for sweet perfection, we bake NY-style gourmet cookies and Cookie Cakes that are thick, gooey, and utterly irresistible.
Made with love and packed with indulgent fillings like dark and white chocolate, marshmallow, Oreos, and crunchy nuts, each bite delivers a molten heart of flavor. This isn’t just dessert, it’s your next sweet obsession.
Perfect for gifting, sharing, or satisfying your own cravings, our cookies are available for easy order and delivery. Choose your favorite flavor, and we’ll bring the magic straight to your door."

name: Samui Gourmet
tags: Shopping, Food & Convenience, Deli, Bakery, Butchery
description:
We specialize in high-quality Australian grass-fed beef, Wagyu beef and lamb hamburgers, and a curated selection of deli meats and cheeses. From Italian salami, ham, and sausages to artisanal cheeses, we bring the best of the butcher and deli counter to Koh Samui.
Perfect for food lovers, BBQ enthusiasts, and those craving premium ingredients, we also offer freshly baked bread and made-to-order gourmet sandwiches, hamburgers and breakfast, ideal for a quick bite or a beachside picnic.
Whether you're stocking up for a gourmet dinner with family and friends or grabbing a satisfying lunch, Samui Gourmet delivers taste and quality in every bite."

name: Samui Gourmet
tags: Shopping, Food & Convenience, Deli, Bakery, Butchery
