We specialize in high-quality Australian grass-fed beef, Wagyu beef and lamb hamburgers, and a curated selection of deli meats and cheeses. From Italian salami, ham, and sausages to artisanal cheeses, we bring the best of the butcher and deli counter to Koh Samui.

name: The Hideout Samui
tags: Accommodation, Hostels, Bungalows, Swimming Pool, Bar, Wifi Access In Room, Shared Dorm, Private Room, Air Conditioning, Private Bathroom, Rooms With Balcony, Sun Loungers Or Beach Chairs, Sun Umbrellas, Kitchen
description:
We offer the perfect blend of adventure, comfort, and community. Choose from our cozy 16-bed mixed dorm or one of 10 private bungalows, all designed for backpackers by backpackers.
Located just minutes from Maenam Pier, we’re your perfect base for island hopping to Koh Phangan or Koh Tao. After a day of exploring, relax in our massive pool, connect with fellow travelers at our revamped kitchen & bar, and enjoy lightning-fast Wi-Fi, secure lockers, and a laid-back, social atmosphere that feels like home.
Drop in to chill, party, or dive into island life, The Hideout Samui is where unforgettable travel stories begin."

name: The Quienest Project
tags: Property Services, Real Estate Brokers
description:
The Perfect Balance of Luxury & Tranquility
Wake up to sweeping ocean views and the calming sounds of tropical breezes in the villas of The Quienest. More than just a residence, this development offers a private sanctuary where luxury meets peace, and nature is part of your daily life. As part of Gates Asia’s exclusive villa collection, The Quienest sits in one of Koh Samui’s most sought-after locations.
Sustainable Living, Timeless Design
Each villa is thoughtfully crafted for a lifestyle that values both comfort and consciousness. Designed with eco-friendly principles and elegant style, this project combines natural beauty, contemporary architecture, and sustainable construction.
Crafted by Experts in Tranquility
The vision is brought to life by Green Frog Construction, known for high-quality, sustainable builds, and The Studio Design, a firm that creates modern living spaces in harmony with the environment. Every detail of The Quienest is designed to offer a peaceful escape — a place where you can recharge, reconnect, and truly feel at home."

name: Granny's Samui
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, International Food, Breakfast, Cocktails, Wifi Access In Restaurant, Coffee Shop, Sweets
description:
All-Day Comfort, From Breakfast to Midnight
Granny’s Samui invites you to indulge in delicious food, tempting desserts, freshly brewed coffee, and refreshing cocktails — all served in a warm, welcoming atmosphere. From cozy breakfasts like syrniki, scrambled eggs with crispy bacon, salmon croissants, and shakshuka to relaxed coffee chats, every morning at Granny’s feels like home.
Late-Night Flavor with a Gourmet Twist
Don’t miss the signature seabass fillet — crispy on the outside, tender on the inside, and served with a rich beetroot sauce. It’s the perfect choice for a satisfying dinner or a late-night treat, available daily until midnight.
Granny’s is where good food meets good vibes, any time of day."

name: Verdant Lamai Residence
tags: Property Services, Construction, Property Developers, Property developer , Villa development
description:
Modern Living in Harmony with Nature
Verdant Lamai Residence redefines tropical living with nine exclusive private pool villas designed to blend modern elegance with Koh Samui’s natural beauty. Surrounded by lush landscapes, each villa offers a peaceful and refined retreat focused on privacy, comfort, and sustainability. The development also features a landscaped community garden and playground, making it ideal for families.
Elegant Villas in a Prime Location
Located in the heart of Lamai yet set away from the busy tourist areas, Verdant Residence combines seclusion with convenience. Each villa offers 295 sqm of open-plan living space, set on plots ranging from 498 to 710 sqm. With a secure 30-year leasehold and premium amenities, it’s a rare opportunity to own a private villa in one of Koh Samui’s most desirable areas.
Community & Lifestyle Features
The gated residence includes 24/7 CCTV security, landscaped green areas, a boutique, café, and concierge services for rentals and management. Lease terms are simple and fixed, ensuring peace of mind for the full 30-year period.
Promotional Launch Price: 6.9M THB"

name: Lamai Residence
tags: Property Services, Property developer , Villa development
description:
Ultimate Convenience Meets Luxury Living
Just 20 meters from Windfield International School, this location is unmatched for families, expats, and investors seeking a refined lifestyle with strong investment potential. The area offers not just a home, but an opportunity to live or invest in one of Koh Samui’s most desirable and future-proof neighborhoods.
High Demand for Family-Friendly Housing
With over 600 children enrolled, Windfield International is a top choice for expat families, driving strong rental demand in the area. Parents prefer living nearby for convenience, making it ideal for long-term leases and stable rental income. Spacious, secure homes in well-connected areas are consistently in demand.
Strong Rental Yields & Investment Opportunity
Properties in this zone typically achieve annual rental yields of 8–14%. The presence of long-term tenants such as expat families offers consistent income and less turnover compared to short-term holiday rentals. Limited land supply near premium schools also drives property appreciation.
Close to Key Amenities & Infrastructure
Supermarkets like Lotus and Makro, hospitals, cafés, fitness centers, and good road networks are all within easy reach. Bophut, Fisherman’s Village, and Chaweng Beach are just a short drive away, offering lifestyle perks and convenience.
Safe, Upscale Neighborhood
The surrounding area is peaceful, secure, and known for its luxury villas and gated communities. It offers a quieter alternative to central tourist zones while remaining well-connected — ideal for families and high-end tenants.
Resale Value & Long-Term Growth
Proximity to a major international school ensures lasting value. As Koh Samui’s expat population grows, demand for quality family housing is set to increase. With limited prime land available, properties here offer excellent capital appreciation."

name: KoHabitat Samui
tags: Accommodation, Hostels, Wifi Access In Room, Shared Dorm, Air Conditioning, Kitchen

name: The Seahorse Ferry
tags: Transport, Ferries
description:
More Than Just a Ferry Ride
Seahorse Ferry redefines travel between Bangkok and Koh Samui with a smooth, spacious, and comfortable onboard experience. It’s not just about reaching your destination — it’s about enjoying the journey.
Comfort, Convenience & Entertainment Onboard
From delicious meals served in our onboard restaurants to fresh coffee in our casual café, every detail is designed for your comfort. Families will appreciate the safe and engaging Kids Zone, while all passengers benefit from access to clean shower rooms and relaxed public seating areas. Whether you're traveling solo, as a couple, or with family, Seahorse Ferry makes every journey enjoyable."

name: One Bophut
tags: Property Services, Property Developers, Property developer , Villa development
description:
Luxury Living in the Heart of BoPhut
One Bophut presents an exclusive collection of premium villas designed for those who value elegance, privacy, and location. Nestled in one of Koh Samui’s most sought-after areas, these residences offer modern comfort paired with timeless style.
Premium Finishes & Ready-to-Live Comfort
Each villa is delivered fully furnished with high-quality built-in and soft furniture, matching the refined aesthetics of our 3D renderings. Every detail is thoughtfully curated to provide a sophisticated, move-in-ready experience.
A Smart Investment in Island Living
With starting prices from just 8.9M THB, One Bophut offers an exceptional opportunity to secure your dream villa in a prime location. Whether as a personal retreat or long-term investment, this is luxury redefined on Koh Samui."

name: Prana Resort Nandana
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Bar, Wifi Access In Room, Gym, Air Conditioning, Parking, Rooms With Seaview, Laundry Service, Rooms With Balcony, Sun Loungers Or Beach Chairs, Sun Umbrellas, 24 Hours Front Desk, Room Service, 4* Accommodation, Family Friendly, Kid's Friendly
description:
Our smiles are sincere and so is our commitment to making your stay as relaxing, enjoyable, and memorable as possible. With a dedicated team of 77 staff and a guest-to-staff ratio that outshines many larger resorts, we pride ourselves on offering warm, personalized service that goes beyond expectations. Enjoy a touch of luxury without the five-star price tag. The only stars we care about are the ones that light up the night sky.
Our resort’s design draws inspiration from the rich textures, colors, and flavors of Samui. In the Resort Wing, traditional Thai materials such as teak, rattan, and bamboo are reimagined with a modern twist, resulting in striking facades and elegant interiors. The iconic Thai fishing basket serves as the muse for organic, wave-like architectural forms, sculptural accents, and intricate lighting throughout the property.
Sleek and contemporary, the Beachside Wing offers a more streamlined aesthetic, featuring soft timbers, cool greys, and panoramic ocean views. Designed to feel open and inviting, both the Resort and Beachside Wings celebrate a seamless blend of modern comfort and traditional charm all nestled within lush tropical gardens.
Prana Resort Nandana invites you to experience the spirit of Samui through thoughtful design and genuinely caring hospitality."

name: Vows Villa & Beach Wedding
tags: Professional Services, Wedding Planners, Wedding Venues
description:
Set against the sparkling turquoise waters and spectacular sunset views is where the beginning of your love story meets the sea. Tucked along a quiet stretch of pristine shoreline, this exclusive beachfront villa with its extraordinary architectural style blended within the natural beauty offers an intimate and unforgettable setting for couples ready to say “I do” in paradise.
With flexible wedding packages and private venue rental options, every detail at Vows Villa & Beach Wedding is crafted around your vision. Bring your dream wedding to life, whether it be a barefoot ceremony at sunset or a stylish celebration under the stars, our team is here to bring your unique love story to life with elegance and ease.
From the first glance to the final toast, Vows Villa & Beach Wedding promises an experience you and your guests will never forget. Let the ocean be your witness and the island your canvas.
Begin your forever at Vows Villa & Beach Wedding, where romance meets the rhythm of the waves."

name: UBOX Samui Hostel
tags: Accommodation, Hostels, Swimming Pool, Bar, Wifi Access In Room, Shared Dorm, Private Room, Laundry Service
description:
A fresh and modern take on hostel living with its unique container-style design, combining style, comfort, and functionality. The hostel features 12 well-designed rooms, each accommodating 8 beds in a clean and comfortable bunk-bed layout, making it an ideal choice for solo travelers, backpackers, or groups. With a total of 96 beds, UBOX creates a vibrant social atmosphere while maintaining a sense of personal space. Shared bathrooms are conveniently located and separated by gender, ensuring a comfortable and respectful environment for all guests.
Superb base while exploring the island, hang out and chill while making new friends, or simply enjoy a stylish budget-friendly stay, UBOX Samui Hostel delivers a unique and memorable experience."

name: March Samui Resort
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Bungalows, Beachfront, Swimming Pool, Parking, Rooms With Seaview, 3* Accommodation, Kitchen
description:
Come enjoy a peacful and tranquil stretch of coastline, at our resort we offer a peaceful escape into nature’s embrace. With a collection of thoughtfully designed bungalows and elegant beachfront villas, the resort invites guests to unwind in complete harmony with the landscape. Our beachfront accommodation features sweeping views of the Gulf of Thailand, imagine waking up to the soft hush of the tide and falling asleep beneath a sky of stars.
Surrounded by lush tropical greenery and caressed by ocean breezes, the resort is a true sanctuary for those seeking calm, privacy, and beauty. Here, the only soundtrack is the rhythmic sound of waves and birdsong echoing through the palm-fringed grounds. Whether lounging on your private terrace, strolling the secluded beach, or savoring sunset over the water, March Samui Resort offers a deeply restorative experience—where the world slows down and nature takes center stage."

name: Samui Tailor
tags: Shopping, Clothing, Tailors, Men's Clothes, Women's Clothes
description:
We have proudly set the benchmark for high-end, handcrafted tailoring on the island—earning a reputation as
the
best tailor in town. With every stitch, we deliver more than just clothing, we deliver confidence, character and a personal statement of style.
At Samui Tailor, we believe that true luxury lies in the details. Each garment is made to measure, expertly designed to reflect your individual taste and perfectly fitted to your form. Whether you're dressing for business, a wedding, or simply to express your unique style, our team ensures every piece is a flawless blend of comfort, precision, and sophistication.
We tailor both men’s and women’s attire with equal mastery, understanding the unique contours, lines, and preferences that define personal fashion. From finely structured suits to elegant dresses and custom shirts, every item is meticulously handcrafted, featuring precision stitching, hand-selected fabrics, and carefully chosen details like custom buttons and lining.
Discover the difference of true bespoke tailoring at Samui Tailor, where your wardrobe is as refined and unique as you are."

name: Toast Cafe Bar
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Bakeries & Coffee Shops, Pet Friendly, Airconditioned Area, Brunch, International Food, Breakfast, Coffee Shop, Fresh Roasted Coffee
description:
A cozy corner of comfort on Koh Samui where rustic charm meets mouthwatering breakfasts, and every bite feels like home. From the first aroma of freshly brewed espresso to the last drizzle of maple syrup on golden French toast, we’re all about celebrating life’s simple, delicious joys.
Pull up a chair and tuck into hearty brunch favorites, from creamy avocado toast to our signature TOAST Breakfast
Board for Two with a generous spread of eggs, sausages, bacon, pancakes, and more, all served with a steaming pot of tea. It's the perfect plate to share with someone special (or keep all to yourself, we won’t judge!). Craving comfort? Our chicken noodle soup is like a warm hug from Mom’s kitchen, and our baristas pour love into every cup of coffee, made with locally roasted organic beans and rich, velvety crema.
Start your day by fueling up for an island adventure or simply take a moment to slow down, Toast Café Bar is your go-to haven for delicious food, soul-warming drinks, and feel-good vibes, all day, every day. Come for the toast, stay for the love."

tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Bakeries & Coffee Shops, Pet Friendly, Airconditioned Area, Brunch, International Food, Breakfast, Coffee Shop, Fresh Roasted Coffee

name: Happy Elephant Restaurant
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Beachfront, Seafood, Thai Food, Outdoor Dining, Cocktails, Ice Cream & Sweets, Fine Dining, Reservation Advised, Panoramic Views, Parking
description:
Welcome to an experience where the charm of island life meets the art of fine dining. Perfectly situated on one of Koh Samui’s most beautiful beachfronts, we invite you to indulge in fresh, locally sourced seafood and authentic Thai favorites, all served with a gentle sea breeze and the soothing sounds of the waves.
Our menu celebrates the vibrant flavors of Thailand, crafted with care using only the freshest ingredients from local farmers and fishermen. From perfectly grilled prawns to aromatic curries and rich, spicy stir-fries, every dish is a tribute to Thai culinary tradition with a touch of elegance.
Whatever the occasion, enjoying a romantic dinner under the stars or a relaxed lunch by the shore, Happy Elephant offers an unforgettable dining experience that combines exceptional food, warm hospitality, and the natural beauty of Samui. Fine dining barefoot on the beach, only at Happy Elephant."

name: Sarana Beach Villas
tags: Accommodation, Pool Villas, Beachfront, Swimming Pool, Air Conditioning, Rooms With Seaview, Sun Loungers Or Beach Chairs, Kitchen, Family Friendly
description:
Experience beachfront luxury at its finest at a collection of stylish, spacious 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom villas set on the tranquil sands of Bang Por, one of Koh Samui’s most sought-after beach destinations.
Each villa is thoughtfully designed for both comfort and elegance, featuring open-concept living spaces that invite in the light and sea breeze. The master bedroom opens up to stunning panoramic ocean views, creating a truly romantic and serene start to every day. Downstairs, a second bedroom with 80% blackout blinds ensures restful sleep, day or night. Enjoy a fully fitted kitchen with all the bells and whistles needed to cook up your favorite meals, whether you're preparing a tropical breakfast or a sunset dinner to enjoy on the deck.
Step outside to your private deck and plunge pool, perfect for relaxing in the sun or taking in the soothing rhythm of the waves. The view is peaceful, the vibe is luxurious, and the setting couldn't be more idyllic. Immerse yourself in nature with long walks on the beach, breathtaking sunsets, and the gentle lull of the ocean just steps from your door.
Sarana Beach Villas isn’t just a holiday destination, it’s your home away from home on Koh Samui."

name: Como bake & brunch
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Bakeries & Coffee Shops, Airconditioned Area, Brunch, International Food, Breakfast, Coffee Shop, Sweets, Fresh Roasted Coffee
description:
A cozy and inviting spot where everything revolves around quality, freshness, and a passion for homemade goodness. Known for its handcrafted approach, Como offers a delightful menu built around house-made specialties that bring comfort and flavor to every bite.
Here, the sourdough bread and pillowy shokupan are baked fresh in-house each day, using traditional methods and simple, wholesome ingredients. The same care goes into the savory side—bacon and ham are prepared on-site, ensuring rich, authentic flavor that you won’t find anywhere else.
The menu blends heartiness with elegance, offering a balanced mix of breakfast and brunch favorites, made with love and served in a warm, stylish setting. Freshly brewed coffee is a cornerstone of the Como experience, complemented by a curated selection of refreshing house-made drinks.
Don’t miss the daily assortment of fresh cakes, all baked in-house, offering the perfect sweet finish to your meal or a reason to drop by anytime. At Como Bake & Brunch, everything tastes a little better because it’s made from scratch, served with care, and enjoyed in a space designed for comfort, conversation, and connection."

name: Sasitara Thai Villas
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Wifi Access In Room, Parking, Laundry Service, Airport Shuttle, Sun Loungers Or Beach Chairs, 24 Hours Front Desk, 3* Accommodation, Family Friendly, Kid's Friendly
description:
A serene escape right in the heart of Koh Samui’s most vibrant area, surrounded by nightlife, restaurants, and the island’s iconic beaches. Ideal for travelers seeking both relaxation and easy access to the city’s attractions, this charming property blends traditional Thai style with modern comforts to create a warm and inviting atmosphere.
Conveniently located, Sasitara Thai Villas makes it simple for guests to explore the best of Koh Samui. Whether you're looking to unwind by the sea, sample local cuisine, or experience the island’s dynamic nightlife, everything is just moments away.
The hotel provides a thoughtful range of amenities designed to enhance your stay. Guests enjoy free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour security, daily housekeeping, as well as services like taxi booking and ticket assistance for tours and local activities. These touches ensure a seamless, worry-free experience from check-in to check-out.
Accommodations are spacious and comfortably appointed, with a focus on relaxation and privacy. Each villa features traditional Thai décor, cozy furnishings, and modern conveniences to create a peaceful retreat after a day of exploration."

name: Chaweng Park Place
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Bungalows, Swimming Pool, Bar, Wifi Access In Room, Rooms With Balcony, Sun Loungers Or Beach Chairs, 24 Hours Front Desk, Family Friendly
description:
A comfortable and independent living experience, ideal for both short and long stays on the beautiful island of Koh Samui. Perched above Chaweng, this peaceful hillside retreat combines affordability with convenience, featuring lake and mountain views, a private swimming pool, and a relaxed bar area built into the natural landscape. It's a perfect balance of tranquility and accessibility, with easy reach to Chaweng’s beaches, nightlife, and dining options.
The property offers a range of accommodation styles to suit different needs and preferences, all thoughtfully designed with comfort and practicality in mind. Guests can choose from Superior Rooms, Deluxe Rooms, and Deluxe Pool Villas, each offering a unique take on the Chaweng Park Place experience.
Each option includes modern comforts like air conditioning, satellite TV, free Wi-Fi, a fridge, microwave, and a Western-style bathroom with hot water. Superior Rooms are cozy and functional, with king-sized beds and balconies overlooking the lake or mountain. Deluxe Rooms offer more space with a separate living area and large balcony, ideal for longer stays. Deluxe Pool Villas sit at the top of the property, offering the best views and extra privacy.
Chaweng Park Place combines convenience, comfort, and value, making it a smart choice for independent travelers seeking a relaxed, self-contained stay in Koh Samui."

name: Sasitara Residence
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Pool Villas, Swimming Pool, Room With Private Pool, Air Conditioning, Rooms With Seaview, Family Rooms, Sun Umbrellas, 24 Hours Front Desk, 3* Accommodation, Kid's Friendly
description:
Ideally located in Chaweng, placing guests just 0.5 km from the city center and within easy reach of Samui’s top attractions. Whether you're here for relaxation or adventure, this convenient location makes it a great base for exploring the island.The residence offers 17 well-appointed rooms designed for comfort and tranquility. Each space is equipped with essential amenities and free Wi-Fi, ensuring a peaceful stay with all the conveniences of home.
Guests can enjoy a range of facilities including an outdoor swimming pool, a kids’ pool, a hot tub, and a lush garden area. Additional services like airport transfers, babysitting, and on-site parking add to the ease of your stay.Combining a central location with thoughtful service and relaxing spaces, Sasitara Residence is a smart and affordable choice for travelers looking to enjoy the best of Koh Samui."

name: Green Mango Club
tags: Bars & Nightlife, Clubs & Discos, Live Music Venues, Dj Music, Adults Only, Sports Bar
description:
No visit to Koh Samui is complete without experiencing the island’s legendary nightlife hub, Green Mango. A staple of the party scene for nearly two decades, this iconic open-air nightclub has become synonymous with Chaweng's vibrant after-dark energy. Its popularity is such that the street it anchors is now famously known as Soi Green Mango.
Located just off Chaweng Beach Road and easily accessed via Lake Road near McDonald's and Starbucks, Soi Green Mango is lined with buzzing bars, go-go joints, and street vendors, all leading to the massive Green Mango club at the far end. Known for its rustic style, high energy, and thumping dance floors, it’s the beating heart of Samui's nightlife.
While monthly events like the Full Moon and Escape Black Moon parties come and go, Green Mango remains a constant, an essential part of the Koh Samui experience. Whether you're looking to dance until dawn or soak up the party atmosphere, this is the place to be."

name: Two Sister Burger
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Bakeries & Coffee Shops, Gluten Free Options, Vegan, Vegetarian, International Food, Breakfast, Health Food, Coffee Shop, Sweets
description:
Tucked away in the charming Maenam is a warm, welcoming café where homemade flavors and feel-good food come together. From sunrise to afternoon cravings, we serve a menu full of heart, where every dish is crafted from scratch, using fresh, locally sourced ingredients.
Start your day with our comforting breakfast plates, featuring everything from fluffy scrambled eggs and crispy hash browns to freshly baked bread and homemade vegan cakes with freshly brewed coffee. Looking for something on the go? Our signature sandwiches and juicy burgers are made to order, stacked high with vibrant veggies, house-made sauces, and your choice of protein, including plant-based options.
We cater to every appetite with a focus on health and inclusivity. You'll find a delicious variety of vegan and vegetarian dishes, gluten-free options, and lighter meals that don’t compromise on flavor. Whether it’s a loaded breakfast sandwich, a fresh veggie burger, or a colorful plant-powered bowl, everything is made with love and intention."

name: Sativa Tattoo
tags: Professional Services, Tattoo Shops
description:
Creativity, precision, and passion come together as we specialize in high-quality, custom-designed tattoos, from hyper-realistic pieces and bold traditional styles to unique, personal designs crafted just for you. Whether you're looking to bring new ink to life or cover up an old tattoo with something meaningful, our experienced artists are here to help you tell your story through art.
At Sativa Tattoo, we take pride in clean lines, vibrant colors, and attention to detail all in a hygienic, welcoming studio environment. We also offer professional body piercing services, using top-grade equipment and sterile techniques to ensure your safety and comfort.
Add to you're ink journey if you are a seasoned collector or embrace your artistic style by getting your first piece, our team is here to guide you every step of the way. Discover the art of self-expression in a studio where your vision becomes permanent."

name: Phensiri Thai Restaurant
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Seafood, Thai Food, Outdoor Dining, Fusion Food, Family Friendly, Vegetarian, Sweets
description:
Welcome to a return to the roots of Thai Cuisine, where every dish tells a story deeply rooted in Samui’s rich culinary heritage. Founded by Chef Santi Wongsawat, a native of the island, Phensiri honors time-honored southern Thai recipes while embracing a commitment to health, sustainability, and authenticity.
At Phensiri, we cook with intention. Our kitchen uses only what nature offers fresh each day — locally grown herbs, responsibly sourced seafood, and tropical produce from the Samui archipelago. We avoid industrial ingredients, opting instead for natural alternatives like coconut oil and traditional animal fats that have nourished generations.
Chef Santi’s journey began in his mother’s kitchen, where he learned the secrets of southern Thai flavors and the importance of balance and technique. Today, that legacy lives on in every dish, from vibrant curries enriched with mature coconuts to delicate desserts made with the subtle sweetness of young ones. Each meal is a tribute to the island’s bounty and the wisdom of its culinary traditions."

name: SEA SUN Bed & Beyond
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Wifi Access In Room, Air Conditioning, Rooms With Seaview, Rooms With Balcony, Sun Umbrellas, 4* Accommodation
description:
Welcome to your cozy, colorful escape on the coast where we’ve mastered the art of laid-back comfort and unforgettable views, creating a place where good vibes and island beauty come together effortlessly.
From the moment you step into our lobby, you’ll notice the difference, more of a cool hangout than a typical reception, with vibrant colors and a relaxed atmosphere that flows throughout the hotel. Our rooms may be compact, but they’re thoughtfully designed for comfort, featuring inviting balconies with comfy chairs perfect for soaking in Samui’s legendary sunsets.
Each room offers a panoramic view where nature takes center stage. Gaze out over the ocean, watch the sky transform into a masterpiece of colors, and let the calm of the sea wash over you. Whether you're starting your day with the sound of waves or winding down with a sunset show, SEA SUN Bed & Beyond is your front-row seat to the island’s natural beauty."

name: Sabienglae Restaurant
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Beachfront, Seafood, Thai Food
description:
A celebration of island life, where the rhythm of the sea meets the soul of Thai culinary tradition. More than just a seafood restaurant, Sabienglae is a living tribute to the flavors, stories and spirit of Samui, inspired by its fishermen, families, and age-old way of life.
Here, each dish is a dialogue between land and sea, crafted with the freshest local catch and time-honored recipes passed down through generations. From sizzling seafood platters to delicately spiced southern Thai classics, every bite carries the essence of the island’s heritage.
Whether you're savoring a sunset over the Gulf or sharing a meal with loved ones, Sabienglae invites you to experience authentic, unhurried, and unforgettable island dining, where the flavours are timeless and the welcome is as warm as the tropical breeze."

name: Sabienglae Restaurant
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Beachfront, Seafood, Thai Food
description:
Set against the laid-back charm of Bangrak Bay, we are bringing the heart of Samui’s coastal traditions to your table. With sweeping sea views and a gentle breeze carrying the scent of salt and spice, this is where island life unfolds through food.
Rooted in community and guided by generations of local wisdom, Sabienglae serves up fresh-off-the-boat seafood and bold southern Thai flavors in a setting that feels both familiar and special. Every plate reflects a deep respect for the ingredients, the craft, and the stories behind them.
Whether you’re arriving by road or boat, coming for a family feast or a quiet escape, Sabienglae is a place to slow down, dig in, and taste the true spirit of Samui, honest, vibrant, and unforgettable."

name: Sapphire Ocean Samui Charter
tags: Things To Do, On The Water, Tour Companies, Diving, Private Boat, Pink Dolphins, Ang Thong Marine National Park, Koh Tao, Private Tours, Fishing, Koh Taen, Koh Madsum, Koh Mat Lang, Koh Nangyuan
description:
Experience the Gulf of Thailand like never before with professional speedboat charters around Koh Samui and beyond. Whether you seek adventure, relaxation, or a once-in-a-lifetime celebration, we bring your ocean dreams to life.
Dive into crystal-clear waters for
snorkeling, scuba diving, or deep-sea fishing with expert guidance and top-tier equipment. Looking to mark a special occasion? From intimate weddings at sea to unforgettable parties under the sun, our crew is here to craft your perfect day on the water.
Cruise through the stunning archipelago surrounding Koh Samui, including hidden beaches, lush marine parks, and secluded islets, all at your own pace and in total comfort. With Sapphire Ocean, every journey is personalized, every detail considered, and every moment unforgettable. Let the sea set you free."

name: Wilson’s Beach Bar & Restaurant
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Beach Bars, Beachfront, Thai Food, Outdoor Dining, Family Friendly, International Food, Breakfast, Cocktails
description:
Sip, savor, and slow down beneath swaying coconut palms with uninterrupted views of the sea at our laid-back escape on the shores of Bang Por. Here time moves with the tide and every moment is best enjoyed barefoot.
Unwind with a chilled cocktail or an ice-cold beer as you watch the sun dip below the horizon. Our menu blends the best of both worlds – flavorful Thai favorites, comforting international classics and Danish style dishes, all served with a smile and a sea breeze.
Drop in for a lazy lunch, stay for a sunset drink, or take your time with a beachside dinner under the stars, Wilson’s invites you to relax, recharge, and soak in the simple beauty of island life."

name: Samui Paragon Gun Shooting Range
tags: Things To Do, Adrenaline Seekers, Shooting Range
description:
Gun shooting range that offers a thrilling and safe environment for both beginners and experienced shooters of all ages. Set in a vast natural field, our outdoor range is ideal for long-distance target practice, providing the space and setting to truly sharpen your aim.
We offer a wide selection of firearms, including a variety of handguns and long-range rifles, giving you the chance to experience the power and precision of professional-grade equipment. Our team of trained instructors ensures every session is guided, secure, and tailored to your skill level.
Whether you're trying shooting for the first time or looking to refine your technique, Samui Paragon Gun Shooting Range delivers an unforgettable experience in one of the island’s most scenic and spacious settings."

name: Samui Media Group
tags: Professional Services, Marketing, Graphic Design & Printing, Merchandise, Web Development, Seo Services, Digital Marketing, Graphic Design, Logo Design
description:
Samui Media Group: Digital & Print Solutions
At Samui Media Group, we bring your vision to life with high-quality digital and print solutions. Our expert team excels in four key areas:
Web Design & Development:
Crafting stunning, functional websites for all needs—simple sites or complex e-commerce platforms.
Graphic Design:
Transforming ideas into captivating visuals, from logos to custom graphics.
Online Marketing:
Enhancing your online presence with SEO, social media management, and targeted campaigns.
Print Work:
High-quality print services for business cards, brochures, large format prints, and more.
We’re committed to excellence, ensuring every project exceeds expectations. Let’s create something amazing together."

name: Elephant Jungle Sanctuary
tags: Things To Do, Must See, On The Land, Elephants
description:
Take part in a truly ethical and unforgettable experience with Thailand’s gentle giants. As part of a nationwide initiative rooted in compassion and conservation, our Koh Samui location provides a safe haven for rescued elephants, many of whom have been retired from labor or exploitative tourism practices.
At this sanctuary, visitors can connect with elephants in a natural and respectful environment, no riding, no performances, just meaningful interaction. From preparing nutritious treats to walking beside these majestic animals through the jungle, every moment is designed to foster understanding, empathy, and responsible tourism.
Set against the backdrop of Koh Samui’s serene beauty, this sanctuary is more than just a destination, it’s a movement toward a future where elephants thrive in peace. Join us in supporting ethical tourism and discover the joy of giving back while making memories that truly matter."

name: Sweet and Salty
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Bakeries & Coffee Shops, Keto Friendly, Airconditioned Area, Outdoor Dining, Family Friendly, Gluten Free Options, Vegetarian, Brunch, International Food, Breakfast, Coffee Shop, Sweets
description:
A must breakfast and brunch spot where flavor meets passion. Perfect if you have a sweet tooth or if you are more of a savory breakfast lover, our cozy café is all about satisfying cravings with fresh, feel-good food made from the heart.
Come hungry and leave happy, our menu has something for everyone to start your day or need a boost throughout the day. Enjoy eggs just the way you like them, explore our keto-friendly options, or indulge in classic brunch favorites with a delicious twist. Every dish is crafted with quality ingredients and a whole lot of love.
Perfect for lazy mornings or post-beach bites, Sweet and Salty is where good vibes, great coffee, and unforgettable meals come together."

name: Jin's Bar and Restaurant
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Seafood, Thai Food, Vegetarian, Cocktails, Sweets
description:
Discover the heart of Thai cuisine at our warm and welcoming spot where tradition meets taste. Home style cooking elevated as Jin’s serves up authentic Thai dishes made with care, bold flavors, and the freshest local ingredients.
From classic Thai favorites like Pad Thai and Green Curry to savory seafood specialties and satisfying vegetarian options, there’s something on the menu for every palate. Escape the heat and enjoy your meal with a refreshing cocktail or an ice-cold beer and soak in the relaxed island atmosphere.
Served with a smile, try our menu if you and your loved ones are craving comfort food or looking to explore something new, Jin’s is the perfect place to unwind, eat well, and enjoy true Thai hospitality."

name: Clay Beach Samui
tags: Accommodation, Pool Villas, Beachfront, Butler / Private Chef, Swimming Pool, Wifi Access In Room, Rooms With Seaview, Sun Loungers Or Beach Chairs, Sun Umbrellas, 5* Accommodation, Kitchen, Family Friendly
description:
A collection of three exclusive beachfront pool villas located on the serene western end of Bophut Bay. Set against the backdrop of white sands, turquoise waters, and lush tropical gardens, Clay Beach offers a rare blend of contemporary luxury, privacy, and authentic Thai charm, an island escape unlike any other.
Each villa, available in 3 or 5-bedroom configurations, features striking modern design infused with timeless Asian elegance. Hand-selected antique artworks, sculptures, and natural materials like clay, brass, and wood create a sophisticated yet soulful ambiance. Every detail is designed to impress, from the expansive oceanfront decks and private pools to panoramic views of Koh Phangan.
Whether you're planning a family holiday, a romantic honeymoon, or a retreat with friends, Clay Beach delivers the highest standard of comfort and service. With dedicated villa staff, private chef, and personalized butler service, your every need is met with the warm hospitality Thailand is known for."

name: Auayporn Resort
tags: Accommodation, Bungalows, Air Conditioning, Parking, Kitchen

name: Tanchote House
tags: Accommodation, Bungalows, Air Conditioning, Parking
description:
Discover a hidden sanctuary, where tranquility and nature come together in perfect harmony. Nestled among swaying coconut palms and lush greenery, our well-appointed bungalows are thoughtfully arranged around a serene inner lake, offering guests a soothing, immersive retreat.
Wake up to birdsong, breathe in the fresh tropical air, and let the natural beauty of your surroundings melt your stress away. Whether you're sipping coffee on your private terrace or taking a gentle stroll through the gardens, Tanchote House invites you to slow down, unwind, and reconnect with the simple pleasures of life.
Perfect for those seeking calm, comfort, and a deep connection with nature, Tanchote House is more than a place to stay, it’s a place to truly relax."

name: 4 Monkeys Coffee & Bar
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Beach Bars, Beachfront, Thai Food, Outdoor Dining, Vegetarian, Brunch, International Food, Cocktails, Ice Cream & Sweets, Coffee Shop

name: Green Flow Chill Bar & Thai Food
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Thai Food, Outdoor Dining, Vegetarian, International Food, Breakfast, Cocktails
description:
A natural haven among the swaying coconut trees, you will find fresh, flavorful Thai cuisine, international dishes and refreshing drinks served with heart. We’re a small, welcoming spot where locals and travelers alike come together to enjoy great food, good company, and laid-back island vibes.
Our menu celebrates traditional Thai recipes and gobal favorites, made with locally sourced, organic ingredients whenever possible. From vibrant curries to aromatic stir-fries, savory breakfast dishes and refreshing tropical drinks, every dish is crafted with loving care making a simple, honest menu that is bursting with flavor.
At Green Flow, we believe in more than just feeding the body, we aim to nourish the soul. Whether you're here for a quiet meal, a chat with friendly faces, or just to soak in the relaxed atmosphere, we want you to feel at home. Come as you are, stay as long as you like, and leave with a full heart (and belly)."

name: Bamboo Resort Samui
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Bar, Wifi Access In Room, Sun Umbrellas, Kitchen, Family Friendly

name: Amarina Green Hotel
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Swimming Pool, Wifi Access In Room, Air Conditioning, Laundry Service, Rooms With Balcony, Sun Umbrellas, 3* Accommodation

name: Samui Wooden Hill Resort
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Bungalows, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Wifi Access In Room, Air Conditioning, Parking, Airport Shuttle, Family Rooms, Sun Umbrellas, 3* Accommodation, Family Friendly
description:
Perched on the serene hills of Lamai offers more than just a place to stay, it invites you into the soul of Thai heritage. Designed with timeless elegance, our traditional Thai wooden houses blend gracefully with the natural surroundings, creating a warm, peaceful atmosphere that feels both exotic and comforting.
From spacious family suites to intimate couple's retreats, our variety of room styles caters to travelers from all walks of life, whether you're Thai or visiting from afar. Every detail, from the handcrafted décor to the gentle scent of local wood, is chosen to reflect authentic Thai charm.
Unwind by our unique mountainside swimming pool, where you can soak up the sun or float beneath the trees, all with panoramic views that make you feel like you’re swimming in the clouds. It’s a space designed not just for relaxation, but for connection, with nature, with culture, and with yourself.
At Samui Wooden Hill Resort, your happiness and comfort are our inspiration. Come discover Thailand the way it was meant to be felt, naturally beautiful, warmly welcoming, and deeply rooted in tradition."

name: Wirason Residence
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Bar, Wifi Access In Room, Air Conditioning, Rooms With Balcony, Family Rooms, Sun Umbrellas, 3* Accommodation
description:
Nestled in a serene coconut grove just minutes from the vibrant center of Lamai, we offer the perfect balance of comfort, tranquility, and convenience. With 16 spacious and well-appointed rooms, our boutique resort is designed to welcome couples, families, and groups of friends seeking a peaceful escape.
Surrounded by lush tropical gardens, guests can unwind in our swimming pool, enjoy traditional Thai massages in our dedicated massage room, or savor delicious food and drinks at our on-site bar and restaurant. Whether you're returning from a day of island exploration or simply soaking in the quiet beauty of the surroundings, WIRASON Residence provides the ideal setting to rest, recharge, and reconnect.
With its calm atmosphere, personal service, and natural charm, WIRASON Residence invites you to experience Koh Samui at your own pace, relaxed, refreshed, and right at home."

name: Wirason Residence
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Bar, Wifi Access In Room, Air Conditioning, Rooms With Balcony, Family Rooms, Sun Umbrellas, 3* Accommodation
description:
Nestled in a serene coconut grove just minutes from the vibrant center of Lamai, we offer the perfect balance of comfort, tranquility, and convenience. Whether you're returning from a day of island exploration or simply soaking in the quiet beauty of the surroundings, WIRASON Residence provides the ideal setting to rest, recharge, and reconnect.
With its calm atmosphere, personal service, and natural charm, WIRASON Residence invites you to experience Koh Samui at your own pace, relaxed, refreshed, and right at home."

name: Samui Bike Tour
tags: Cars & Bikes, Bike Rentals
description:
Welcome to your ultimate motorbike rental destination in Lamai to explore the whole island. Whether you're here to unwind or seek adventure, there's no better way to experience the island than on two wheels and we've got you covered with a fleet of brand-new Honda motorcycles.
Choose from our top-quality selection, including the Honda Click 160cc, Honda PCX 160cc, Honda ADV 160cc and the premium Honda Forza 350cc. Each bike is meticulously maintained for your safety, comfort, and peace of mind giving you the freedom to explore Samui’s beaches, mountains, and hidden gems in style.
Whether you're a seasoned rider or trying it for the first time, our friendly team is here to ensure a smooth and easy rental experience. So start planning your holiday now and ride with confidence, ride with Samui Bike Tour. Your island adventure starts here."

name: Manga Sushi
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Thai Food, Airconditioned Area, Japanese Food, Vegetarian, International Food, Breakfast, Delivery

name: Chef Wayz Shabu
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Seafood, Japanese Food
description:
Dive into the ultimate all-you-can-eat experience with our flavorful shabu buffet, premium sashimi, and a variety of fresh ingredients made for sharing. At Chef Wayz Shabu, we believe great food brings people together, and there’s no better way to enjoy it than around a steaming pot of rich, aromatic broth.
Choose your broth, load up on high-quality meats, seafood, and vegetables, and cook everything just the way you like it. Craving something cool and fresh? Our carefully prepared sashimi is sliced to perfection and melts in your mouth. Whether you're here with family, friends, or flying solo, every visit is a chance to eat, relax, and enjoy.
Modern, cozy, and full of flavor – Chef Wayz Shabu is the perfect place to gather, dip, and indulge."

name: Mollusca Japanese &Oyster
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Seafood, Fusion Food, Japanese Food, Cocktails, Wine Pairing
description:
Specializing in fresh, raw oysters and creative fusion rolls, embrace a bold twist to traditional sushi dining. Our menu blends the delicate art of Japanese cuisine with global flavors, offering everything from expertly sliced sashimi to inventive rolls that surprise and delight.
Indulge in the briny perfection of raw oysters, paired with house-made sauces or enjoyed pure. Explore a range of fusion sushi crafted with premium ingredients, served alongside a curated selection of premium beverages, from a selection of fine wine and Thai craft beer designed to complement every bite.
Chic, intimate, and full of flavor, Mollusca is more than just a restaurant – it's an experience for those who crave something refined, fresh, and a little unexpected, where ocean luxury meets modern Japanese fusion."

name: Say Sushi
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Outdoor Dining, Japanese Food, Delivery
description:
Our story began with two longtime friends and a shared dream: to bring the flavors of Japan to life in a way that feels both authentic and personal. Say Sushi was born out of our love for Japanese cuisine and a desire to create a sushi bar that goes beyond the ordinary.
Crafting our menu has been a journey of inspiration and innovation. We blend timeless sushi traditions with signature creations, giving each dish its own character and story. Every roll, nigiri, and sashimi plate is prepared with care, using only the freshest, highest-quality ingredients, because we believe great sushi starts with great sourcing.
At Say Sushi, we’ve poured our hearts into every detail from the warm, inviting atmosphere to the thoughtfully designed space that captures the spirit of modern Japan. Most of all, we’re here to serve sushi that’s not only delicious and beautifully presented but generous in flavor and crafted with joy."

name: Onaka Sushi Bar
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Airconditioned Area, Japanese Food
description:
We believe sushi isn’t just food – it’s an experience that should satisfy your cravings and stir your senses. Our name means ""stomach"" in Japanese, and that’s exactly what we aim to please – with generous portions, bold flavors, and a menu that blends traditional Japanese craftsmanship with a modern twist.
From fresh-cut sashimi and perfectly balanced nigiri to creative rolls and seasonal specialties, everything at Onaka is made with precision and passion. We use only the finest ingredients, sourced daily, and served in a cozy, stylish setting where every guest feels like part of the story.
Serving long time sushi lover's to curious first-timers, Onaka Sushi Bar is your go-to spot for satisfying meals, good vibes, and unforgettable bites. Come hungry. Leave happy."

name: Classic Gym & Fitness
tags: Sports & Fitness, Gym & Fitness, Personal Trainer

name: The Living
tags: Accommodation, Pool Villas, Swimming Pool, Bar, Room With Private Pool, Wifi Access In Room, Basketball Court, Air Conditioning, Parking, Sun Umbrellas, 3* Accommodation, Kitchen, Family Friendly
description:
Experience laid-back island living with all the comforts of home in our spacious 2 Bedroom pool available for daily, monthly, or yearly stays. Each villa includes two comfortable bedrooms with closets, air conditioning, and two private bathrooms featuring bathtubs and hot water. Your private pool with jacuzzi offers a relaxing space to unwind, while the fully equipped kitchen with an electric stove and microwave makes cooking easy and convenient.
Enjoy free high-speed Wi-Fi throughout the villa, and stay entertained with a Smart TV that includes access to Netflix and YouTube. Room and pool cleaning is provided once a week, including chlorine service to keep your private pool fresh and clean.
Guests also have access to shared hotel facilities, including a standard-size swimming pool, a basketball half-court, and on-site car and motorbike parking. Whether you're planning a short holiday or a long-term stay in Koh Samui, our 2 Bedroom Pool Villas offer the perfect mix of privacy, comfort, and convenience in a peaceful Chaweng location."

name: Maison Tonka
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Bakeries & Coffee Shops, Afternoon Tea, Airconditioned Area, Outdoor Dining, French Food, Brunch, Breakfast, Wifi Access In Restaurant, Coffee Shop, Sweets, Fresh Roasted Coffee
description:
A must try, where refined French craftsmanship meets the tropical charm of Thailand, ideally located in the vibrant area of Bophut. This elegant pastry shop, tea room, and café invites guests to experience flavors they won’t find anywhere else on the island.
Led by Julien Despaquis, whose background includes working in Michelin-starred kitchens and under the tutelage of renowned Meilleur Ouvrier de France, Pascal Caffet, Maison Tonka stands out for its uncompromising commitment to quality. Every creation is made with premium French-sourced ingredients, from butter and cream to flour and chocolate, ensuring a taste and texture that’s unmistakably authentic.
The menu showcases a wide variety of freshly baked pastries like croissants, pain au chocolat, and cookies, alongside signature cakes, seasonal chocolates, and a selection of breakfast and lunch offerings. A curated beverage menu complements the experience, featuring barista-crafted coffee, homemade lemonade, and premium teas.
Everything is prepared on-site each day with care and creativity, making Maison Tonka a must-visit destination for lovers of exceptional pastry and thoughtful cuisine."

name: The Cups Café
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Seafood, Thai Food, Airconditioned Area, Outdoor Dining, Barbecue, Japanese Food, Korean Food, Parking
description:
Explore the rich and flavorful world of Asian fusion cuisine through a generous buffet-style experience. Specializing in Thai, Korean, and Japanese dishes, this vibrant eatery brings together the best of three culinary traditions under one roof, making it a must-visit for food lovers in Ko Samui.
A highlight of the Shabu buffet is the selection of premium buffet menus of fresh seafood, meat and vegetables to choose from, sourced daily to ensure exceptional quality. From succulent prawns and tender squid to locally caught fish, the seafood is prepared in a variety of styles steamed, grilled, or infused with bold Asian spices. It’s a paradise for seafood lovers looking for both classic flavors and creative fusion dishes and for those who crave a more interactive experience while choosing from marinated meats, seafood, and vegetables, then grill them right at your table.
The interior of The Cups Café is stylish and inviting, decorated in a modern Thai style that balances comfort and elegance. Guests can dine in the cool, air-conditioned indoor space or enjoy the tropical ambiance of the outdoor terrace."

name: Majesty Tailor
tags: Shopping, Clothing, Tailors, Handcrafted, Men's Clothes, Women's Clothes

name: Royal King International Suits
tags: Shopping, Clothing, Tailors, Handcrafted, Footwear, Men's Clothes, Women's Clothes
description:
Timeless elegance meets modern craftsmanship, we specialize in bespoke tailoring for both ladies and gentlemen and take pride in delivering custom-made suits, dresses, and leather shoes that reflect your personal style and sophistication.
Each garment is made to order using premium quality fabrics sourced from around the world, ensuring a flawless fit and luxurious feel. Our skilled tailors bring decades of experience and a keen eye for detail, combining traditional techniques with contemporary flair to craft pieces that stand out.
From classic business attire to refined formalwear, Royal King International Suits is your destination for tailored excellence, expert service, and true individuality in every stitch."

name: Chaweng Regent Beach Resort
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Bar, Wifi Access In Room, Gym, Air Conditioning, Parking, Rooms With Seaview, Family Rooms, Sun Loungers Or Beach Chairs, 24 Hours Front Desk, Room Service, 4* Accommodation
description:
Step into a world of tropical tranquility, where powdery white sands meet the crystal-clear waters of the Gulf of Thailand. Nestled along one of Koh Samui’s most beautiful beaches, this serene sanctuary invites you to unwind beneath swaying coconut palms and immerse yourself in breezy elegance.
From the moment you arrive, you’ll be enveloped in the charm of Thai contemporary design fused with modern chic aesthetics. Our 155 spacious rooms are thoughtfully designed with a touch of elegant opulence and reflect the vibrant culture of Thailand, offering a variety of settings across the lush, landscaped property, each complete with full amenities to ensure your comfort.
Wander through gardens bursting with native blooms, soak up sweeping ocean views, and indulge in pure relaxation and pampering. Whether you're lounging by the beach, enjoying a rejuvenating spa treatment, or savoring local flavors at our dining venues, every moment is crafted with care and luxury.
Chaweng Regent Beach Resort isn’t just a place to stay, it's your personal slice of paradise, where every detail is designed to make your holiday in Koh Samui truly unforgettable."

name: Chaweng Regent Beach Resort
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Bar, Wifi Access In Room, Gym, Air Conditioning, Parking, Rooms With Seaview, Family Rooms, Sun Loungers Or Beach Chairs, 24 Hours Front Desk, Room Service, 4* Accommodation

Chaweng Regent Beach Resort isn’t just a place to stay, it's your personal slice of paradise, where every detail is designed to make your holiday in Koh Samui truly unforgettable."

name: Red Fish Restaurant @ Chaweng Regent
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Seafood, Thai Food, Airconditioned Area, Outdoor Dining, International Food, Cocktails, Ice Cream & Sweets, Wine Bar
description:
Redefining island dining with a bold blend of design, flavor, and relaxed sophistication. Inspired by the energy and vibrancy of its namesake, the Red Fish, the restaurant’s interiors combine traditional Thai elements with modern creativity, creating a warm and stylish atmosphere that feels both fresh and familiar.
Guests can choose between air-conditioned indoor seating or a breezy open-air terrace, each offering a unique yet equally inviting setting. A standout feature is the playful bar with swinging seats, seamlessly connecting the indoor and outdoor spaces, perfect for sipping signature cocktails or enjoying light bites with a view.
The menu, crafted by an award-winning chef, showcases Thai cuisine with a modern twist. Every dish highlights bold flavors, fresh local ingredients, and thoughtful presentation, offering a culinary experience that is both inventive and rooted in tradition. Red Fish Restaurant Samui offers an unforgettable dining experience where island charm meets creative flair."

name: Chaweng Regent Beach Resort
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Bar, Wifi Access In Room, Gym, Air Conditioning, Parking, Rooms With Seaview, Family Rooms, Sun Loungers Or Beach Chairs, 24 Hours Front Desk, Room Service, 4* Accommodation

name: Bophut Resort & Spa
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Bar, Room With Private Pool, Wifi Access In Room, Gym, Parking, Rooms With Seaview, Airport Shuttle, Sun Umbrellas, Wellness, 24 Hours Front Desk, Room Service, 4* Accommodation, Family Friendly
description:
An exquisite blend of tropical serenity and modern luxury, surrounded by seven acres of lush, native gardens, this boutique resort is a true sanctuary for those seeking both seclusion and sophistication.
Just a short 5 km drive from Samui International Airport, the resort features 61 elegantly appointed accommodations, including 32 private villas and 29 deluxe rooms, all designed in a stylish fusion of traditional Thai architecture and contemporary comfort. Each room is thoughtfully outfitted with upscale amenities such as a Smart TV with satellite channels, a luxurious bathroom with separate shower and tub, an in-room safe, and a fully stocked minibar.
Bo Phut Resort & Spa is the perfect destination for travelers who value peace, beauty, and personalized service. Feel at complete ease while enjoying the tranquil beach, or be more adventurous while exploring the natural beauty and vibrant culture of Koh Samui. This resort offers a truly memorable island experience that balances relaxation with refined hospitality."

name: Bophut Resort & Spa
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Bar, Room With Private Pool, Wifi Access In Room, Gym, Parking, Rooms With Seaview, Airport Shuttle, Sun Umbrellas, Wellness, 24 Hours Front Desk, Room Service, 4* Accommodation, Family Friendly

name: Villa LunaSole
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Swimming Pool, Wifi Access In Room, Air Conditioning, Rooms With Balcony, 3* Accommodation, Family Friendly
description:
A peaceful retreat in one of Koh Samui’s most tranquil locations, perfect for travelers seeking comfort, convenience, and a touch of island charm. Tucked away in a quiet area just a 5-minute walk from the beautiful Bo Phut Beach and only 15 minutes from the vibrant Fisherman’s Village night market, LunaSole combines serene surroundings with easy access to local attractions.
This charming villa-style hotel features apartment-style and family-friendly rooms designed for relaxed, no-fuss living. Guests can unwind in the outdoor pool, stroll through the private garden, or simply enjoy the calm ambiance after a day of exploring the island.
Located just a 12-minute drive from Samui International Airport, Villa LunaSole is an ideal choice for couples, families, and long-stay visitors looking for simple comfort, thoughtful amenities, and a peaceful home base on Koh Samui."

name: The Roof Samui
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Thai Food, Outdoor Dining, Viewpoint, Family Friendly, International Food, Cocktails, Parking
description:
Perched high above the vibrant energy of Chaweng you will find a sensory escape with an elevated dining destination that invites you to rise above the ordinary and savor an experience that’s as breathtaking as its panoramic views. As the sun melts into the horizon, casting golden hues across the island, The Roof becomes the perfect stage for unforgettable evenings.
Here, flavor knows no borders. The menu is a bold celebration of culinary creativity, weaving together Thai classics, European favorites, and international comfort food, from sizzling grilled specialties and handcrafted pizzas to juicy burgers and fragrant Thai curries. Every dish is crafted with passion and served with a side of sweeping island vistas. Thirsty for more? The bar at The Roof Samui is a haven of handcrafted cocktails and all-day pours designed to elevate your moment.
Accessing this hilltop haven is part of the adventure, The Roof offers 4×4 transfers to carry you up the scenic, winding ascent, adding a touch of thrill to your journey. Once you arrive, the relaxed atmosphere, stylish décor, and sky-high views do the rest."

name: TOMMY BLACK INK
tags: Professional Services, Tattoo Shops
description:
A premier tattoo studio known for its professional artistry, top-tier hygiene standards, and welcoming atmosphere. With over 20 years of experience, the skilled artists at TOMMY BLACK INK specialize in both machine tattoos and traditional bamboo tattoos, delivering high-quality work that’s tailored to your unique style and vision.
Whether you're looking for bold, modern designs or intricate, cultural pieces, the team’s precision and passion ensure every tattoo is a masterpiece. The studio is meticulously clean and fully equipped to meet international hygiene standards, giving you total peace of mind during your session.
And while you're getting inked, enjoy FREE drinks in a relaxed, friendly setting that reflects the island's laid-back spirit. At TOMMY BLACK INK, it’s more than just a tattoo, it’s a lasting memory of your time in paradise."

name: The Villager
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Wifi Access In Room, Air Conditioning, Rooms With Seaview, Rooms With Balcony, 3* Accommodation
description:
Conveniently tucked away in the charming streets of Fisherman’s Village is a bespoke boutique hotel that blends modern comfort with authentic island character. Just steps from Bophut Beach and surrounded by some of Samui’s most beloved cafés, restaurants, and markets, it’s the perfect home base for your island adventures.
Each room at The Villager is thoughtfully designed to offer a relaxed, stylish retreat. Expect spacious layouts, comfy
beds, and all the modern essentials to make your stay seamless, When you stay with us, you will find Quirky Designs, inspired by a life of travel. With each turn of your head you will find more to love about our unique style and furnishings that were handpicked to give you an authentic Thai experience, with a modern twist! Cool off in the refreshing pool, enjoy your morning coffee in a sun-drenched courtyard, or stroll to the beach in under a minute. At The Villager, every detail is curated to help you unwind, explore, and feel right at home.
If you’re a first-time visitor or a returning traveler, come stay in style at The Villager Samui, where laid-back luxury meets island ease."

name: Vibes Samui Hostel & Cafe
tags: Accommodation, Hostels, Breakfast, Restaurant, Bar, Shared Dorm, Air Conditioning
description:
Travel Meets Connection, not just a place to rest your head, it’s a hub for curious souls and adventurous hearts. Here, every day begins with the calming rhythm of the ocean and ends with stories shared over coffee, cocktails, or local fare.
Designed for modern travelers seeking comfort, community, and culture, Vibes offers a warm, social atmosphere paired with stylish accommodations and thoughtful amenities. Whether you’re soaking up the sun on nearby beaches, joining a group tour to explore the island’s hidden gems, or enjoying a laid-back afternoon in our cozy café, you’ll find the perfect balance of relaxation and adventure.
At Vibes, we believe the best part of travel is the people you meet along the way. That’s why we’ve created a space where connections come naturally—whether through spontaneous conversations in our shared lounge or curated experiences that bring travelers together. Come for the stay. Stay for the vibe."

name: The Reef Bar & Restaurant
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Beach Bars, Beachfront, Thai Food, Outdoor Dining, Family Friendly, International Food, Cocktails, Panoramic Views
description:
Embrace the rhythm of island life at this hidden hideaway, where time slows down and the sea sets the pace. The Reef Bar & Restaurant offers a peaceful escape from the island’s busier spots, a place to unwind, savor and soak in the natural beauty of the coast.
Set just steps from the shoreline, The Reef is all about laid-back vibes while enjoying the soothing sounds of waves as you sip on refreshing cocktails, chilled beers, or freshly made smoothies. Our menu features a delicious mix of Thai classics and international favorites, crafted with fresh, local ingredients to satisfy every craving.
Escape the hustle and bustle while lounging with friends, watching the sunset, or simply enjoying a quiet moment by the sea, The Reef invites you to relax and truly embrace the island lifestyle, where every drink is a toast to serenity, and every bite is a taste of paradise."

name: White Sand Samui Resort
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Bar, Wifi Access In Room, Rooms With Seaview, Family Rooms, Sun Loungers Or Beach Chairs, Sun Umbrellas, 24 Hours Front Desk, 4* Accommodation, Family Friendly
description:
Here, serenity meets sophistication, offering an intimate retreat where breathtaking ocean views and warm Thai hospitality come together to create an unforgettable island experience. With just 45 elegantly designed rooms across six unique categories, our boutique resort is the perfect sanctuary for couples seeking romance or families in search of relaxation. Each room is thoughtfully crafted to provide comfort, privacy, and a sense of peaceful escape, surrounded by lush tropical gardens and the calming sounds of the sea.
Soak up the sun at our stunning infinity pool, sip on a handcrafted signature cocktail, and let your worries drift away with the gentle sea breeze. Whether you're unwinding on the beach, enjoying fresh, locally inspired cuisine, or simply taking in the beauty of Koh Samui, White Sand Samui Resort invites you to slow down and savor every moment.
Experience the art of island living, calm, elegant, and effortlessly relaxing."

name: Aloha Resort
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Beachfront, Breakfast, Pet Friendly, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Bar, Wifi Access In Room, Air Conditioning, Rooms With Balcony, Family Rooms, Sun Loungers Or Beach Chairs, Sun Umbrellas, 24 Hours Front Desk, 3* Accommodation

name: Mira Mare Resort
tags: Accommodation, Bungalows, Beachfront, Breakfast, Restaurant, Air Conditioning, Parking, Sun Loungers Or Beach Chairs, Fan Room, Kitchen, Family Friendly
description:
A locally owned, family-run retreat dedicated to preserving the island’s natural beauty and cultural heritage. Our philosophy is rooted in simplicity, sustainability, and heartfelt hospitality, offering guests an authentic experience that reflects the true spirit of Samui.
We offer 30 cozy bungalows designed for comfort and practicality, ideal for both economy and mid-range travelers. Each bungalow features a private bathroom, with options ranging from fan-cooled rooms to more upgraded accommodations, all surrounded by tropical gardens just steps from the sea.
At Mira Mare, we believe less is more. That’s why we focus on what matters most: clean, comfortable stays, genuine local charm, and a peaceful environment where guests can unwind and connect with nature. While you're here, explore the island or simply relax, Mira Mare offers a simple yet memorable stay, guided by care, community, and conservation."

name: Centara Life Lamai Resort
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Bar, Wifi Access In Room, Gym, Air Conditioning, Parking, Wheelchair Accessible, Airport Shuttle, Rooms With Balcony, Family Rooms, Sun Umbrellas, 24 Hours Front Desk, 3* Accommodation, Family Friendly
description:
Just a short drive from Samui International Airport and steps from the crystal-clear waters of Lamai Beach, we invite you to unwind in contemporary comfort, surrounded by the natural beauty and vibrant culture of Koh Samui.
With 61 stylish rooms, including Deluxe, Premier Loft, and spacious Family Suites, each space is thoughtfully designed with calming earth tones and a chic, modern loft style. Select accommodations feature separate living and dining areas, balconies, and daybeds for added flexibility, perfect for groups of 3–4 without the need for an extra bed. Enjoy a host of premium amenities, including a sparkling outdoor pool, 24-hour fitness centre and complimentary parking.
Embrace the freedom from our ideal location to explore iconic local landmarks like Hin Ta and Hin Yai, browsing Lamai Night Plaza, or simply soaking in the sea breeze, Centara Life Lamai Resort Samui offers the perfect blend of island charm and contemporary ease, ideal for solo travellers, families, and business guests alike."

name: Coconuts Palm Resort
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Pool Villas, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Bar, Room With Private Pool, Wifi Access In Room, Air Conditioning, Parking, Sun Umbrellas, 4* Accommodation, Kitchen, Family Friendly
description:
Tucked away in a peaceful coconut grove in Hua Thanon, on offer is a serene island escape blending contemporary comfort with authentic Thai charm. Conveniently located just 2.8 km from Lamai City Center, 1.7 km from the famous Grandfather and Grandmother Rocks (Hin Ta and Hin Yai), the resort is perfectly positioned for both relaxation and exploration.
The resort features two distinct areas designed for rest and relaxation. The Tropical is set around a tranquil garden and private pool, with eight cozy bungalows each offering a private terrace, direct access to the pool, sun loungers, and a jetty perfect for lazy afternoons. The Big Pool area is centered around a spacious lawn and sundeck, featuring fourteen modern bungalows, each with a private terrace.
All rooms are air-conditioned and equipped with modern amenities, including flat-screen TVs and free Wi-Fi. Some units also offer a comfortable seating area for unwinding after a day of island adventures. Private bathrooms are included in every room, and free private parking is available on site for your convenience. A peaceful hideaway or a base to explore Koh Samui’s vibrant local culture, Coconuts Palm Resort combines natural beauty, comfort, and warm hospitality in a truly tropical setting."

name: Coconuts Palm Resort
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Pool Villas, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Bar, Room With Private Pool, Wifi Access In Room, Air Conditioning, Parking, Sun Umbrellas, 4* Accommodation, Kitchen, Family Friendly

name: 1% Coffee House
tags: Food & Beverage, Bakeries & Coffee Shops, Airconditioned Area, Outdoor Dining, Family Friendly, Coffee Shop, Fresh Roasted Coffee, Panoramic Views, Parking
description:
Discover your perfect cup, where freshly roasted coffee meets flaky pastries, all enjoyed against a backdrop of lush jungle views. Tucked away in nature, this serene hideaway is the ideal spot to slow down, sip, and savor.
Our beans are sourced from ethical farms and roasted in small batches to bring out the fullest flavor in every cup, whether you prefer a bold espresso, smooth pour-over, or creamy iced latte. Complement your brew with one of our daily house-baked pastries: flaky croissants, rich banana bread, gooey cinnamon rolls, or muffins made with local fruit.
Whether you're fueling up for an adventure or simply soaking in the peaceful jungle vibe, 1% Coffee House is more than just a café, it’s your daily ritual, redefined."

name: Sassy
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Meat Lovers, Italian Food, International Food
description:
At the heart of a unique experience, lies a passion for flavor, creativity, and unforgettable dining. Our team of dedicated chefs transforms high-quality, fresh ingredients into dishes that reflect both time-honored traditions and bold, modern techniques.
Step into our kitchen, the soul of our restaurant, where every plate is crafted with precision, love, and a deep respect for the culinary arts. Indulge in classic Italian recipes passed down through generations or daring fusion creations inspired by global flavors, each dish is a celebration of quality, flavor, and artful presentation.
At Sassy, we blend traditional Italian cuisine with innovative culinary expressions to create a menu that’s both comforting and exciting. Expect hand-rolled pastas, slow-simmered sauces, creative seasonal specials, and striking plating that delights the eyes as much as the palate.
But our experience goes beyond the plate. Our curated cocktail menu, designed by expert mixologists, complements the food with handcrafted drinks that balance sophistication and fun, perfect for a night out, a special celebration, or a simple moment of indulgence."

name: Foxtrot Bistro
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Beach Bars, Beachfront, Outdoor Dining, Vegetarian, Brunch, International Food, Breakfast, Cocktails, Sunset Restaurant

name: Oars Kitchen
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Thai Food, Vegetarian, Ice Cream & Sweets
description:
A warm and welcoming family-run Thai restaurant in the heart of Bangrak. We pride ourselves on serving authentic Thai classics and beloved international favorites, all crafted with care using fresh, locally sourced ingredients.
Our menu celebrates the vibrant flavors of Thailand,from fragrant curries and wok-fried specialties to comforting dishes with a global twist. Pair your meal with one of our refreshing drinks, all offered at friendly, affordable prices.
Whether you're a local looking for a familiar favorite or a traveler seeking a true taste of Thai hospitality, Oars Kitchen offers honest food, relaxed vibes, and genuine service, just like home."

name: La Vida Samui
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Pool Villas, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Room With Private Pool, Wifi Access In Room, Gym, Air Conditioning, Parking, Rooms With Seaview, Family Rooms, Sun Loungers Or Beach Chairs, 4* Accommodation, Family Friendly
description:
Discover a refreshing take on island living at our boutique resort nestled along the pristine white sands of Chaweng Beach. Just a one-hour flight from Bangkok and a 10-minute drive from Samui International Airport, this tranquil sanctuary invites you to slow down, reconnect, and embrace the beauty of tropical life.
Our 49 elegantly designed accommodations blend contemporary comfort with island-inspired charm. Bright, spacious interiors, natural tones, wooden floors, and soft floral touches create a serene, romantic atmosphere, while private balconies and modern amenities ensure a sense of home with every stay.
Surrounded by lush tropical gardens and facing the calm, turquoise sea, La Vida Samui offers more than just a place to rest, it’s a place to feel inspired. From fresh, authentic cuisine to genuinely warm, personalized service, every detail reflects the spirit of the island and the people who call it home.
At La Vida Samui, it’s not just a holiday, it’s a celebration of life, nature and meaningful moments."

name: Samui Natien Resort
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Bungalows, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Bar, Wifi Access In Room, Air Conditioning, Parking, Airport Shuttle, Rooms With Balcony, Family Rooms, Sun Loungers Or Beach Chairs, Sun Umbrellas, 3* Accommodation, Family Friendly
description:
Located on the lively yet picturesque Chaweng Beach, a peaceful beachfront retreat just 20 minutes from Samui International Airport awaits with direct beach access and a welcoming atmosphere, the resort is ideal for travelers seeking a blend of relaxation and convenience.
The resort’s guest rooms are thoughtfully designed with comfort and style in mind. Each room features a private balcony or a tropical garden terrace, inviting you to unwind in a natural setting. Amenities such as air conditioning, complimentary WiFi, satellite television, and a minibar fridge ensure a relaxing and hassle-free stay.
Guests can enjoy the outdoor swimming pool, relax by the sea after exploring the island, all while simply soaking in the laid-back atmosphere, Samui Natien Resort provides a warm and comfortable home away from home. Experience genuine Thai hospitality, attention to detail, and the soothing rhythm of island life at Samui Natien Resort."

name: The Stay Chaweng Beach Resort
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Bar, Wifi Access In Room, Air Conditioning, Family Rooms, Sun Umbrellas, 24 Hours Front Desk
description:
Perfectly positioned along the shoreline, on offer is a stylish and convenient beachfront escape in the heart of Samui. With the ocean just steps away, this modern resort is designed for travelers who value both relaxation and location.
Each guest room is thoughtfully appointed with a comfortable seating area, flat-screen TV, air conditioning, and a private bathroom with a walk-in shower and complimentary toiletries. Select rooms feature a private terrace, offering a peaceful spot to enjoy the sea breeze. Every room is also equipped with a refrigerator, making it easy to store drinks and snacks during your stay.
Whether you’re unwinding in your room, exploring Chaweng’s vibrant surroundings, or simply soaking up the beachside atmosphere, The Stay Chaweng Beach Resort promises a memorable island getaway, right by the sea, right where you want to be."
