name: Chaweng Villawee Hotel
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Bar, Wifi Access In Room, Rooms With Balcony, Sun Umbrellas, 3* Accommodation
description:
Experience the vibrant heart of Koh Samui at a stylish and modern retreat located just minutes from the island’s most famous beach clubs and the soft sands of Chaweng Beach. Designed for both comfort and convenience, the hotel features a beautiful swimming pool and a welcoming atmosphere perfect for couples, solo travelers, or friends on a tropical getaway.
Ideally situated in the center of Chaweng, the hotel is surrounded by a wide variety of restaurants, massage and spa centers, bars, nightclubs, and shopping venues, everything you need is right at your doorstep.
Let the outside world fade away while lounging poolside, get out exploring the buzzing nightlife, or spend the day soaking up the sun, Chaweng Villawee Hotel offers the perfect balance of relaxation and excitement in a modern setting."

name: Rice x De Pier
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Beachfront, Seafood, Thai Food, Wood Oven, Outdoor Dining, Italian Food, Brunch, Mediterranean Food, Breakfast, Cocktails, Wifi Access In Restaurant
description:
Nestled along the shoreline is a culinary escape where coastal elegance meets industrial chic. This beachside restaurant and ocean bar offers a one-of-a-kind dining experience, blending contemporary style with the calming rhythm of the sea with authenic Italian cuisine. Inside, the spacious interior features warm lighting, exposed brick walls, and rich wooden floorboards, creating a refined yet relaxed ambiance with subtle nautical touches.
Step outside and dine with your toes in the sand at our oceanfront tables, where panoramic views of the sea and the gentle breeze set the tone for a truly tranquil experience. Whether you're sipping fine wine, enjoying a crafted cocktail, or indulging in our full menu of elevated cuisine, Rice x De Pier delivers excellence in every detail.
Start the day with a light breakfast, recharge with an afternoon brunch or indulge in sunset dinners, this vibrant spot is where fresh flavors, good vibes, and exceptional service come together. Welcome to Rice x De Pier
,
where the beach meets bold gastronomy."

name: Nonna & Son
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Meat Lovers, Wood Oven, Airconditioned Area, Outdoor Dining, Italian Food, Brunch, Mediterranean Food, Wifi Access In Restaurant, Fresh Roasted Coffee, Wine Pairing
description:
Welcome to where the heart of Italy meets the soul of Chaweng. Specializing in authentic Italian cuisine, our restaurant offers a warm, family-inspired atmosphere with a modern touch. From handcrafted pasta to wood-fired grilled specialties, every dish is a tribute to traditional Italian flavors, just like Nonna used to make.
Located in the vibrant heart of Chaweng Beach Road, our second-floor terrace offers the perfect spot to unwind. Enjoy a leisurely brunch or dinner with a view, as you overlook the lively street below and soak in the relaxed island vibe.
Whatever your craving, from a classic espresso and fresh-baked focaccia or a perfectly grilled seafood platter with a glass of wine, Nonna & Son is your go-to destination for genuine Italian hospitality and unforgettable flavors. Come for the food, stay for the feeling."

name: The Bagel
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Outdoor Dining, Fast Food, Vegetarian, Brunch, International Food, Breakfast, Coffee Shop, Sweets, Nutritious Drinks
description:
We believe great days start with great food. Our artisan bagels are baked fresh every morning, using time-honored techniques and the finest ingredients. With a delicious selection of fillings made from locally sourced produce, meats, and cheeses—including smoked salmon, cream cheese, and vibrant veggie combos, there's something for every craving.
Looking for something beyond the bagel? Try our hearty burrito wraps, packed with bold flavors and wholesome ingredients with a selection of iced coffees and fruit smoothies, perfect for a filling breakfast, a satisfying lunch, or a snack on the go. Fresh, fast, and full of flavor, The Bagel is your daily stop for handcrafted bites made with care."

name: Chaweng Buri Beach Resort
tags: Accommodation, Pool Villas, Bungalows, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Bar, Room With Private Pool, Wifi Access In Room, Air Conditioning, Family Rooms, Sun Loungers Or Beach Chairs, Sun Umbrellas, 3* Accommodation
description:
Discover tranquility, where tropical beauty and peaceful seclusion come together in perfect harmony. Nestled along the soft sands of Chaweng Beach and surrounded by lush, vibrant gardens, the resort offers a serene escape from the everyday.
Private bungalows and pool villas blend comfort with natural charm, creating a space where you can truly unwind. Stroll beneath towering palms, listen to the gentle rustle of leaves, and let the calming atmosphere restore your sense of balance.
Let go and relax by the sea, explore the island, or simply enjoy a slower pace of life, Chaweng Buri Beach Resort invites you to experience a getaway defined by nature, comfort, and quiet luxury."

name: Chaweng Buri Beach Resort
tags: Accommodation, Pool Villas, Bungalows, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Bar, Room With Private Pool, Wifi Access In Room, Air Conditioning, Family Rooms, Sun Loungers Or Beach Chairs, Sun Umbrellas, 3* Accommodation

name: WILD WOOD Beach Fitness
tags: Sports & Fitness, Gym & Fitness, On The Beach
description:
A unique blend of health, nature, and sustainability, transforming the traditional workout into an energizing outdoor experience. With premium, eco-friendly fitness equipment set right on the beach, guests can train in harmony with nature, surrounded by sea air, sunlight, and the calming sound of the waves.
This innovative fitness concept caters to the growing number of travelers who value wellness and want to stay active during their vacation. Whether it’s strength training, bodyweight exercises, or functional workouts, WILD WOOD provides a refreshing alternative to indoor gyms, inviting guests to reconnect with both nature and their fitness goals.
Beyond enhancing physical health, exposure to natural surroundings has been shown to reduce stress, boost mood, and increase motivation. By incorporating sustainable fitness into a scenic outdoor setting, WILD WOOD leaves guests feeling refreshed, accomplished, and inspired."

name: Star Gym & Fitness Center
tags: Sports & Fitness, Gym & Fitness, Personal Trainer, Muay Thai
description:
A modern fitness destination designed for the new generation of health-conscious individuals. Whether you're just starting your fitness journey or looking to take your training to the next level, our gym is the perfect space for anyone committed to achieving better health and a stronger body.
We offer more than just equipment, our team, in collaboration with experienced external coaches, provides expert guidance on both training and nutrition to support your overall wellness goals. From personalized fitness tips to nutritional advice, we’re here to help you every step of the way.
Our facility is equipped with a wide selection of free weights, plate-loaded machines, and high-performance cardio equipment. We proudly feature cutting-edge fitness technology from leading manufacturers such as Matrix and Bailih, ensuring every workout is both effective and enjoyable.
What sets Star Gym apart is our inclusion of specialized equipment not commonly found in standard gyms, offering unique training options tailored to all levels. With a clean, dynamic environment and top-tier gear, Star Gym & Fitness Center empowers you to train smarter, feel better, and reach your full potential."

name: BedTime Hotel Samui
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Breakfast, Wifi Access In Room, Gym, Air Conditioning, Parking, Laundry Service, Airport Shuttle, Rooms With Balcony, Family Rooms, 24 Hours Front Desk, Concierge Services

name: Samui Verticolor
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Bar, Wifi Access In Room, Air Conditioning, Parking, Rooms With Seaview, Laundry Service, Airport Shuttle, Rooms With Balcony, Family Rooms, Sun Umbrellas, 24 Hours Front Desk, Room Service, 3* Accommodation, Kid's Friendly
description:
Where vibrant design meets laid-back island living. Perfectly situated in the quieter southern end of Chaweng Beach, our colorful and contemporary hotel offers a cheerful atmosphere perfect for travelers seeking both relaxation and convenience.
With 151 well-appointed guestrooms, Samui Verticolor provides a refined retreat featuring elegant interiors, modern comforts, and stunning views of the mountains and sea. Whether you're lounging by the refreshing swimming pool or unwinding in your stylish room, every detail is designed to enhance your tropical holiday experience.
Blending contemporary architecture with playful charm, Samui Verticolor invites you to enjoy the best of Koh Samui in a setting that’s as bright and joyful as your vacation should be."

name: New Star Beach Resort
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Pool Villas, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Restaurant, Wifi Access In Room, Gym, Air Conditioning, Rooms With Seaview, Laundry Service, Airport Shuttle, Rooms With Balcony, Family Rooms, Sun Loungers Or Beach Chairs, 24 Hours Front Desk, Room Service, 4* Accommodation, Kid's Friendly
description:
Welcome to where the spirit of Koh Samui’s easy-going lifestyle meets contemporary comfort. Beautifully situated on the serene sands of Chaweng Noi Beach, our resort offers a tranquil retreat designed for couples, families, and travelers seeking relaxation, style, and heartfelt service.
Set within a lush tropical garden and boasting 200 meters of pristine oceanfront, New Star is a true hideaway that feels worlds apart, yet just a short walk from the vibrant energy, dining, and cultural attractions of Chaweng.
Surrounded by the calming effect of nature while you're lounging by the sea, or strolling through the peaceful lush green grounds, every moment at New Star is thoughtfully crafted to help you unwind and reconnect. Spacious, stylish, and effortlessly welcoming, New Star Beach Resort invites you to experience some of life’s finer moments, right on the beach."

name: The Blooming Gallery
tags: Food & Beverage, Restaurants, Bakeries & Coffee Shops, Afternoon Tea, Airconditioned Area, Fusion Food, Vegetarian, Brunch, International Food, Breakfast, Fresh Roasted Coffee
description:
Happiness blossoms with every bite. Tucked away in a vibrant corner of Koh Samui, this charming café invites you to indulge in a fusion of artful cuisine and floral inspiration.
Here, every dish is a piece of edible art, beautifully presented, thoughtfully crafted, and made with only the finest ingredients. The menu celebrates both local gems and global flavors, blending the unique tastes of Samui with beloved international classics. Whether you're savoring a tropical twist on a familiar dish or discovering a new favorite, each bite is designed to delight your palate and spark joy.
With a warm, welcoming atmosphere and a creative menu that evolves with the seasons, The Blooming Gallery is more than just a café, it's an experience. A harmonious blend of comfort and innovation, it’s the perfect spot to unwind, explore new flavors, and let your senses bloom."

name: Synergy Samui
tags: Accommodation, Hotels & Resorts, Pool Villas, Beachfront, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, Spa Retreat, Restaurant, Bar, Room With Private Pool, Wifi Access In Room, Gym, Rooms With Seaview, Laundry Service, Airport Shuttle, Sun Umbrellas, Room Service, 4* Accommodation, Kid's Friendly
description:
A tranquil escape where modern design blends with the natural beauty of Chaweng beach. Set against the natural beauty of the island, this beachfront retreat is embraced by romantic, unspoiled surroundings and cooled by the gentle sea breeze, creating an atmosphere of relaxation and renewal.
The resort features five distinct categories of stylishly designed villas, tailored to meet the needs of every traveler. Choose from spacious Family Rooms, elegant Deluxe Villas, scenic Pool View accommodations, or opt for the exclusivity of our Beachfront Villas. For a more private experience, indulge in our luxurious Jacuzzi or Pool Villas, each thoughtfully appointed with modern amenities, tasteful furnishings, and a private terrace or balcony overlooking lush gardens or the ocean.
The search is over, whatever you are seeking, from a romantic getaway, a family vacation, or a peaceful solo retreat, Synergy Samui provides the perfect blend of comfort, serenity, and tropical charm, right in the heart of one of Koh Samui’s most iconic beaches."

name: Flo Coffee Roaster
tags: Food & Beverage, Bakeries & Coffee Shops, Pet Friendly, Airconditioned Area, Brunch, International Food, Breakfast, Delivery, Wifi Access In Restaurant, Coffee Shop, Sweets, Fresh Roasted Coffee
description:
We believe every cup tells a story, of passion, precision, and the pursuit of quality. Situated in a modern, thoughtfully designed space, our café offers more than just great coffee, it's a destination for those who appreciate craft, comfort, and community.
We proudly serve premium coffee made from both locally sourced and carefully selected imported beans. Our signature blends are roasted in-house to bring out distinct, nuanced flavors, reflecting our commitment to authenticity and innovation. Each cup is prepared by skilled baristas who bring dedication and artistry to every pour, ensuring your coffee experience is nothing short of exceptional.
Pair your brew with our selection of freshly baked pastries, wholesome breakfast favorites, or refreshing fruit bowls, perfect for a leisurely brunch or a midday pick-me-up. Whether you're catching up with friends, working remotely, or simply enjoying a quiet moment, Flo’s chill atmosphere and contemporary design create a warm and welcoming space for all. At Flo Coffee Roaster, we invite you to slow down, sip thoughtfully, and savor the experience."
